translations.name: AI智慧料理鍋
translations.description:
智慧烹調多元化料理
具有7種烹調及預約定時功能–蒸煮/煮飯/快煮/稀飯/慢燉/蹄筋/恆溫。 恆溫功能精準控制溫度與時間，可製作肉類/果醬/奶烙/優格等多元化料理。
直覺易用安全防燙
全平面觸控式面板，容易清潔。 介面操作引導性強化，能一鍵完成烹調。 採用改良式隔熱反射罩，縮減機身體積，外殼亦能防燙 。 
抗菌內鍋表面紋路減少沾黏
內鍋採用含銅抗菌不銹鋼材，能抑制細菌繁殖。 表面不沾紋路設計防止米飯沾黏。
智能APP語音控制
APP引導式操作，可依照個人需求設定自動保溫時間/完成提示/按鍵音等細項。 語音控制可簡化操作流程。 食譜關鍵字搜索，讓初次使用者能更容易上手，拓展電鍋使用族群。

translations.name: Intelligent Cooker
translations.description:
Smart Cooking - Diversified Cuisines
7 cooking and reservation functions - white rice/fast cook/porridge/heating/stew/soup. Constant and precise temperature/time control for a variety of meat/jam/milk roast/yogurt dishes.
Intuitive, Easy to Use, Safe, and Anti-scalding
Full touch panel, easy to clean. Intuitive interface operations, and cooking can be completed with one click. Improved heat-insulating reflectors, reduced size, anti-scalding outer casing. 
Anti-bacterial and Anti-sticking Inner Pot Surface Texture
Inner pot made using copper-antibacterial stainless steel, which inhibits bacteria propagation. Nonstick surface design prevents rice from sticking.
Smart APP Voice Control
APP guided operation - set automatic constant temperature time/completion prompt/key press tones and other details according to your needs. Simplify the operation process using voice control. Recipe keyword search makes it easier for beginners and expands the electric cooker user group.

translations.name: 65吋高螢幕佔比多分區薄型化電視
translations.description:
在近年的電視產品中，外型的設計逐漸成為畫質外消費者注重的另一項主流規格。8K4K是目前市面上電視解析度最高的畫質，能達到7680*4320的解析度，是4K2K的4倍、1080P的16倍。今年8K4K畫質已經是各家電視的基本配備。8K4K電視在2018年全球出貨量不到2萬台，到了2019年成長到43萬台，根據市調機構預測，2020年則可快速增加至約200萬台。
群創今年推出全球最窄邊框 8K4K 電視產品，除了群創本身技術已臻成熟的8K4K解析度及120Hz螢幕更新率可提供更佳畫面品質外，更擁有超薄外型，而超窄邊框的設計(infinity design) 讓顯示區域佔螢幕面積比達 99.5%，幾乎感覺不到邊框的存在。
群創8K4K 120Hz電視藉由新的電路設計將邊框縮減到0.5 mm的寬度，為目前業界最窄設計，而且模組厚度僅 14.9 mm，使用者安裝時可非常緊貼牆面，再加上無邊框設計，可以讓電視產品完全融入家庭擺設中，增加美觀及實用的功能性。

translations.name: 65"Infinity screen and thin 8K TV
translations.description:
The resolution upgrade is definitely an important display tech trend in all applications. This trend will not only stay in mobile device but also pushing TV market to higher resolution. 
INX 65" TV with mini LED backlight not only improve the specification but also the color performance. The more colorful and vivid color is represented.
8K screen with inifinity 99.5% screen share and super slim give us a larger field of view of and stylish form factor. Mini LED backlight design emphasis on high local dimming and brightness to show vivid picture qualities than regular LED backlight. The Infinity screen of invisible bezel also create a sense of value for TV application.
INX’s latest flagship 65” TV only has 14.9 mm thickness. By applying exclusive pixel design and a special optical system, the panel border can reduce to 0.5mm. Compared with current products in the market, it’s the highest proportion of screen share.

translations.name: 23.8"3-side Borderless Privacy Display
translations.description:
These days, many industries  (healthcare, finance, security, military, and other industries dealing with sensitive information) request data protection, which is why some companies offer monitors with privacy screens adopted special folm to prevent casual security breaches. However permanent privacy screens reduce viewing angles and therefore user comfort only. InnoLux’s privacy tech allows user to turn on and off as necessary by one hot key.
InnoLux 23.8” FHD Privacy monitor features berderless design for fancy look design. InnoLux developes uniq process with patented privacy glass and special liquid chrystal to control the viewing angle then switch sharing and privacy model. When the privacy mode is activated, the display reduces its brightness and horizontal viewing angles to 90°.Then  the sensitive data are hidded from passerbyes or hackers.

1.成本競爭優勢
大量減少驅動IC和電路板的使用
2.未來性 
縮小顯示 LED pitch不用增加 driver數與電路板，輕易往微間距設計

translations.description:
Innolux is committed to scientific and technological research and development of AM miniLED display screen, using glass as the board, significantly reducing high-contamination PCBA substrates, and using TFT process to greatly reduce LED Driver  to achieve a highly integrated and high-performance display screen.
 And we also develop surface coating Technology, which makes the AM miniLED substrate display an extremely black screen effect, achieving high image quality and high-quality display screen. AM miniLED has the following advantages compared with traditional display screen:
1. Cost competitive advantage 
substantially reduce the use of driver ICs and circuit boards
2. Future possibility
Narrow display LED pitch does not need to increase the number of drivers and circuit board, easy to design to the micro pitch

translations.name: 6.4吋隱形相機顯示器
translations.description:
據科技網站調查，眾多手機新應用中屏下相機為消費者最期待之功能。而現今因為在技術上無法突破故尚未可產品化。
群創6.4"隱形相機全屏顯示器為全球首創以 LCD 技術達成屏下相機之應用，導入獨家camera pixel 專利創新設計，再以特殊光學系統讓影像可穿透背光到達相機，除可提升500%以上透光率且可有效消除繞射效應導致影像模糊之問題，突破現傳統技術所面臨之困境。
相較一般產品，隱形相機全屏顯示器無須在螢幕上挖孔設置相機專用非顯示區，故可去除現行產品令人詬病的相機孔洞及劉海問題。提升高屏佔比全屏顯示器具有更大的視野與高沉浸感。

translations.name: 6.4" LCD with invisible camera
translations.description:
According to a survey, the invisible camera dispaly is the most anticipated function of consumers in many new mobile phone applications. 
It has not been commercialized since it has many technical bottlenecks. 
Innolux 6.4" full-screen LCD with invisible camera is the world's first LCD technology to achieve the camera under display. 
By applying exclusive camera pixel design and a special optical system, the images can penetrate the display and reach to the camera. 
This technology not only improves the light transmittance to the camera under display (more than 500% ) but also effectively eliminates the image blur due to the diffraction effects. 
Compared with current products in the market, full-screen LCD with invisible camera does not need to dig holes on the screen for the camera. 
Therefore, the display can remove the camera holes and notch and increases high-screen-to-body ratio to Full-screen displays. 
It gives us a larger field of view of display and stylish form factor .

translations.name: 6.4吋環繞顯示器
translations.description:
近年全面屏的概念手機日趨流行，高屏佔比依舊為市場消費者所追求的視覺感受。以無縫拼接概念出發，設計曲面環繞屏幕手機，集結功能性、外觀性、實用性於一身的美型行動裝置。

曲面環繞且不對稱新穎設計極具視覺衝擊的外觀，突破消費者對手機外觀的想像。正面及背面以兩塊極窄邊框屏幕拼接而成，雙屏幕特色能擁有多功能應用，無論事務、娛樂一機掌握；雙面螢幕切換，無需翻轉手機，亦可讓雙側都能看到相同畫面。在娛樂、拍照等情境上提升人性化及增加互動性。

為了提高屏佔比，隱藏式攝像頭是很好的選擇；共用鏡頭，是前鏡頭亦為後鏡頭，也能節省攝像頭設計空間；此外，拍照時雙面顯示讓拍攝者及模特兒互動更直接。

translations.name: 6.4" Surrounding display
translations.description:
Starting from the concept of seamless splicing, we propose a mobile phone with a surrounding display features, which combines functionality, appearance and practicality into a beautiful mobile device. 
The curved surface and asymmetrical novel design have a visually striking appearance.
The front and back are made up of two extremely narrow bezel screens. 
The dual-screen feature can have multi-function applications in business or entertainment. 
The two-sided screen can be switched without turning the phone, so that both sides can see the same screen for the entertainment or photography. 
In order to increase the screen ratio, the hidden camera is required. 
Using the surrounding display, the same camera can be shared both the front and the rear sides, which can also save the camera design space. 
In addition, the dual-screen features of surrounding display allows the photographer and model to directly interact with each other when taking pictures.

translations.name: 內嵌式全屏指紋辨識顯示器
translations.description: 智慧型手機的普及和行動支付的需求，加速了行動裝置生物辨識的快速發展，現階段以指紋辨識為技術主流，但目前的技術都只能達到單指和固定區域的指紋辨識，群創專注在開發下世代指紋辨識技術， 開發內嵌式全屏多指指紋感測液晶顯示器， 直接把光感測器整合到 LCD array 基板內， 無須額外的相機模組， 實現屏內指紋辨識的功能， 單一顯示模組，具備指紋辨識，顯示器，觸控功能，實現輕薄和接近 100% 全面屏，可支援大面積多指感測，提升安全性和使用者體驗， 且還有輕薄低成本等優勢， 為下世代指紋辨識明星技術。

translations.name: Fingerprint Sensor in Display
translations.description: The popularity of smartphones and the demand for mobile payments have accelerated the rapid development of biometrics for mobile devices. At this stage, fingerprint recognition is the mainstream technology, but the current technology can only achieve single-finger and fixed-region fingerprint recognition. Innolux focuses on the development of an embedded full-screen multi-finger fingerprint sensing liquid crystal display, the next generation fingerprint recognition technology, directly integrating the light sensor into the LCD array substrate, without the need for additional camera modules and to realize the function of on-screen fingerprint recognition. This display module, with fingerprint recognition, display, and touch functions, realizes a thin and nearly 100% full screen, large-area multi-finger sensing function, and is more security, better user experience and low cost.

translations.name: InnoMirror
translations.description:
InnoMirror is an intelligent mirror display which  is a multi-function touch display.Users can look at the mirror and also interact with the display by the narrow border LCD splicing technology. The calendar, weather informations, breaking news and other informations closely related to the user's life are necessary.
However, in addition to be a home-use mirror, this product can also be used in public places such as cosmetic display cabinets, hair salons, dressing rooms, etc. It shows that products are varied. And the LED lights are attached around the product, in addition to its very design sense, users can also see all the outlines with plenty of light. The base is also designed with compartments to increase the use of space, place hair spray, makeup utensils, earrings, necklaces or merchandise demo samples etc. By these characteristics, it's very convenient for customers to use it in every situations.

translations.name: 13吋極致窄邊框屏
translations.description:
群創光電以優越前瞻的技術及設計能力，提供全系列薄型化LED寬螢幕筆記型電腦液晶面板，具有輕薄、省電、廣視角及高畫質等功能，可滿足客戶對多功能應用之娛樂顯示。

13吋極致窄邊框屏為群創光電最新推出應用於大尺寸筆電/行動平板領域之產品。因窄邊框設計可使機身減重及超高螢幕佔比,達到輕薄短小美觀的核心價值。其具備有高亮度(420nits)、3K2K高解析度(3000*2000)等優異特性，可呈現精細及立體感畫質。以高色彩飽和度之光阻及LED光源搭配，使得整體產品具高NTSC特性(96%)，可讓畫質呈現更加濃郁鮮艷。

translations.name: 13” Super Narrow Border Display
translations.description:
Innolux relies on its superb, forward-looking technology and design ability to develop all-series slender LED widescreen notebook LCD panels with features such as light weight, slim profile, power saving, wide viewing angle, and high resolution. These panels can satisfy customers' need for multifunctional entertainment displays.

The 13-inch super-narrow bezel screen is Innolux's latest introduction for large-sized notebooks / mobile tablets products.  Due to the narrow bezel design, it can reduce weight and the ultra-high screen ratio to achieve the core value of mobile device, thin and light. It has high brightness(420nits) and 3K2K high resolution can display fine and stereoscopic vision image. Using high saturated color resist with specified LED light source can achieve NTSC 96%. The picture quality is more rich and vivid with high color gamut.

translations.name: 沙發按摩椅
translations.description:
1.	業界首創小沙發按摩椅特殊造型可比擬傳統按摩椅大器之外觀 ，能讓小椅子也能夠享有大空間 ，針對家裡空間不足顧客也能提供頂級按摩。

2.	業界首創搭載3D機芯，結構採用氣袋充氣原理，機芯本體後有一顆氣袋充氣後順勢將機芯頂出，讓按摩滾輪可更服貼使用者身形，讓體感變成軟中帶硬，硬中帶Q，提供最舒適的按摩。

3.	與知名大廠共同開發最新款PVC合成皮料，特殊紋路設計耐磨係數較高，對家中的寵物利爪抵擋力也較高 。

4.	PVC合成皮料，另含獨家抗菌/防霉技術 ，可抑制細菌產生且通過專業認證機構檢驗，可通過抗菌/防霉的標準。

5.	搭配BLE4.0藍芽結合督洋自主開發APP功能，可利用手機或平板操作控制按摩椅，顯示按摩狀態與使用者互動 ，增加操作時之便利性與互動性。

6.	扶手設計加裝USB充電座 與手機放置槽，更符合現代人們離不開手機以及使用手機操控時之收納性。

translations.name: Sofa Massage chair
translations.description:
1.	The first small sofa-shaped massage chair has a unique, elegant appearance, providing a compact massage experience to clients with relatively small spaces at home.

2.	Even though it is a compact size, but it has a 3D massage mechanism which is operated by airbag structure to fit the contours of the user’s body more closely, thereby offering the most comfortable massage experience.

3.	The latest synthetic PVC materials developed in conjunction with major manufacturers feature superior wear-resistance, making it impervious to the sharp claws of your pets.  

4.	The synthetic PVC materials feature proprietary anti-bacteria/mold technology that inhibits bacterial growth. 

5.	BLE4.0 Bluetooth technology combined with Tokuyo’s proprietary app function allows the user to control the massage chair with a smartphone or tablet. 

6.	The armrest is equipped with a USB charging port and a smartphone slot.

translations.name: AERO 17 HDR 創作者筆電
translations.description: 技嘉AERO系列創作者筆電，自推出就廣獲好評，勇奪「歐洲電腦硬體協會2019年度最佳筆電」、「台灣精品獎」等多項大獎，堪稱｢次世代輕薄高效專業筆電」的最佳典範。本次新一代改版15吋AERO 15 OLED / 17吋AERO 17 HDR，支援4K解析度及HDR400，4K面板色彩表現依舊是技嘉獨有的拿手好戲。一般商業設計或創作應用筆電的面板色偏值(Delta E)多落在3以上，小於2已經屬於工作站等級的高畫質，但技嘉獨家與色彩權威Xrite Pantone合作，在筆電出廠前進行逐台校色，達成嚴格標準色偏值小於1*，搭配OLED面板的4K高解析及HDRTrue Black純黑超高對比，支援顯示更多色彩及細節，協助創作者完美呈現精彩作品。效能方面同步獲得NVIDIA RTXStudio筆電認證，透過專屬Studio Ready驅動程式優化超過40款創作者常用編輯軟體，提升執行效率，且具備豐富擴充介面與UHS-II SD卡插槽。真正實現「行走如風超薄筆電、強效桌機擴充專業」的使用者體驗，強大多工應用能力堪稱最佳跨界應用薄型筆電。

GIGABYTE takes it one step further by working with Xrite Pantone, the authority in color display, implementing color calibration and achieves Delta E < 1. Combined with the AMOLED 4K display and HDR True Black high contrast, colors and details can be better displayed, helping content creators flawlessly display their products. Furthermore, AERO utilizes NVIDIA Studio driver to optimize over 40 editing software programs that content creators often use for improved efficiency. AERO is truly the epitome of “an ultra-portable notebook with desktop-level performance.”

translations.name: 行車記錄器
translations.description: 創見DrivePro 10行車記錄器搭載頂級STARVIS™感光元件，提供清晰銳利的影像品質，無論是白天駕車或者在低光源下拍攝，皆能精準地呈現豐富色彩與高解析度的畫面。DrivePro 10支援1080P Full HD、每秒60幀的高畫質高速動態錄影，不僅動態影像流暢不掉格，同時在定格放大顯示時，也可清楚辨識畫面細節。內建Wi-Fi功能，透過專屬的DrivePro行動應用程式，在行動裝置上可即時瀏覽行車影片。當發生車禍時，毋須取出記憶卡即可取得錄影檔案，可立即提供相關證據給警察機關與保險相關釐清肇事責任。此外，DrivePro 10採用新一代寫卡技術，大幅提升資料完整性，免去頻繁格式化的困擾。DrivePro 10造型簡約精巧，安裝於前擋風玻璃時，可輕鬆隱身後視鏡下，裝於後擋風玻璃時，便於監控後方車況。迷你的尺寸讓安裝位置更加多元，也不易遮擋視線，為行車安全帶來最有利的保障。

translations.name: Dashcam
translations.description: Transcend's DrivePro 10 dashcam features the STARVIS™ image sensor to capture sharp, high-resolution images in superb, rich color even in low light, making it perfect for filming during both day and night. Supporting 1080P Full HD recording at 60fps, the DrivePro 10 captures every crucial detail, such as license plates. It features Wi-Fi connectivity that allows it to work with Transcend’s exclusive DrivePro app. You can easily access video evidence and report it to law enforcement and insurance companies without needing to remove the memory card. In addition, the dashcam utilizes the latest format-free technology to reduce memory card errors, obviating the need for frequent formatting. The DrivePro 10 comes in a compact, discreet design that allows it to be flexibly mounted on your front or rear windshield. Being able to easily hide behind the rearview mirror out of sight, the DrivePro 10 offers the driver an unobstructed view of the road ahead or behind.

translations.name: ASUS ZenBeam Latte 可攜式LED投影機
translations.description:
為提供給使用者「隨時隨地享受大螢幕」及清晰高亮畫面的主要需求，ZenBeam Latte除了符合消費者需求的同時也是貼近生活的設計，另外在設計方面也對環境非常友善。其中幾項創新價值包含: 

1. 方便性: 尺寸和大小就像一杯拿鐵，小巧方便好攜帶
2. 親民的外型設計: 外觀嘗試使用有溫度而柔軟的布料有別於一般電子產品冰冷的塑膠質感，希望能帶給使用者輕鬆愉悅，融入生活，也更活潑年輕的感受
3. 綠色設計: 採用環保的無汞LED光源的壽命是傳統燈的10倍，且無須暖機或冷機，可即時開關機，幫助使用者節省能源及時間。
4. 短焦投影: 在最小1公尺距離內，即可投影40吋影像，最大則可投影至120吋影像（距離3公尺），空間再小也不影響視界放大的精彩。
5. 獨立喇叭: 內建9W藍芽喇叭搭載harman kardon認證，提供良好的音頻性能，提升使用者的影音體驗。影&音的功能可以快速自由的切換，不受空間跟距離的限制。

translations.name: ProArt Station
translations.description:
It’s time to raise your expectations of what a small-form-factor PC can do. ProArt Station D940MX is a compact workstation-grade desktop with powerful specification, optimum thermal solution, and near-silence operation.

ProArt D940MX will appeal to those who dare to be different. A clever use of different materials and offset tilted design work perfectly together to create chassis that’s not only aesthetically pleasing, but also functional with effective cooling and front-facing I/O ports. Smart LED indicator is designed to facilitate creators’ work by letting them know the PC status.

D940MX features an advanced thermal solution for optimum performance, incorporating hybrid cooling, multi-zone thermal design, and four cooling fans. The industry-leading ASUS motherboard includes ASUS 5X Protection III design and has also passed strict testing for over 8000 hours to detect problems such as over-current or short circuits, providing creators with an assurance of 24/7 reliability.

The powerhouse that does it all
ASUS Chromebook Flip C436 is a convertible laptop that features an magnesium-alloy chassis that weighs just 1.1 kg. The Aerogel White finish takes advantage of optical principles to achieve a metallic iridescent effect that highlights its magnesium alloy the space-age chassis material, and gives it a smooth and elegant finish. ASUS Chromebook Flip C436 is the first laptop to utilize this environmentally friendly painting process.
Wit latest powerful Intel 10th gen processor, ASUS WiFi Master Technology, and up to 12 hours battery life, it gives all the needs for mobile workers. The innovative patent omnidirectional speaker design with harmon/kardon helps to direct sound towards the user whether it’s being used in laptop, tent, stand or tablet mode.

translations.name: ExpertBook
translations.description:
1.	針對行動商務人士打造ExpertBook B9筆電，主打全球最輕的 14 吋商用筆電，機身僅14.9公釐薄，重量僅870公克，並使用鎂鋰合金材質，相較前一代鎂鋁合金更輕、更堅固耐用，並通過軍事等級的耐用測試。以電池 66Wh 選項，滿電可維持 24 小時以上的續航。
2.	使用窄邊框設計，螢幕佔比達 94%，使14吋筆電，放入13吋機身中，保持體積小的機身，輕易放入包包中。
3.	即便輕薄，搭載齊全的連接埠、儲存空間最高達2 顆SSD 方式擴充至 4TB，保持效能強大、完整，反應速度快。
4.	為適合用於視訊會議，內建 4 個麥克風，可做全向性收音，方圓 3.5 公尺以內的人聲都能收到聲音，搭配抗噪功能，可放大人聲。
5.	為提供絕佳使用體驗，支援虛擬數字鍵盤、出色的打字體驗、具備防潑水鍵盤特性，並搭載智慧語音功能，支援微軟的 Cortana、亞馬遜的 Alexa。
6.	機身設計上，顛覆商務筆電死氣沉沉的印象，參考清水模建築，採用有稜有角的方正設計，低調且細節滿點，搭配星辰感的霧面外漆，在不同角度下，呈現綠色、紅色謎樣色彩。

    Designed to offer business users ultimate portability, ExpertBook B9, with an overall weight of just 870 g, is the world’s lightest business laptop. The NanoEdge display gives it superslim bezels, enabling a 14-inch display to fit into a 13-inch-class chassis, thereby giving it compact, briefcase-friendly dimensions. A magnesium-lithium alloy construction and internal structural bracing give it incredible durability and toughness, meeting the ultra-demanding MIL-STD 810G U.S. military standard. 
    Energy-efficient panel technology and a large capacity battery combine to give it up to 24 hours of battery life, ensuring users stay productive, even on long-haul flights.
2. Project Athena-certified:
3. User-centric innovations:
    Additional features include the exclusive ASUS NumberPad
4. Sleek, precision-crafted minimalist chassis: 
    This stylish design goes against the boring and plain image one has of typical business laptops.

translations.name: 智慧蔬果洗淨偵測器
translations.description:
由於氣候變遷，食品來源有更依賴施加農藥以提升產量之現象，目前大多數國家皆仰賴法規及標準儀器進行檢驗。然而，因各國政府在政策上執行效率上之不同，於亞洲及東南亞地區農藥殘留檢測不合格率逐年攀升；目前市面上面臨到農藥快篩的科學方法準確率及覆蓋率不足或仰賴專業檢測分析儀價格高且時間長的問題，本公司與工研院技術轉移合作，領先開發設計推出一般居家即能便利使用之智慧蔬果洗淨檢測商品，為農藥殘留帶來突破性的解決方案。
華碩團隊運用深耕三十多年電子電機本業,結合防水機構之技術層次以及UV光學、材料科學的經驗，深入了解蔬果農藥領域，經由研發同仁無數次地台灣北中南實地蔬果洗滌實驗及訊號分析，修改最適當之韌體演算法及提供專屬APP使用介面。由無線充電器上將產品隨手拿起，投入洗菜水中數秒鐘內立即開始即時偵測，紀錄洗滌日誌，改善提升自身洗滌方式及效率並可分享心得給親朋好友。 傳送至雲端蒐集到的大數據，經由資料分析將提供消費者客製化專屬功能，讓煮夫、煮婦們有全新廚房智能體驗!
本產品無論產品設計或代工廠生產製造研發技術，均由台灣國家隊組成。將核心技術留在台灣，期望成為另一個台灣之光。

translations.name: PureGo
translations.description:
The impacts on health due to excessive pesticide residue is a problem,especially in Asia.It used to only to be detected pesticide with professional equipment in a lab.
PureGO is a breakthrough designed to help users at  HOME determine if their produce has unhealthy levels of pesticides,other residue or contaminates,through a partnership with a national laboratory,plus ASUS long-term solid capacity in electric and mechanical engineering,optical,material and software knowledge.
Just picking up the device from the wireless charger,users simply turn it on and drop it into washing water.The status then is shown by the halo lighting, with green,orange,red colors indicating the levels of safety.Dedicated App. features such as data records,chart display,to improve washing-efficiency.Real-time data can simultaneously be transmitted to the cloud with database AI analysis.  
Both of product core technical design and manufacturing process are stay in Taiwan and hope it can be next glory of MIT.

translations.description: ROG Kunai 3 Gamepad 包含四個模組：左右控制器(Controllers)、保護殼(Bumper)、充電板(Charger)、手把(Grip)。ROG Kunai 3 Gamepad 模組化設計，實現Handheld mode（左右控制器固定於手機兩側）、Gamepad Mobility mode（左右控制器結合充電板)與Gamepad All in one mode三種模式（左右控制器結合充電板與下手把）。Handheld mode採透過Type C USB2.0有線連結，將左右手把與手機連接，提供無延遲的操作體驗；Gamepad Mobility mode讓玩家以最小的體積，與最簡要的內容搭配攜行包就能輕鬆攜帶，並擁有良好的手感與遊戲操作；Gamepad All-in-one mode則提供了最舒適的握感與人因，讓玩家能長時間遊玩卻不會感到不適。整合式的產品設計，讓一項產品能發揮出眾多功能，並使在手機上玩遊戲的遊戲體驗、氛圍以及操作皆更佳流暢且專業。如此強大的手機遊戲裝置，前所未見。

translations.name: ROG Kunai 3 Gamepad
translations.description: ROG Kunai 3 Gamepad is designed for immersive mobile gaming. It consists of a Bumper, two Controllers, Charger and Grip. Attach the left and right Controllers to ROG Phone 3 via the Bumper for Handheld mode. The Controllers can also be mounted on the Charger (for  Mobility Gamepad mode) or the Grip (for All-in-one Gamepad Mode) to create a standalone controller. ROG Kunai 3 Gamepad offers exceptional control, whether in compact All-in-one Gamepad mode or when paired with ROG Phone 3 in Handheld mode. At home, attach the Kunai 3 Grip for a more ergonomic console gamepad-like design and play games on a large-screen tv or display. We've also found that most mobile controlers only offer a single mode of operation, and  Bluetooth latency detracts from the gaming experience.With USB 2.0 wired connection, ROG Kunai offers zero latency.

translations.name: 華碩VivoWatch健康錶
translations.description:
ASUS VivoWatch SP，最重視健康管理的智慧手錶。

獨家創新微電與光學雙感測器：比市售其他廠牌智慧手錶增加以手指測量的感測器，能更精準專業測量使用者健康數值及情緒壓力，包含活動心率、脈波指數、身心平衡指數、舒壓指數、Pulse O2、運動及睡眠脈搏血氧感測。

全新身心平衡指數功能：透過偵測心率加速、減緩、變化，即時管理身心的協調以及平衡狀態，結合舒壓指數及身心平衡指數共同分析，可幫助使用者完整管理身心平衡以避免失調進而影響到生活與情緒。

ASUS HealthConnect APP：手動設定或記錄服藥提醒，血壓趨勢及女性生理健康趨勢記錄等貼心健康功能，我的健康生活圈可透過分享功能，讓最親愛的家人、另一半以及好友參與我的健康管理，雲端備份健康資料：透過免費的雲端分享功能，備份完整健康資訊。

B2B與醫療院所合作：可支援一對多遠距雲端健康管理技術，24小時即時遠端監測合作醫療院所中使用者的生理數據，藉由這些資料的蒐集，進一步建立數位模型，讓醫療院所能夠更清楚使用者可能出現的生理狀況趨勢及變化，盡早做出決策因應，有效管理其健康狀態。

translations.name: 4G LTE 防水防塵資產監控衛星定位監控器
translations.description: 威潤科技旗下AS11 4G LTE 防水防塵資產監控衛星定位監控器適用於各種高價資產的追蹤及監控。AS11 搭載適用於物聯網的4G LTE Cat.1/Cat.M1通訊技術，並可選配加裝藍芽通信，讓資訊傳輸更加便捷。因應大多放置於戶外的高價資產，AS11配備IP68防水防塵等級外殼，既使曝露在惡劣的環境之下依然可以順利運行。AS11內建三軸加速度感測器，可以有效監測資產異常位移及碰撞，並配備大容量可充電式電池，既使在沒有外部電源支援的情況下，仍然可以長時間運行。此外，AS11搭載通用型之輸入輸出介面(GPIO)，可以輕鬆擴充周邊配件，例如:溫溼度感知器、位移感知器、身分辨識卡、太陽能充電板等，以滿足各種不同的監測需求，像是: 冷鏈監控應用、工程機具管理、冷凍貨櫃監測等。AS11協助企業監控旗下資產動態並收集相關數據，企業可依據資產實際耗用況狀，預先安排檢修，以預防資產無預警故障所導致的營業損失。此外，企業也可依據資產實際使用情況，規劃維護舊有資產及投資新資產的預算。AS11實現各種資產監控的創新應用，並協助企業提升管理效能和降低營運成本。

translations.name: 4G LTE Trailer & Asset Tracker
translations.description: ATrack AS11 4G LTE Trailer & Asset Tracker is a perfect device for asset tracking and monitoring. It is equipped with 4G LTE Cat.1 / Cat.M1 and Bluetooth communication technologies that make data transmission more convenient and suitable for various IoT applications. With IP68 rated casing, AS11 is designed to operate under extreme environment against water and dust. Moreover, AS11 is equipped with a large-capacity rechargeable battery, so it can last for a long period of times without external power. It is also equipped with GPIOs for better solution expandability by connecting to a wide range of accessories, such as temperature and humidity sensor, displacement sensor, ID reader & tag, solar panel, etc., to meet various monitoring needs; for example, cold chain monitoring, construction equipment management, reefer monitoring, etc. ATrack AS11 is incorporated numerous technologies to achieve diverse IoT applications.

translations.name: 備份豆腐
translations.description:
曾經因為手機弄丟，忘記備份，造成照片全沒的悲劇？還是覺得備份好麻煩，除了要簽雲端賣身契，還得付高額的雲端月租費？現在，有了Qubii備份豆腐，你不用再苦惱到底該如何備份了！

『Qubii備份豆腐，充電就自動備份』一手機充電就自動備份您的照片、影片、聯絡人、FB/IG，自動化讓您省時、省力，揮別手機容量不足的困擾，輕鬆保存珍貴照片！

1.充電就自動備份，簡單到阿嬤都會
只要把備份豆腐連接您的充電線＆充電頭，完成初始設定，過後每次手機充電即可自動備份。

2.無限備份空間，不受雲端容量制約
備份豆腐可換卡式設計，想用多少容量就付多少，存滿了還可換記憶卡，換卡也不重複備份，免綁約、免月租費，輕鬆擁有iPhone私人備份空間。

3.一邊玩遊戲，一邊備份
背景備份技術，即便滑手機，也能自動備份，完全不受干擾！

4.智慧型APP，瀏覽整理照片更便利
照片可依年月日自動排序，省去手動整理的麻煩。照片依手機名稱分類，多支手機共用照片也不會混在一起。

5.可當讀卡機，連接電腦看檔案
不論是Go Pro、空拍機、行車記錄器裡的檔案，都可以插進備份豆腐，開始電腦或手機觀看。

translations.name: Qubii
translations.description: Qubii provides automatic full back-up of your data while you’re charging your device. It saves your data into a micr-SD memory card; once full, the Qubii app will remind you to replace a card to continue the back-up process without duplication. This is Apple-certified MFi product, useable and workable even when the iOS has been updated. An innovative iOS invention called ‘Non-interference Background Thread Technology’ allows you to make calls and play games as Qubii continues to work in the background. Qubii creates separate folders so you can share one memory card between different devices. Can be used as card reader or USB port. One year manufacturer’s warranty. This combination is exclusive to Cathy Pacific Group.

translations.name: MindDuo 2 Plus 坐姿提醒智能檯燈
translations.description:
全球第一盞結合雙感應器與演算法的坐姿提醒智能檯燈

MindDuo 2 Plus坐姿提醒智能檯燈，為改善兒童閱讀姿勢不良及光線不足兩大問題而設計之產品。我們都知道，近視主要成因為「光線太暗」及「閱讀距離太近」，近來科技進步使檯燈產品發展日臻完善，光線太暗問題早已被解決，然孩子的坐姿問題，卻始終只能靠家長自行叮嚀提醒，我們觀察到多數家長都為此問題頭疼，一方面無法時時刻刻陪伴孩子身邊、一方面又怕講多了被孩子嫌嘮叨，為解決這些問題，BenQ研發出MindDuo 2 Plus，一盞具備坐姿提醒功能的智能檯燈。

*主要功能:
-坐姿提醒:透過超音波與紅外線感測器，結合坐姿判斷演算法邏輯，偵測孩子的頭是否趴太低，並適時以語音提醒端正坐姿
-智能調光:光感應器隨時偵測桌面亮度，自動補足閱讀所需光線。書本閱讀模式，光線充足均勻而寬廣；螢幕閱讀模式，降低中央光輸出，避免螢幕反光，兩側補足所需照明
-隱藏光源:隱藏式光學設計搭配雙翼反射片，光線寬廣明亮而不刺眼

*其他貼心設計:
-自動開關燈，入席2秒鐘開燈，離席3分鐘關燈
-30分鐘休息提醒
-倒吊燈頭，燈體無反射眩光
-飛梭旋鈕，亮度色溫一轉到位

translations.name: MindDuo 2 Plus, Desk Lamp with Posture Reminder
translations.description:
MindDuo 2 Plus, a desk lamp for children, featuring posture reminder function. 
We all know that the main cause of myopia, or short-sightedness, is spending long time on near work such as writing, reading or watching screen with insufficient lighting and improper posture. We notice that poor posture is indeed a common problem on children. Most parents realize it but have no other solutions but to keep reminding children to sit up straight by themselves. 

Now, BenQ is here providing MindDuo 2 Plus, to help deal with this problem. 

【Product Features】
- Posture Reminder : With ultrasonic and PIR sensors, the lamp detects the position of head and remind children to sit up straight if their head is too close to the desk. 
- Auto-dimming Adjustment : With a light sensor, the lamp detects ambient lighting condition and automatically adjusts brightness.
- Hidden Light Sources : To avoid dazzling glare directly seen by children, the light sources are hidden into upper case of lamp head.

奧圖碼 2020 年全新 4K 雷射超短焦家庭劇院 P2 再次登場，承襲去年銀質獎 P1 既有的高解析度、高便利性、高智能的優勢外，更強化了色彩光影處理和軟體功能升級，外型上則改走更精簡、更清爽的外觀材質處理來降低生產成本，進而能以更優惠的價格讓更多消費者體驗 4K 大視覺的美好，徹底貫徹 P1 和 P2 在「輕奢華享受」與「不受限的大視野」上的產品定位。此外，P2 全新「Framed」功能為 P1 DecoWall 的強化版本，允許用戶以動態方式客製呈現自己喜愛的數位畫廊，精準打造每個用戶不同的居家生活時尚!

+ 奧圖碼獨家Smart+智慧平台
+ 內建NuForce頂級音響

translations.description:
創新建立在品質之上，先有品質的基礎，再建立創新功能，努力為台灣產業盡一份心力，讓台灣製造成為世界精品，讓國人享受最高級別的畫質享受，不讓國外品牌專美於前，不只是在價格上的竸爭力，更在技術面讓台灣品質技術名列前茅! 國產第一台量子點顯示器，色域超過NTSC 100% 符合電影業界標準DCI-P3規範，畫質細膩精緻，數十年經驗功力盡現，標準更上一層樓；量子點技術採用珠光抗UV技術，色彩持久不褪色，精緻優美外形，全金屬設計外觀，以銀色為主體顏色，中間黑色裝飾點綴，大型獨立的X型中間全金屬閃光腳座，大氣高檔又不失優美身形，多樣的尺寸一定有一個適合你的尺寸。

       行銷的方面，禾聯量子點用方便好來行銷以家庭為導向，客廳因為禾聯有了歡樂，因為禾聯有了幸福，在行銷上以實質的客戶體驗來取代過去的話術行銷方式。

translations.name: Apple HomeKit智慧空調
translations.description:
投身物聯網家電是禾聯碩近年來的發展策略重點，歷經好幾年的佈局準備，創造出全國第一台符合Apple Homekit規範的雲端空調產品。在進入Apple Homekit生態圈市場之前，必須經由「Apple MFi製造認證商」進行產品的品質、生產及相關網路安全元件的認證（相關認證標準僅2%的通過率），才可以成為Apple的週邊商品，極其嚴苛。目前全台超過1,000萬民眾為Apple用戶，此參選商品將帶動空調以最新的形態展現於市場上。
R32變頻一級GF系列雲端智慧防沼空調，除了居家網路及隱私安全有保障外，機體本身也具備齊全的防護特點：室內、外機皆有藍波防鏽，室內機更有沼氣防護功能，可有效延緩銅管受沼氣侵蝕進而增加機體壽命；5D氣流出風，有效提高室內冷房效率並使空間涼感均衡；去除PM2.5濾網阻隔空氣中微小灰塵，使空氣更加清淨。
禾聯「Apple Homekit」GF系列雲端智慧防沼空調，產品特點與品質獲得國際性品牌蘋果公司的認同，並同時擁有蘋果認證經銷商的銷售資格，產品在APPLE公司官方網站上刊登列表後，大幅改變消費者對於空調產品的認知與定位，將引領空調產品進入全新的市場型態與消費模式。

translations.description:
產品面:
1.全強固型車聯網車廠檢測平板電腦M133K提供豐富I / O功能和選項，可快速與任何車檢應用程序互聯。
2. M133K通過IP65防塵和防水與MIL-STD-810跌落和振動測試認證，可在-20°C至60°C（-4°F〜140°F）的溫度下運行。 
3. 全強固型平板電腦的13.3吋大螢幕以及Intel i5-7200U高速處理器可以分割畫面同時監測車輛檢驗進度與電力狀況，協助預防車輛損壞。
行銷面:
1. 德國第一大品牌車廠的車檢服務團隊，採用融程強固型平板電腦搭配自動車檢系統，效率提升60%，大幅降低服務時間。
2.車檢團隊能夠從各廠區角落遠端連結中央控制系統，並且進行自動檢驗流程。進而讓每台轎車都能在45分鐘內完成檢驗流程，幫助車檢維持緊湊的行程。
3.車檢服務員每位都配備M133K全強固型平板電腦。使用平板的內建4G遠端聯繫中央控制系統，連結車輛數據與資料中心的伺服器提供精準正確的安全檢測數據。操作者亦可透過平板電腦從車檢場與中央辦公室電腦聯繫，保證車檢以最快的速度服務客戶。

translations.description:
Product side:
1. Fully rugged tablet M133K passed IP65 dust and water proof and MIL-STD-810 drop and vibration test certification, and can be operated at a temperature of -20 ° C to 60 ° C (-4 ° F ~ 140 ° F).
3. The 13.3-inch large screen of the fully rugged tablet PC and the Intel i5-7200U high-speed processor can split the screen while monitoring the vehicle inspection progress.
Marketing surface:
1. The car inspection service team of Germany's largest brand manufacturer adopts fully rugged tablet M133K with automatic inspection system, which improves the efficiency by 60% and greatly reduces the service time. 
2. The car inspection team can remotely connect the central control system from the corners of each plant area and carry out the automatic inspection process. In turn, each car can complete the inspection process within 45 minutes, helping the vehicle inspection maintain a compact journey.

translations.name: LoRaWAN閘道器
translations.description:
研華WISE-6610閘道器，可串接至多500組LoRaWAN感測器，經由LoRaWAN無線傳輸，對下接收感測器蒐集而來的數據，對上透過無線3G/LTE或者有線乙太網路，將資料上傳雲端平台，供使用者監測、運用、分析感測內容，達到遠端監控管理之目的。

LoRaWAN的特色為「遠距離傳輸，所需功耗低」。為此，LoRaWAN方案適合用在幅員廣大的監測場域，或者地理位置分散的監測對象。

以國內為例，台灣林地水域的占地廣，定時派送人員至各觀測點，移動、人力與時間成本龐大，資訊蒐集的頻率卻十分有限。套用LoRaWAN方案，將耗電量極低的感測器安裝於欲監測處，市中心辦公室內僅需少量員工，即可隨時掌握全部監測對象狀態。不但節省人物力，提高監控效率，同時取得大量數據供研究人員使用。

以國外為例，德國超商內皆有瓶罐回收機。這些機台安裝LoRaWAN感測器，配合研華WISE-6610閘道器，將回收狀況傳送至回收商辦公室。有別於以往派遣大量工作人員定時巡檢機台狀況，利用LoRaWAN科技，總部僅需派送人員至"已滿"或"故障"的回收機，完成任務即可。此方案為客戶節省大量人物力，並巨幅提高資源運用效率。

translations.name: LoRaWAN Gateway
translations.description:
Advantech WISE-6610 gateway connect up to 500 sensors to receive and transmit data to cloud platform via wireless 3G/LTE or wired Ethernet connections for data acquisition, computing and analytic, achieving remote, real-time control and monitoring. Featuring in "low-power, wide transmission area", this solution is best for applications in wide area without geographical boundary.

In Taiwan, forests and water bodies are everywhere. Sending staff to monitor stations periodically results in high human, time and travel costs but still with limited efficiency. With this solution, managers deploy LoRaWAN sensors around to have data sent back to office run by just a few employees, allowing for instant, remote and centralized monitoring.

In Germany, recycle machines with sensors are in every supermarket can immediately send recycle status back to a control room. Other than assign inspect staff periodically, the manager only send people there when a machine is full or out of order.
translations.meta_description: Advantech WISE-6610 gateway connect up to 500 sensors to receive and transmit data to cloud platform via wireless 3G/LTE or wired Ethernet connections...

translations.name: 智能震動感測器
translations.description:
WISE-2410可用於監控固定或移動設備，全天候蒐集數據，業者可掌握設備的利用率，將產能極大化。其搭載最新ARM Cortex-M4處理器，能將原始震動數據透過傅立葉運算轉換成頻譜資訊，再進而演算出更具價值的震動特徵值，用戶可透過速度RMS、位移P-P特徵值與ISO 10816-3交叉比對，並透過加速度RMS、Peak、Kurtosis等其他震動特徵值，分析機械設備的運作趨勢，判斷其水泵、冰機、空壓機、風扇等馬達機械設備狀態，進一步作到主動追蹤設備健康狀態，預防無預警停機，以發現並修正根本問題和擬定預防性保養計畫。

WISE-2410架設簡易，隨插即用，產品可耐-20°C - 85°C寬溫、採IP-66等級防護設計，縱使機體在惡劣環境下採集、運算和傳送資料，依舊不受阻礙；在供電設計上，WISE-2410使用低功耗晶片方案，搭配2顆3.6V AA的鋰電池並聯驅動。以15分鐘回報一筆資料的運作條件下，電力供應可長達2年之久，即便已在低電量警示下，電力仍可運作3個月無虞。
translations.meta_description: WISE-2410可用於監控固定或移動設備，全天候蒐集數據，業者可掌握設備的利用率，將產能極大化。其搭載最新ARM Cortex-M4處理器，能將原始震動數據透過傅立葉運算...

translations.name: LoRaWAN Smart Vibration Sensor
translations.description:
WISE-2410 can be used to monitor fixed or mobile devices and collect data 24/7. Users can estimate the operational status of any motor-powered mechanical equipment by cross-comparison of RMS speeds and eigenvalues against ISO 10816-3 standards and vibration characteristic values. Equipment can be proactively tracked its health and status of production lines and machines, preventing unwarned downtimes and plan better preventive maintenance.

WISE-2410 is easy to set up and supports plug and play. The product can withstand wide-temperature ranges from -20 °C to 85 °C and has an IP-66 rating for dust and water ingress resistance. WISE-2410 uses a low-power consumption IC solution and is driven by two 3.6V AA lithium batteries. Under regular operating conditions (returning a packet of data every 15 minutes), the battery life can be as long as two years. Even under low power warning conditions, the power supply can still operate for up to three months.

translations.name: Full HD旋轉無線網路攝影機
translations.description:
360度無死角，可以隨時監看家中的任一個角落再加上支援自動追蹤功能，任何風吹草動鏡頭都可以隨時轉到移動物件的區域更加安全，人形偵測更可以大幅過濾非人為的錯誤警報，讓使用者可以收到最正確推播訊息，為了讓使用者更安心增加了隱私模式，開啟之後鏡頭就會隱藏至機殼內，完全不擔心個人隱私問題。

DCS-8526LH更是取得了Onvif協議認證，可以支援第三方Onvif協議的NVR或是監控軟體，更可以讓一些小型的店舖用較低的成本及更簡單的安裝設定來架構屬於自己的監控系統。

translations.name: Full HD Pan & Tilt Pro Wi-Fi Camera
translations.description:
The mydlink DCS-8526LH Full HD Pan & Tilt Pro Wi-Fi Camera is a surveillance camera that is designed to blend into a room decoration and be in obtrusive, while effectively monitoring large areas of a home or small office at all hours of the day. The device provides a wide range of features to help users effortlessly track and monitor what’s important - kids, elderly parents, or pets - even as they move around the room.
The core design concept of the DCS-8526LH was to adapt to the home use case – our hope was that when using the DCS-8526LH, the user can enjoy a pleasant sense of security in their home, bringing technology into their everyday life in an organic way. The exterior design adopts a round and harmonious style, further softened by the use of a textured surface treatment. The design was built on the powerful yet easy-to-use functions that are the core foundation of the product.

translations.name: mydlink戶外型無線智能插座
translations.description: DSP-W320是目前是全球唯一提供戶外5V/2.1A USB供電的戶外型智能插座，內建802.11b/g/n及BLE藍芽無線網路, 可直接連到無線路由器, 不需使用額外的HUB做連接，可讓您隨時隨地控制戶外電器。通過IP54防水認證，可承受雨，雪或沙塵暴等惡劣的室外天氣環境。輕巧的尺寸設計可以輕鬆整合室外與室內的家電系統。DSP-W320提供雙插座大幅增加使用的靈活度，每個插座可獨立操作並有LED顯示插座的開關狀態，整機通過UL安全規範認證。使用者可以透過mydlink™APP輕鬆設定自動排程、警報器或是手動開關設備電源，可有效節省電源使用。 支援smart BLE功能, 當使用者拿手機開啟APP接近此設備時，APP就會自動列出此設備, 此時只要點選它就可進行設備安裝，並且能夠跟友訊所有智能家庭系列產品都能無縫互通，並使用友訊自行開發的雲端系統, 目前此系統已有數百萬用戶正在使用中。同時支持Amazon Alexa 和 Google Assistant等智慧音箱操作。

translations.name: mydlink Outdoor Wi-Fi Smart Plug
translations.description:
The DSP-W320 Outdoor Wi-Fi Smart Plug is a versatile and easy-to-use device that allows you to monitor and control outdoor electrical appliances from wherever you are. It has an IP54 rating, which means it
can withstand outdoor weather environments such as rain, snow or dust storms. Its compact size lets you inconspicuously integrate outdoor areas into your connected home system and the legible LEDs let you know the status at a glance. Automatic scheduling provides a helpful way to save power whileyou’re at work or asleep, and the mydlink™ app provides an easy way to set up alerts or manually power a device on or off, giving you peace of mind – anytime. It stands up to wet encounters in your backyard, so you can be sure your connected appliances stay powered on all the time. And with weather resistant seals, the outlets stay protected from weather penetration when not in use. It gives you more flexibility with two independently-controlled outlets.

translations.name: Armor G5 12空間串流10G WiFi 6智能超無線路由器
translations.description:
Armor G5 以用戶導向所打造，兼具跨時代11AX規格、極致速度效能、VPN資訊安全、等特色，符合家用物聯網標準，屬於次世代型智能居無線路由器。
- WiFi 空間串流、12組優化天線: 具備多組WiFi空間串流，可以同時容納多台連線設備，並且有效降低上網延遲感
- 2.5G WAN及10G LAN連接埠解決方案: 搭載2.5G WAN規格，提升頻寬與網速，並配有10G LAN連接埠，支援目前興起的10G電腦、NAS 和 Switch 等網絡設備，幫助專業知識傳遞以及雲端工作的普及性
- VPN功能完備、設定簡單、遠端存取安全無虞:保障用戶的遠端存取隱私與個資，讓在外工作的行動用戶或是SOHO一族的使用者，能夠安心存取資料，確保資料的安全性
- 動態LED指示燈讓運作狀態、一瞥可見:透明飾帶以LED燈色來呈現Armor當下的運行狀態，方便用戶判斷網路品質與機器是否正常運作
- 行動生活app:親切的使用者介面、直覺式的操作邏輯，讓各年齡層的家庭成員都能快速上手輕鬆管理
- 極速USB3.0端口: 只需將外接式硬碟或隨身碟連接到USB 3.0連接埠，就可以開始享受閃電般的快速傳輸

•10G LAN and 2.5G WAN network connection for maximum speed 
•Secure access of devices, IT resources, transfer data with remote access VPN while you’re away from home or the office 
•Support more capacity & high performance for more than 30 IoT devices
•Effortless Installation with app & GUI

translations.name: 5G NR 室內整合型路由器
translations.description:
●支援低至超高頻段 5G NR C波段頻譜，自 RF 4G LTE 到 5G NR，同樣頻寬下行速度比 4G LTE 至少提高 13.3%，大幅提升用戶上網流暢度。
●採用延遲控制 (Latency control)、上行鏈路服務品質(UL QoS) 管理機制等智慧延遲控制機制，可將來回通訊延遲(Round-trip delay time)減少 400% 到低於10ms (毫秒) ，協助電信營運商提供極致行動連網體驗。
●業界領先同步支援 TR-069/ MQTT 雙重遠距管理標準，支援系統配置管理、流量監控、錯誤診斷自動化，且支援無線韌體升級，大幅減少電信營運商派遣技術人員的需求並降低維運成本。
●同步支援最新 WiFi 6 (11ax) 無線網路標準，透過正交頻分多址 (OFDMA)、多使用者多重輸入多重輸出 (MU-MIMO) 等技術，即使在高密度無線裝置同時連網時，也能保有優異傳輸速度。另支援 RU scheduling、BSS Coloring、1024-QAM、Target wake-up Time 等降低延遲及省電機制。

translations.name: 智慧城市物聯網多媒體資訊站解決方案
translations.description:
為推動智慧城市應用與願景，EDIMAX與臺北市政府於2019年宣佈合作Smart City IoT Kiosk Solution，在信義商圈佈署多媒體資訊站，滿足：網路服務、觀光導覽、空品偵測、廣告託播、以及緊急防災系統等5大需求。啟動POB商業驗證方案，為IoT物聯網產業開展創新商業模式。這項公共服務計畫通過第一期程的商業經營、服務品質與資訊串接等驗證程序後，2020年成功進入第二階段運營。

造價不斐的硬體機台加入多項創新設計：802.11ax Mesh Wi-Fi ，網狀網路全區覆蓋；獨家全球EdiGreen空氣盒子測站實況和在地商圈PM2.5微氣候；可連線市政通報系統，如遇緊急災害狀況，55吋大螢幕即主動推播，達到避災防護效果。

 主要規格
* 雙面55吋觸控式螢幕，6.8mm 防爆強化玻璃
* 全機400公斤、20級抗風、7.7級抗震。安全穩固
* 內嵌801.11AX Mesh Wi-Fi網狀網路
* 戶外型PM2.5空品感測器

系統規劃
* Free Wi-Fi 公共網路服務
* 城市氣候資訊收集中心
* OOH多媒體廣告播放
* 觀光導覽服務
* 市政中心災害通報

translations.name: Smart City IoT Kiosk Solution
translations.description:
In order to push the smart city initiative, EDIMAX and the Taipei city government announced the Smart City IoT Kiosk Solution collaboration in the year 2019, which kicked off in the heart of Taipei, where the Taipei 101 skyscraper resides-the Xinyi District area.

The EDIMAX Kiosk is one of a kind due to its exclusive EDIMAX core components, integrating multiple software, hardware and cloud services to satisfy five core services such as providing internet service, touring guide, real-time air quality, advertisement broadcasting and emergency disaster prevention system. 

The KIOSK already passed the initial “Proof of Business” and provided new IoT business models, with this said, the project is now ready to continue into the second phase in the year 2020.

Core Hardware Spec
*Auto brightness adjustment 55-inch touch displays
*Weighs 400Kg, withstand 7.7 magnitude and 20 Knots Wind
*802.11ax Wireless AP
*Outdoor PM 2.5 air quality solution device

translations.name: 智慧物聯網電子貨架標籤解決方案
translations.description:
EDIMAX ESL解決方案，包括Master主機、Coordinator 基站、多款ESL電子價格標籤，以及特別開發的Security Backend 雲端安全管理平台；全系統功能強大、直覺易用、擴展性強、安全耐用，為現代通路建立智慧零售第一步。

ESL電子價格標籤機
採用高解析、高亮度、醒目易讀的數位彩色電子墨水顯示幕，寬溫設計適用於生鮮冷藏與一般櫃位，從頂部到底部的貨架，價格特惠一目瞭然、精彩導購集客力強，搭配智慧手機，購物方便又有趣。

ESL系統主機與無線基站
方便店面運用的Master系統主機擴充性高，可快速佈建並管理多台Coordinator 基站，每個基站可同步更新高達3000個ESL電子價格標籤，促銷改標彈指之間，監控管理輕而易舉，消弭繁瑣和錯誤，發揮「數位貨架媒體」優勢，比競爭者快一步創造好業績。

ESL後端管理系統
提供豐富的標籤設計工具，商品自動變價系統，以及超直觀的資訊儀表板，幫助店面經理和行銷總部同步掌握銷售情況，雲端管理多個店鋪標籤，實現遠端全面掌控。可搭配POS加快貨物盤點與銷售統計，滿足快速流通產業所需要的敏捷性與一致性，營業效率大提升。

translations.name: Smart Retail IoT ESL Solution
translations.description:
Advanced ESL System

An advanced ESL (electronic shelf label) system (Master, coordinator and ESL) that is packed with features. 

The Electronic Shelf Label
The ESL is made with a high-quality, easy to read, eye-catching responsive digital color e-ink display that is capable for further customization to catch buyers' attention and durable enough for low and high-temperature areas.

Powerful Backend Dashboard
The backend dashboard is ultra-intuitive and feature-packed, which offers changing, updating and monitoring of up to 3000 labels spontaneously with ease.

Securely Over the Cloud
Multiple admins and operators can manage multiple store labels over the cloud for long-distance full control. Furthermore, be assured to stay 100% anonymous that utilizes Amazon’s secure cloud-based technology with PKI and SSL protection. Data can be imported or exported all at once through the integration with the POS system.

translations.name: 4K超高清無線投影系統暨解決方案
translations.description:
WP-4500及WP-4600系列4K超高清無線投影系統暨解決方案，適用於小到大型會議室/教室/演講廳及宴會廳，因應行動及BYOD設備多互動投影(多對一或一對多)，無線取代煩人的線路，解決會議/教學中投影的不便利性，提升會議及教學效率，免軟體，隨插即用，輕鬆一按，立即分享投影，支援跨平台及設備，輕鬆地把各類型的筆電/智慧手機/平板/電腦裡的螢幕畫面投放到任何支援HDMI顯示器或投影機裏，即時轉換分享的投影設備。將現有的老式會議室或教室變成一個智能，現代和時尚的協作空間。

Wi-Fi 6或5 安全加密高速傳送 4K超高清畫面，5G抗干擾頻段投放畫面不延遲不失真，不再發生HDMI/VGA線在設備間拉來拉去切換或需要求助於IT人員的設定，多對一同時可以4台設備分享投影到同一螢幕中(4分割畫面)，適合順暢及高效同步會議研討，一對多支援一台設備同步投影到200個螢幕，BoardCast/回控功能/多屏投影適合互動智會教學投影；具直覺式網頁管理介面輕鬆做進階設定，是實現聰明會議及互動教學投影的有效工具。2合1無線投影系統具無線基地台功能，投影同時無線上網，具擴展性，節省佈建成本，不再需要拉線。

translations.name: 4K Wireless Projection System/Solutions
translations.description:
The WP-4500 and WP-4600 Wireless Projection System series offers an unprecedented 4K HD wireless presentation solution for business meeting and class lecture with creative collaboration and efficiency discussion. Unique BYOD multi-device, multi-platform, dual-way interactive connectivity, bringing next-gen presentation methods to reality. Easy plug-and-play makes group presentations possible, with one click, users can cast, interact or receive high-quality imagery through the desktop, laptop, tablet or mobile device.

The Wi-Fi 6 offers high-degree security encryption, protecting the 4K images as they are being transferred. Through the Wi-Fi 5Ghz channel images that are smooth and lag-free, even in populated environments. Users now can cast up to 4 presentations at the same time (split-screen), with up to 200 nodes, opening up to more presentation methods and discussions. Participants the power to interact dual-way with the on-stage presentation by simply connecting to the core system.

translations.name: 行動醫療背包雙LTE行動路由器
translations.description:
NCA-1020 是一台迷你桌上型網路設備，內建Intel® Celeron® N3010 處理器，適合佈建於網路邊緣、分公司及零售通路。除了低功耗及有效率的處理能力，NCA-1020也為了邊緣計算、多重服務閘道器、虛擬私有網路(VPN)路由器及uCPE提供了充足的I/O連接埠及無線網路擴充能力。對於連接至Wi-Fi 或LTE網路設備，NCA-1020 也能協助整合及管理，像是保持24小時營運不中斷的迷你型入門級防火牆或多重服務閘道器的重要角色。
產品特色:
•	超迷你型無風扇式x86 網路設備
•	內建Intel® Celeron® N3010 處理器 (先前代號 Braswell)
•	1 x DDR3L SODIMM, non-ECC 1600 MHz, 最高容量 8 GB
•	專為行動網路設計，內建全長 mini-PCIe 內建 SIM 卡插槽
遠程醫療設備揹包
美國醫療設備供應商採用NCA-1020，將它放在遠程醫療設備揹包中，利用其外型小、無風扇設計及強大的無線網路連接特性，緊密地連接起搜救人員、救護車與醫院之間的通訊，成功將SD-WAN uCPE整合在醫療背包之中。

translations.name: Mobile Medical backpack LTE Gateway
translations.description:
NCA-1020 is a compact desktop appliance empowered by Intel® Celeron® Processor N3010 (codenamed Braswell) for deployment at edge environment, branch offices, and retail surroundings. Besides the low power consumption and decent processing capability, NCA-1020 also provides necessary I/O functionality for edge computing, multi-service gateways, VPN routers and uCPE applications. NCA-1020 also helps manage and secure devices connected to Wi-Fi or LTE network, like a compact entry-level firewall or multi-service gateway for business continuity.
Key Features:
•	Ultra Compact Fanless x86 Network Appliance
•	Onboard Intel® Celeron® N3010 CPU (codenamed as Braswell)
•	1 x DDR3L SODIMM, max. 8GB
•	1 x full-length mini-PCIe with SIM slot for mobile connectivity
A medical solution provider use NCA-1020 as a 4G LTE communication gateway for emergency medical backpack. It’s slim design and power wireless communication feature seemlessly integrates communications between ambulance and hospital.

translations.name: ZenFone 7 Series
translations.description: ZenFone 7為一支兼具攝錄影功能與旗艦規格的手機。結合更創新的技術、頂尖的效能及世界級的精細設計，ZenFone 7將帶來更強大更完整的體驗。極致的全螢幕、5G的效能、超大電量搭載快速充電與全新的側邊指紋按鍵整合體驗，以及業界獨特的前後共享翻轉式鏡頭，都展現了ZenFone 7不同凡響的性格。全新的側邊電源鍵更結合了指紋辨識以及智慧按鍵SmartKey，除了能提供更加快速與準確的解鎖體驗外，更可將智慧按鍵自訂最常使用的功能或應用程式，一鍵搞定! 獨家的翻轉鏡頭模組搭載6400萬畫素的超高畫質主鏡頭、超廣角以及長焦鏡頭，不僅提供了流暢的視角切換，更可透過手指輕鬆操控就可以輕鬆的翻玩出最合適的角度及焦距，徹底改變以往手機拍照的體驗。透過翻轉鏡頭更可提升前鏡頭攝錄影的品質，更具備業界少有的超廣角4K錄影，使豐富的背景不再受到鏡頭的限制。

translations.description: ZenFone 7 is a masterpiece of mobile phone design. It offers the best mobile photography and videography experiences with its innovative Flip Camera and is equipped with the latest flagship specs. Including an immersive all-screen display, 5G performance, 5000 mAh high-capacity battery, and the new all-in-one side key that integrates a fingerprint sensor with SmartKey and power on/off functionality. The Flip Camera creates a revolutionary mobile photography experience, offering an incredible 64 MP camera, an ultrawide-angle camera and a tele-camera. Its flip design enables the same camera effects and high resolution for both the front and back cameras. Users can control the camera angle via the interface, and a new angle sensor helps to ensure more precise angle control. ZenFone 7 is designed to provide ultimate all-around user experiences.

translations.name: 無線雙頻路由器
translations.description:
RT-AX89X雙頻無線路由器集成了最新的Wi-Fi 6技術，可提供爆炸性的6000Mbps數據速率並同時處理256個高密度設備、提供4倍效率的容量來處理擁擠的網絡，更重要的是RT-AX89X為業界唯一搭載雙10G網路接口的Wi-Fi6路由器，RT-AX89X為提供完美的智能家居體驗而生。

在外型上，精確計算距離和角度定位的8根高性能天線，提供了出色的圓形陣列架構，不但零死角還擁有更廣的WI-FI覆蓋率。 多邊形設計有助於提高天線結構的可靠性。 更重要的是，對稱設計提高了內置風扇的通風冷卻系統的效率、改善了氣流的散熱，並具有出色的穩定性。由內而外高度邏輯的設計，它可以適用在每個地方，穩定表現高速的特質，同時在這個架構下內建防毒軟體，在重視網路隱私及安全性的前提下為使用者提供周密的安全防護網。

面向未來; RT-AX89X無限寬廣。

translations.name: Dual-band Wi-Fi router
translations.description:
The RT-AX89X dual-band wireless router integrates the latest Wi-Fi 6 technology to deliver an explosive data rate and handles up to 200 simultaneous devices, providing 4 times the capacity to handle crowded networks or a flawless smart home experience.
Eight high-performance antennas positioned by distance and angle provide an excellent circular array architecture for wider WI-FI coverage with zero dead zones. The polygonal design contributes to antenna structure reliability, but more importantly provides a ventilation ratio of 6:4 for uniform heat dissipation, naturally drawing cold air in from the bottom while pushing hot air out of the top.

translations.name: AI 自動追蹤 PTZ 攝影機
translations.description: PTC310U可直播串流錄製課堂授課、政令宣達、企業會議、藝文表演、醫療照護、體育賽事、宗教信仰等活動現場。搭載兩種先進AI追蹤模式：「講者追蹤」可讓講者隨處移動與觀眾近距離互動，無須任何感應裝置，即使被他人或物體遮擋仍不影響追蹤精準度；「區域追蹤」最多可設定四個追蹤區域，透過自動分段式追蹤同時拍攝講者與簡報內容。智慧AI人形追蹤演算法可即時追蹤講者，精確的追蹤效能與超強抗擾鎖定能力，即便多人入鏡也不影響追蹤準確度。此外不管透過遙控器或網路介面，一鍵就可切換目標，不需重新設定就可立刻轉換追蹤，活動錄製不中斷。4K解析度搭配12倍光學變焦鏡頭，加上2倍獨家無損變焦的加乘，不論拉進或放遠，精彩片段不錯過。絕佳的運鏡操控能力與自動對焦技術可維持每秒0.1°轉速，穩定進行平移或轉動等多角度拍攝，且能維持高度觀看舒適度。多樣化的影音輸出入埠支援RS-422、RS-232、IP等多種控制介面，可輕鬆預設高達255個拍攝點，只要事先預設所有拍攝角度，特寫切換超順手。搭配NDI通訊協定，只要連上網路，就能讓直播更快速、更有效率。PTC310U追蹤功能強大、操作簡單，影音串流秒上手、直錄播得心應手。

translations.name: AI Auto Tracking PTZ Camera
translations.description:
The PTC310U features Presenter Mode and Zone Mode auto tracking, in-house AI functions enhanced by Human Detection processing. Human Detection enables ultra-precise tracking that sets presenters free to walk around without wearing accessories. Tracking continues even when two or more people enter the effective area.
Presenter Mode tracks targets wherever they go. This feature gives presenters the option to exit the stage and interact with the audience. The camera locks onto its target, still tracking if other people or objects block it. Zone Mode is ideal for capturing content on multiple displays. Up to four Content Zones can be created to capture content rather than the presenter’s movements.
Users can broadcast, stream, or record in 4K quality with 12X optical zoom capability, without using extra devices. The PTC310U presents every angle for studio productions, live events, worship services, esports competitions, distance learning classes, conferences, personnel trainings, and more.

translations.name: 1080P USB雲端視訊會議組
translations.description:
AVer VC520 Pro視訊會議系統搭載了適合中、大型會議室的18倍變焦鏡頭，及可自動降噪、清晰收音的喇叭麥克風。額外更串接二個喇叭揚聲器或四個360°全向型麥克風，讓使用者可依其需求去擴充收、放音範圍。
其USB連結設計及直覺式的UI設計，讓使用者可輕鬆插拔、使用，優異的軟體相容性，更獲得國際知名視訊軟體ZOOM認證。影像方面，AVer VC520 Pro採用Sony超高感度True WDR感光器與18倍變焦鏡頭，提供用戶Full HD 1080P高清解析度及60fps高畫質影像，確保影像隨時維持在最適曝光值，告別失真及殘影的狀況。
內建的SmartFrame智能自動對焦框選功能，則能掃描偵測人像，根據情境變化自動平移、對焦，將所有人納入會議畫面中，免除手動進行畫面調整的困擾。
不論何種裝置，僅要透過網路瀏覽器即可連入，遠端操作與更新AVer VC520 Pro。此外因應近年來的直播熱潮，AVer VC520 Pro亦讓使用者可透過H.264 RTSP/ RTMP進行網路直播，與Facebook及YouTube雙平台無縫接軌，拉近用戶與潛在客戶間的距離。

translations.name: 1080P USB Conference system
translations.description:
The AVer VC520 Pro is an enterprise-grade video conferencing system, perfect for mid-to-large conference rooms. Equipped with an 18X total zoom camera and a full-duplex speakerphone, it effectively captures every audiovisual detail. 

Users can daisy-chain additional speakerphones and microphones to meet the needs of various collaboration spaces. The VC520 Pro also adapts to various video conferencing platforms. It is compatible with most cloud-based service providers and even boasts official Zoom certification. In terms of visual quality, its camera ensures 1080P Full HD resolution and 60fps fluidity, and Sony True WDR automatically maintains proper exposure at all times. The VC520 Pro even uses facial detection technology to automatically frame meeting participants. 

Remote control and livestream functions are also embedded in the VC520 Pro. Anyone seeking video conferencing equipment that can facilitate high-quality remote collaboration will find the VC520 Pro is an ideal choice.

translations.name: 智慧人物追蹤快速球網路攝影機
translations.description: SD9374-EHL為最新一代具備晶睿通訊自行研發AI智慧人物追蹤技術的紅外光可變角度快速球網路攝影機。快速球攝影機以出色的夜間照明、高倍數變焦及PTZ功能為主要特色，適合用於需要24小時360度高準度監控的廣闊場域使用，如機場、城市監控、港口、空曠廠區等。SD9374-EHL具備可照明達250公尺的紅外線投射燈及36倍光學變焦鏡頭，在低照度的環境下，仍可捕捉高品質清晰影像。快速球攝影機PTZ功能使鏡頭可左右360度、上下220度擺動，創新結合晶睿通訊以AI深度學習為核心，以「人」為偵測主體的智慧人物追蹤技術，能自動偵測區域中是否有人入侵，鏡頭將會鎖定目標後跟隨目標移動同時變焦放大清晰拍攝五官捕捉細節，並持續追蹤直到入侵者離開該區域。智能人物追蹤功能使產品化身為能大幅減少誤發警報、具有通報能力的智慧偵測設備。此外，通過IP66 IK10及NEMA 4X認證的防水防塵防撞擊堅韌外殼及寬溫防護，能在極端氣候環境下仍提供穩定影像，使SD9374-EHL成為戶外監控的最佳選擇。不僅如此，SD9374-EHL內建趨勢科技防入侵軟體，除了高品質影像與智慧分析外，更提供全方位的資安防護。

translations.name: Smart Tracking Speed Dome Camera
translations.description: SD9364-EHL is the latest professional speed dome camera, specifically designed to enhance video surveillance in wide-open areas, such as ports and cities, where high-level precision is required. Equipped with 250M IR illuminators and a 36x optical zoom lens, the SD9374-EHL provides a superb low light image in the most challenging situations. Powered by VIVOTEK self-developed AI engine, the SD9374-EHL has build-in people-based Deep Learning Technology-Smart Tracking, which can automatically detect people activities in the chosen area and track the target with the high-quality zoom image. It is especially effective for applications and times in which individuals require special attention and fine details. VIVOTEK further strengthened the camera performance with an IP66, IK10 and NEMA 4X-rated housing to protect the camera against rain, dust, and corrosion. Moreover, it’s embedded with Trend Micro’s anti-intrusion software to provide users with higher levels of network protection.

translations.name: AI人群偵測魚眼網路攝影機
translations.description:
過去安控攝影機不斷嘗試解決各種監控需求，然而如何有效地降低誤判率一直是產業中的一大挑戰。透過人工智慧 (AI) 技術導入攝影機，VIVOTEK AI人群偵測魚眼網路攝影機 FE9391-EV能夠準確辨識人與非人的物體，搭載全景AI智慧影像分析技術-人群偵測技術，更將魚眼攝影機的效能提升至全新境界。

此款攝影機為專業型全天候攝影機提供1200萬畫素、360度零死角全景影像，搭載晶睿通訊最新自行開發具備深度學習的AI影像分析技術-人群偵測，能夠計算在所選區域的人數，並在人數到達區域上限時傳送警報。除此之外，採用新一代全景鏡頭，大幅修正過往360度邊緣畫面失真的狀況，同步搭載智慧紅外線 II 技術(Smart IR II)，在低照度的環境下提供強度與亮度一致性的清晰影像。內建趨勢科技防入侵軟體，在全方位的資安防護下，提供無死角的影像。在防疫期間此款攝影機可協助零售商場或控管特定區域的人數上限，降低感染風險。在後疫情時代不僅可同時守護客戶的資產，在可控管人群上限，並透過影像分析數據，提升營運效率。

translations.name: AI Crowd Detection Fisheye Camera
translations.description: In the past, how security camera minimizes false alarms remains a challenge in the industry. Thanks to the development of AI, the AI Crowd Detection Fisheye Camera FE9391-EV is programmed to learn to differentiate between the motion of people and objects. With the AI Crowd Detection technology, this camera becomes an intelligent device to analyze how many and people stayed in a specific area. It is also updated with the VIVOTEK's Smart IR II technology with Adaptive IR, providing the best possible IR image, reducing glaring hotspots and/or underexposed dark spots. Embedded with Trend Micro’s anti-intrusion software, the camera provides users with higher levels of network protection. During the COVID-19, stores and businesses can effortlessly manage and maintain distances between customers, automatically sending alert notifications when maximum capacity is exceeded. In a post-COVID-19 world, the camera can be expanded to optimize operations through its intelligent video analytics.

translations.name: 第三層網管24埠95瓦802.3bt乙太網路供電交換器具2400瓦雙槽熱插拔電源
translations.description:
普萊德科技創新研發第三層網管24埠95瓦802.3bt乙太網路供電交換器具2400瓦雙槽熱插拔電源 (GS-6322-24P4X)，乃全球首款高階網管PoE++交換器具備 (1)全24埠802.3bt PoE++供電搭配2400W熱插拔冗餘電源模組化設計，供電總量高達2280瓦；(2)普萊德獨家15項智慧節能PoE管理；(3)第三層網管Cybersecurity暨遠達120km 40G光纖傳輸能力，加速IoT、智慧建築、智慧照明、監控與無線網路基礎建設。

* 全球首款高規格全24埠 802.3bt標準95W供電，搭配2400W熱插拔冗餘電源，網路供電總量高達2280W，滿足網路連結多樣受電設備之電力需求。
* 2400W熱插拔冗餘電源模組化設計: 搭載兩組電源模組互相備援，可直接抽換不中斷系統運作。
* 普萊德獨家15項綠能智慧PoE主動式管理，集中管理電力及網路，促進網路節能效益。
* 第三層網管動態路由10G光纖網路上傳能力，設備之間自動協調備援，提升網路架構靈活性。
* Cybersecurity功能，保障網路資訊傳輸安全。
* 支援國際標準ONVIF規範。

translations.name: L3 24-port 802.3bt 95W PoE Managed Switch with 40G Uplink and 2400W Swappable Redundant Power System
translations.description: PLANET L3 24-port 802.3bt 95W PoE Managed Switch with 40G Uplink and 2400W Swappable Redundant Power System (GS-6322-24P4X) is world’s first Layer 3 24-port 802.3bt PoE++ Switch with dual modular power supply slots expandability promotes power management efficiency and flexibility in large-scale networks, such as smart cities, enterprises, hotels, government buildings, and other public areas. It supports rich PoE operation modes including 24 90-watt 802.3bt type-4 PoE++ ports, 95-watt PoH (Power over HD-BASE-T) mode and 4-pair force mode to solve the incompatibility of non-standard 4-pair PoE PDs in the field. With a total power budget of up to 2280 watts for different kinds of heavy PoE applications, the GS-6322-24P4X provides a quick, safe and cost-effective 802.3bt PoE network solution for small businesses and enterprises. The GS-6322-24P4X also features Redundant Ring, cybersecurity functions, ONVIF support, built-in unique Intelligent PoE functions for environmental protection.

translations.name: 工業級Modbus串列設備閘道器系列
translations.description:
普萊德工業級Modbus串列設備閘道器系列(IMG-2000T系列)獨創整合Ethernet和RS232/RS422/RS485串列介面，以Ethernet實現網路距離的延伸；使多重Modbus RTU、ASCII、TCP等常用工業通訊協定的設備，輕鬆轉換至單一網路IP化遠端管控，並可透過普萊德友善智慧化中央網管平台即時管理網路傳輸之獨創設計，使工業自動化、智慧交通等智慧網路基礎建設更加靈活，且提昇網管效能。

●支援多達32台Modbus TCP主、從模式設備，網路應用彈性高
●內建Web及Telnet管理介面，即時監控及管理設備
●工業用標準12~48V DC備援，或9~48V DC與24V AC電力備援，保障資料傳輸不間斷
●電源極性反接保護設計，防止誤接正負極時設備損壞
●系列機種IMG-2400T支援DI/DO功能，當設備異常時，即時警示通知管理者
●耐攝氏-40至75度寬溫工作範圍
●體積簡約輕巧，具滑軌式與壁掛式設計，安裝便利
●支援普萊德智慧化中央網管平台(Network Management System)，效率化佈署和監控產品狀態

translations.name: Industrial RS232/422/485 Modbus Gateway Series
translations.description:
PLANET Industrial RS232/422/485 Modbus Gateway Series (IMG-2000T Series), a bridge that converts between Modbus TCP/IP Protocol and Modbus RTU/ASCII Protocol, enables the industrial IT SNMP network upgraded to the Modbus TCP/IP network and brings interconnection over Ethernet longer distances. Thus, it offers a more flexible network connectivity solution for the industrial automation environment where SCADA or HMI system is in place.

●RS232/422/485 to 10/100TX or 100FX integration solution
●Supports 32 Modbus TCP Master and Slave connection requests
●Built-in IP-based Web interface and telnet interface for remote management
●Redundant power with reverse polarity protection
●DI/DO for external alarm (IMG-2400T)
●-40 to 75 degrees C operating temperature
●DIN-rail and wall-mountable installation
●Multiple serial operation modes at the same time (IMG-2200T, IMG-2400T)
●Supports PLANET Network Management System for easy monitoring of device status

translations.name: 工業級4G LTE IoT閘道器系列
translations.description:
專為保障公用網路和工業嚴苛環境的行動網路資訊安全而設計，普萊德工業級4G LTE IoT閘道器系列 (ICG-2515W-LTE系列)創新搭載Dual SIM 4G LTE負載平衡頻寬管理，提供工業級標準VPN加密與Cybersecurity防護，內建友善雲端化管理，並具備智慧節能PoE管理機種，達成物聯網(IoT)、智慧交通、M2M、工業物聯網(IIoT)安全且節能的行動化網路通訊，並預留無縫升級5G設計。

●雙SIM卡4G LTE負載平衡頻寬管理
●支援工業級標準VPN協定 (IPSec、PPTP、L2TP、SSL VPN、IP Tunnel)
●內建Cybersecurity、SPI防火牆、IPS入侵防禦，阻止網路惡意程式和DoS/DDoS攻擊
●支援Modbus TCP、MQTT、SNMP, SD-WAN
●雙電源輸入備援，內建DI/DO以及系統故障警示
●天線和電源隔離設計，阻絕資料傳輸干擾
●IP30防護機殼，耐攝氏-35至75度工作範圍
●獨家智慧PoE主動式管理 (ICG-2515WPG-LTE)
●支援普萊德智慧化中央網管平台，效率化佈署和監控產品狀態

translations.name: Industrial 4G LTE IoT Gateway Series
translations.description:
The ICG-2515W-LTE Series is the first Industrial IoT Gateway combining PoE function and Dual SIM 4G LTE for failover and roaming over to ensure uninterrupted network connectivity.  It supports various VPNs and cybersecurity function to flexibly expand all sorts of IIoT protocols which enables secure network applications for public network infrastruture and industrial environment.

●5-port Gigabit, Dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi, 4G LTE, GSM or PoE+ connection
●Dual SIMs for network load balancing and redundancy
●Multiple VPNs with IPSec, PPTP, L2TP, GRE, IP Tunnel, SSL and VPN Failover
●Cybersecurity, SPI firewall and intrusion prevention system
●Modbus TCP, MQTT, SNMP, SD-WAN supported
●Dual power inputs, DI/DO support
●Antenna and power isolation design
●IP30 metal case, -35 to 75 degrees C operating temperature
●802.3at PoE+ and intelligent PoE functions supported (ICG-2515WPG-LTE)
●Supports PLANET Network Management System for easy monitoring of device status

translations.name: 再生能源供電智慧網管控制器系列
translations.description:
普萊德科技再生能源供電智慧網管控制器系列(NMS-360系列)為全球首款人性化之綠能網路電力智慧管理系統，促進國家公園、自然生態保護區、離網醫療站等偏遠地區最大化運用再生能源，實現用電獨立，off-grid(離網)網路通訊。

translations.name: Renewable Energy Management Controller Series
translations.description:
Designed for off-grid renewable energy applications in natural reserves or remote medical centers, PLANET Renewable Energy Management Controller Series (NMS-360 Series) is the world’s first controller that integrates green technology and exclusive intelligent PoE management functions to provide users with real-time remote management over renewable energy usage and connected PD operation status.

•Integrates SNMP, ONVIF, and MQTT protocols and PLANET Smart Discovery
•Auto discovery of up to 256 PLANET BSP-360 and up to 1024 PoE IP cameras
•Central provisioning and control over each managed device
•Intuitive dashboard to monitor green power, battery status, network traffic, PoE usages of the BSP-360, and device status
•Setup Wizard
•Event alert notification via e-mail 
•Map view and monitor IP cam snapshot
•User-defined access policy
•Backup and restore via USB 3.0
•Supports PLANET DDNS and Easy DDNS
•Stylish 10” TFT-LCD touch screen display and IP55 aluminum case protection (NMS-360V)

translations.name: 4G無線傳訊記錄器
translations.description:
【專為自來水管理開發，IoT智慧水務數據傳訊利器】
輸入訊號多元，可連接各式設備，具5組類比輸入(AI)、4組數位輸入(DI)、1組RS-485(可接3台設備)、內建2組壓力計，整合水量、水壓、水質數據，定時間/時距記錄(1~1440分鐘) ，透過4G網路回傳至遠端系統(10~1440分鐘)，取代人工抄錄作業提升水資源管理效益。

【流量數據預先處理，減輕資料處理負擔】
內建15段水頻譜分析功能，進行流量落點與進水分布狀況分析，精簡資料量降低後端系統運算耗能，協助用戶用水模式分析、水表口徑匹配度分析以及水量計自我診斷應用，提高水數據附加價值。

【上下限警戒、門禁管制】
可設定三段流量、壓力上下限警戒值，並可結合門禁感測器，若儀表箱不明啟動或颱風天人孔蓋異常開啟，得發出警示。

【IP68防水設計，內建長效鋰電池】
外殼採蜂巢式結構與肋型結構設計，耐擠壓、受力強度高，IP68防塵防水等級，可安裝於潮濕環境(如窨井)。內建鋰電池，每日通訊可達五年。

【串流資料分析、遠端韌體更新】
同步回傳訊號強度、電壓值、傳輸秒數等資訊，利於傳輸品質分析；可遠端韌體更新，具預約啟動功能，節省電力耗損。

translations.name: 4G Wireless Data Logger
translations.description:
‧GTI 6 connects flow, pressure and water quality sensors to log data at user-defined time intervals and send data to cloud system via 4G technology with remote monitoring to replace manual reading and optimize water network.

‧GTI 6 has built-in 15 consumptions sections to distribute flow data and categorize consumption patterns to reduce the system burdens effectively and analyze user-consumption patterns, water meter size selection and water meter self-diagnosis analysis.

‧GTI 6 supports 3 flow & pressure alarms and integrates with entry access sensors.

‧Pressure-resistance, durable and IP68 protection, GTI 6 can be installed in humid environment. 5 years built-in battery is based on daily transmission.

‧GTI 6 sends signal strength, battery voltage and transmission times to analyze the data quality. With OTA supports, site visit is not needed. Pre-activation function can log future data without logging abundant data.

translations.name: 窄邊框超薄微型OLED顯示器
translations.description:
窄邊框超薄微型OLED顯示器WEO004864A，實現獨家三面窄邊框製程，運用(1)電極層疊技術，(2)低電阻陽極技術，(3)「電性接合孔」封裝技術，減少電極間距，提高有效顯示區比例。該產品採用獨家的發明專利，改善了現有顯示器觀測面的左右雙側側邊仍需保留一定走線區寬度而無法降低走線面積的缺點，達成縮減邊框寬度的目的，該專利技術大量縮短整體走線距離而具有降低整體線路阻抗值的優點之外，整體結構簡單有助於提高製程良率。
窄邊框超薄微型OLED 具傑出的顯示效果、高對比度、高視角、快速響應時間、超輕薄、5萬小時以上的長壽命(黃色為例)等優勢，擁有獨特產品競爭力。 
窄邊框超薄微型OLED顯示器具備產品美學設計，創造出驚豔的顯示效果，對於講究空間利用率的工業性或消費性產品是絕佳的解決方案，已銷售全球數十個國家，應用於讀卡機、噴碼機、穿戴式裝置等產品。
該產品的製程以友善綠色為生產方針，有計劃的降低汙水、廢氣及廢棄物生成量，產品符合RoHS與REACH:SVHC高關注物質限用標章，實現華凌光電以科技貢獻人類、重視環境保護的企業使命，達到永續經營理念。

translations.name: Narrow Border Micro OLED
translations.description:
Winstar Narrow Border Micro OLED is a powerful product which is very thin and lightweight and at least 50,000 hours-long-lifetime. Due to the self-emitting properties and narrow boarder technology, WEO004864A has significant superiority over other displays. 

► Faster response time：10 μ sec.
► Wider viewing angle：Up to 175 degree
► Module Structure: Chip on Glass
► Self-emitting, no need backlight
► High contrast ratio：Up to 2000:1
► Wide temperature range：-40 ℃ ~ +85 ℃
► Low power consumption：< 200 mw
► Narrow bolder technology increased the panel active area.

Narrow Border Micro OLED is 100% made in Taiwan through fully automatic production line and quality control facilities. WEO006448A is designed to fit for wearable devices, printing machine, etc. It is featured with diagonal size 0.71 inch, 48x64 pixels resolution, and over 175 degree-viewing angle. Due to the above advantages, Winstar “Narrow Border Micro OLED” is the best choice for industry and consumer applications.

translations.name: 先進彩色電子紙看板系統
translations.description:
先進彩色電子紙看板系統，面板採用先進彩色電子紙(Advanced Color ePaper, ACeP)，是全球首款以四種帶色粒子：青色、洋紅、黃色、白色，動態進行顆粒組合和混色、實現全色域的彩色電子紙技術。
ACeP擁有如印刷油墨般的視覺效果，細膩、類紙質，並整合電子紙時序控制晶片T1000，且具備連網功能，可由雲端系統於遠端、無線即時更新資訊，應用於公共資訊、零售廣告、藝廊、博物館、學校等場域，提供電子紙護眼舒適、節能環保的效益。
特色：
1.全反射式(Reflective)：不自發光、對眼睛舒適、融入環境氛圍
2.70 L*高反射率
3.雙穩態(Bi-Stable)：畫面不變時不耗電，以電池或太陽能即可運作，移動安裝容易、不需另外牽設電線
4.環境斷電時畫面持續顯示，緊急時刻依然能傳遞資訊
5.具備電子紙時序控制晶片T1000，使用液晶顯示器標準MIPI DSI介面，整合E Ink電子紙影像演算法、及電子紙驅動波形(Waveform)，利於終端場域系統整合
6.透過Web API與雲端平台串接，以手機或電腦即可遠距無線更新資訊，簡單便利
7.創造與發光型顯示器不同的利基市場和效益

translations.name: Advanced Color ePaper Display System
translations.description:
Advanced Color ePaper (ACeP) is a high quality, reflective display technology. The color richness is achieved by having 4 colored pigments in every pixel for dynamic color mixing without a color filter array (CFA). Grid-free is attributed to ACeP being ultra-low-power and paper-like readability as other E Ink ePaper. A perfect display solution for portable POP and signage, providing an easy-on-the-eyes and environmental friendly display technology.
1.Non-emissive. Reflecting images with ambient light, easily blend into surroundings.
2.High reflectance, 70L*.
3.Battery operable. Portable, no major reconstruction required.
4.Bi-Stability. Adverts and messages remain to be shown without any power.
5.Easy design-in. E Ink T1000 TCON IC integrates E Ink specific algorithms and Waveform and MIPI DSI to shorten time-to-market.
6.Remote images update is achieved by integrating Web API and cloud platform.
7.Different niche use cases and applications from emissive displays, e.g. LCD, LED, OLED.

translations.name: 穿透式OLED觸控面板
translations.description:
透明顯示器最大的特色，是可讓使用者清晰的看見目標物品，並同時提供目標物品相關內容於螢幕上，並加上觸控功能使得使用者體驗更加直覺全面強化使用者、目標物以及傳播資訊三者之鏈結關係。

穿透式OLED觸控面板以開發觸控系統是結合穿透專利技術，在高透明絕緣層的開發、光學模擬設計高效率各色元件與面板最適化layout設計，可達到高均勻度與高亮度（>3000nits）的穿透式觸控面板，實現穿透度達70%兼具觸摸精度，擁有更清晰的圖像質量和更纖薄的面板顯示設計。透明顯示器在顯示影像的同時，可透過顯示器看到後方之實體物件，相當適合於擴增實境的應用。不同於虛擬實境應用是把使用者帶到虛擬世界中，擴增實境應用則是把現實世界與虛擬資訊進行整合並帶到使用者面前。

OLED顯示不需要背光模組的輕薄，也可應用在智能家居(如智能冰箱、排油煙機、開關控制面板)、運輸顯示(智能窗口可顯示到達資訊、運輸價格、調控溫度、調控燈光等應用)、穿戴應用等各種透明或可切換透明應用領域，並有微型化核心技術，已切入激光瞄準鏡、測距儀望遠鏡等高階光學裝置市場應用。

translations.name: DBMaker
translations.description:
「DBMaker 5.4.3關聯式資料庫系統」是國人少數能自行研發的關聯式資料庫系統，多年來致力於創新研發，產品功能及品質足以媲美國際大廠；從資料庫基本存取功能到XML、Jason等標準化傳輸應用、多語言全文檢索、優異的多媒體支援能力、獨特的COBOL開發解決方案、雲端開放式資料連結介面Cloud ODBC。面對大數據趨勢來臨，提供彈性動態欄位、自動索引、過濾索引、外掛式索引引擎，處理多變性資料型態並快速引入外部索引工具。因應容器技術新趨勢來臨，提供了容器化的 DBMaker Docker image，可經 Docker 作業系統層虛擬化技術，支援微服務架構，亦可運用在自動部署、擴充以及執行應用程式容器的平台K8S中。有別於對手的 bundle 方式，可以無痕地篏入ISV系統，且通過SEI CMMI ML3認證，是台灣IT業界的榮耀。
由於優異的產品特性在國際間，包括日、中、泰、越、美、巴西、義大利等地，都有廣大用戶，橫跨金融、製造、通訊、物流、零售、交通能源、公共事業及媒體各領域。在日本已超過50萬使用者、1,200家以上企業使用；巴西與義大利夥伴，合作舉辦大型研討會，獲得廣大肯定。

translations.name: DBMaker
translations.description: DBMaker 5.4.3, Syscom’s relational database developed in Taiwan more than 25 years ago. Product features and quality equal to its international competitors. DBMaker has RDBMS access functions, XML/Jason data transfer, multi-language full-text search, multimedia support, a unique COBOL solution, Cloud ODBC, and big data features like flexible dynamic columns, automatic indexing, filter index, and an external indexing engine. DBMaker also provides containerized DBMaker Docker image, which  for supporting micro-service architecture via virtualization technology. Different from our competitors, DBMaker integrates seamlessly with ISV systems. We won the Taiwan Excellence Awards five times and passed SEI CMMI ML3 certification. With a constantly updated feature set, DBMaker remains a popular solution in Japan, China, Vietnam, the United States, Brazil, Italy, and more. DBMaker is used in finance, manufacturing, communications, logistics, retail, and energy. Customers worldwide trust DBMaker.

translations.name: NETCenter
translations.description: 數位轉型時代最佳解決方案「NETCenter 網路監控管理中心」提供八大功能模組：監控告警、跨品牌組態備份、Log紀錄管理、資產管理、直覺式儀表板(Dashboard)、網路實體拓樸圖、流量分析管理(NetFlow)、指令供裝。可依照設備屬性，利用不同的協定進行監控，協助 IT 管理者全面掌握 IT 基礎設備的狀態與資訊，並強化日常維運工作的效率，獨家的Dashboard設計讓管理者及相關人員可以一目瞭然且迅速上手。NETCenter以統一介面、分權管理的方式有效降低管理人力負擔，並提供報表分析迅速掌握管理的資產相關情報。提供跨單位監控服務時，本系統可整合不同版本、品牌之設備，各單位IT人員可自行管理各單位監控之設備，而總監控中心可管控所有監控之設備，如有異常狀態，可透過E-mail或LINE即時告警，並利用拓樸圖掌握設備實體架構，透過備份功能線上比對備份檔案，找出故障原因，進行線上即時故障排除，使得網路營運可以快速恢復服務。NETCenter產品以橫向而言，具備整合跨品牌設備的能力；縱向來看，是跨領域的解決方案，總而言之，是全方位的IT監控解決方案。

translations.name: NETCenter
translations.description:
NETCenter 4.5 is an integration and management application, which provides various management functions, like: fault, configuration, accounting, performance and security. All connections and network equipment are under control, you won’t disconnect any network connection, then figure out the problem.
Our innovative features are:
1. No need to install a front-end application. No add-ons are need. Remotely manage via Web Browser. 
2. Provides Auto-Discover and Topology and automatically generates an L2 Topology.
3. Supported Protocols: SNMP v2C/v3, Telnet, FTP, SMTP and ICMP.  NETCenter manages all equipment that supports CLI (Command Line Interface).
4. Provides professional customized services to satisfy enterprise IT infrastructure management.
Smooth and stable networks are affected by the rate of information exchange, also it’s an important symbol of an enterprise. Almost all enterprises use multiple vendor's equipment. In conclusion, NETCenter can reduce TCO and increase ROI.

translations.name: 無軌道智慧移動平臺多車派遣與管理系統
translations.description:
東元於2019年推出智慧移動平臺(AGV)，以此為基礎延伸，可提供許多業者進行內部運輸作業的重要系統，為了加速運作效率及減少人力成本，便在倉儲物流系統或少量多量生產站點間之流水線內導入AGV。自動化物流可利用集成智慧化技術、智慧設備等使物流系統具有學習、推理判斷和自行解決物流中某些問題的能力，進而形成智慧工廠模式而運作。
東元無軌道智慧移動平臺多車派遣與管理系統整合多項關鍵技術，如SLAM技術、Web-based HMI程式設計、MESH網路架構、網路通訊協定、OTA更新功能、路徑規劃派送功能、任務排程管理、車輛交通管理、車輛狀態監控與管理、實務應用技術等等加以實現路徑圖型化可編輯、行走無標籤定位、多車腳本編輯、數位雙生(Digital Twin)運行模擬。

translations.name: Multi-AGVs Intelligence Control System
translations.description:
TECO launched the Smart Mobile Platform (AGV) in 2019 as an extension based on it, which can provide an important system for many operators to carry out internal transportation operations. Introduce AGV into the pipeline, it can make the logistics system have the ability to learn, reason, judge, and solve certain problems in logistics, and then form a smart factory mode and operation.
This product, Multi-AGVs Intelligence Control System, integrates multiple key technologies, such as SLAM, Web-based HMI, MESH network architecture, network communication protocol, OTA(On-the-Air) update function, route planning dispatch function, task scheduling management , Vehicle traffic management, vehicle status monitoring and management, practical application technology, etc. to achieve path graphic editing, walking without label positioning, multi-car script editing, digital twin running cyber-physical simulation.

translations.name: 智視康
translations.description:
VeriSee DR是一個AI輔助診斷軟體，它學習了多位台大醫院眼科醫師對於糖尿病視網膜病變(DR)診斷的經驗，透過AI深度學習的技術產生判讀水平相似於醫師的軟體，臨床前試驗結果已接近眼科醫師判讀準確度，可有效提供輔助判斷，並透過Acer在PC產業的設計經驗，將這個軟體與硬體整合成邊緣運算裝置，這個裝置不需要透過網路就可以直接運算，是輔助內科醫師判讀DR的絕佳幫手。

由於現行糖尿病患者會定期到家裡附近的內科診所複診，在醫師診斷後會開立眼底檢查單到附近眼科診所檢查，等待數日後病患再回到內科診所聽取報告，而這往往會花病患許多時間及額外的掛號費，致使篩檢率不高。我們的目標是在有眼底鏡的內科診所或健檢中心內，導入VeriSee DR，在沒有眼科醫師在場時，即可透過軟體進行初步分析，分析結果會顯示該糖尿病患者是否需轉診眼科進行更詳細的檢查，協助醫師找出潛在的糖尿病視網膜病變患者，及早發現以進行治療，協助控制病情、避免惡化至視力損失甚至失明，並大大降低病人的候診時間。

We use AI and deep learning techniques to make a software that achieves a level of diagnostic confidence similar to that of an ophthalmologist. Through Acer's design experience in the PC industry, this software and hardware are then integrated into an edge computing device, allowing it to compute locally without having to go through a network. We believe that this device will be of tremendous assistance for physicians in diagnosing DR.

translations.name: 智能3D分撿系統
translations.description:
JustPick智能3D分撿系統
物流中心分揀流程仍依賴人力，難轉型自動化。因機器人需事先學習，才能辨識物品以執行取放作業，故無法支應物流中心需處理上千萬不同商品的現場。
所羅門自主研發JustPick智能分揀系統，透過AI 3D視覺與深度學習，賦予機器人感知能力，如同裝上眼與腦，讓機器人突破使用限制，「機器人不需事先學習即能成功辨識上千萬種商品」；自主研發「視覺導引吸嘴模組」，機器手臂裝有吸嘴模組，能依物件尺寸彈性應用，讓機器人夾取更靈活，有效替代物流業人工分撿作業，實現物流場域智動化。適用物流業與製造業夾取作業。

特色
1.視覺系統:透過深度學習不須事先教導，即能辨識上萬種物件與降低設備導入時間與成本。
2.夾爪系統:任何一款吸嘴或夾爪均無法全面處理各式樣品項。「視覺導引吸嘴模組」可依物件外觀尺寸自動切換吸嘴數量，提高產業適用性。
3.機器人手臂系統:能與20家以上的機器人品牌大廠整合，直接控制手臂動作，省作業員操作手臂的煩惱。
4.路徑規劃以及防撞系統:動作規劃模組(motion planning)可在最短時間內計算最佳路徑，並加上防撞系統。

JustPick智能3D分撿系統
物流中心分揀流程仍依賴人力，難轉型自動化。因機器人需事先學習，才能辨識物品以執行取放作業，故無法支應物流中心需處理上千萬不同商...

translations.name: JustPick
translations.description:
When your operation requires to manually pick thousands or millions of SKUs to fulfill your customers’ orders, using robots to automate its handling becomes the only logical solution. However, despite the advancements in AI, training robots to “learn” to identify every single item before they can pick it is still an impractical process.  
With JustPick, the robot is able to pick items without having any prior knowledge of them. This is best suited for applications where working with large SKUs is required, including order picking, parcel handling, and carton de-palletization. Features:
Deep-Learning without previous training/No labels, sample images, or CAD files required/Reduction in the processing time, completing it in minutes not hours/Optimal identification of the objects, regardless of their shape, size, or appearance/A vision controlled gripper that automatically guides the robot to perform its picking tasks effortlessly/Support for 20 brands of 6-axis robots, cobots, SCARA.

translations.name: PowerDVD
translations.description: With digital media content consumption on the rise across devices, PowerDVD 20 integrates a comprehensive cloud-based viewing and streaming experience for seamless enjoyment of all contents, anywhere, in their best possible quality. Users can share content between Wi-Fi connected PCs, TVs and devices, or upload media to their personal CyberLink Cloud, allowing easy access to their videos, photos and music on any device, no matter where they are. With the ability to share media with friends and family, users enjoy a seamless, socially integrated entertainment experience. By syncing with CyberLink Cloud, PowerDVD 20 offers a complete cross-device experience. Users can pause media on one device and continue watching on other PCs or mobile devices right where they left off. It is as simple as sharing a link that allows them to view the content on their browser. PowerDVD 20 is the perfect choice for groups of people wishing to build a shared cloud-streaming collection.

translations.name: U會議 & U通訊
translations.description:
「U會議＆U通訊」為一套專為企業與學校打造的視訊會議和即時通訊工具。今年因疫情影響，「U會議＆Ｕ通訊」獲得市場的關注且詢問大增。已獲全台百所大專院校申請導入。訊連經營數位行銷宣傳和舉辦線上教育訓練，擴大產品知名度與曝光度，深化企業客戶的互動連結。

「U會議＆Ｕ通訊」產品創新亮點
1.	跨平台高品質視訊會議：
  可利用電腦、行動裝置或是Chrome瀏覽器（免安裝插件），輕鬆加入高品質的視訊會議。U 會動態依據網路連線品質，即時調整影像最佳畫質，提供觀眾流暢的觀看體驗。
2.	多元溝通互動方式：
一鍵即時分享電腦螢幕，啟用白板功能畫記，或在討論時啟用虛擬雷射筆互動。強化會議主持人和會議中進行分組討論的功能，讓線上教學互動更有彈性。
      3. 強大組織管理工具 
透過整合AD企業帳戶，U組織成員名單皆利用公司信箱認證，且自動同步更新。提供組織管理工具，方便即時掌握並分析U使用情形，與組織成員帳號和雲端空間。

translations.name: U Meeting & U Messenger
translations.description:
"U Meeting & U Messenger" is designed for business communication, providing the tool for online meetings and business chat. This year, due to the disaster of Covid-19, businesses and schools require a fully integrated communication tool for video meetings and chat. 
The unique features of U Meeting & U Messenger are listed below: 
1. Best video quality by AI technology
Using powerful AI technology, U delivers unmatched video meetings by automatically detecting network environments and adjusting image quality to suit.
2. Flexible Interaction	
During meetings, the participants can share their desktop, annotate on the U whiteboard, and use laser pointers for extra clarity on each point.  
3. Easy Management for your Organization
With AD Sync set up, U member lists can be automatically synchronized from AD. With the Admin tools, administrators can keep track of key metrics of all meetings in the organization.

translations.name: FaceMe® AI 臉部辨識引擎
translations.description:
訊連科技為全球人工智慧臉部識別技術領導廠商。採用深度類神經網路學習演算法打造的FaceMe® AI臉部辨識引擎，以高達98.95%的正確辨識率，低於10-6的認錯率，在全球知名的MegaFace Challenge和NIST臉部辨識競賽中，名列全球最精準之臉部識別技術之一，為台灣最具權威的臉部辨識引擎。

產品特色：

1. FaceMe® Security是市面上唯一同時提供臉部辨識及即時通訊的解決方案。FaceMe® Security於智慧安控場景中提供端對端的解決方案，可串聯中央伺服器、局端的工作站及安控攝影機，並可透過即時通訊系統發送警示訊息給行動裝置。

2. 跨平台優化：支援 Windows、Linux、Android 與iOS技術平台，適用於開發跨平台應用解決方案，如門禁系統、電子看板、資訊服務站及利用iOS和Android 打造之app。

3. 專為邊緣運算裝置打造：FaceMe®可針對各式邊緣運算裝置之CPU/GPU運算能力，進行彈性配置及優化並支援多種AI深度學習演算法之系統和平台，包含 OpenVINO™、NVIDIA CUDA、Jetson及ARM等。

translations.name: FaceMe® AI Facial Recognition Engine
translations.description:
CyberLink is the world leader in facial recognition technology. The deep neural network-based FaceMe® has an accuracy rate of 98.5%, at 10-6 FAR, ranking it the fastest, most precise facial recognition engine in the NIST’s Face Recognition Vendor Test (FRVT).

Key features:
1. FaceMe® Security is a complete end-to-end surveillance solution, connecting central servers, surveillance cameras, and edge-based workstations. Combined with U Alerts, FaceMe® can send warning messages to mobile devices via instant messages.

2. Optimized for cross-platform solutions: supporting Windows, Linux, Android, and iOS platforms. FaceMe® is ideal for cross-platform solutions, such as security door systems, digital signage at KIOSKs, and mobile apps.

3. Encompassing all Edge Computing configuration: FaceMe® provides flexible settings to control speed, accuracy, CPU/GPU processing, and AI toolkits. Making it optimized for edge computing and suitable for numerous scenarios and hardware configurations.

translations.name: 安克細偵
translations.description:
安克細偵®為數位細胞學影像分析軟體。除顯像調整及基本量測標記，此軟體可自動分辨細胞核質後做色彩及型態特徵分析與量化，如核質比、細胞核大小不均、擠壓與重疊、核內細胞質封入體等，準確地提供細胞學特徵量化數據及視覺化影像呈現，協助臨床與科學研究者做疾病評估判讀。另外，此軟體亦透過甲狀腺結節細胞量化特徵建構診斷模型輔助結節臨床判讀。
產品特色: 
1.	細胞核與細胞質自動分群
2.	視覺化特徵影像方便臨床比對
3.	量化細胞色彩及型態特徵值可供後續統計分析及臨床報告輸出
4.	提供甲狀腺結節惡性機率評估
5.	支援即時顯微鏡細胞學影像擷取並分析

translations.name: AmCAD-CA
translations.description:
AmCAD-CA is a software device designed for analyzing digital cytological images. Considering morphology and chromatology, AmCAD-CA can be used to identify cytological features such as nuclear-cytoplasm ratio, anisokaryosis, molding, pseudoinclusion, etc. The numeric quantified and visualized cytology features may be used to assist clinical interpretation of diseases. In particular, a computer-aided diagnosis (CAD) model has been built and included in the software to assist diagnoses of thyroid neoplasms.

Product Features: 
1.	Automatic classification of cytoplasm and nucleus
2.	Visualized and quantified data for further statistical analysis
3.	Quantification of both morphological and chromatic cytology features
4.	Diagnostic interpretation for thyroid nodules with estimation of malignant risk
5.	Supporting real-time acquisition of digital images from microscopy camera for immediate analysis and interpretation of the cytological smear samples

translations.name: YouCam AI智慧膚質檢測
translations.description:
「YouCam AI智慧膚質檢測」是玩美移動獨立研發美妝科技SaaS (軟體即服務)，結合人工智慧 (Artificial intelligence, AI)、虛擬實境(Augmented Reality, AR)與大數據(Big Data)提供給保養品牌與終端使用者專業級膚質檢測。「YouCam AI智慧膚質檢測」」系統的服務情境分為三部分，第一是利用相機掃描AI針對七萬張不同膚色、膚況的照片進行學習後分析膚質狀況，第二是AR標定瑕疵分布與種類，最後則是根據瑕疵分布狀況分析嚴重程度及AR預覽保養品使用效果。智慧膚質檢測的一項重點在於皮膚瑕疵的AR視覺化標定，目前研發技術可針對皮膚的七大瑕疵－皺紋、黑眼圈、斑點、紋理、保水度、油光與泛紅於相機擷取影像後進行即時辨識分析，並標定於輸出影像顯示於螢幕上。

另一個膚質管理的重要領域是抗痘保養，若能準確偵測青春痘的位置分布，進而分析其發展週期與嚴重程度可幫助使用者追蹤管理皮膚健康狀況。

translations.name: YouCam AR Skin Diagnostic
translations.description: The YouCam AI Skin Diagnostic experience is available to beauty lovers through the in-app Skin Diary feature in the free YouCam Makeup app, and to brands and retailers through custom omnichannel solutions that play to the growing demand for personalization, such as the Neutrogena Skin 360 app. The instant skin diagnostic uses advanced YouCam AI skin tech to track spots, wrinkles, texture, and dark circles and generate personalized product recommendations that meet the specific skin concerns of the users. Patented YouCam facial recognition technology generates a skin age and overall skin score for users to use as a baseline in tracking their skin health and the efficacy of products they are using over time.

translations.name: Novo無線協作智能會議解決方案
translations.description:
Novo無線協作智能會議解決方案同時具備視訊會議與電子白板功能，當進行遠距溝通時，可即時分享簡報內容，並於觸控螢幕上速寫重點筆記、會議記錄等，讓視訊會議+無線分享+筆記功能，變成最強大的遠端會議方式，解決了居家辦公、分流辦公等因應全球疫情影響而大幅改變的工作型態。

此外Novo無線協作智能會議系統，改善了傳統線材連接距離的限制與資訊分享的不便，讓使用者迅速分享個人裝置的資訊與簡報，並產生即時的互動，提升整體參與度與訊息的傳遞性，增進群組討論的效率。

Novo系列解決方案亦提供了完整的產品選擇，不論是傳統會議室或共享辦公環境，都能簡易安裝適合的產品組合，快速打造出新型態的智能會議、互動協作環境。

內建數位電子看版系統，亦可在會議空檔時，由中央控制播送文字、圖片、影音、網頁內容等形式而成的內部訊息，建立高效、吸睛的內部溝通管道。

Novo無線協作智能會議解決方案，突破傳統會議室的框架，善用企業內部的所有空間；並搭配更便利、更強大的無線投影與互動協作功能，在任何環境下，皆能為企業用戶打造智慧辦公空間，讓文件分享更方便，會議討論更省時，溝通更有效率。

translations.description:
The Novo Wireless and Collaborative Presentation Solution is the smart solution for enhancing conference efficiency.

Enable to have video conferencing capabilities for remote discussions just by installing the meeting software. With a digital whiteboard, speakers can write down notes on the touch screen and share meeting minutes immediately. The combination of video conferencing software, wireless presentation system, and digital whiteboard has become the most powerful remote meeting method, which solves problems people have experienced with changes in work habits since the pandemic began, such as working from home or splitting operations.

Breakthrough the traditional conference room framework, enhance the use efficiency of all the spaces in the building with a more convenient and powerful wireless presentation and collaboration system. Companies can build a smart, highly efficient, and productive working environment via the Novo wireless and collaborative presentation solution.
