translations.name: Golface智慧球車系統
translations.description:
Golface 智慧球車系統目前與台灣 12 家高爾夫球場合作，透過GPS定位，球場管理者及桿弟，可幫助球場掌握各球道的使用狀況，讓管理者可靈活進行調動，避免塞車。根據統計，使用 Golface 後，可以幫球場省下了 80％ 巡場的時間。也因透過 App 管控得當，每組客人總擊球時間也減少了 15 分鐘。另外，透過系統上的球道介紹與攻略，球友在擊球時更能掌握球道的地勢，並可輕鬆記錄每次下場的成績。
Golface 智慧球車系統除了用來協助球場管理與球友擊球，也可透過所收集的資料與消費者行為，幫助球場提升管理績效、推動行銷。Golface 掌握了球友們較常在那些時間訂球、他們所喜愛的時段、打球的週期、並且可以預測舉辦職業比賽前後對於球場營運所產生的影響，Golface 讓科技與數據的妥善結合來協助高爾夫球場全面數位轉型。

translations.name: Golface smart golf cart system
translations.description:
Available in 12 golf clubs in Taiwan, Golface Smart Golf System is able to assist course mangers and caddies to maximize the use of each fairway and avoid traffic jams with GPS positioning. According to statistics, after using Golface, the average patrolling time has been reduced by 80%, and the average playing time has also been reduced by 15 minutes. Moreover, the course information and strategies on the system also allow players to have a better understanding of the course layout and record their scores easily.
On top of helping with course managements and enhancing golfing experiences, Golface can also help the course to improve productivity and marketing with data collected. Such as the most common time for booking, their favorite tee-times and period of playing. Furthermore, Golface is able to use data to predict the effect of professional tournaments on sales before and after. Golface will help golf courses with total digital transformation by integrating data and technology.

translations.name: 邊緣雲解決方案
translations.description:
多數中小企業因成本考量，大多使用公有雲，不過部分領域業者像是半導體製造、CNC機台等業者，在場域限制、資料敏感或網路安全…等因素下，傾向建置私有雲，但由於市場上的私有雲多為大型企業設計，此類系統的架構龐大，且需投入大量資金，對中小企業來說難以負荷，因此研華推出輕量級邊緣雲解決方案EIS-S230，結合研華硬體設備與設備營運管理軟體WISE-DeviceOn，提供資料蒐集、管理與呈現等功能，並具備高可擴充性的完整微服務架構，中小企業可以評估內部資源與需求後建構出合身的私有雲系統。邊緣雲解決方案三大價值點如下: 
(1)	私有雲與混和雲場域設備管理: 邊緣雲向上提供各種公有雲對接，向下負責設備管理與資料處理。透過低延遲，高安全性與標準開放的架構，讓需要高穩定與安全需求場域可以快速建置邊緣雲。
(2)	邊緣雲計算與人工智慧佈署: 透過邊緣雲計算，將大量數據轉化為有效資料，除了減少網路頻寬浪費，更可以大大降低雲運算負載。
(3)	豐富視覺化套件，隨時掌握場域即時狀態:透過研華邊緣雲Dashboard可視化圖形介面，將大量資料轉化為各種評量指標, 做為管理者提出決策的依據。

translations.name: Edge Cloud Solution
translations.description: Advantech, a leading global provider of IoT systems and embedded platforms, is pleased to announce the brand new Edge Cloud Solution to accelerate edge-to-cloud application implementation. Edge Cloud Solution provides an all-in-one hardware and software integrated packages with high scalability to realize edge management based on DeviceOn.iEdge, and pre-integrated with both Linux-based Kubernetes and Windows Server environments support, help in microservice deployment and management. It also supports a hybrid-cloud structure for connecting to public clouds like Azure or AWS and private clouds. System integrators and IEMs can quick build their edge cloud solution for incorporating data storage, creating composite data views with dashboard, and hosting data services.

translations.name: B1
translations.description:
創新以缽為型
以盛裝食物容器的「缽」為造型設計，融合層間相間格柵設計，圓融的曲線律動，溫潤交疊成充滿時尚現代感的禪風機殼。

一體成型工法
捨棄接合方式，運用一體成型工法創造出橢圓造型，形塑圓潤美感的線條，柔和的角度使整體視覺動線更流暢。高抗壓性的優秀結構強度，大幅增強耐用度。

獨特的格柵層間通風
運用格柵建築層間相錯設計為隱藏式散熱孔，一虛一實的次序線條，讓光線及空氣得以自然流動，打造穿透性美感空間。

羽量級機能機殼
僅僅1.9kg的輕量級機殼，小巧的體積，高密度的空間運用，滿足文書機、HTPC、LAN串連等影音娛樂使用需求，能融合於任何環境。

雙層空間
透過分層架構讓主機板與硬碟各自空間獨立，精密的風流計算出最佳系統配置，使熱源得以分流。

零距離手感
細膩的機械工藝技術，表面防刮抗污，不沾指印，溫潤手感接觸，零距離地親近生活。

直立/平放兩用
雙重擺放功能，有效利用空間。不對稱腳架設計，巧妙平衡系統重量，定位卡榫防滑，增強穩固性。

人性化快拆設計
免工具2.5吋硬碟槽，內建易插拔SATA模組，上蓋快拆把手，易於拆裝。

200W金牌認證高密度電源供應器

translations.name: B1
translations.description:
Innovation based on bowl
With a "bowl" serving as the modeling design, the combination of grille layers, curve shape and overall symmetry; overlaps aesthetics into a modern computer chassis. 

Unibody forming
Abandoning the joint construction, the B1 adopted an integral molding method to make an ellipse, creating a mellow line and a soft angle to make the visual extension.

Distinctive grille interlayer ventilation
The grille building layer is as a hidden vent, a virtual and real sequence of lines, allows the natural flow of light and air, creating a penetrating space.

Lightweight functional chassis
The B1 is developed into a 1.9kg lightweight chassis. The dual-layered architecture separates the motherboard and hard disk to avoid thermal issues. 

Vertical/Horizontal placement
Placed vertically or horizontally to make use of space effectively. Equipped with an asymmetric stand, designed to distribute the weight of the system evenly to prevent slipping and enhance the stability.

translations.name: HS-3314A
translations.description:
(一)、創新結構設計，利用先分再合觀念，先將功能模組一一獨立化，再利用直立式機型堆疊架構，將週邊8大模組依其PCB電路及人體操作工學做配置，縮小機身，強化功能。
(二)、創新設計針對使用率、維修率高的模組，強化模組拆裝便利性，不涉及內部結構，即使一般客戶也能輕鬆DIY升級或維修。並讓POS升級簡單快速化，更能滿足不同顧客需求。減少重覆購機或換機，成功減少用料並降低購機成本，相當符合節能減碳之環保概念。
(三)、創新獨立便利拆裝模組設計，縮短組裝工時，加速客戶端功能升級和維修作業，成功減少顧客營運中斷之窘境，有效提升客戶服務品質。
(四)、創新自動點膠系統貼合，改善面板貼合技術，提升面板可視度及對比度，並讓前框面板達防水、防塵等級。
(五)、特殊無風扇設計，利用鋁合金背板快速均溫導熱，再透過上下I/O氣孔加速排放熱能，使CPU表面溫度低於85oC有效降低運轉時環境溫度，可延長產品生命週期。

translations.name: HS-3314A
translations.description:
The HS-3314A is the best value option for Mom & Pop stores where the counter space needed to be maximized smartly. It is an Android based all-in-one POS featuring a detachable printer for easy maintenance, and can be integrated the most widely used peripheral options in daily POS operation.
1.Compact
Space is money; the HS-3314A creates more precious counter space to display and to promote more merchandize, thus increasing profit returns for the store owner.
2.All-in-one
As an “all-in-one” solution, the HS-3314A offers great benefits while still maintains adequate performance with its ARM based quad core processor.
3.Aesthetics
With stylish touches added throughout, the HS-3314A is not just a piece of machinery; it is an elegantly crafted piece of art that looks right at home in any store decoration.

translations.name: DDR4 RGB 超頻記憶體
translations.description:
RGB產品在市場上算是相對成熟的商品，XPG旗下有多款RGB炫光記憶體模組產品，為各種不同目標市場所設計，分為「Hybrid複合式散熱技術的液冷」、「專利大面積發光」以及強調「多層次控燈光效」，堪稱業界製作RGB系列產品最全面的品牌。 

SPECTRIX D50電競記憶體，強調簡潔的工業風，裝上厚度達1.95mm堅固厚實的散熱片，讓整體性更形穩固。散熱片隱隱透出細微髮絲增加其立體層次，陽極處理刻印上的俐落幾何線條，象徵強悍速度，同時搭配唯美的三角導光柱，三角形發光點綴著金屬的剛硬線條，正面看過去就像嵌著寶石的權杖，頂部的導光條讓 RGB 漸層光能完整綻放；如流動的霓虹，是系統中最吸睛的視覺亮點。

SPECTRIX D50經過嚴密的品質篩選，採用高效能的記憶體顆粒與優質電路板搭配，穩定提供高達 4800MHz 的超高頻率，特別適合追求速度的電競玩家和超頻好手。另外，與各大主機板廠合作，藉由XPG獨家開發的XPG RGB Sync APP控制燈效模式，除了預設的靜態恆亮、漸進呼吸式發光、彗星光束三種發光模式外，還能設定與音樂節拍同步閃爍的音樂模式，讓系統更富生命力！

translations.name: DDR4 RGB Memory Module
translations.description:
The XPG SPECTRIX D50 memory module is a product specifically designed for discerning gamers and PC enthusiasts. Moving away from a traditional memory module design characterized by outrageous and flashy elements. Therefore, its sturdy heat sink features understated hairline brushed surfaces and an elegant styling with geometric lines. What’s more, its beautiful triangular light bar adds a unique touch.

Made with only the highest quality chips and PCBs, the D50 provides ultimate stability, reliability, and speeds of up to 4800MHz. What’s more, it comes with a maximum capacity of 32GB and supports the latest Intel and AMD platforms. In addition, the D50 sports a solidly constructed 1.95mm-thick metal heatsink for excellent durability.

With the XPG RGB Sync app from a major motherboard brand, users can switch between RGB modes - Static, Breathing, and Comet – for a bit of gaming flair. In addition to the modes, users can also set it to Music mode to sync with their favorite songs.

translations.description: Predator X34 S brings to professional gamers the most high-end gaming features. With a rapid overclock to 175Hz refresh rate, VESA DisplayHDR 400,  3440x1440 resolution, large 34" size, wide color gamut of DCI-P3 98%, high color accuracy of Delta E less than 1 and tear-free Nvidia G-Sync, the X34 S fulfills a professional gamer's every need. This monitor belongs in the top of the line X(Extreme) series and is prefect gaming companion.

translations.name: Predator電競按摩椅-OSIM聯名款
translations.description: 全新的Predator電競按摩椅-OSIM聯名款專為職業玩家和電子競技愛好者而設計，在遊戲進行中或後提供放鬆的按摩，利用按壓，滾動和拍打功能來減輕緊張感並提高身體舒適度。 這款舒適的椅子可調高度，椅背也可傾斜至145°，並通過設計在右邊扶手內的控制面板，揮別有線的纏繞，可提供4個滾輪的2D按摩，這些滾輪會跟隨脊椎的S形曲線直線移動，同時也可左右移動。 提供了三個自動程式和兩個可客製化程式，它們的速度和強度各不相同。 滾輪可以通過六種級別進行調節，以找到肩部按摩的理想位置，而三種水平調節設置則使玩家能夠準確地瞄準按摩位置。 頭枕上的兩個內置藍牙揚聲器增強了遊戲的沉浸感，這是無需耳機即可提供動態音效的便捷解決方案。

translations.name: Predator Gaming Chair x OSIM
translations.description: Designed for professional gamers and eSports enthusiasts, the new Predator Gaming Chair x OSIM gives a relaxing massage to undo muscle and nerve stress from press-grip, rolling and tapping during gaming. Highly adjustable, this cozy chair can recline up to 145°. Buttons on the right armrest control a 2D massage with four rollers that follow the s-curve of the spine while also moving from side to side. The three automatic and two customizable programs vary in speed and intensity. The rollers can be adjusted six ways for shoulder massages, while three horizontal settings can always find the right spot. Two built-in Bluetooth speakers on the headrest intensify the gaming immersion through dynamic sound effects without the need for a headset.

translations.name: ConceptD 3/3 Ezel創作者筆電
translations.description: 宏碁推出採用Windows 10的全新創作者筆電ConceptD 3與ConceptD 3 Ezel。其中ConceptD 3 Ezel為可翻轉筆電，大大的擴展了ConceptD系列產品。甫獲2020年CES創新獎的ConceptD Ezel系列採用宏碁專利Ezel軸承設計，提供五種不同使用模式，讓設計師更方便協作、分享、實踐創意點子。ConceptD Ezel 系列皆採用宏碁的Ezel軸承，適合用於各式工作情境，不管是團隊協作、或使用產品隨附的Wacom® EMR或Acer Active Stylus觸控筆進行繪製或向客戶簡報都能游刃有餘。設計師可以將筆電轉換至手邊最合適的工作模式，包含分享、漂浮、站立、平板及展示和傳統筆電共六種模式可供選擇。ConceptD 系列輕便易攜帶，能在旅途中取代桌機，以一台裝置即可繪製、完成作品並呈現簡報的創作者來說是效能強大的移動式專業工作站，是絕佳選擇。

translations.name: ConceptD 3/3 Ezel Creator Laptops
translations.description: Acer expands the ConceptD series with a new series of convertible mobile workstation laptops with Windows. The ConceptD Ezel series, winner of the CES Innovation Award 2020, uses Acer Ezel bearing design and offers six usage modes, making it easier for designers to collaborate, share, and discuss creative ideas. The series is suitable for all kinds of work situations, from teamwork to drawing with the Wacom® EMR or Acer active stylus to briefing customers. Designers can switch between six modes: share, float, pad, stand, display and laptop. ConceptD 3 and 3 Ezel are both light and very portable, like a powerful desktop computer on the go, a great choice for creators that wish to draw and present works on one device.

translations.name: 全自助多功能智慧付款機
translations.description:
1.適合放置在生鮮食品商店，店員可以不需要接觸到貨幣，避免細菌感染到食品上。
2.可應用於缺乏人力之小商店，取代收銀員的角色，店家可以騰出時間來管理商店中其他事務。
3.應用於高所得國家，可以減少商店的人事開銷，也可避免罷工或是缺工問題。
4.無現金交易為當今世界潮流，應用於治安不佳地區相當程度可以防止犯罪，同時也避免因偽鈔造成損失，防止因計算錯誤造成店家的損失。
5.應用於人流量較大的商店時，可以避免因為付款時間過長造成客戶等候過久。
6.透過此設備，員工毋須接觸到金流，可以防止員工的舞弊行為。
7.支援Windows 7以及Windows 8作業系統，以及最新的Windows10，方便習慣各種不同作業系統的操作者使用。
8.通過ISO9001品質認證、ISO14001環保認證，保證PA-R110的使用安全性。

translations.name: Desktop Non-Cash Self-Payment POS
translations.description:
1.Ideal for fresh food shops, the clerks no need to contact money directly, avoid bacterial infection to food.
2.Apply in small shops lack of manpower, PA-R110 can replace clerks’role, help do routine and repetitive things. Shop owner can spent more time on important actions.
3.Implement in high-income countries’ shops, PA-R110 can help reduce labor cost as well as avoid impact of strike and labor shortage issue.
4.Cashless payments are the current trend globally. With various non-cash payment methods, PA-R110 can prevent certain types of crimes, avoid loss caused by fake banknotes and calculation errors made by human clerks. 
5.Lead to shorter queues time in busy stores when checkout.
6.Prevent embezzlement as employees do not have chances to access money.
7.Support Windows 10, 8 and 7. Customers can select operating systems based on their needs.
8.Get ISO9001 quality authentication & ISO14001 environmental protection authentication, guarantees the operational safety of PA-R110.

translations.model_number: Z490 AORUS XTREME / Z490 AORUS XTREME WF
translations.name: Z490 AORUS XTREME電競主機板
translations.description:
Z490 AORUS XTEME電競主機板，透過最高16相數位電源VRM設計及新一代Fins-Array II散熱規劃，滿足高效能處理器在超頻時所需要的電源管理及溫度控制機制，完美發揮極致效能及卓越的超頻能力。採用Daisy Chain的記憶體走線搭配抗干擾遮罩設計，提供記憶體更穩的訊號以提升超頻效能與穩定性，配備附贈最新研發採用USB Type C介面的ESSential USB DAC，讓玩家可以不用屈就於機殼內音效線路對音質的減損，同時ESSential USB DAC也可以搭配採用USB Type C介面的手機跟平板等手持裝置，獲得更具沉浸效果的音效體驗。
Z490 AORUS XTEME採用技嘉廣受好評的超耐久技術，以極致效能及高耐用度為最主要訴求，透過採用全固態電容、全數位電源及智慧型風扇控制設計等方式達到低溫節能效果，同時智慧型頻率控制設計，除了在環保的同時提供最佳效能，更能有效減少能源使用量，延長產品使用壽命，有效達到資源使用最佳化，滿足電腦玩家在系統效能、電源穩定、散熱及音效等各方面的需求，提供消費者最佳產品體驗。

translations.model_number: Z490 AORUS XTREME / Z490 AORUS XTREME WF
translations.name: Z490 AORUS XTREME GAMING Motherboard
translations.description:
Z490 AORUS XTREME features 16-phase digital power design and improved Fins-Array II heatsink design, gears with the best power and thermal management to optimize overclocking performance on the high performance processors, also equips with Daisy Chain Routing and Shielded Memory Routing design to improve memory overclocking and stability. Adopts newly developed ESSential USB DAC with USB Type C to avoid audio quality impairing by chassis. ESSential USB DAC can also be used with mobile phones or tablets with USB Type C interfaces to provide a more immersive audio experience.
With GIGABYTE signature Ultra-Durable technology, all-solid capacitors, all-digital power designs, intelligent fan control and CPU frequency control design, Z490 AORUS XTREME manages to be environmental friendly while featuring extreme performance with durability and energy-saving which checks all the boxes to offer top-of-the-line system performance, power stability, thermal design, and audio quality.

translations.model_number: AERO 15 OLED YB / XB / WB / KB / SB
translations.name: AERO 15 OLED 創作者筆電
translations.description: 技嘉AERO系列創作者筆電，自推出就廣獲好評，勇奪「歐洲電腦硬體協會2019年度最佳筆電」、「台灣精品獎」等多項大獎，堪稱｢次世代輕薄高效專業筆電」的最佳典範。本次新一代改版15吋AERO 15 OLED / 17吋AERO 17 HDR，支援4K解析度及HDR400，4K面板色彩表現依舊是技嘉獨有的拿手好戲。一般商業設計或創作應用筆電的面板色偏值(Delta E)多落在3以上，小於2已經屬於工作站等級的高畫質，但技嘉獨家與色彩權威Xrite Pantone合作，在筆電出廠前進行逐台校色，達成嚴格標準色偏值小於1*，搭配OLED面板的4K高解析及HDRTrue Black純黑超高對比，支援顯示更多色彩及細節，協助創作者完美呈現精彩作品。效能方面同步獲得NVIDIA RTXStudio筆電認證，透過專屬Studio Ready驅動程式優化超過40款創作者常用編輯軟體，提升執行效率，且具備豐富擴充介面與UHS-II SD卡插槽。真正實現「行走如風超薄筆電、強效桌機擴充專業」的使用者體驗，強大多工應用能力堪稱最佳跨界應用薄型筆電。

translations.model_number: AERO 15 OLED YB / XB / WB / KB / SB
translations.name: AERO 15 OLED Creator Laptop
translations.description: GIGABYTES’ AERO series has been widely praised since its launch in 2016. AERO is referred to as the model for “next gen high-performance PRO laptops”. This major upgrade includes enhancements across the 15” AERO 15 OLED and 17” AERO 17 HDR, both supports 4K and HDR400. The color display has always been GIGABYTE’s strong selling point. GIGABYTE takes it one step further by working with Xrite Pantone, the authority in color display, implementing color calibration and achieves Delta E < 1. Combined with the AMOLED 4K display and HDR True Black high contrast, colors and details can be better displayed, helping content creators flawlessly display their products. Furthermore, AERO utilizes NVIDIA Studio driver to optimize over 40 editing software programs that content creators often use for improved efficiency. AERO is truly the epitome of “an ultra-portable notebook with desktop-level performance.”

translations.model_number: AORUS 15G YB / XB / WB / KB / SB
translations.name: AORUS 15G 專業電競筆電
translations.description: 技嘉科技聯手G2 Esports 電競戰隊，推出 AORUS 17X旗艦機皇與AORUS 17G、AORUS 15G高階電競筆電，從職業電競選手需求打造專業電競筆電。本次升級搭載包含Intel® Core™三款第10代處理器，顯示卡方面，更新增新一代筆電卡皇NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2080 SUPER™及NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070 SUPER™規格，預期在媒體處理速度及遊戲表現都能有所提升。AORUS 17X、17G與15G獨家與知名微動開關製造商OMRON合作，縮小機械軸體積卻保留手感，打造世界最輕機械軸鍵盤筆電，透過更短的觸發鍵程、紮實手感及敲擊回饋，提升遊戲速度的競技表現。而AORUS隨國際電競賽事顯示器規格標準紛紛同步拉高至 240Hz，減少遊戲中惱人殘影、破圖等問題，為高階玩家營造最佳遊戲視覺體驗。技嘉今年從各層面量身為專業玩家打造夢寐以求電競筆電逸品，連G2 Esports 戰隊CS:GO選手"狙神”KennyS都分享其使用經驗，表示AORUS 15G讓選手在各地巡迴比賽時，不論練習、遊玩，都能保持高水準的專業表現。

translations.model_number: AORUS 15G YB / XB / WB / KB / SB
translations.name: AORUS 15G Professional Gaming Laptop
translations.description: In collaboration with G2 Esports, GIGABYTE launches its flagship AORUS 17X, AORUS 17G, and AORUS 15G high end models, tailoring its laptops to the needs of pros. The AORUS 17X, AORUS 17G and AORUS 15G are the lightest laptops in the industry that feature true mechanical keyboards. AORUS works exclusively in partnership with mechanical switch manufacturer, OMRON, to minimize the size of mechanical switches while retaining its quality to create the world’s lightest mechanical keyboard laptop. The shortened switch travel distance, phenomenal tactile feel and crisp feedback all offer increasing game speed and performance, meeting the precise and rapid in-game control requirements of the pros. AORUS has set this as the standard for the display of all its high-end product series and effectively reduces the occurrence of afterimages and broken images, providing the high-speed visuals required by enthusiasts. The AORUS series form the pinnacle of high-performance gaming that pro gamers pursue.

translations.name: Creator 17 創作者筆電
translations.description:
CES創新大獎認證！CREATOR 17 全球首款搭載MINI LED面板的創作者筆電
MSI針對內容創作族群打造的創作者系列筆電，Creator 17獲得CES「數位影像與攝影」類別創新獎的肯定！經CES評選認證，Creator 17是內容創作平台的顛峰之作，即使在高負載狀況下，創作者也能流暢地完成工作。新世代Mini LED面板技術絕對是今年CES展覽的一大重點，MSI也精準捕捉到這項趨勢，Creator 17是全球首款搭載4K解析度Mini LED面板的筆電，也是第一款支援HDR 1000顯示標準的創作者筆電，4K解析度Mini LED面板的亮度達1,000 nits，可提供最鮮明的視覺效果以及更清晰，更細膩的圖像。此外，也支援100% DCI-P3廣色域標準，為使用者帶來最精準色彩呈現。

translations.name: Creator 17 Content Creation laptop
translations.description: Take the power of a fully loaded professional studio on the go with the world’s first laptop with Mini LED display and the first to meet HDR 1000 standards. Its 17-inch 4K display boasts a peak brightness of 1,000 nits and Mini LED backlighting, delivering the most vibrant visuals with the brightest whites and deepest blacks for sharper, more detailed imagery. Creator 17 also supports a wide color gamut of 100% DCI-P3, delivering the best true-to-life color accuracy to the human eye. To meet the demanding needs of creative professionals, MSI Content Creation laptops are tested and optimized to run Adobe software including Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Illustrator and much more. Instead of some laptops with webcam embedded on the bottom of the screen, a respectable IR HD webcam sits at the top of the lid of Creator 17.   The IR facial recognition system will also speed up your login process, which is 3 times faster than a password.

translations.name: GS66 Stealth 輕薄黑魂電競筆電
translations.description:
採用全新「黑魂」概念，GS66 Stealth以磨砂黑低調質感設計，就如同Stealth系列的命名意涵，不論任何情境你都可以毫無違和感的隱身其中。堅固的磨砂黑金屬材質完美符合日常使用需求，GS66 Stealth不僅是效能強悍且方便攜帶的電競筆電，更是同時橫跨遊戲戰場與工作場所的絕佳配備！

GS66 Stealth最高搭載最新第10代Intel® Core™ i9處理器、NVIDIA® GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER™顯示卡，搭配0.1 mm極薄扇葉以及大幅增加扇葉數目設計的獨家Cooler Boost Trinity+散熱模組，帶來最大氣流量，如此強效散熱使系統能發揮完整效能。99.9Whr超大電池提供絕佳續航力(符合飛航可攜帶上機的最大容量規定設計)，遊戲與工作腳步絕不停歇。極速300Hz更新率電競面板能完美呈現極度流暢的遊戲畫面體驗！全新設計的雙響單體設計(Duo Wave Speaker)，被動振膜設計提供高品質低音域至纖細中高音域的豐富聽覺體驗！前置掌托喇叭設計能傳遞令人驚豔的音效感受。

Combined with a 99.9Whr battery, the GS66 Stealth is the perfect solution for professionals who are gamers at heart.

translations.name: Optix MEG381CQR人機介面電競曲面顯示器
translations.description:
1. 世界首創人機介面電競螢幕
(i)第二螢幕可同時監控電腦及螢幕的使用狀態，發揮完整效能
(ii)人性化旋鈕設計，讓螢幕的操控更加得心應手

2. 從玩家角度出發、提供最佳使用者體驗
相機支架及溝槽－針對現在流行的直播市場，提供最佳的直播環境
滑鼠線夾－螢幕下方結合滑鼠線夾，預防滑鼠線造成滑鼠移動困難，並節省玩家桌上放置空間

3. 世界首創可支援SteelSeries GameSense的電競螢幕
獨家專利的前面板LED燈搭配Gamesense與遊戲連動，能即時顯示遊戲狀態。

4. 精緻優美之外形，令人賞心悅目。
Optix MEG341CQR承襲MSI電競的電路面板風格，螢幕背面斜角式電路紋路花紋，如一把刀，斜掛在螢幕背後，表現霸氣驕傲之態，搭配RGB LED燈與Mystic light燈光調控技術，忠實呈現出玩家最自我的獨特個性風格。

5. 頂級規格，符合所有玩家的基本需求
21:9的UWQHD高畫質畫面、2300R曲面螢幕符合人眼可視角曲度、144Hz刷新率與1ms的高反應速度提供最流暢的遊戲畫面，HDR600的高動態範圍成像技術，高色彩與亮度對比讓畫面栩栩如生。

translations.description:
1. The world's first gaming monitor with a human-machine interface. 
(i) The second monitor can simultaneously check the status of the computer and the monitor.
(ii) Humanized knob design makes the screen control more convenient.

2. The camera stand and mount provide the best streaming environment.
A mouse cable bungee is integrated under the monitor to help with cable organization and to save space on the players' desks.

3. SteelSeries GameSense status can be instantly displayed with the exclusively patented front panel LED lights coupled with Gamesense.

4. Optix MEG381CQR inherits the circuit panel styling of MSI Gaming. The circuit pattern on the back of the monitor hangs diagonally. With RGB LED lights and Mystic light lighting control technology, shows the players' gaming styles.

5. 21:9 UWQHD, 2300R curved monitor, 180Hz refresh rate and 1ms high response speed that provide the smoothest gaming images, HDR600 high dynamic range.

translations.name: Creator PS321 專業創作者顯示器
translations.description:
1.特殊不對稱設計打破傳統思維，融合達文西Vitruvian Man的完美對稱與米羅Carnival of Harlequin的不對稱，結合油畫與水墨畫的繪畫特性，符合設計師對完美與永恆的追求，同時符合設計師內心的智慧與狂野。
2.背面的不對稱氛圍燈光設計，使用者可自行決定最適色系，在關閉氛圍燈之後，其背面不對稱設計與正面的完美對稱相呼應，呈現不完美的完美。

4. 32吋2560x1440(WQHD)或3840x2160(UHD)解析度，導入快速IPS面板，提供驚人的圖像和色彩品質，確保更平滑的色彩漸變、均勻性和色彩準確性，以捕捉大自然的美麗和表現力。
5. 從使用者角度思考，磁吸式螢幕遮罩和側面讀卡器設計帶來直觀且高效的色彩管理。螢幕腳架支援左右、高度與俯仰角度調整，同時導入線材管理設計，不僅讓設計師在炫耀自我品味的同時，兼具便利性。
6. VESA協會認證HDR 600，色彩更加明亮鮮豔。

translations.name: Creator PS321 Creation Monitor
translations.description:
1. MSI Creator PS321 Series is inspired by The Harlequin’s Carnival, a painting by Joan Miró, the idea of perfect asymmetry. Something perfectly asymmetrical seems just as mesmerizing as something perfectly symmetrical. 
2. Ambient lighting design with asymmetrical circle and a curved line on the back perfectly blends with its symmetrical square on the front – making it stand out like a work of art, no matter the lighting is on or off.
3. The world's first monitor which can link with creators’ software, with exclusive Creator OSD and Creator Center, to provide the easiest way to customize all of settings.
4. With 32” 2560x1440 (WQHD) or 3840x2160 (UHD) & Rapid IPS panel and Adobe RGB 99% & Delta-E ≤ 2 & VESA Certified DisplayHDR 600, it is optimized for a breathtaking image and display intensity and purity of color to a professional degree. 
5. The magnetic monitor hood & side card reader design bring you an intuitive creation experience & an efficient color management workflow.

translations.name: Creator P100 專業創作者桌上型電腦
translations.description:
Creator P100系列為針對創意工作者如攝影、平面設計、影音編輯、3D動畫等創作者提供最佳效能與效率。

1. Creator P100系列外型簡潔、俐落，更是幾何圖形、曲線與金屬材質結合而成的完美體現，其設計概念源自於世紀中期現代主義(Mid-Century Modern Style)設計師，其低調奢華的外型設計，使其看起來不再像是電腦，更像是一份藝術精品，滿足設計師狂野但低調的心理。

2. MSI從創作者的角度出發，獨家軟體Creator Center能一鍵優化設計師常用軟體，使用者不需進行複雜的設定。結合Content Creation系列螢幕，更是滿足使用者對螢幕精確色彩的需求，以達電腦效能與顯示器最佳整合。

3. 尺寸僅13x37x39公分，十升小體積媲美大型工作站效能，搭載業界最高階第十代Intel i9-K系列處理器、支援共64GB雙通道記憶體與最新RTX顯示卡、Thunderbolt 3 、2.5 LAN與Wifi 6，為設計師帶來最快的運算與效率。

4. 重要零組件配置於兩側，免工具的手轉螺絲設計，可輕鬆開啟側蓋升級各項零件，免去繁瑣與錯綜複的拆裝及佈線。

translations.name: MEG Trident / MPG Trident 迷你電競桌上型電腦
translations.description:
1. 首款搭載Intel第10代 i9-10900K處理器僅10公升的迷你電競主機

translations.description:
1. 電競旋鈕設計- 整合系統資訊快速切換系統模式,提供玩家遊戲體驗
2. 第四代寂靜風暴冷卻系統- 獨家分離氣室設計與獨立風流途徑,確保系統始終維持瑜高效能

translations.name: 集線器
translations.description: 創見HUB5C搭載一體成型、正反可插USB Type-C傳輸線，採用極速USB 3.1 Gen 2介面，適合新一代Type-C手機、平板、筆電、新iPad Pro及MacBook機種等，擴充連接至Type-C孔的數量。HUB5C提供兩個USB Type-A埠，除了可連接USB隨身碟、外接式硬碟、行動固態硬碟等外接式儲存裝置，也可以連接USB隨身碟、鍵盤、滑鼠、USB風扇等配件，體驗隨插即用的樂趣！HUB5C具有兩個記憶卡槽，支援UHS-II效能等級的SD卡、及USH-I效能等級的microSD卡，搭配創見記憶卡，分別可達到SD卡槽每秒約285MB、microSD卡槽每秒約95MB的傳輸速度。拍完照後直接將記憶卡從相機中取出，接上HUB5C，就可以在電腦上無痛存取！HUB5C另有一僅供充電的USB Type-C埠，可連接筆電原廠充電器，或搭配其他支援PD快充的行動電源，支援最高60W PD (Power Delivery 3.0) 快速充電。創見HUB5C輕薄小巧的設計，可讓您隨身攜帶而不增加額外重量，是出門旅遊或是外地出差的最佳拍檔。

translations.name: Hub
translations.description: Transcend's HUB5C comes with a reversible USB Type-C connector equipped with the USB 3.1 Gen 2 interface to allow for amazing data transfer rates, a perfect complement to your new Type-C mobile, tablet, laptop, new iPad Pro, and new MacBook. The HUB5C offers two USB Type-A ports, allowing you to connect USB flash drives, external hard drives, portable SSDs, and other peripherals such as mice, keyboards, or USB-powered fans. The HUB5C also serves as a card reader for SD (UHS-II) and microSD (UHS-I) memory cards for up to 285MB/s and 95MB/s data transfer rates when paired with Transcend's memory cards. Furthermore, the HUB5C comes with another Type-C port for 60W USB PD (Power Delivery) pass-through charging. You can connect your laptop manufacturer's charger to the port, or use a power bank that supports USB PD. The HUB5C is so slim, lightweight, and portable that you can easily carry it around with you, ideal for business and for leisure.

translations.name: 隨身碟
translations.description: 創見JetFlash 920採用時尚耐用的鋁合金噴砂工藝打造，不但賦予隨身碟精緻質感，更提供資料高規格的防護，讓隨身碟即使經常隨身攜帶，內部資料仍舊安全可靠。JetFlash 920擁有超越坊間普通USB的非凡讀寫效能，每秒最高讀取速度達420MB、寫入速度達400MB，不論是4K電影還是高解析度影像，隨插立即光速秒傳，彷彿把固態硬碟裝入口袋中！此外，JetFlash 920隨身碟具備高耐用度特性，壽命是市售USB的十倍，無論是每日密集存取大量檔案、還是長時間對隨身碟進行連續的讀寫，例如將JetFlash 920與行車記錄器搭配使用，隨身碟皆提供長效優異的傳輸表現，確保您的重要資料完整儲存。貼心的鑰匙圈孔設計，可將JetFlash 920掛在包包上，攜帶方便，既實用又不失流行。附帽蓋更可防止USB接頭意外斷裂，而導致資料遺失。搭配免費下載的資料管理軟體Transcend Elite，可使用於Windows及Mac作業系統，內含多種實用功能，包含備份及還原、資料加密、雲端資料備份等，讓你在儲存、分享並攜帶個人資料時更有效率！

translations.name: USB Flash Drive
translations.description: Safeguard your data with Transcend's JetFlash 920, whose aluminum metallic housing with a sandblasted finish is as sturdy as it is sleek. Being highly portable, the flash drive’s durable design offers top-notch protection of your data inside and out. With up to 420MB/s read speeds and up to 400MB/s write speeds, you can transfer full-length 4K movies and high-resolution images to the JetFlash 920 in a mere seconds. In addition, these high-endurance drives boast 10 times the lifespan of a regular USB. Whether you need to transfer a ton of graphics or HD videos on a daily basis, or whether you use your JetFlash 920 with a write-intensive application, like a dashcam - you can count on the JetFlash 920 to get things done without a hitch! Finally, get the Transcend Elite software for free to easily manage data on a PC or Mac. The software features backup and restore, data encryption, and cloud backup functions, helping you keep your important files organized, protected, and up-to-date!

translations.name: ASUS TUF Gaming A15/A17/F15/F17
translations.description:
TUF Gaming A15/A17最高配備最新的AMD Ryzen™ 9 處理器和GeForce RTX™ 2060 圖形處理器，可在各式遊戲中大量處理高畫面播放速率。高達144Hz 的高速IPS級顯示器，可呈現完整飽和的色彩; TUF Gaming F15/F17則是最高搭載了最新第10代 Intel® Core™ i7 處理器及GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti 圖形處理器，帶領玩家贏得勝利。

此款電競筆電甚至擁有比前代更小巧、具便攜性的機身，以及更大的90Wh電池容量，展現優秀的電池續航力; 為求極致的生產力表現，產品設計保留了第2個固態硬碟的插槽，提供玩家自行擴充的彈性空間。除此之外，使用標準螺絲起子，即可輕鬆移除機身底部的螺絲: 特殊的設計使得螺絲可些許彈開，抬起了底部面板的一角，使分離底板變得更容易，進而實現快速升級、替換RAM，或透過新增第二個PCIe®硬碟增加超高速SSD的容量。

結合高效的自我清潔散熱系統和TUF獨特的軍規級耐用性，在更精實的產品外觀之下，此代TUF Gaming為使用者帶來更強大的實力，為遊戲、直播及一切相關活動提供可靠的效能與戰鬥力。

translations.name: ASUS TUF Gaming A15/A17/F15/F17
translations.description:
The latest ASUS TUF Gaming laptops are powerfully equipped for high-FPS gaming. Our new TUF Gaming A15/A17 devices combine the latest AMD Ryzen™ 9 CPU with an NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 GPU, while the TUF Gaming F15/F17 laptops use 10th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 CPU and a GeForce GTX™ 1660 Ti GPU.

A speedy IPS-level panel up to 144Hz makes these gaming powerhouses perfect for fast-paced play. Adaptive Sync synchronizes the display’s refresh rate with the GPU’s frame rate to reduce lag, minimize stuttering, and eliminate visual tearing for silky smooth, immersive gameplay. These laptops also feature a large 90Wh battery that lets users unplug and work longer on the go.

Efficient self-cleaning cooling combines with TUF's signature military-grade durability to make our TUF Gaming A15/A17/F15/F17 devices reliable allies for gamers on the go, and also deliver dependable performance for gaming, streaming, and everything in between.

translations.name: ROG Strix 可攜式電競螢幕
translations.description:

1. 流暢、零破圖的遊戲體驗: 15.6吋144Hz高刷新率面板，支援1毫秒動態反應時間，G-Sync Compatible垂直同步功能

translations.name: ASUS ProArt Display
translations.description:
為了符合創作者隨時隨地的創作需求，ProArt Display PA14專業可攜式觸控顯示器因此而生，其創新的價值，除了為創作者提高工作效率之外，也讓他們能隨心所欲地揮灑熱情、展現創意，其中包含：
1. 產品外觀設計力求簡潔俐落且方便攜帶，重量僅0.9Kg，厚度僅12mm。
2. 背面設計整合0∘~150∘多角度支架，可依創作者需求快速、無段調整使用角度。
3. 機台背面亦加入旋鈕設計，除了可快速操控OSD，亦可讓創作者在進行影音編輯時，快速調整軟體工具，例如:切換筆刷大小、調整彩度及飽和度…等，提供創作者更直覺快速的使用體驗。
4. 採用優於業界色彩的IPS面板，可涵蓋100% sRGB色彩空間，再搭配出廠時的色彩預先校正程序，造就優異的色彩準確度(ΔE < 2)。
5. 此面板亦為電容式觸控面板，最高支援十點觸控功能，可支援滑/捲動、拖曳、捏合與展開等手勢。
6. Micro HDMI及USB type-C連接埠，後者可支援電源和視訊傳輸，可相容於任何具備USB Type-C連接埠且支援視訊傳輸的筆記型電腦及Android智慧型手機。

translations.description:

此外，ROG Zephyrus Duo 15特有的螢幕轉軸設計，能在開啟上蓋時帶動第二螢幕抬升，不僅提供使用者更舒適的視角與觸控互動，還能透過28.5mm的進氣口大幅提升散熱效果。ROG亦在CPU上使用液態金屬，讓Zephyrus Duo足以在不犧牲輕薄設計的情況下，發揮旗艦CPU的最高效能，提供使用者雙螢的極致體驗。

translations.name: ROG Zephyrus Duo 15
translations.description:
The ROG Zephyrus Duo 15 revolutionizes gaming laptops by fitting 2 premium displays in a dynamic ultraslim form factor that’s just 20.9mm thin. The secondary built-in 14.1” ROG ScreenPad Plus display features intuitive touchscreen controls, stylus support, and optimized apps that make using both displays together seamless.

Thanks to an innovative custom hinge design, the secondary display tilts up automatically as the laptop is opened, offering users a comfortable angle for interaction and viewing. That tilt also opens up a massive 28.5mm air intake behind the screen that draws in cool air from above the laptop, significantly increasing airflow and cooling efficiency. Cooling is further enhanced with a liquid metal thermal compound on the CPU, painted on with a patented in-house process.

translations.name: ROG Zephyrus M15
translations.description:

速度、效能與便攜性在M15中取得完美平衡。超薄框架中裝入強大第十代Intel i7-10875H CPU及NVIDIA RTX2070 GPU。高達32GB DDR4-3200 RAM和1TB的高速RAID 0 SSD儲存裝置，讓您更快完成日常工作與多工作業。
2.真實色彩與速度顯示
遊戲玩家可在240Hz和4K螢幕上，進行行雲流水般的射擊遊戲及高品質的專業創作。兩款螢幕獲得Pantone認證，使用適合展示視覺專案與媒體的廣視角。
3.創作無所不在
Thunderbolt 3連線功能提供執行高負載多媒體編輯所需的額外顯示器、外接GPU與高速儲存裝置的擴充彈性。結合Intel Wi-Fi6提供網路活動的低延遲連線，可不受地點限制進行工作或遊戲。
4.利用液態金屬達到智慧散熱
特殊液態金屬膏可降低溫度、雙N片風扇旋轉83片葉片以增加氣流，自我清潔散熱模組可排出灰塵，以延長使用壽命並提升長期效能。
5.TYPE-C 充電
USB Power Delivery 可從行動電源進行二次充電，讓您不必在電量不足時尋找插座。在低負載的活動下也可使用高達 65W 的小型變壓器以減輕負擔

ROG Zephyrus G14是專為新世代所打造, 這個世代擁抱多元文化, 年輕有活力, 並且重視個人化的同時, 希望保有效能, ROG Zephyrus G14是第一台擁有強大效能RTX GPU以及八核心Ryzen APU的14吋電競筆電, 他的便攜性加上強大的效能, 讓使用者可以隨時隨地遊戲及工作。沒有任何同等級的筆電能同時給予如此的效能卻維持在可負擔的價位。

G14的上蓋搭載 ROG 動態編程 LED 顯示器（AniMe Matrix）, 在難以置信的小尺寸面積中創造 6,536 個間距一致的孔洞並且嵌入1,215 個 mini-LED, 透過這些獨立 mini LED 能讓玩家展現自訂的動畫、圖片音效等化器等多種特效來創造自己的個性化內容。未來, 我們準備提供一個平台, 讓用戶可以互相分享彼此的動畫設計。

translations.name: ROG Zephyrus G14
translations.description:
The ROG Zephyrus G14 embodies the spirit of next-gen gamers—a diverse, young, and active group that values individualism on par with performance. It’s the first 14” ultraslim gaming laptop designed to take full advantage of a potent RTX GPU and 8-core Ryzen APU, offering impressive power in a portable size that lets users work and play anywhere. No other gaming laptop in its class offers comparable power, and certainly not at a price that makes it affordable for a wide range of gamers. 

The G14 also debuts an entirely new platform for creativity in its patented AniMe Matrix™ LED display. The customizable display shines 1,215 LEDs through 6,536 precision perforations in the lid to let users show off custom animations, graphics, or synchronize lighting effects to the music they love. It’s a radical, one-of-a-kind means for self-expression that reinvents laptop design for the modern gamer and raises expectations for what’s possible in such a compact form factor.

全新 ROG Strix G15 Series 電競桌機專注於遊戲基本所需，兼具親民價格與出色效能；其輕巧機身(10 Kg)內蘊AMD Ryzen™ 7 3800X & Intel® Core™ i7 10700KF 動態處理器，無論執行硬派遊戲、串流媒體或多工作業皆游刃有餘，再加上內建的專屬提把，使用者無論走到哪，都能將如此強大的運算力帶到哪。

translations.name: ROG Strix GT35/GA35/ GT15/GA15
translations.description:
ROG Strix G35 Series gaming desktops are designed for tournament-level esports. Top configs are equipped with powerful ROG STRIX GeForce RTX™ 2080 Ti graphics, pumping out more frames per second for smooth gameplay and a serious edge in fast-paced action. For next-level content creation and multitasking, the GA35 boasts up to a 16-core AMD® Ryzen™ 9 3950X CPU, while the GT35 features the latest 10th Generation Intel® Core™ processors.

Impressive clock speeds and frame rates are sustained through an innovative cooling system, which includes a massive triple-fan cooler, a 240-mm radiator that chills the CPU with liquid, all wrapped in an airflow-optimized, multi-zone chassis. Plus, the case is simple to open and upgrade, giving gamers the freedom to build upon their investment over time. 

A smaller variation on this cooling-focused case is used for the ROG Strix GA15 and GT15 desktops, which offer focused esports performance in a lighter and more affordable package.

translations.name: ZenBook series
translations.description: The latest ZenBook series include 13”, 14” and 15” models, which now feature the revolutionary ASUS ScreenPad™ 2.0 and/or NumberPad™ 2.0. As for ScreenPad™ 2.0 SKU, it upgrades the traditional laptop experience, adding an interactive secondary screen that enhances productivity for endless possibilities. Its intuitive new smartphone-like interface enables easy task management and allows the creation of seamless multitasking workflows. All models in the series feature a four-sided frameless NanoEdge display, with up to a 92% screen-to-body ratio that gives them one of the world's most compact footprint in their respective classes.The combination of performance and mobility is a defining feature of the ZenBook series with ZenBook 14 weighing only 990g. The new models feature a full complement of high-performance components including up to 10 th and 11th Generation Intel® Core™ i7 quad-core CPUs, up to NVIDIA® GeForce® MX450 graphics, 32GB RAM, ultrafast PCIe® SSDs and gigabit-class Wi-Fi.

translations.name: ZenBook S
translations.description:
1. 使用者導向開發
近年電競周邊漸漸走向「無線」趨勢，使用者也更傾向選擇符合簡約設計、更便於攜帶的周邊產品。Falchion無線鍵盤的開發理念即是為了這群玩家而生。

2. 簡約、人性化按鍵排列
Falchion的按鍵將 4 顆方向鍵及 4 顆功能鍵保留，為了維持鍵盤精簡短小的外觀尺寸，鍵位排列經過多次調整優化。

3. 耐用材質及精湛工藝
Falchion搭載了ROG獨家設計的PBT雙料射出鍵帽，較一般傳統鍵盤所使用ABS噴漆雷雕鍵帽耐磨。Falchion更搭載了業界首創的鍵盤保護蓋設計，提供使用者攜帶鍵盤多一個保護。

4. 絢爛多彩電競燈效
Falchion每顆按鍵皆有獨立RGB背光燈效，且為ROG首支鍵盤導入無線Aura Sync燈效同步技術，Falchion的側邊更搭載互動式觸控面板，上方透明燈條可流暢呈現RGB燈光、即時顯示鍵盤電量狀況，兼具功能及創意。

translations.name: ZenBook S
translations.description:
1. Innovate for gamers
In recent years, many core gamers and enthusiasts have shown a preference for a minimalistic gaming setup. Falchion is the perfect keyboard for these customers. 

2. Compact and user-oriented layout
Mini-form-factor keyboards are among the most difficult to design, considering all that has to be placed in a limited space. The layout of Falchion is smartly designed to allow arrow and function keys to be included, despite the compact size.

3. Durable material and cutting-edge design
It features ROG PBT Doubleshot keycaps with profiles that are fine-tuned to ensure the best click-feel. Falchion features an innovative cover that provides protection for the keycaps when the keyboard is moved. 

4. Abundant gaming RGB lighting
Falchion is the first wireless Aura Sync gaming keyboard that is equipped with RGB LEDs under each keys. It also features the first interactive touch panel in a gaming keyboard.

translations.name: ROG Delta S電競耳機
translations.description:
還沒體驗過 ROG Delta S，就別斷定電競耳機沒有好音質。ROG Delta S是一款搭載Hi-Fi 等級 ESS 9281 quad DAC的電競耳機，能針對遊戲音效的低頻、中頻、高頻到超高頻進行無失真音訊處理， 接著整合四個訊號並產生更清晰的聲音，還具備令人驚艷的 127-dB SNR，此訊噪比遠高於市面上任何裝置所能提供。因此您可精準地聽見遊戲音效，以利準確判斷敵人距離、腳步聲方向、槍響位置等。聆聽清晰無比的細節，沉浸在身歷其境的音效體驗中。

配備 USB-C 接頭，並隨附 USB-C 轉 USB 2.0 轉接頭，因此幾乎可與所有遊戲平台連接，包括電腦、遊戲主機和行動裝置，讓玩家隨時隨地皆可享受頂級最佳效能，無須更換耳機。

獨具風格的環狀彩虹 RGB 燈效，讓玩家在戰場上與眾不同。透過可自訂的 Aura RGB 燈效展現自我風格。 ROG Delta S 搭載彩虹環狀 RGB 燈效，視覺感受遠遠勝過普遍的單色燈效。其中Soundwave特效更可以透過麥克風吸收人聲以提供高互動式的流動燈效，讓玩家在戰場上與眾不同。

translations.name: ROG Delta S Gaming Headset
translations.description:
ROG Delta S features industry-leading, hi-fi-grade ESS 9281 quad-DAC and supports MQA files. The exclusive ASUS Essence drivers have been updated with Audio Signal Diversion technology, reducing interference between frequency ranges for purer audio. Additionally, the drivers feature a wide frequency response of 20 to 40kHz to provide optimized bass and crystal-clear gaming sound, which delivers impeccably detailed sound for both gamer and music lovers. 

What's more, AI noise-canceling microphones offering clear voice communication, the lightweight ROG Hybrid ear cushions with fast-cooling fabric and an ergonomic reverse-D shape provide superior comfort and sound isolation during extended gaming sessions. ROG Delta S features a USB-C connector and comes with a USB-C to USB 2.0 adapter to let you game on your PC, console and mobile device without changing headsets. A one-of-a-kind, circular rainbow RGB lighting effect provides a stylish look to set you apart on the battlefield.

5. eXtend POS系列的線材收納設計, 底座特別開孔讓列印機線材能夠隱藏收納；設計團隊也將背後I/O孔洞隱藏, 能完美藏線。

translations.name: 超強固EDGE AI智慧製造HMI人機介面
translations.description:
ARCHMI-810A超強固EDGE AI智慧製造HMI人機介面，內建AI加速處理器，藉由獨家散熱技術，無風扇設計整合VPU/NPU AI加速處理器於精緻體積的機身內，創新布局，領先業界，提供EDGE AI應用之HMI解決方案，特別適用於智慧製造HMI端導入EDGE AI運算，具備分散式邊緣運算能力，可直接於中末端生產設備執行AI邏輯推理運算，如AI SCADA生產可視化，產能優化與數據分析，AI語音輔助操作，AI視覺圖像辨識，視覺與語音辨識等，有效提升操作效率，強化智慧製造之AI布局與滲透度，與中央系統快速整合，分進合擊，發揮更大效益。
ARCHMI-810A導入專利：網路多協定架構，於EDGE AI應用中，支援多種主流通訊協定之轉議，AIOT應用不再因不同協定而卡關，資料傳輸無遠弗屆！
ARCHMI-810A機身採全鋁壓鑄製成，結構強固，抗震耐摔，無風扇寬溫操作，IP69K前防水觸控螢幕具7H抗刮且達IK07衝擊等級，強固耐用。模組化設計，易於擴充升級與維護，支援15款SMART-TB擴充I/O介面卡。可選配內建式SMART BATTERY不斷電備援模組，提供最完善的保護機制。

translations.name: Rugged Edge AI Smart Manufacture HMI
translations.description:
ARCHMI-810A rugged edge AI smart manufacturing HMI is powered by Intel N4200/N3350 processors and AI accelerator processor. ARCHMI-810A  is compatible with VPU/NPU AI accelerator by fanless and compact design to provide edge AI computing. It is suitable for edge AI applications with SCADA data and production visualization, AI voice assisted control, AI image processing, vision and voice identification access security to maximize productivity. ARCHMI-810A supports multiple mainstream protocols translating for edge AI application and AIoT with wireless communication. 
Its rugged design features aluminum die-casting chassis that offers resistance to shock and vibration. It has wide range temperature fanless design. The IP69K waterproof front bezel has 7H hardness anti-scratch screen and achieves IK07 impact level. It has modular design for easy upgrade and maintenance. It supports up to 15 SmartTB series I/O boards and optional built-in smart battery UPS module as redundant mechanism.

translations.name: InnoAGE SSD
translations.description:
宜鼎國際 InnoAGE是第一款內建微軟Azure Sphere技術的固態硬碟，能透過本身擴充的網路埠或Wi-Fi無線網路，連接微軟Azure的IoT Hub與網頁管理主控臺。相較於市面上的固態硬碟, InnoAGE最大的特點，是整合了Azure Sphere這套微軟發展的微控制器（MCU），能透過Azure的物聯網雲端服務IoT Hub，執行資料的收集作業，以及頻內（in-band）、頻外（out-of-band）的管理機制，以便進行錯誤修正、系統更新、資料分析、AES加密等工作。

值得注意的是，這款SSD可支援兩種網路介面：乙太網路與Wi-Fi，目的是為了提供獨立於系統本身的網路通訊管道，以便連接雲端服務與支援頻外管理。 除此之外, 宜鼎也同步為InnoAGE提供基於雲端服務的管理平臺，能讓用戶透過簡易操作的介面，進行遠端操作，SSD的韌體可從Azure Sphere接收指令，再由它來連接Azure雲端服務。同時，這臺固態硬碟能傳送除錯訊息，協助監控讀寫行為模式，進而提升固態硬碟的壽命，若發生SSD系統當機的狀況，IT人員可透過雲端的儀表板管理介面，將SSD快速回復成預設組態。

translations.name: InnoAGE SSD
translations.description:
InnoAGE SSD is the intelligent SSD always connected, even if the edge device crashes. From cloud-based management portal can remotely direct the edge device to reset, reboot, or restore the drive to an earlier backup, write-protect all data or even erase itself. Device status information is also provided to facilitate maintenance work. InnoAGE SSD provide system integrators an effective way to mitigate some of IoT’s biggest challenges including management, maintenance and edge security.
(1)	Key features: 
a.	Secure out-of-band management 
b.	Cloud-managed backup, restore, write-protection and erasing of the SSD
c.	Cloud-provided maintenance and device status panel
d.	I/O extension with GPIO, UART, and SPI interfaces
(2)	Solutions: Adding It All Together
InnoAGE is a toolset to take on IOT’s biggest challenges. By enabling out-of-band signaling, management and maintenance can be facilitated while maintaining edge security at the highest level.

translations.name: 遠距教學實物（投）攝影機
translations.description: M11-8MV創新遠距教學與數位學習的應用，擁有A3超大尺寸拍攝範圍，照射平面文件、立體教材、自拍人像都能一機搞定。超輕巧造型僅0.8公斤的直立式機體，方便老師隨身攜帶跑班授課，有效節省桌面擺放空間。霧面曜石黑機身不擔心留下污痕或指紋，底座加重設計能有效避免傾倒，全方位考量老師和學生的使用安全性。800萬畫素20倍數位變焦旋轉鏡頭讓老師不管拍攝人像或模型都清晰。修長機身鑲入圓形小巧按鍵，單手即可操作所有按鍵，開關機、自動對焦、旋轉、縮小、放大、開關LED燈等功能隨時切換。此外，配備VGA、HDMI及USB全方位輸出入介面，可連結不同設備，滿足各種使用需求，老師不需改變既有教學習慣與設備，大幅降低備課時間、增加設備近用性。M11-8MV可搭配獨家研發的AVerTouch教學軟體使用，重點註記、畫面擷取、即時錄影等隨手可用，創造多樣化吸引學生眼球的學習體驗。在翻轉教育風潮之際，老師還可將M11-8MV作為網路攝影機進行視訊教學，線上授課無國界、創意分享全世界；錄下授課過程亦可上傳到雲端或社群網站，即便學生在家也能讀取課程教材，依據自我需求上線下共學，即便停課，學習也不會中斷。

translations.name: Visualizer for Distance Learning
translations.description:
The M11-8MV is designed for digital and distance learning, and it is perfect for using as a USB camera to shoot presenters or visualize teaching materials. A compact, upright design offers versatile utility, and a weighted base decreases the risk of it being knocked over. Its stunning 8-megapixel camera with a 20X digital zoom is mounted on an adjustable arm, and a thoughtful position indicator on the camera head ensures the correct display angle. Diverse I/O ports meet various needs, including both HDMI and VGA for connecting to displays, and USB for connecting to laptops for online teaching.
Teachers can combine the M11-8MV with AVerTouch software to use advanced functions like annotation, image capturing, and recording. Users can even livestream lectures to the world and extend the life of content by uploading it to Google Drive or YouTube. Online schooling with the M11-8MV removes limits of teaching, perfectly connecting online and offline learning for education without boundaries.

translations.name: 互動控制盒
translations.description: CB-310的產品概念為打造教室的核心，深度整合資訊設備，變身全能智慧教室。最大的創新價值在於簡化教育科技設備的操作以幫助老師提高對於設備掌控性，最甜美的成果是老師欣然回歸教學本業，激發學生最大潛能。CB-310讓老師不改變教學習慣就可同時使用電腦和安卓系統，教學方式更延續、教學過程不中斷。多樣化連接介面具備高度相容性，可與教室現有設備互連，無縫整合讓學校不須更換整套設備，預算有限也有強大的教學火力支援。內建無線鏡像投影技術並整合AirPlay、MiraCast、ChromeCast三大投影方式，跨平台跨載具免App、即時連線即刻使用。專為教學創新的四分割無線鏡射可同時顯示不同載具畫面，依需求配置全螢幕、二或四格分割，在同一畫面比較內容、重點強調或視訊授課，翻轉學習和多元教學就在轉瞬間！只要輸入老師個人帳密或卡片感應即可登入裝置，一鍵開啟電腦與投影機；還能隨時更新專屬桌面、釘選課程檔案，從雲端直接讀取教材，跑堂授課不用帶課本。免費加值軟體可串聯所有與CB-310對接的裝置，一對多的創新管理方式讓學校事半功倍，大幅提升管理效率。除了集中控制的好處，設定自動開關機時間也能夠有效節能節電。

translations.name: Interactive Control Box
translations.description:
The CB-310 Interactive Control Box is truly a game changer and classroom transformer. Its most innovative value is the way it helps educators make the most of their existing equipment via flawless integration while also helping to engage students with inclusive collaboration tools. 
Educators can maximize their existing technology investments by easily integrating older equipment with the CB-310. With native wireless screen sharing, teachers can use any device to begin brainstorming and then share ideas and homework with the class. This feature also enables simultaneous presentations, allowing users to share ideas in two, three, or four split screens.
There’s no learning curve when educators use laptops and download thousands of Android apps with the CB-310. Also, management software simplifies device control and maintenance. Administrators can broadcast important text and audio messages and manage hundreds of devices at one time, even updating them to the latest versions all at once.

translations.name: 45H USB-C旅行萬用充電器
translations.description:
Innergie 45H是一款多功能緊湊型電源解決方案，專為國際旅行者而設計，可為筆電、平板、手機和遊戲系統等多種設備進行快速充電。一顆勝過所有，一款適用於所有設備的充電器，讓您的移動生活更美好。

1.獨創動態智能功率分配，單孔(USB-C)充電能極大化45瓦輸出，雙孔(USB-C+USB-A)充電則分配為30瓦與12瓦輸出。相較於一般雙孔固定功率輸出的充電器，更小體積卻能不浪費任何瓦數，發揮最大充電效益。

2.專利雙向旋緊轉換插頭，搭配偏心安裝結構，可調整不同角度的安插方向來適應插座空間。美英歐澳四種可換插頭，符合國際法規，安全便利無國界。

3.獨創45度無縫接合，讓分模線隱藏於俐落的邊界，呈現簡約、無切割之整體美。側壁2.5度內縮與偏心設計造型，讓牆上的充電器成為牆上的雕塑品。

4.獨家搭載InnerShield™ 多重安全保護晶片，讓您的裝置免於過電流、過電壓、過熱、過載與短路的危害，提供穩定且安心的電源。

5.獨家搭載GreenSense™ 環保節能技術，高於業界標準的電源轉換效率，並以模組化元件來提高生產效率，本產品節能與環保，落實永續綠能的理念。

translations.name: 45H USB-C Power Adapter
translations.description:
Innergie 45H is a versatile and compact power solution for travelers to fast charge multiple devices from laptops, tablets, smartphones to gaming systems. One charger for all, making your mobile life better.

1. Dynamic power allocation ( 45W in single-output and 30W +12W in dual-output) utilizes a better efficiency of size and power, compared to the general dual-port fixed power charger.

2. The patented two-way installation plug allows multi-orientations plugging management to fit limited socket space. The plugs comply with international safety regulations.

3. The 45-degree seamless joint at the sharp border achieves the invisible parting line, presenting a  beauty of simplicity and making the charger a sculpture on the wall.

4. Built-in InnerShield™ chip with multi-security from over-current, over-voltage, over-temperature, overpower, and over-circuit.

5. GreenSense™ technology achieves green energy through high power efficiency and modular components production process.

translations.name: High-Performance Intelligent Edge Computing PC
translations.description: The BOXER-6641 fanless system provides an invaluable solution to serve a broad range of customers and applications. While retaining the core functions of traditional industrial computers, the BOXER-6641 adds support for advanced applications including edge server, machine vision and Industrial IoT (IIoT), and artificial intelligence (AI). The BOXER-6641 is a universal solution in the field of AIoT and IPC platforms, powered by the 8th/9th Generation Intel Core processors with support for Intel Xeon processors up to 71W TDP. Thanks to it’s innovative fanless cooling design, the BOXER-6641 can provide powerful computing and graphics performance even in environments with temperatures up to 70°C. With high-quality design and great appearance, the BOXER-6641 is the best solution for customers to take advantage of the growing AIoT market, while maintaining support for traditional IPC applications.

translations.name: 嵌入式AI邊緣運算型工業控制系統
translations.description:
◆工業級強固設計
-完善保護：過壓保護(OVP)、過流保護(OCP)、過低電壓保護(UVP)、過溫保護(OTP)、短路保護(SCP)及反接保護(RVP)
-優化寬溫解決方案，工作溫度在IEC-60068規範下達-20~ 65°C
-模組化設計，縮短組裝工時及維護時間、減少庫存，縮短OEM/ODM開發時程
-支援多種可換式擴充卡介面

◆高效能設計
-業界唯一支援Intel® Core™ i9-9900T處理器及E-2124G Xeon™處理器的機種
-業界最大記憶體容量，達128GB DDR4 DRAM
-業界最高速存儲，支援NVMe SSD，效能為SATA SSD四倍
-高瓦數電源設計，單一電源接口可輸入480W，不需第二電源即可支援Nvidia 高階顯卡

◆市場需求創新
-主要I/O從正面出線，易於使用
-2.0mm厚龍骨設計，可快速拆裝CPU、DRAM，拆6顆螺絲即可更換CPU，業界普遍需拆20顆
-獨特抗震結構，重達兩公斤的顯示卡在IEC-61373規範下可對抗震動、安全運輸
-快拆式雙硬碟，使用手轉螺絲固定，不需工具即可換裝SSD/HDD
-支援Reset鍵及遠端啟動

translations.name: Edge AI Fanless Embedded Industrial Controller
translations.description: The BOXER-6842M is built to deliver industrial-grade high performance for embedded computing with ruggedized design. Maximum performance is delivered with the power of 8th and 9th Generation Intel Core i3/i5/i7/i9 and Xeon processors combined with support for 128 GB of memory, M.2 NVMe storage (PCIe [x4]) along with high end graphics cards such as the NVIDIA 2080Ti or 2080 Super. With AAEON’s expertise in rugged industrial design, the BOXER-6842M features protection for over-voltage, over-current, under-voltage, over-temperature, short-circuit and reverse-voltage. Innovative thermal design also allows for operating in temperatures from -20°C up to 65°C. The BOXER-6842M also features a user-friendly design with all I/O features placed on the front to make it easy to maintain and install necessary connections. It also features an easy access drive-bay which can be opened with a single screw.

translations.name: 人工智慧邊緣運算系統
translations.description:
硬體效能
◆掌上型尺寸，重量僅300公克卻擁有四核心ARM Cortex-A57 Core及128個CUDA核心，能處理兩路FPS 30 Camera input的472浮點運算之強大AI邊緣推算效能
◆無風扇系統寬溫設計適用於-20至50℃嚴苛環境，滿足全天候穩定運行
◆低功耗僅5W~10W以及AI運算效能若與CPU + GPU卡的solution下可節能80%

軟硬整合
◆結合研揚推出Hero platform，透過研揚客制Linux當中，客戶可透過整合輕量化虛擬技術(Docker Image Deployment)與簡易的操作介面可真正做到在五分鐘內一鍵更新更換全球上千台不同系統版本不同場域裝置上的AI演算法
◆研揚Hero Platform軟硬整合遠端部署平台，讓更新與燒錄走入Over the air處理，大幅降低時間以及維護成本。
◆整機預裝ACLINUX整合Security Boot功能，搭配研揚Hero Platform能讓使用者可以大量遠端部署管理下亦能保障裝置資安。

外觀設計
◆一體化機身安裝、拆解只需四顆螺絲
◆以特殊的美觀IP顛覆對工業電腦邊緣運算系統的想像

translations.name: Embedded Edge AI Computing System
translations.description: The BOXER-8221AI brings the power and performance of the NVIDIA Jetson Nano SoC, with quad-core ARM Cortex-A57 processor and 128 CUDA cores, providing vital processing power for AI edge computing. Despite its compact size of 88mm x 75mm x 39mm, it delivers 472 GFLOPS of processing speed and can process AI models with dual camera inputs at 30 FPS. With fanless design, the BOXER-8221AI provide reliable performance in even extreme temperatures from -20°C to 50°C without loss in performance. The system is energy efficient, with power usage between 5W to 10W. The BOXER-8221AI also provides easy integration with both hardware and software, through compatibility with various other edge devices to integrating AAEON’s innovative HERO platform and the AAEON ACLinux operating system. Over the Air update management also allows the system to be maintained remotely, and integrated secure boot protects the software from attacks.

translations.name: 人工智慧AIOT邊緣閘道系統
translations.description:
◆Google Edge TPU張量處理器配備4個Cortex-A53 處理器核心與 GC7000繪圖處理器，除了在邊緣端可以運行AI邊緣運算外，在掌上型小巧體積下除了擁有Wi-Fi 2x2 MIMO以及藍芽4.2高速無線傳輸方式外，豐富的I/O專為AIOT以及邊緣閘道器控制應用及互聯網資訊搜集所設計，SPI/I2C/GPIO/COM等滿足Edge端AIOT的需求。
◆無風扇系統寬溫設計適用於-20至60℃嚴苛環境
◆硬體軟體平台整合，搭配研揚客制image，Hero Platform能透過伺服器網路企業大規模部署、硬體運作監控、更新、遠端故障診斷排除甚至遠端控制裝置上所有I/O (GPIO)
◆在設計階段即考量了工業設計，導入無風扇、無通風孔、無銳角等強固設計，並減少組裝難度跟螺絲使用量。客戶只需要拆卸4顆螺絲快拆，即可更換內部模組。
◆POE PD的供電方式提供在運用現場安裝的便利性，作為現場無DC power in的完美替代解決方案。
◆契合Google Could IOT以及 Edge ML, TensorFlow Lite 完美融入Google互聯網生態圈

translations.name: Embedded AIOT Edge Computing Gateway System
translations.description: The BOXER-8521AI is powered by the innovative Google Edge TPU tensor processor, equipped with four ARM Corte-A53 processor cores and on-board GC7000 graphics processor. The BOXER-8521AI provides ultimate flexibility in deployment, from its compact size of 153mm x 35mm x 101mm, to high-speed wireless communication thanks to Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 4.2. It also boasts I/O features specially designed for AIOT and Edge Gateway deployment, including SPI, I2C, GPIO, and COM. The BOXER-8521AI is also a POE Powered Device (POE PD), allowing the system to be deployed where power input might not be readily available. Designed for industrial environments, the BOXER-8521AI achieves reliable performance thanks to its fanless design and operating temperature range of -20°C to 60°C. Thanks to its Google Edge TPU, the BOXER-8521AI easily integrates into the Google AIOT ecosystem with support for Google Clout IoT and Edge ML along with support for TensorFlow Lite.

translations.name: 工業級AI人工智慧電腦系統
translations.description: AMI230是特別針對工廠自動化所量身打造的工業級AI人工智慧電腦系統，可應用於AI工智慧檢測以及IoT物聯網的使用，搭配PoE+網路線供電設備，可外接鏡頭進行人工智慧視覺、聽覺辨識技術，其寬溫、無風扇的設計，支援零下20°C至高溫70°C寬溫操作範圍，高達3Grms/3~500Hz耐振動力，讓系統即使在嚴酷戶外環境下亦能正常運作。本系統採用第8 代/第9代Intel® Core™處理器，並支援廣積iSMART智慧控制，可提供自動開關機排程、電源自動回復、並可在低溫環境下重新啟動，以達到全方位的保護機制。電路的保護機制設計也相當重要，AMI230可提供電壓過載保護、過低電壓保護、反向電壓保護加強其安全性；2020年末將施的全新安全標準EC 62368-1/EN 62368-1，AMI230在設計之時，便將符合規格之用料包含在內。本系統亦提供三個M.2插槽可外接4G/LTE或WiFi模組，以及支援儲存資料用的NVMe SSD。另外為因應不同需求，不同的應用可搭配性相對應的轉接卡，大大的提升了產品使用的彈性。

translations.name: Industrial AI Computer
translations.description: The AMI230 is a robust embedded system based on the 9th/8th Gen Intel® Core™ platform. Developed for smart factory, industrial automation, AIoT and other applications in harsh environments, the rugged AMI230 delivers exceptional computing and graphics performance with an extended operating temperature range of -20°C to 70°C, operating vibration up to 3Grms and over/under/reverse voltage protection.The AMI230 houses the Intel® Q370 MB230AF motherboard and is equipped with multiple high speed I/O including 8x USB 3.1, 4x COM, and 3x M.2 (B-Key, E-Key & M-Key) for NVMe storage, WiFi and 4G/LTE options, and HDMI/DP/DVI-D display interface. It also features four Gigabit Ethernet ports making it highly suitable for network related applications, iAMT (11.6) for system remote management and repair, TPM (2.0) security for preventing phishing attacks, and iSMART green technology for power on/off scheduling and power resume functions.
translations.meta_description: The AMI230 is a robust embedded system based on the 9th/8th Gen Intel® Core™ platform. Developed for smart factory, industrial automation, AIoT and ot...

translations.name: 24螢幕輸出電視牆數位看板播放系統
translations.description: SP-63E是一台可透過HDMI外接最高達24個螢幕的電視牆數位看板播放系統，採用第八代Intel®處理器，內建Intel® Arria® 10 FPGA模組，以提供最佳性能和成本優化的電視牆播放解決方案，完美運用於8K/12K電視牆或電子菜單看板等應用。本系統內建硬體EDID仿真技術，並提供前所未有的最終畫面擷取以及遠端無線監控功能，在業界是一項重大突破。為因應嚴苛的運作環境，SP-63E在設計時即以強固安全、散熱快速以及安裝方便為設計目標，因此極易擴充的模組化設計，便利使用者加裝各式繪圖卡擴充功能。此外，SP-63E整合廣積獨家iSMART智慧控制以及Observer遠端監控技術，可提供自動開關機自動排程、電源自動回復、遠端監控系統溫度和電壓等功能，並可在低溫環境下重新啟動，以達到全方位的保護機制，內建的FPGA模組可獨立供電，在系統出現故障時及時擷取並顯示最後一個影像，讓商家維持正常運作，並透過EDID技術提供客戶遠端即時偵測功能，用戶可定期檢查了解終端螢幕輸出狀態，提前解決任何隨時可能出現的播放顯示和電線脫落問題，可降低外派人員到現場支援費時費力的狀況並大幅降低客戶的營運成本。

translations.name: 24-Port Video Wall Digital Signage Player
translations.description: The SP-63E is an extreme performance video wall signage player featuring up to 24x HDMI display outputs for 8K/12K video wall or menu board signage display applications in the smart retail market. Powered by 8th Gen Intel® Core™ processor, it offers optimal performance and cost-optimized video wall signage solutions, built with hardware EDID emulation, last frame capture and display status monitoring functions. The SP-63E allows users to remotely check on-site status and to solve any arising display and cable issues. It implements Intel® Arria® 10 FPGA modules, which are powered independently, capture and display the last video frame in case of system malfunction. The system also supports IBASE unique iSMART energy-saving and Observer remote control technologies that enables power on/off scheduling and power resume functions remotely. It can also integrate with Intel OpenVINO toolkit allowing future expansion with analytics and deep learning technologies for advanced AI workload.
translations.meta_description: The SP-63E is an extreme performance video wall signage player featuring up to 24x HDMI display outputs for 8K/12K video wall or menu board signage di...

translations.name: 軌道交通EN50155認證28.6吋長條型螢幕
translations.description: MRD-286是一台專為智慧型交通運輸市場應用所設計的28吋長條型螢幕電腦，本產品符合EN50155軌道交通法規，並具有EN45545-2軌道交通之防火產品驗證並配備軌道交通運輸專用的M12型連結器，以提高其運用於交通運輸場合的穩定度，更具備可偵測現場環境光源，自動判斷調指出適當的顯示屏幕亮度，節省不必要的能源消耗，同時也延長了產品使用壽命，且其整機IP65防塵和防水機構設計，可妥善保護系統不受外界損害。此外，產品本身具有雙Giga 頻寬之乙太網路連結埠，在智慧交通應用中，可安裝於軌道列車車廂中、行車月台上、或是運輸車輛之車頂，藉由兩埠之網路連結，分別提供行車資訊與多媒體娛樂廣告資訊等，相當適合整合應用於現正火熱的智慧型交通運輸市場。因應公眾交通運用的需求，MRD-286在設計時即以簡單易維護與安裝為設計目標，邊角圓弧型收邊設計，可減少碰撞傷害之發生，並特於產品兩側安裝手把，雖僅是細微功能，人性化的設計卻讓原本須兩人搬運之產品變為可由一個人員獨力完成，搭配特別設計之安裝結構，產品後方特意拉平整體邊際線，展現出簡潔大方的整體造型，本產品可固定於任何的牆面、天花板、車廂中或於任何平整頂面。

translations.name: EN50155 Certified AIO 28.6" Bar-Type Panel PC
translations.description: The MRD-286 is an EN50155 certified AIO 28.6" bar-type panel PC. It integrates an Intel® Pentium® Processor, powered by a 24VDC or 110VDC power input. Built with an ultra-wide TFT active matrix LCD screen, the system can ideally serve as signage display delivering advertising and providing passengers with the current information on arrival and departure times at targeted areas in the vicinity of airports or train stations. The MRD-286 complies with EN50155 international standards, ready to be deployed in various rolling stock applications where rigorous shock and vibration requirements should be met. Its sunlight readable panel provides enhanced graphical performance (1920 x 540) with a wide viewing angle of 178 degrees, ensuring excellent visibility from any direction. The unit has an IP-65 rated front panel and supports up to 8GB of system memory, a 64GB SSD storage, and useful I/O interfaces including an M12 GbE connector, an RS-232/422/485 port and two USB 2.0 ports.
translations.meta_title: EN50155 Certified AIO 28.6" Bar-Type Panel PC

translations.name: 智能交通圖像加速計算機
translations.description: MPT-8000AR智能交通圖像加速計算機為因應IIoV車載智慧聯網需求而研製的軌道專用高階伺服器系統，通過EN50155:2017 認證以及EN45545防火測試標準驗證，其創新採用全模組化設計，可依照不同使用情境需求更換、擴充周邊設備，且提供自我偵錯的防護功能，具備高效的邊緣運算能力搭配內建可擴充的影像運算模組，透過高速乙太網路連結網路攝像鏡頭，讓車輛可對視覺作補充，同時在各個方位進行軟硬障礙物探測，並根據所獲得的道路、交通號誌、車輛位置和障礙物等數據做出分析和判斷，以控制車輛轉向和速度。另外亦可透過無線通訊模組(3G/LTE) ，將車上資訊即時上傳到雲端達到控制中心，方便維護人員依照遠端回傳的資訊做即時的判斷，提早預防危險的發生，對於以提升行車安全與效率為最主要目標的軌道車輛產業而言將是一大利器。MPT-8000AR提供全車電池電源控制功能和GPIO和G-sensor控制軟體Utility/SDK，並結合系統硬體監控技術，透過GPIO進一步去控制周邊裝置，以創造出更多元化、更有經濟價值的解決方案給不同的產業別來結合與延伸並整合使用，如智慧型監控設備、車聯網管理產業。

translations.name: Railway Computer System
translations.description: The MPT-8000AR embedded system was designed for the Intelligent IoV (The internet of vehicles) market and is certified with EN50155:2017 rolling stock standards and EN45545 fire safety parameters. It has an innovative modular design that satisfies diverse applications with easy peripheral replacement and expansion. The system can be equipped with video cameras and sensors to scan for traffic signs or signals to control speed or to detect static obstacles in time to stop based on data analysis. Vehicle and passenger information can also be transmitted via cloud to the control center for remote monitoring to ensure a safe journey for passengers. The MPT-8000AR features self-debugging and battery power control. GPIO and G-sensor control software Utility with system hardware monitoring technology allows connection to various devices for enhanced reliability and availability. The solution can be extended to intelligent surveillance equipment and vehicle network management systems.

translations.name: 智能交通控制計算機
translations.description: MPT-1000R智能交通圖像加速計算機為車載物聯網 (Industrial IoV，IIoV) 應用而打造的軌道專用抗震嵌入式系統，搭載Intel® Atom™x7中央處理器；支援零下40°C至高溫70°C的寬溫操作範圍，擁有寬電壓9-36VDC電源輸入、M12新型快插式防水接頭與防水型天線開口，可應用於戶外的嚴峻環境，適合軌道車輛監控&軌道邊控制箱用途。在產品開發階段中，也加入了自己獨特的創意，如一鍵式恢復周邊擴充卡功能，自動電壓保護，並通通過EN50155:2017 認證以及EN45545防火測試標準驗證。此外，本產品採用all-in-one無纜線環境，依然可使用高速連接器處理電源以及所需之通訊界面，使產品沒有線材連接上的問題。此創新性的設計法，能不用再受限於空間限制而影響規劃或增加架設成本，大幅為客戶降低製造成本。且本產品以符合人性化的要求來設計，以提升績效並增進人員操作的便利性與效率，MPT-1000R是可廣泛利用於軌道交通的產品，寬溫、抗震、高穩定度的設計提供客戶給多的應用面，為此產品的強力銷售動能，期將產生的龐大商機。

translations.name: Railway Computer System
translations.description: The MPT-1000R Intelligent Traffic Image Computer was developed for rolling stock applications, with features that meet IIOV, Intelligent Internet of Vehicle and harsh outdoor environment requirements. The shock-resistant system is powered by an Intel® Atom™ x7 processor, operating in extended temperatures between -40°C and 70°C and with 9V-36VDC power input. It has robust M12 waterproof connectors and waterproof antenna connectors that ensure fault-free data transmission in rail vehicle monitoring & railway track side control box applications. Featuring a unique one-click recovery of peripheral expansion card as well as automatic voltage protection, it is certified with EN50155:2017 and EN45545 fire test standards. Designed for ease of use and maintenance, the innovative MPT-1000R overcomes space constraints and high installation costs, supporting an all-in-one cable-free setup with high-speed connectors that handle power and interface requirements without a glitch.

translations.name: 人工智能影像辨識自助服務機
translations.description: VINO2100是一台專為數位自助服務系統與影像辨識應用市場所開發的人工智能影像辨識自助服務機，搭載Intel® Core™處理器，可快速影像辨識運算，其主機板為工業化耐用堅固設計，主被動元件皆採用長壽命、耐高低溫元件，確保系統能每日24小時，全年365日的全時運作無虞。另外本系統支援醫療等級紅外線攝影機與高解析度數位攝影鏡頭，除了傳統影像識別之外，還能針對熱顯示影像進行判別，搭配廣積專為Intel® OpenVINO所開發的人工智慧套件，進行快速人流辨識。以近期肆虐全球的新冠肺炎疫情為例，使用本系統可以快速辨識體溫異常的人員，並同時判定往來人群是否有適當的社交防護(例如口罩配戴與否)，經由系統判定之後，進行適當的門禁管制或是發出警示。且本產品外型輕薄，機殼邊緣搭配流線圓弧收邊造型，提高搬運或碰撞時的安全性，安裝方便可輕易固定於任何的牆面。將本產品設置於車站、機場、商場、商業中心、學校與大型醫療院所等，可快速大量的處理人流分析，分擔並減輕管制人員執勤之壓力與負擔，提高人流管制效能，以達降低感染之風險，為人工或機械式服務進化成為新世代的智慧平台。

translations.name: Artificial Intelligence Image Recognition Kiosk
translations.description: The VINO2100 is an artificial intelligence image recognition kiosk developed for the AI image recognition market. It is equipped with a high-performance Intel Core CPU and a reliable industrial motherboard populated with both active and passive components that ensure 24/7 data processing and system operation without breakdown. The system supports infrared cameras and high-resolution digital lenses together and deploys the Intel OpenVINO toolkit to speed up image recognition. It has a thin and light weight design, with smooth and attractive streamlined round edge. Following the worldwide outbreak of COVID-19, it can be used to intercept people not wearing face mask and who fail the body temperature test. The system can be installed in train stations, airports, shopping malls, schools or hospitals to maintain social distancing and conduct massive temperature screening. The built-in medical grade camera offers precise body temperature test so won’t mix up with face or drink temperature.

translations.name: 4K專業級攝影後製用螢幕
translations.description:
BenQ 4K專業級攝影後製用螢幕SW321C特別為專業攝影師及影片調光師所設計，搭配32吋4K IPS 螢幕，結合BenQ獨家的AQCOLOR調整技術和16bit 3DLUT色彩晶片，在99% AdobeRGB & 95%DCI-P3的色彩表現下，達到Delta E≤2的精準度。
而特有的螢幕均勻度補償技術，讓整個螢幕都可以保有精準的色彩輸出, 在檢視作品上更為安心和有效率
除了精準的色彩調整, BenQ和友達經過多年的研發和以及實地訪談, 在SW321C搭載了全球獨家的類紙質面板, 可以呈現出近似紙的效果, 大幅提升有輸出作品需求的專業攝影師有感的效率提升, 減少時間和金錢上無謂的浪費
在影片調光師的支援上, SW321C支援雙HDR規格HDR10和HLG, 並支援多樣化的影片格試. 在顏色的調整上除了自我開發的Palette Master Element 校色軟體 , 也支援Calman 和Lightspace 兩家國際級的軟體直接調整內建的色彩晶片,以達到最嚴格的色彩標準.
整機也同步附贈遮光罩, 可以有效的阻擋環境光, 讓使用者看到的色彩更為精準

translations.name: 4K Professional Photo Editing Monitor
translations.description:
BenQ PhotoVue SW321C monitor is design for professionals photographer and videographer.

Feature with 32 inch IPS panel and 4K resolution, combined with BenQ AQCOLOR technology and 16-bit 3D LUT, is able to reach 99% Adobe RGB and delta E≤2 color accuracy.

The unique Uniformity Compensation Technology provide color consistency across the entire screen allow user to check the color more precisely. 

BenQ also worked with AUO for years and develop the 1st paper-like monitor to present the paper texture which improve the print workflow with high efficiency and also reduce cost.

For videographer, SW321C supports HDR10/HLG and various video format. 

In color calibration part, expect for supporting BenQ Palette Master Element SW321C also supports CalMAN and Lightspace, which are the world leading software, to adjust the color setting directly to the IC to reach the color accuracy.

SW321C also comes with Shading Hood to reduce the ambient light and allow user to see the accurate color.

translations.name: QUADZILLA 163吋LED一體機
translations.description:
163吋 All-in-One LED (AiO)智慧顯示屏為Pitch 1.875的小間距LED屏，內建安卓系統，可使用App控制。具有極輕薄外觀與易移動性，僅3.5cm 螢幕厚度，並有0.9mm可拆式無邊框設計，實現更沉浸式的觀看體驗。

● 輕鬆省時的安裝方式
簡單三步驟，約兩人於一小時內即可完成安裝。

● 穩固4in1 LED先進封裝技術
4in1 LED技術可提高對比度、銳利度和水平及垂直可視角 。並可強化貼附力，不易掉燈，達到更平滑的螢幕表面。

● 獨家Calibre 4K HQUltra影像技術
屏體內建英國廣電級影像處理引擎，畫面呈現流暢，並有圖像邊緣增強技術，呈現最高品質圖像顯示。

● 強大可擴充性(雙系統/多來源接口)
提供OPS插槽，實現安卓及微軟雙系統的需求。另外也有接口卡插槽，可以提供如:光纖或IP串流等功能,實現更多元的應用。

● 雙屏無縫拼接功能
獨家設計能讓兩個顯示屏橫向無縫拼接，並透過OSD選單，選擇雙屏顯示模式，簡單轉變為雙屏顯示系統。

● 環保節能
首創待機模式，待機耗電小於0.5W，並增加Lan待機，解決傳統高功耗問題。

translations.name: QUADZILLA 163" AiO LED Display
translations.description:
The QUADZilla is a Full HD 1080p 163" (3.60 x 2.00 m) LED display that provides an all-in-one package solution capable of high-end performance in any education, corporate and retail indoor application.

● Improving on the same unique characteristics of the 130" QUAD, QUADZilla delivers 600 nits of brightness pre-calibrated out of the box.

● An industry-leading built-in scaler switcher provides a wide range of connectivity and control options such as dual HDMI, USB, RS232 and HDBaseT. In addition, users can take advantage of Optoma’s Control Q application to control the display from a smartphone or tablet.

● Unique 4-in-1 LED SMD layout - smoother screen surface, wide viewing angle and more robust design.

● Simple three step process - installation time is dramatically reduced from days to hours.

● BYOD with Optoma TapCast pro app – up to four devices wirelessly at the tap of a button.

● ECO friendly

translations.name: 岩/3.5吋外接式硬碟
translations.description:
Stream S07為業界最小的桌上型3.5吋外接式硬碟，採USB 3.2 Gen 1高速接口，容量高達8TB，支援電視錄影功能。

設計意象源自日式園林景觀，以石代山，岩石紋外觀具耐磨抗刮功效。猶如一個經過時間考驗的石塊自然產生了裂縫，在裂縫處整合隱藏式散熱孔和雙向藍色LED指示燈兩項設計，展現枯山水的極簡美學。

橫向擺放時，側開式散熱孔可避免設備因長時間平放桌面而產生的落塵堵塞 ; 直立擺放時，散熱孔朝下能防止設備入塵，使產品更耐用也節省擺放空間。並附帶智慧型自動休眠模式，既省電又環保。

translations.name: 3.5"External Hard Drive
translations.description:
The Stream S07 is a compact 3.5”external hard drive with impressive specs: USB 3.2 Gen 1 interface & up to 8TB capacity. 

It also fully supports TV recording. But it's not just specs that set it apart from the competition. It boasts a unique & scratch-resistant design inspired by an aged stone; the perfect addition to a Zen garden. Like a weathered stone, it's cracked, but this intentional design serves dual functionality: hidden vents to promote cooling and prevent dust from entering inside & 2-way blue LED lights to display transfer status. 

It can be placed either upright or flat, for flexible configuration options. Lastly, this well-thought product has a built-in auto sleep mode, which is eco-friendly & cost-saving.

translations.name: 便攜式USB-C防震固態硬碟
translations.description:
這是一款迷你外接式固態硬碟，獨特波紋設計，傳達記憶就像漣漪，傳輸資料時安靜、快速，記錄著生活中每一瞬間的波動。外觀纖薄、輕巧、好攜帶，小巧體積還可輕易放入口袋或包包的夾層中，無論商務出差還是旅行，都能方便地隨身携帶。耐衝擊輕量化材質及結構設計，能有效減緩落下衝擊，所以就算是從日常1米高度不慎掉落，也能安然保護內部重要資料！角落穿透造形，便利使用掛勾或吊繩，讓產品美學與實用功能兼具。

 切合未來行動介面市場主流，PC60採Type-C傳輸埠與USB 3.2 Gen 2超高速介面，資料傳輸速率提升至10Gbps，實測連續讀/寫速度最高可達每秒540MB/500MB，擁高達1.92TB的存儲容量，可轉瞬存取文件、高解析影音資料，或釋放電腦寶貴空間，完美契合旅外商務人士、創意或媒體工作者對於速度效能的極致要求。

translations.name: PORTABLE USB-C SHOCK-RESISTANT SSD
translations.description:
The PC60 is our mini portable SSD. It fits snugly in the palm of a hand and comfortably slides into a pocket, unnoticed, thanks to its slim 11mm profile. The polished frame accentuates its square shape, while the unique ripple design symbolically conveys memories like ripples; momentary fluctuations in life that are recorded on to this device. The shock-resistant design can withstand minor drops and bumps, while the convenient keyhole design allows it to easily attach to bags.  The PC60 is our portable-friendly answer to square away data.

Despite its ultra compact size, the PC60 is brimming with technical features. With its USB 3.2 Gen2 interface, it can transfer data at lightning speeds, up to 10Gbps, while its Type-C port is both convenient and on-trend with the majority of new devices. 3D NAND Flash technology allows it to store a deceptively large amount of data, up to 1.92TB. And blazing read and write speeds up to 540MB/s and 500MB/s, respectively, get the job done faster.

translations.name: 專業型醫療照護資訊平台
translations.description: M1923使用Intel第七代Kaby Lake Core i5平台，除了標準的功能及介面外，亦整合多樣的資料辨識裝置包括RFID讀取器、雙晶片卡槽、5百萬畫素的CMOS攝影鏡頭，同時也提供了多種連線功能如高速乙太網路、藍芽及Wi-Fi等。透過這些功能，醫護人員可快速完成患者身份辨識、調閱就醫記錄及用藥資訊，以簡化繁瑣的工作內容。此外，為了符合醫院對環境衛生的高度要求，M1923沿續磐儀醫療系列產品的永久抗菌設計，能夠降低大腸桿菌及金黃葡萄球菌等細菌感染風險。M1923同時也符合IP65防塵防水等級(前面板)及醫規認證 IEC60601-1、EN60601-1、EN60601-1-2及UL60601-1，適用於對安全及穩定性要求嚴格的醫護環境。

translations.name: Expert Fanless Medical Station
translations.description:
The M1923 is an Expert Medical Station with excellent graphic computing performance designed to achieve quality imaging for diagnosis. Powered by high performance Intel Kaby Lake Core i CPU, the M1923 offers faster data processing and graphic capabilities ideal for medical image diagnosis and applications such as nursing care and PACS (Picture Archiving and Communication Systems). 

The M1923 features a variety of hardware modules to lessen a clinicians’ work load. The smart card reader offers quick and easy access to secured electronic medical records. Dual smart card readers enable applications such as simultaneously retrieving staff ID and the collection of patient’s case histories. Dual-band networking supports instant data access anywhere within wireless coverage. In addition, the RFID reader restricts the access to the terminal to medical staff only. With a rich variety of network and identification modules, the M1923 provides medical staff an easy to use and reliable system.

translations.name: T-FORCE夜鷹電競RGB桌上型記憶體
translations.description:
相較於前代Night Hawk，在用料與可變化性幅度大幅提升，從原先的8層PCB提升至10層，有效的阻絕雜訊干擾，大幅增加材質抗潮並強化PCB佈線，令產品本身可達頻率高達5000MHz，並且有效利用線路將單色變化LED更換成RGB燈珠，進而讓消費者可以透過各家主機板廠燈校控制軟體，通過嚴苛的相容性測試與驗證使整台PC完成燈效同化，四件式的散熱套件，讓產品本身擁有高效率的散熱效果，並最小化塑料的覆蓋率，避免在金屬減少的情況下喪失了IC散熱的作用，維持Night Hawk 產品一貫的酷炫散熱片外觀。

1.幻彩全鏡面

2.穿透光 • 冷光ARGB

3.嚴選顆粒 • 穩定耐用

4.高效能 • 低功耗 輕鬆升級

5.支援OC Profile 一鍵超頻

6.T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB電競記憶體支援多家燈效控制軟體

translations.name: T-FORCE Night Hawk RGB DDR4 memory module
translations.description:
相較於前代Night Hawk，在用料與可變化性幅度大幅提升，從原先的8層PCB提升至10層，有效的阻絕雜訊干擾，大幅增加材質抗潮並強化PCB佈線，令產品本身可達頻率高達5000MHz，並且有效利用線路將單色變化LED更換成RGB燈珠，進而讓消費者可以透過各家主機板廠燈校控制軟體，通過嚴苛的相容性測試與驗證使整台PC完成燈效同化，四件式的散熱套件，讓產品本身擁有高效率的散熱效果，並最小化塑料的覆蓋率，避免在金屬減少的情況下喪失了IC散熱的作用，維持Night Hawk 產品一貫的酷炫散熱片外觀。

1.幻彩全鏡面
DDR4電競記憶體全鏡面反射設計概念引領全球RGB電競記憶體設計，創造無可超越的RGB發光效果，幻彩鏡面發光記憶體設計讓T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB呈現光學工藝的極致質感。
 
2.穿透光 • 冷光ARGB
T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB DDR4電競記憶體利用光學反射與穿透導光原理，讓整支模組透過鏡面製程設計使發光面積最大化，並讓底部的燈光直接透出，呈現反射光學的層次美感。


3.嚴選顆粒 • 穩定耐用
十銓科技T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB DDR4電競記憶體堅持採用嚴選顆粒，皆經過完整相容性與可靠度的測試，提供玩家品質優異、效能卓越、兼具穩定性與相容性的DDR4電競記憶體。 

4.高效能 • 低功耗 輕鬆升級
新世代的DDR4桌上型記憶體除了資料傳輸速率的提升，基本工作電壓更調降到1.2V，提供節能省電、高效能低功耗的桌上型記憶體。


5.支援OC Profile 一鍵超頻
隨插即用的T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB DDR4電競記憶體，不須手動調整BIOS即可輕鬆超頻。同時相容於Intel & AMD平台，玩家可放心裝機。
 
6.T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB電競記憶體支援多家燈效控制軟體
T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB支援ASUS Aura Sync / GIGABYTE RGB Fusion 2.0 / MSI Mystic Light Sync / ASROCK-Polychrome Sync軟體[1]，玩家可讓T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB 電競發光記憶體模組，透過這些燈效控制軟體來控制燈光特效及燈效同步，打造獨特耀眼絢爛色彩美學，呈現光彩奪目的RGB 系統！

translations.name: T193 文具隨身碟(文具碟)
translations.description:
T193隨身碟專門設計給學生使用，是結合多種特殊功能於一體的隨身碟，除高速及大容量的儲存功能外，還包括12公分直尺、可以畫半圓的簡易圓規、可觀察小字體的放大鏡、每15度為一格的量角器，和可吸附於鐵製鉛筆盒中的磁鐵功能，同時採用具防水防塵防磁的新技術，在重視資訊科技與便利多功能的21世紀，T193可做為教育與資料儲存應用，是因應現代生活與教育而設計的隨身碟。

1.兼具時尚和創意的外觀，完美詮釋創新的時尚感。

2.多功能創意文具設計，兼具磁吸、放大鏡、直尺、圓規和量角等功能。

3. 貼心考量攜帶時的便利－易收、摺疊、好攜帶。

4.USB 3.2 Gen 1 (3.0/3.1)高傳輸介面，滿足資料備份和影音大檔的傳輸需求。

5.採用COB (Chip on Board)的封裝技術，具有防塵、防水、防震等資料防護功能。

translations.name: T193 USB PEN DRIVE
translations.description:
T193隨身碟專門設計給學生使用，是結合多種特殊功能於一體的隨身碟，除高速及大容量的儲存功能外，還包括12公分直尺、可以畫半圓的簡易圓規、可觀察小字體的放大鏡、每15度為一格的量角器，和可吸附於鐵製鉛筆盒中的磁鐵功能，同時採用具防水防塵防磁的新技術，在重視資訊科技與便利多功能的21世紀，T193可做為教育與資料儲存應用，是因應現代生活與教育而設計的隨身碟。

1.時尚創意與實用的完美詮釋
T193文具碟完美顛覆隨身碟的刻板印象，兼具時尚和創意的外觀，並採用符合人體工學的產品設計，專為學生和上班族精心設計的多功能文具，完美詮釋創新的時尚感。

2.多功能文具設計
T193文具碟擁有台灣新型專利M581756及台灣設計專利D199855，是款結合多功能文具設計的創意隨身碟。創意設計的磁吸和放大鏡功能，適合辦公族群處理公務使用；直尺、圓規和量角器功能，則適合輔助學生族群測量數學的幾何圖形，輕鬆達成學習成效。

3.易收、摺疊、好攜帶
T193文具碟貼心考量攜帶時的便利性，展開長度12公分，折疊後僅有7.2公分。磁吸功能可輕鬆整理散落桌面的迴紋針，亦能穩固地吸附在辦公桌隔間牆面/冰箱/鐵製鉛筆盒，減少意外碰撞所造成的資料損壞。

4.USB 3.2 Gen 1 (3.0/3.1)高傳輸介面
T193文具碟不僅採用頂級鋅合金鍛造出一體成型的主體，更採用USB 3.2 Gen 1 (3.0/3.1)的高速傳輸介面，大幅縮短檔案傳輸存取的工作時間，讓128GB的大容量USB3.2隨身碟，滿足資料備份和影音大檔的傳輸需求。

5.防護功能再升級
T193文具碟採用COB (Chip on Board)的封裝技術，具有防塵、防水、防震等資料防護功能，堅固耐用，確保隨身碟在使用或攜帶的過程中，不易因遭受外力衝擊而造成資料的損毀或遺失。

translations.name: T-FORCE SPARK智能提示隨身碟
translations.description:
T-FORCE SPARK UFD符合USB3.2 Gen1規範。它具有漂亮的幻彩燈效果外觀，還具有智能容量顯示的固有功能。是一個既有智慧又具美感的USB產品。滑動推式無蓋設計解決了丟失帽蓋的疑慮。適用於各種計算機，遊戲機，生活美學，無處不在。

1.RGB燈效 電競新元素
T-FORCE SPARK自帶炫彩RGB燈效，絢麗而不刺眼，為電競增添一股新元素。

2.智能容量提醒
連結PC時可於低、中、高容量時輔以藍、黃、紅燈效閃爍提示當前容量狀態，智能提醒，實用升級。

3.支援多平台 豐富生活色彩
不再局限於電腦，可支援各式遊戲主機，如PS4™、PS3™、Xbox One™、Xbox 360®，讓RGB充滿生活。

4.大“推”! 無帽蓋設計
採用滑推式USB接頭設計，單手推出輕鬆便利，同時避免帽蓋遺失的困擾，大推！

T-FORCE SPARK自帶炫彩RGB燈效，絢麗而不刺眼，為電競增添一股新元素。

連結PC時可於低、中、高容量時輔以藍、黃、紅燈效閃爍提示當前容量狀態，智能提醒，實用升級。

3.支援多平台 豐富生活色彩
不再局限於電腦，可支援各式遊戲主機，如PS4™、PS3™、Xbox One™、Xbox 360®，讓RGB充滿生活。

4.大“推”! 無帽蓋設計
採用滑推式USB接頭設計，單手推出輕鬆便利，同時避免帽蓋遺失的困擾，大推！
translations.meta_description: T-FORCE SPARK UFD符合USB3.2 Gen1規範。它具有漂亮的幻彩燈效果外觀，還具有智能容量顯示的固有功能。是一個既有智慧又具美感的USB產品。滑動推式無蓋設計解決...

translations.name: 水冷機殼
translations.description:
ZADAK MOAB II Lite是一台突破性的水冷主機，在四個智慧型手機大小的機身中整合入水冷系統及強悍的性能配備。在精巧的鋁鎂合金機身中整合獨家專利水道板水冷系統，消除了傳統水管式水冷系統易產生的漏水等技術障礙，並降低所需管道和配件數量。機身採用鋁合金CNC加工工藝，使整個結構有如一個大型散熱器，大大有助於散熱。
MOAB II Lite原創設計延續品牌識別 ，以不對稱塊狀分割展現ZADAK突破極限的精神，全機採用金屬材質以CNC精密加工打造，展現堅實工藝品質，金屬原色及霧黑陽極呈現低調內斂的質感與觸感，以雙層雷雕工法製作的ZADAK品牌圖紋在不同視角與光影觀看會產生不同效果更增添時尚精緻，減少表面處理工法對環境更加的友善。CPU與記憶體和底座具有可同步的RGB LED，且配備特殊的RGB控制器可用於創建各種新燈光效果，滑動式觸發的開關加上獨家搭載水冷表讓玩家有效的監控電腦狀態，提供良好智慧科技體驗。為所有想突破既有框架，展現自我品味的電腦玩家，打造兼具造型美感與實用效能的整機使用體驗，大膽挑戰長久以來一成不變的主機殼式整機外型，突破受限的傳統分體式水冷結構。

translations.name: Water-Cooled PC Case
translations.description:
MOAB II Lite is an innovative water-cooled PC case, integrating a water-cooling system in a body merely equals four smartphones. The patented CNC-milled aluminum water distribution plate eliminates the technical issues such as water leakage that easily occurs on a traditional liquid cooling system, and reduces required pipes and accessories. The whole case is like a big radiator greatly contributes to heat dissipation.
The color shows a low-key feeling and touch. The double-layer laser engraved ZADAK logo has different effects at different viewing angles,  making the design more exquisite, and because of the reduction of the process, it is more friendly to the environment. The base for the CPU and memory is equipped with synchronous RGB LEDs, and a special controller can be used to create various of lighting effects. A capacitive touch switch and a digital display for real-time water temperature allow users to effectively monitor the PC and provide smart technology experience.
translations.meta_description: MOAB II Lite is an innovative water-cooled PC case, integrating a water-cooling system in a body merely equals four smartphones. The patented CNC-mill...

translations.name: XR-LRDIMM 強固型抗震低負載伺服器記憶體
translations.description:
Apacer宇瞻科技XR-LRDIMM(Extremely Rugged Load-Reduced DIMM)強固型抗震低負載伺服器記憶體，其獨具的抗震動與衝擊設計，可提供兼具穩定、安全、耐用特性的利基型工控記憶體產品，以滿足特殊垂直應用系統於惡劣環境下的長期穩定運作需求，特別適用於軍事、航太、國防與交通運輸等產業。

目前市場上並無專為抗震動與衝擊設計的伺服器記憶體模組，許多軍用伺服器仍採用一般標準型伺服器記憶體，造成記憶體資料傳輸的可靠度處於高風險的狀態。宇瞻XR-LRDIMM是目前市場上唯一具抗震動與衝擊設計的強固型伺服器記憶體模組，其與一般標準型伺服器記憶體不同之處，在於採用高度堅固的3*100針連接器(3*100-pin connector)，取代標準型記憶體的金手指，以創新的板對板連接器(board-to-board connector)設計，緊密且穩固的結合主機板。更重要的，宇瞻XR-LRDIMM特別增加兩個固定孔(mounting holes)設計，有效避免伺服器記憶體模組因強烈震動與衝擊導致記憶體模組脫落與位移，大幅強化記憶體訊號傳輸的可靠度。
translations.meta_title: XR-LRDIMM 強固型抗震低負載伺服器記憶體

translations.name: XR-LRDIMM(Extremely Rugged Load-Reduced DIMM)
translations.description:
Apacer’s XR-LRDIMM – extremely rugged, load-reduced DIMM – features a unique anti-vibration and anti-shock design, which can provide a stable, secure and endurable industrial server memory solution. This makes it ideal for long-term stable operations in challenging environments and high-end applications such as the defense, aerospace and transportation industries. 
Most defense servers still employ standard server memory, which means reliability could be at risk. Unlike a standard memory module, XR-LRDIMM is the only server memory module on the market which is designed especially for anti-vibration and anti-shock applications. It features a board-to-board connector design with triple 100-pin connectors and two mounting holes as opposed to a gold finger connector. This keeps the module fully integrated with the motherboard at all times, preventing the XR-LRDIMM from slipping out of position when subjected to vibration or shock. The result is greatly enhanced memory signal transmission.
translations.meta_description: Apacer’s XR-LRDIMM – extremely rugged, load-reduced DIMM – features a unique anti-vibration and anti-shock design, which can provide a stable, secure...

translations.name: 耐熱玻璃涼水壺
translations.description:
成立於西元1964年的台灣玻璃(TAIWAN GLASS:簡稱台玻)，為台灣最具代表性的玻璃製造大廠，致力於形塑更美好的生活為願景，以深耕超過半世紀的精湛技術，與日本工業設計大師深澤直人攜手打造自創品牌-TG 。

TG玻璃系列以溫潤的Ｕ形弧線為視覺主軸，溫潤的線條與簡約外型，貫穿深澤直人「Without Thought」（無意識設計）的概念，看似不著痕跡，然每個方寸弧度間，卻是經過縝密的思考，自然而然地融入日常生活中，是用過才能意會到箇中巧思的細膩設計。

本款「耐熱涼水壺杯組」，由水壺與杯子組合而成，採用硼矽酸耐熱玻璃製作，最高耐熱溫度400℃，耐熱溫度差可達150℃。設計上，形式單純俐落，樣貌明淨剔透，優雅流暢的壺身，搭配兼具壺蓋功能的水杯，兩相合為一體，非常耐看！特別考量使用者取用的便利性，壺身的容量設計一次可裝滿三次水杯，十分貼心；獨特的薄邊切口技術，讓每一只成品擁有絕佳的品飲觸感。優異的壺口設計，使得斷水乾淨俐落，重量輕巧單手就能駕馭，渴了，不需多費工夫，直接執起壺蓋為杯倒水飲用，非常方便；用來盛裝冷泡茶與各種冷、熱飲品皆適用，絕對讓您一用傾心愛不釋手！

translations.name: Heat-resistant Water Pitcher Set
translations.description:
Found in 1964, TAIWAN GLASS is the leading glass manufacturer in Taiwan that continues the endeavor to enrich the quality of life; with our emphasis on advanced production, TAIWAN GLASS cooperates with internationally renowned designer, Naoto Fukasawa, to establish a Taiwanese brand-TG.

This “Heat-resistant Water Pitcher with Cup Set” is composed of a pitcher and a cup. Made with non-porous, heat resistant clear borosilicate glass, the product can withstand a maximum heat of 400°C and sudden temperature range of 120°C. 

Designed by Naoto Fukasawa for TG, this Heat-resistant Water Pitcher with Cup Set embodies the brand's unique approach of marrying highly technical processes and materials with a gentle yet distinct design language. This distinct piece is not only eye-catching, but built to last and easily paired with the cups, plates, coffee cups and wineglasses that form Taiwan Glass' inventory.

translations.name: 環保石頭卡系列
translations.description:
『環保石頭卡』是使用石頭複合材料中的厚紙板材系列，可應用多方面卡片及教學文創的設計。
 禮品卡/會員卡/房卡/學習卡或者塑膠卡的產品，都可以替換成減塑的環保石頭卡，產品製造 過程 沒有廢水及廢氣的污染排放，價格優於塑膠卡片，讓企業可以環保兼具耗材費用的節省。
環保石頭卡的材料特色為:：
1.	不砍樹-不用木漿或植物纖維來造紙，保留森林挽救臭氧層
2.	不用強酸、不用強鹼及不漂白-造紙過程不用水
3.	節能-造紙耗能比傳統木漿紙少
4.	減排-不大量排放廢水廢氣 保護河川海洋與空氣

環保設計愛地球：
愛惜地球，從“紙”開始，石頭紙產品，不砍樹，不加水，不加酸，不加鹼，不漂白，節能等。
產品SGS檢驗符合RoHS及無重金屬物質，更加沒有紙張上鹵素毒物，環保安全使用產品。
厚紙板材更可以設計出更多的生活應用商品，為了因應塑膠危害，採用循環經濟觀點提高廢棄物回收率並推動循環再利用，以達到「零廢棄」是全球發展趨勢。從循環經濟的角度減少塑膠使用、促進再生設計是不能迴避的企業責任，企業開啟循環經濟模式 邁向減塑新里程。

translations.name: Eco Friendly Stone Card Series
translations.description:
ECO stone card" is a series of thick stone composite materials, which can be applied to various cards making, teaching and cultural and creative design.
Gift card/membership card/room card/learning card or plastic card products can be replaced with reduced plastic eco friendly stone cards. There is no pollution of waste water and toxic gas during the manufacturing process, and the price is more affordable than plastic cards, allowing enterprises to lower cost while being environmentalist. The characteristics of the eco friendly stone card are:
1. No cut trees, no use of wood pulp or plant fibers to make paper, preserve forest to save the ozone layer
2. No strong acid, strong alkali, no bleaching, and no water used in the papermaking process
3. Energy-saving papermaking technology consumes less energy than traditional wood pulp paper
4. Emission reduction, no large amount of wastewater, and waste gas is discharged, protecting rivers, oceans and air

translations.name: 防水透氣蠶絲機能織物
translations.description:
明基材料創新研發的「Xpore環保防水透氣織物技術」，是唯一通過ITS，符合Green Peace綠色和平組織無毒認證(不含33種有害全氟化合物)的微孔薄膜。Xpore薄膜每平方吋遍佈100億個奈米微孔，微孔小於水滴2萬倍、大於水蒸氣200倍，以此物理特性，有效阻擋外部雨水，但同時輕鬆排除服裝內層的濕熱汗氣，達到快速排濕與乾爽感受。

「Xpore防水透氣蠶絲機能織物」通過紡研所TTRI檢測，具有持久防水、高透氣和透濕性，並可完全隔離細菌，提供更佳保護性；集環保、防水、透氣、防風、輕量快乾、阻菌阻蟎功能於一身，適用於製作戶外機能服裝與配件，為設計師提供了更多創新材料，也為消費者提供了最強的保護和穿著舒適感。
Xpore以環境永續理念，發展創新織物技術，讓消費者在享受微孔技術帶來的舒適透氣之餘，也能為保護環境盡一份心力。

translations.name: Silk waterproof-breathable functional fabricfabric
translations.description:
The "Xpore Eco-friendly waterproof breathable textile technology" developed by BenQ Materials is the only nanoporous membrane certified by ITS Green Peace (excluding 33 harmful perfluorinated compounds). The Xpore membrane has 10 billion nanopores per square inch, and the pore size is 20,000 times smaller than water droplets, but 200 times larger than moisture vapor, so it can block water droplets but allow wet and hot sweat to pass through, achieving a rapid heat removal effect, maintaining excellent comfort and dryness.

The silk waterproof-breathable functional fabric has been certified by TTRI. It has durable waterproof, high breathability and moisture permeability and completely blocks bacteria. This fabric is suitable for outdoor functional clothing, provides designers with more innovative materials, and also provides consumers with the strongest protection and wearing comfort.
