translations.description: 膠原胜肽及古籍《清．陳修園醫書》典藏名方，多重中草精萃，在刷牙瞬間釋放護齒精華，形成防禦機制，有效強健牙根並預防牙齦問題生成。抗敏感成分檸檬酸鉀5％，經臨床驗證可有效阻斷敏感性疼痛傳導，舒緩敏感不適，不讓敏感有機可趁! 膠原胜肽具小分子滲入技術，強化牙齦健康基礎，在刷牙瞬間釋放護齒精華，達到護齦固齒的功效，更能預防牙龈出血、牙龈炎、牙周病發生以強健牙根。運用HAP琺瑯質填補修護配方，能釋放出構成牙齒主要成分的鈣及磷酸鹽，透過再礦化修護琺瑯質損傷，回復完整防護層，配合綻藍美齒清新酯粒去垢功效與含氟、鈣成分覆蓋受損牙齒有助於維護琺瑯質之強固，達到強健齒況的功效。

translations.name: root-strengthening toothpaste
translations.description: Collagen and Chinese herbal ingredients recorded in the Medical Book of Chen Hsio-Yun of Qing Dynasty provide tooth protection essence upon brushing teeth, and form a perfect defense mechanism. The anti-sensitivity ingredients of 5% potassium citrate is clinically proven to repress sensitivity to pain, and relieve the user’s discomfort. Molecules sink into gums and strengthen them. Molecules provide tooth protection essence upon brushing teeth, and form a perfect defense mechanism. It also helps prevent gum bleeding, gingivitis, and periodontal disease from occurring while strengthening teeth roots. Utilizing HAP in releasing calcium and phosphate, which are the main components of teeth, to repair tooth enamel through remineralization, restoring the original tooth protection. Refreshing miniscule particles also help rid teeth of stains, while components with fluorine and calcium coat damaged teeth, and strengthen tooth enamel, making it solid once again.

translations.name: 自行車用複合陶瓷軸承
translations.description:
東培在2015年首先業界提供自行車花鼓專用全陶瓷軸承給國際一流輪組和花鼓製造商，證明陶瓷軸承低摩擦轉矩的優越性。
今年更是推出了自行車專用複合陶瓷軸承，本產品使用航太級陶瓷經自動化機械加工，精度達工業級以上水準。除擁有陶瓷低摩擦轉矩、輕量化、輕啟動性等性能，又兼顧容易組裝、提升密封性的高性價比的自行車專用複合軸承。
複合陶瓷軸承也比現有陶珠混合軸承具有更多陶瓷低摩擦轉矩、輕量化、輕啟動性等性能，接近全陶瓷軸承的適切設計，更能擴大市場接受度。

translations.name: Combined Ceramic Bearings for Bicycle Hubs
translations.description:
TPI first introduced all ceramic ball bearings for bike wheel hubs several years ago. They were assembled in a hub and wheel for track bike. It was tested that 0.3 second reduction was achieved by Olympic athlete thanks to its low friction and high stiffness to weight ratio properties.   
Bike wheel hubs specified all ceramic ball bearings which are made of ASTM F2094 Standard ceramic and manufactured by automated machine exceeds industrial standard. They provide excellent friction property for hubs where 90% bearing friction loss is consumed.

translations.name: 傳動系統
translations.description:
TR12有兩個重要的設計特色, Hall Lock & 可調式棘輪式離合器。

Hall Lock是源自於五屆世界杯冠軍車手Aaron Gwin的技師John Hall，此整合至後變速器的機構，可以透過Hall lock撥桿的操作將後變速器固定於安裝處。Hall Lock功能可以讓後變速器和傳動系統保有更佳的穩定性，並讓騎乘更為安靜。也可以輕易的將Hall Lock功能關閉以方便輪組的更換。

依照每輛自行車避震設計的不同，鏈條拉伸量會有所不同。這是為什麼TRP團隊設計了一個可調式的棘輪式離合器。消費者可根據避震和騎行風格去調整離合器的鬆緊，在踩踏回饋和鏈條張力之間找到平衡。

translations.name: Drivetrain System
translations.description:
TR12 rear derailleur is able to provide a quiet and accurate ride over the roughest trails. The key feature to this pursuit is the Hall Lock. When working on the derailleur or changing the wheel, the Hall Lock is opened. Closed while riding, the derailleur is locked to the frame and thus stabilized in the roughest conditions. This feature maintains accuracy in shifting and superb chain retention by not allowing the derailleur to rotate excessively away from the cassette. Its clamping force can be adjusted to balance stability and security while the derailleur deflects impact.

A “second ride-control” feature is an adjustable Ratchet Style Clutch, keeping tension on the chain through the movement of a bikes travel. With many different frame and suspension options, there has never been a greater need for a component’s adaptability. The clutch has integrated adjustability, effectively providing the individual balance between pedal feedback and chain retention for your bikes chain growth.

translations.name: 空氣力學碳纖維公路自行車
translations.description:
Fly against the wind 馭風飛行是明安國際投入打造DIZO EPIC PRO空力車款的初衷，這是一台完全自主開發，並高度展現明安國際在設計及生產碳纖維空力車架的極致之作。

DIZO EPIC PRO是一台運用高科技材料，追求超低風阻、將高剛性與高韌性結合且操控性傑出的高階空氣力學碳纖維公路車。

車架結構運用CAE電腦模擬，從多種虛擬原型組合找出最佳化的幾何架構，使用日本高剛性(30T/40T)碳纖維與搭配頂尖MR70超高強度碳纖維，搭配明安專利的「奈米碳管技術」，有效強化結構/保持吸震/加強彈性的技術，並經過高於ISO 4210標準20%的嚴苛測試。

 EPIC PRO頭管設計專屬入線上蓋來隱藏走線來達到低風阻；前叉則使用稀有F1賽車車架指定用料的Dyneema，提升穩定與安全的操控性能；後下叉長度設計在較短的405mm，使後三角剛性更強，也增加在抽車與加速上的效能，同時後下叉採用左右不對襯的設計，為強化碟煞側在煞車制動時的平衡，最終造就EPIC PRO 車架達到輕量化、空力化、剛性、加速度、操控、安全等六大項性能上的最佳表現！

translations.name: Aerodynamic carbon fiber road bike
translations.description:
DIZO EPIC PRO is born to be fastest and built with disc system. With the top notch technologies and highest quality carbon fiber materials, it gives an edge in every aspect – stiffness, lightweight, comfort, speed – which contribute to the efficiency in aerodynamics as well as energy-saving.
Developed and tested by the DIZO’s pro cyclists. The DIZO EPIC PRO is engineered with NAWP (New Anti-Wrinkle Process) Shaping and CNT (Carbon Nano Tube) technology, the inner surface of every tube is smooth and flat, which result in an ultra-light frameset with the unparalleled stiffness.
Ultra-high modulus carbon materials – Dyneema and Mitsubushi’s MR70. Dyneema has been formed on the frame and fork to increase the shock-absorbing ability, comfort as well as the overall handling. Together with the MR70 carbon fiber, which has been used in the carbon layout structure. The pedaling stiffness is undoubtedly greatly boosted without a huge sacrifice to overall comfort.

translations.name: 征服者
translations.description:
LAKAS II 在29ER車架設計以靈敏度為設計考量，延續之前的結構設計採用扁平結構管材，強化五通結構設計減少踩踏車體變形並採用壓入系統BB結構，採用吸震性較佳的27.2 座管設計。在角度設計以競賽需求，在頭管上採用70角度靈敏設計控制偏移範圍在4到4.5公分。車架設計目的:1.減少前輪與自行車選手鞋子的碰撞。2.增加騎乘轉彎空間範圍。
LAKAS II 29er Cross Country Bike採用獨特隱藏管線結構，配備採用shimano xt系統，在飛輪採用10-51T規格，可應付不同惡劣山野地形使用。在輪組上使用DEORE XT 林道車輪採用內徑寬度30mm，最大可搭配2.6”的輪胎，鋁合金輪圈採用28根彎頭式鋼絲，維持輪組的剛性和輕量，並提供給強悍的騎乘者於嚴苛環境下進行激烈的騎乘。在避震前叉採用X-FUSION 2020 E-SLIDE RC BOOST 使用該規格採用可調功能中的低速阻尼/鎖死，並增加騎乘狀況反應。對整體而言LAKAS II 29ER車架在零件挑選是以各種山野比賽中使用上完美規格的車種。

translations.name: Lakas II
translations.description:
LAKAS II takes sensitivity into consideration in the design of 29ER frame. Demand in the Angle design competition, the Headset Brake cables on the 70 Angle sensitive design control offset range from 4 to 4.5 cm. Frame design objectives:
1. Reduce collisions between front wheels and cyclists' shoes
2. Increase the range of ride turns.
LAKAS II 29er Cross Country Bike has a unique hidden pipeline structure, equipped with shimano xt system and 10-51t specifications in the Cassette to cope with different harsh mountain terrain. On wheels, DEORE XT Trail/Enduro USES Rim inner diameter width of 30mm, maximum 2.6 "Tire, aluminum Rim USES 28 j-bend Spoke, maintain Wheel rigidity and weight, and provide tough riders with intense riding under harsh conditions. The LAKAS II 29ER frame as a whole is selected with the perfect specifications for use in various mountain RACES.

translations.name: CADEX Boost 坐墊系列
translations.description:
碳纖製程技術的進步，讓我們有機會重新思考為自行車坐墊帶來不同的可能，而CADEX 的目標，就是為 坐墊打造出重量、支撐性和舒適度的新標準！全新CADEX BOOST主要採用以下科技:
1.	先進的鍛造碳纖複合技術（AFCT）：提供堅硬的碳纖複合材料主體，可消除不必要的變形彎曲，實現最大的動力傳輸
2.	一體式坐弓設計：有效紓解壓力點，並有效消除來自路面的震動
3.	流暢的短鼻頭設計：可以有效減少騎乘時的摩擦產生
4.	ETPU微粒流動技術：將騎士的重量有效分布在更廣闊的接觸點，從而獲得更堅固，更舒適的乘坐體驗

超輕量的CADEX Boost坐墊更進一步支持騎士們挑戰更長距離、更久時間的專業公路騎乘挑戰。

translations.name: CADEX Boost Saddle
translations.description:
The ultra-light CADEX Boost sets new standards in weight, rider support and comfort. Marrying the exclusive AFCT base and Integrated Rail Design has yielded a revolutionary carbon composite frame that provides maximum power transfer and compliance without extra grams, as our unique Particle Flow Technology provides the ultimate in rider support and comfort.

FEATURES
1. Advanced Forged Composite Technology (AFCT) provides a stiff carbon composite frame that eliminates unwanted flex for maximum power transfer
2. Integrated Rail Design relieves pressure points and maximizes dissipation of road vibration 
3. Smooth edges on the truncated nose reduce the chance of friction from pedaling 
4. Free-flowing CADEX-specific ETPU particles help reduce pressure points by distributing weight across a broader contact area for a firmer, more comfortable ride

translations.name: Reign E+ 長距離越野登山車
translations.description:
專注於長距離越野挑戰的REIGN E+，在長距離越野騎乘與複雜地型上都有相當好的表現。REIGN E+採用GIANT Maestro避震系統，與強大的GIANT SyncDrive Pro電機系統和控制技術，前170mm&後160mm的避震行程輕鬆應付高強度的越野及下坡路段的操控。
1.	GIANT SyncDrive Pro電機系統：擁有80Nm的輸出功率，和升級改進的1:3.6扭力支持。踩踏輸出力道可以獲得3.6倍的電動輔助助力，最高可支援至170RPM的高迴轉踏頻，能充份滿足越野騎士的高節奏輸出需求。
2.	RideControl One控制按鈕：集結所有功能，具有優異的防水性能、防滑和舒適的控制感。面板採用LED燈號來顯示電池電量和助力模式。並可以藍芽連接專屬APP，透過手機來顯示更多的騎乘訊息，如電機參數、騎乘數據和導航等功能。
3.	Energypak Smart管內電池設計：在下管中內藏了最先進的500Wh電池管理系統，優化的電池性能為騎乘提供更持久的動力輸出。搭配使用專屬6A快速充電器，可以在2.2小時內為電池充80%電池容量，滿足專業而挑剔的消費族群騎乘需求。

translations.name: 全能型.空氣動力公路車
translations.description:
“aero bike空氣動力型公路車”是近十年來發展最蓬勃，而極為成熟的專業公路車系，各大品牌無不想方設法，打造更低風阻、使速度更快的空氣動力車。

但是美利達主張aero bike發展至今宜著眼於未來十年的新趨勢，空氣動力車不應繼續停留在一味追求低風阻，而是要更符合騎士的整體需求才對。美利達認為，除了具備絕佳的空氣動力特性之外，兼具整體騎乘舒適性、穩定性特質才是一部真正的絕頂空力車。這就是美利達第四代”全能型.空氣動力車(all-round aero bike)” – REACTO (銳克多)的主要訴求。

美利達的秘訣在於成就完美空氣動力效能之外，更在剛性強度、輕量化、舒適性之間找出最佳、最平衡的組合，使REACTO成為從頂級專業選手到初學者都很適用的極品。

其他看得到的特色:手把座艙管線全內藏，使外觀乾淨俐落；巧思設計的”S-FLEX彈性座管”(專利申請)，搭配可調坐墊角度的特殊”FLIP FLOP HEAD轉換頭”，還有可容30毫米寬的輪胎，為舒適性大大加分。極其獨特的”Disc Cooler碟煞散熱片”設計，確保剎車性能，還有運用NACA航太車架管型，降低風阻等等。

translations.name: ALL-ROUND AERO BIKE
translations.description:
As cyclists love going fast, all major brands keep looking for ways for their perfect speed-oriented aerodynamic road bikes. 
   
However, to be ready for next decade, Merida advocates that now aero bikes should  not just go for less wind drag but also be more in line with the overall demands for riders.  That says, besides of better aerodynamics, being more comfortable and more stable riding characteristics should be offered from the new aero bike.  That is, the 4th-generation REACTO from Merida, the “all-round aero bike”.

As Merida’s philosophy “M.O.R.E. BIKE”(Merida Optimized Riding Engineering) goes, we optimize REACTO to become the most balanced racing machines in the market. From beginners to pros, everyone will enjoy this fast and well-thought-out overall concept. 

More features: clean design with cockpit cable integration, room for up to 30 mm wide tires, well-proven patented MERIDA S-FLEX seat post for maximum comfort & lightweight, Disc Cooler, NACA aero tube profile, etc.

translations.name: 越野&下坡型登山車
translations.description:
在登山車的領域裡，擅長快速爬坡的是重量超輕的XC越野車; 下坡則相反，通常需要額外的重量，與較長的避震行程才好應付。但若有一款上坡、下坡都能應付自如的超輕化全能登山車，那豈不妙哉! 美利達新開發的「越野&下坡型登山車」NINETY-SIX(96至尊)正是這樣一款絕妙好車。

因為我們看到了登山車的新趨勢: 越來越多的登山車愛好者追尋的是一種兼具優異爬坡與衝刺性能，而且能夠靈活穿梭於林道越野的全能型、輕量化的登山車。為此，我們秉持美利達「M.O.R.E. BIKE  ®」(Merida Optimized Riding Engineering優化騎因工程)的造車理念，並與前世界冠軍選手J.Hermida聯手，設計開發出造型搶眼的新一代NINETY-SIX，而且這也是一款足以在當今地形變化無常的世界盃登山車賽裡奮勇奪冠的全能型戰駒。 

其他特色:全碳纖維車架，搭配特有的“ P-Flex”後避震樞紐系統，遠端線控可伸縮的長行程坐管，外觀更乾淨俐落的隱藏式後避震器線控、變速、後碟煞管線，1x12傳動機構，車架前三角還可裝上兩個水壺等等。
translations.meta_description: 在登山車的領域裡，擅長快速爬坡的是重量超輕的XC越野車; 下坡則相反，通常需要額外的重量，與較長的避震行程才好應付。但若有一款上坡、下坡都能應付自如的超輕...

translations.name: CROSS&DOWN-COUNTRY MOUNTAIN BIKE
translations.description:
When the terrain gets more and more technical in modern MTB racing, the challenge is so demanding for bike brands to require quite contrary features for the racer’s bike.  That is to unify a superlight pure XC-bike for fast climbing as well as lots of features relating to additional weight for the demanding downhill sections.  

To develop a super bike capable of winning World Cup races, a "cross & down-country" MTB as we define it, Merida teams up with former world champion Jose Hermida to design the state of the art NINETY-SIX.  Under the striking appearance, it is full carbon frame with “P-Flex” rear-stays integrating the rear pivot to the carbon structure.  The frame geometry is designed around a remote activated long travel dropper seat-post as a key feature for excellent downhill performance.   

Other features: all cables & hoses for remotes, shifting and rear-brake are routed inside the frame; two water-bottles find their place inside the frame’s front triangle; & more..

translations.name: 公路車競賽胎
translations.description:
MAXXIS推出一新花紋的全能競賽級公路車胎 - High Road

High Road使用膠料為導入silica配方的HYPR膠料，該配方膠料核心訴求為『濕地抓地力』，能有效提升溼地過彎的抓地力與循跡性；同時該膠料也經過美國第三方測試，認證全新HYPR膠料比現有膠料更能降低16%滾動阻力。並搭配全新K2防刺層，導入與防彈衣同材料KEVLAR纖維材質，透過新編織技術，使其應用在輪胎的防刺層上，不但能降低滾動阻力，同時也達到保護胎體的作用性，全新平花紋設計，能有效降低滾動阻力；胎邊處採交錯狀溝條並搭配鑽石花紋。於溼地過彎時能藉由交錯狀溝條增加排水性，而鑽石花紋能夠增加溼地上的抓地力，另導入新360TPI/3胎體簾紗，提升胎體保護力以及過彎支撐性，同時在騎乘時也有良好的舒適性。整體性能與競品相比，High Road在溼地抓地力、耐磨耗、滾動阻力以及抗穿刺也有均衡的表現。同時High Road也協助一級車隊 Israel Start-Up Nation與洲際車隊Bridgelane拿到許多UCI賽事的冠軍與佳績。

translations.name: A new generation of Road Tire
translations.description:
For the new High Road, Maxxis wants to provide an all-around competition level tire for customers that can be trusted in all conditions.
The tread was designed with a smooth center to effectively reduce rolling resistance, with a simple pattern on the sides for better water drainage. The exclusive new Full Silica HYPR compound decreases rolling resistance by 16%, and increases wet traction by 23% (when compared to previous Maxxis race clincher models). An additional layer of Maxxis’ K2 breaker protection lies beneath the tread, complementing the supple 170TPI casing to become even more durable. (The K2 Breaker is constructed from the same material as bullet proof vests).
Maxxis is now the tire of choice for UCI World Tour team Israel Start-Up Nation, as well as UCI Continental road cycling team Team Brigdelane.

translations.name: AGC越野下坡自行車用胎技術
translations.description:
KENDA最新技術AGC(The Advanced Gravity Casing)下坡自行車胎系列，與職業車隊Polygon UR Team共同開發測試，搭配KVS(Kenda Vector Shield )全覆式防刺層，以輕型合成纖維編織而成，從胎面到胎側，完美抵抗路面上碎石或樹枝的割傷，相比標準材料能抵抗三次以上衝擊；免內胎結構，有效降低輪組重量，應用20mm高三角膠，強化胎側支撐剛性與抗脫座，抵抗下坡賽中的高速衝擊力道；AGC下坡自行車胎系列提供您不同的花紋選擇，針對碎石或泥濘地設計，提供您馳騁於各式惡地。
榮獲台北國際自行車展創新設計獎 2020(TPC d＆i awards by iF 2020)與美國IDA國際設計獎2019 (IDA Design Award 2019)的肯定。

translations.name: Advanced Gravity Casing Technology
translations.description:
The Advanced Gravity Casing (AGC) is latest innovation for professional bicycle downhill riders. The series tires' construction are jointly developed and tested by professional teams in consideration of various user experiences. A strip of Kenda Vector Shield (KVS), a lightweight woven aramid material, is built in under the tread area and along the sidewalls to protect the tire from cuts and punctures. KVS offers nearly three times more cut resistance than standard protective materials. A 20 mm apex along the bead prevents pinch flats and burping.  AGC is our lightest and strongest gravity casing up to date.
AGC has been winning and awarded ‘’The TAIPEI CYCLE d&i awards 2020 by iF’’ and ‘’The International Design Awards 2019’’.

translations.name: 超薄輕量化自行車內胎
translations.description:
超薄輕量化自行車內胎(SL0.60mm)-Ultra Lite Bike Tubes專為自行車輕量化輪組搭配設計，超薄輕量化內胎，內胎壁厚度僅為0.6mm，重量較一般內胎減少高達40%，騎乘時路感更為明顯，使得衝刺與加速敏銳提升，主要外銷自行車運動風氣盛行的北美與歐盟市場。
(1) 超薄輕量化自行車內胎(SL0.60mm)採用特殊配方，伸長率較一般內胎膠料高，延展性佳，能維持保氣性與高胎壓結構。
(2) 規格齊全，可裝配於講求輕量化的公路車與XC登山車，提升騎乘性能，更為省力。
(3) 簡約的結構，搭配高精度密練製成的內胎配方，打造最優質的超薄輕量化內胎。 
(4) 本產品為ISO 14001認證合格的廠商，在膠料開發管理報告中，明文規定原材料不得使用環保法規公告列管毒性化學物危害、有害性質項目之材料，符合歐盟要求。

translations.description:
Kenda introduces the Ultra Lite Bike Tubes - Kenda’s lighted weight tube individually boxed that feathery lite 0.60mm wall thickness to really save weight (60% lighter). Offered in the most common sizes for Road and Cross Country wheels, almost every kind of rider can take advantage of the new, easy and light weight tubes. With Kenda worldwide distributor strategy, Kenda Ultra Lite Bike Tubes will be promoted to these main markets – North American and European market.
(1)	0.60mm wall thickness.
(2)	Perfect for racing and riders counting grams.
(3)	Available in numerous tube sizes in both Presta and Schrader valve options.
(4)	Ultra Lite Bike Tubes have better ductility than normal products, and can maintain proper tire pressure and better air retention.
(5)	Kenda’s Environmental management system is ISO 14001 certified, and we already provide non-aromatic tubes to reach PAHs regulation issued by European Union, and our best care to environmental issues.

translations.name: 自行車旅遊衛星導航
translations.description:
產品研發策略上著眼「休閒旅遊」，與競爭對手的運動訓練做區隔，又滿足歐洲市場對自行車「假期旅遊」的使用需求。因此，研發策略加強「軟體」於「演算法」與「旅遊路線規劃/資訊呈現」上。不僅提供硬體產品，更提供了軟體服務，為一軟硬整合的自行車旅遊解決方案。
用戶可以使用Cyclo自行車衛星導航機導航之外，還能利用MioShare規劃路徑、儲存/分享騎乘軌跡。至今已儲存了一千三百多萬條路徑，累積公里數可以繞行地球一萬兩千多圈。透過軟性的服務增加顧客「黏著度」與「忠誠度」，每月回訪率更可高達30%，成為許多消費者回購或換購Cyclo新機的主要原因。
市場獲得一致好評的SurpriseMe功能，用戶只要輸入距離或時間，即可自動產生三條路徑供用戶選擇。除了可以回到原點外，還能夠依據指定目的地產生路徑。本公司為其申請了多國商標，近期荷蘭某銷售平台直接應用Surprise Me作為據該類似功能產品的分類方式，足見其受歡迎的程度。
新的Discover產品線，則提出創新的NeverMiss功能，讓自行車旅遊騎乘者能做自我導遊。比起Surprise Me的短程樂趣，NeverMiss提供長程旅遊所需資訊。

translations.name: GPS Touring Computer
translations.description:
Utilized with the largest full-color screen on the market and large-button launcher design interface, the Cyclo Discover series is ideal for bike tours. 

With MioShare, you are able to store your fitness tracking data\route history\discover travel spots around your route. you can also download routes and enjoy new roads enjoyed by other riders. 

The patent-pending NeverMiss feature allows the user to plan a long-distance bike tour/hiking route before the journey starts. People can add traveling spots, manage remarks, or add a weblink to the route. NeverMiss will also display a notification screen when you approach a planned spot along the route, and the user can scan the corresponding QR code with a smartphone to obtain additional information.

In addition, our patented SurpriseMe feature is also ideal for short-distance route plans. It offers three different route options between A to A or A to B. Cyclists can choose a different way to discover new inspirations during the ride.
translations.meta_description: Utilized with the largest full-color screen on the market and large-button launcher design interface, the Cyclo Discover series is ideal for bike tour...

translations.name: 12速超輕量三元件鏈條
translations.description:
穩定輸出、精準變速為各世代自行車手的獲得佳績的必備條件。關鍵賽場上，每一次的變速都考驗著車手的經驗，零件之間的無間配合，也攸關能否破風超越而行。
    
150年來自行車鏈條僅出現一次突破性的結構變革，將鏈條由五元件轉為輕巧且高效的四元件構造，而第二波結構革命-三元件設計-正由大亞鏈條領航。三元件設計將原鏈條零件之一的羅拉構造與內鏈片結合，透過化繁為簡的專利設計和歷史累積的工藝技術，讓在意零配件每一分毫重量的組車廠、品牌商及專業車手都能獲得輕量化成效。

時至今日，市面上的自行車鏈條選項十分多元，喜愛個性化、客製化及多彩配色的自行車友也逐年增加，世界各地消費者在社群熱情分享搭配成果，也顯示鏈條也不在僅是傳動零件，而是車友不可或缺的時尚配件。

因應市場情勢，大亞鏈條開發了「12速三元件星空鏈條」，採用三元件設計，搭配獨家DHT類鑽超硬自潤技術及U型儲油槽設計，鏈條與齒盤間的磨耗可因緩緩釋出的潤滑油而顯著降低，從而提升20%之傳動效率，鏈條壽命更可達10,000公里！奈米星空鍍膜讓鏈條擁有鏡面金屬質感，耐汙易清潔，讓消費者玩色有型，騎車之餘也能滿足客製化和特殊化之期待！
translations.meta_description: 穩定輸出、精準變速為各世代自行車手的獲得佳績的必備條件。關鍵賽場上，每一次的變速都考驗著車手的經驗，零件之間的無間配合，也攸關能否破風超越而行。...

translations.name: 12 Speed Rollerless Galaxy Chain
translations.description:
As a professional bike chain manufacture for 50 years, TAYA Chain always dedicates to finding true alignment with our users’ needs, and step-up to make it becomes real.

Having steady and speedy performance during the race is the basic formula of success for every top-notch road bike cyclist. In other words, an ideal bike chain would need to provide the light-weight and exact shifting feature to meet the end user’s expectation. 

TAYA 12 speed galaxy chain is the new model packing with all the pros. With the breakthrough rollerless structure, this chain saves 8% weight comparing with the current model and brings up long-term usage up to 10,000 km!

“Galaxy surface treatment” on the plate captures the sparkle of the galaxy into every bicycle with all-new aurora green, purple-red, and blue finish. Mirroring and glossy surfaces also ensure easy rinse and maintenance features.

Highly recommend for the cyclist who wants to surpass their limit and show their true color in the meantime!

translations.name: 專業型電動車鏈條
translations.description:
KMC量身打造兼具安全強度、優越變速性能、與系統最佳相容的e-Bike電動車專屬鏈條，抗衡高強度中驅馬達的強大作用力，流暢轉換馬達動力效能，為騎乘者創造愉悅安全的騎乘體驗。

【創新圓盾鉚合Shield Tech】新專利技術結合Oversized pin設計，擴增10%小軸咬合面積以提升鏈軸嵌合力達450kgf，賦予專業型電動車鏈條超強抗拉力和抗側向扭力，完美應對嚴苛環境的變速需求和爬坡時瞬間巨大動力輸出，安全性大幅提升。

【3XSP耐磨耗處理技術】以及【3倍騎乘距離】在電動車的鏈條使用上，因馬達動力強大易導致磨損同時增加，為解決此問題，KMC以精密製程及領先技術處理加工，強化零件的剛性及韌性，多重整合出3倍耐磨耗能力的頂級鏈條，透過耐磨耗技術提升鏈條的騎乘壽命，延長騎乘距離為原本的3倍。

【符合主流中驅馬達規格】隨著綠色意識的興起，單個產品可以做多樣化的使用及搭配，逐漸受到消費者的青睞，專業型電動車鏈條符合市面上主流電動車的中驅馬達傳動軸心規格，適用範圍廣泛，並在大幅提升鏈條與齒盤間的互助效能時，同時降低兩者間的摩擦及損耗，效能轉換流暢穩固，體現出最完美且絕佳相容性。

translations.name: Premium eBike Series Chains
translations.description:
Premium e-Bike Series Chains with structure design and fabricating technique offer the best drivetrain system chains to e-bike with the superior transfer efficiency. 

【Shield Technology】
 25% stronger with reinforced oversized pin design. Come with patented new riveting technology to achieve 450kgf pin power, and possess unparalleled rigidity and strength to withstand high torsional and tensile stress.

【3XSP Durability】and【3X Riding Mileage】
In addition to solve the massive abrasion caused by motor, KMC apply advanced processing to strengthen the rigidity and toughness of the chains. With exceptional durability could stand 3 times friction and meanwhile enhance the riding mileage 3 times.

【For any e-Bike system】
Match most mid motor system on the market, one chain for multiple system use. Significantly improved mutual compatibility between chains and sprocket also drastically lower the interference and friction.

    消費者導設計的Eazzy 2攜車架，特色如下:固定車架區域，採用360度加軟墊旋轉座，適配多數車架及碳纖維材質。此外，無自行車裝載時，車輪固定管可收折，搭配可傾平台，便立尾門啟閉。車輪固定棘輪裝置，適用最大到3.25吋胎寬29吋輪圈軸距至114cm，也適合於10吋兒童車。新一代改良式免工具系統已預先將版手與固定夾具的螺絲整合為一體。

translations.name: 蒙帝菲諾122 Tri Deck Custom Yacht
translations.description: 蒙帝菲諾 122 呎是引人注目的遊艇，體現了海上巡航的樂趣。外型由知名的 Dubois Naval Architects 設計公司及嘉信遊艇共同負責設計。她簡潔時尚的設計，圓滑的線條，與高船艏的設計，顯示這是一艘可以越洋航行的遊艇；透過兩側大窗戶，讓窗外的景色一覽無遺。船上大量的窗戶，確保窗外的視野不會被阻隔。 她的長度有助於空間的規劃，展現較大的載客量。室內裝潢則主要沿襲Dick Young Designs主要風格，並提供船主更大的訂製改裝空間。船上有五間艙房，共12個床位，一間大客廳和寬敞的客艙。船上可供七位船員住宿，充裕的人員足夠服務船上客人。共三層甲板的休閒和娛樂區，可供大型活動和私人聚會場所，駕駛台前戶外則是按摩浴池及日光浴墊。採用Van Cappallen Consultancy 系統加強降噪減震的效果，讓賓客享有絕對舒適的航行過程。

translations.name: Monte Fino 122 Tri Deck Custom Yacht
translations.description:
Kha Shing Enterprise work with the renowned naval architecture, Dubois Naval Architects, the 122 is a striking motoryacht that epitomizes the pleasures of bluewater cruising. Sleek lines and a fine entry at the bow declare this to be a vessel for transocean voyaging, while her generous windows ensure uninterrupted views of the world outside.

Sleeping 12 across five cabins, she exhibits exceptional volume for her length further enhanced by well-developed space planning to deliver a spacious saloon and roomy cabins. Accommodation for up to seven crew allows for sufficient on board personnel to cater for every need. With relaxation and entertainment areas spread across three decks there is full provision for both energetic partying and private moments.

translations.name: 競賽絞盤
translations.description:
• 配備各三/雙顆馬達和三/雙顆潛水等級密封電磁接觸器提供最大扭力及最快速度輸出, 是全世界最艱鉅越野競賽中頂級之絞盤
• 8.0 hp 12V串激馬達搭配過載溫控保護開關確保馬達安全運轉。
• 三段正齒輪及直立式之堅固鋁合金固定架極端的堅固
• 空氣離合器裝置確保快速且輕鬆的將合成索拉出。
• 雙剎車制動系統，包括空壓剎車和棘輪剎車, 讓絞盤剎車無下滑情形發生。
• 棘輪剎車位於索輪外側有助於散熱且非常適合使用合成索. 
• 可自行更換三個或兩個馬達,專屬雷射雕刻銘版客製駕駛者個性化的競賽用絞盤。
• 設計有三種不同的齒輪比（28：1、33.6：1和41.5：1）用於極限比賽使用。
• 最快收線速度可達每分鐘75米在齒輪比28.0:1的競賽絞盤。
• 可選擇長索輪收納更多合成索。

translations.name: Competition Winch
translations.description:
• Three motors and three submersible sealed contactors offer ultimate performance, speed and power in the world’s toughest winch challenge competitions.
• Powerful 8.0 hp 12V series wound motor.
• Extreme rugged 3 stage spur gear train and upright housing.
• Air brake system with clutch mechanism.
• Air free-spooling for rapid and easy rope payout.
• Double brake systems including air brake & ratchet brake let Blazer M3/M2 hold tight all the time.
• Ratchet brake outside the drum expedites heat dispersion and also makes the winch ideal for use with synthetic rope.
• Switchable to three or two motors for customize personalized competition winch.
• Designed with three different types of gear ratio (28:1, 33.6:1 and 41.5:1) for extreme competition application.
• Fastest retrieval speed up to 75 meter per minute on 28:1 gear ratio.
• Choice of Long Drum to accommodate more ropes.

translations.name: IE5超超高效率大型電動巴士用動力系統
translations.description:
1.馬達效率符合IE5規範
經工研院實測，馬達最高效率達96.7%，符合IEC 60034-30-2規範IE5效率，增加續航力。

2.第一家國產化200kW以上動力系統
大同自主開發馬達，並與工研院合作開發驅動器，研發適合於甲類大巴之高功率動力系統，符合國產化之需求，綠能減碳零排放，雲端e化。

3.IPM設計
IPM馬達有效利用磁阻力矩與磁鐵力矩，操作範圍廣。其重量與體積較傳統工業用感應馬達小，適用於對重量與空間有高度要求之電動巴士。

4.直結輸出，減少能耗
高扭力馬達設計，無需配合減速機。除可進一步減少動力系統體積外，更可去除減速機造成之能量損失。

5.符合車用規範
5.1通過IEC 60068-2-64之隨機振動試驗。
5.2符合VSCC-56-1之電磁相容性規範。
5.3通過ISO 7637-2之電源線暫態傳導測試。

6.雲端智能監控
搭配大同開發之TiMS智慧感測器，可於行車中心雲端監測動力系統之狀態。

7.自我診斷功能
驅動器對於溫度、電壓、電流、通訊等都有嚴密監控，防止動力系統失效。

8.環境友善設計
此產品所有材料皆符合RoHS與REACH等環保指令。

translations.name: IE5 ultra premium eff. powertrain for large e-bus
translations.description:
1.Motors meet IE5 efficiency standard
According to actual measurement performed by ITRI, the maximum efficiency of the motor is 96.7%, complied with the IEC 60034-30-2 IE5 efficiency standard.

2.First localized powertrain system greater than 200kW
This powertrain system developed by Tatung is suitable for Class A buses and meets localization demands.

3.IPM design
IPM motors have wide operating range and more compact than traditional motors.

4. Direct connection, less energy consumption
Without gear reducer, the size and energy consumption are further reduced.

5. Comply with vehicle specifications
5.1 IEC 60068-2-64 
5.2 VSCC-56-1
5.3 ISO 7637-2

6. Cloud intelligent monitoring
With Tatung TiMS system, cloud monitoring of this powertrain system can be achieved in data centers.

7. Self-diagnosis function
This powertrain system can closely monitor its currents, temperature, etc. to prevent from malfunction.

8. Eco-friendly design
All materials comply with RoHS and REACH directives.

translations.name: MT-1
translations.description:
MT-1，是一款針對越野玩家所推出的產品，以粗曠帥氣的胎邊設計，以滿足玩家們在性能與造型上的需求。此次著重在胎面跟胎間區塊的設計，以美式風格強調其花紋獨特性。
      為避免SUV / PICK UP車體重量造成輪胎快速磨耗，在膠料結構上，MT-1使用高剛性並能夠承受高荷重的天然膠料配方，不但提升輪胎整體強度，使其在地形險惡路面仍有優異的抓地及操控性能。同時強化胎面花紋塊的耐磨與耐切割性，降低磨耗對環境所造成的汙染，關鍵為膠料皆使用環保油配方，通過最新歐盟標準，減少磨耗對環境造成的汙染；在製程上採用大數據控管的方式來控管材料，有效降低廢料產生。以保障消費者使用的安全性、經濟性，也為環保盡一份心。
    為確保消費者使用產品的安全性，MT-1開發過程中，除了通過歐洲ECE、美國FMVSS、TRA 法規認證，並訂定更加嚴苛的社內規範為試驗標準，以兩倍荷重測試輪胎胎邊的耐久性能，並通過smithers DTAP老化耐久試驗法，模擬輪胎老化約4~6年的耐久性能，使消費者可以放心的使用。

translations.name: MT-1
translations.description: Be prepared for your next off-road adventure with the MT-1 CONQUEROR M/T. The CONQUEROR M/T features an all-new enhanced, modern tread compound for ultimate off-road traction while a variable pitch tread pattern allows for a quieter on-road ride. Its aggressive tread design features large, offset tread blocks for superior all-weather traction, while variable depth siping provides performance consistency throughout the life of the tire. Alternating shoulder grooves work to evacuate mud and debris while mud-and-stone ejectors protect against stone retention and drilling. The 3-ply sidewall rating provides added strength for impact protection, while the aggressive upper sidewall enhances off-road traction and bite, yet protects from rocks and mountainous terrains. The MT-1 CONQUEROR M/T-1 is an off-road tire you can depend on.

translations.name: 102呎豪華遊艇
translations.description:
嘉鴻團隊潛心籌備多時隆重推出Horizon FD 102—首艘FD系列超級遊艇船型，延續FD無邊際落地窗、大格局的室內設計與前衛外觀的特點，全新船體設計搭配高性能穿浪艏 (High Performance Piercing Bow, HPPB)，不管在高速或低速航行時，皆能展現絕佳的航行性能與效率。 宛如海上度假豪宅的FD102，擁有145坪 (480平方米) 船上可用空間，傲視市場同級遊艇，使室內室外娛樂空間全面升級。24呎10吋 (7.57米) 的超大船寬規劃主甲板沙龍與望台的雙客廳以及5間衛浴套房。望台採用寬體與半開放式望台配置,兩側超大面積手動滑窗可隨天氣做更彈性的調整,其優點為讓船主及賓客可以在舒適的中派對並欣賞瞭望的美景。
前甲板龜殼規畫裝備儲藏區,與客製小艇停放區,主甲板船艉後方艇庫兩側廣大儲物空間及平台，依買主需求放置腳踏車儲藏室。入口弧形餐廳開開時與後甲板連成一貫,餐桌可移動有3個位置變化且可變換6人-10人一起用餐,提高室內外空間獨立性及使用彈性，不管是在室內舉辦宴會或是在上下層甲板享受日光浴的賓客皆能互不干擾。

translations.name: 102feet luxury motor yacht
translations.description:
Horizon FD102 motor yacht has been named To-Kalon: a name which takes its inspiration from Plato’s concept of beauty.
To-Kalon’s modified layout includes a semi-enclosed flybridge with sliding glass windows and a U-shaped seating area aft of the fully enclosed pilothouse alongside a full bar with fixed bar stools which is protected from the elements thanks to the hardtop.
The aft deck is fitted with an extendable dining table for up to 12 guests, a BBQ and a Jacuzzi for six with a bar counter and fixed stools. To-Kalon also comes equipped with tender storage area on the bow along with extended area starboard for entertaining family and friends.The main saloon is entered through curved glass doors, with the dining area seating 10 located aft to take advantage of ocean views and al fresco ambience.
On board, yacht To-Kalon accommodates 10 guests in five spacious staterooms including a full-beam master.

translations.name: V型創新全功能LED機車頭燈
translations.description: 本產品由TYC為義大利Ducati New Streetfighter V4重機所設計開發生產的V型創新全功能LED機車頭燈，符合SAE、ECE、3C的法規要求；遠近燈光學應用考量節能、輕量化以圓形塑膠透鏡來設計，在雙燈室空間應用近遠燈共用透鏡的設計下達成雙近雙遠的對稱光型，使照明安全性更加提升；晝行燈與位置燈應用LED光學均光擴散技術搭配V形燈殼造型設計，使燈具外觀呈現猶如一雙犀利的鷹眼般帶來全新視覺感受。全燈設定使用可回收材料，皆符合RoHS、REACH的要求，在新穎的光學設計下，達到減少耗能，降低客戶成本及符合巿場環保節能的需求趨勢。

translations.description: The T-shaped full LED headlamp is designed and manufactured by TYC for Ducati Italy New Streetfighter V4 motorcycle. The V-shaped daytime running lamp design represents a clear Ducati hallmark. Round aspheric lenses with the applicable optical design were used for High and Low beam function, while specialized optical diffusive material was applied on both the DRL and Position lamp function, which makes the appearance of the lamp assembly upon activation resembles a pair of sharp eagle eyes with homogeneous light visibility effect.  The headlamp meets ECE, SAE and CCC regulations also use of recyclable materials and eco-friendly manufacturing is complied with RoHS and REACH regulations, TYC is fully committed to Made in Taiwan high quality and international green energy standard.

translations.description: 本產品由TYC為Triumph 2020 Tiger 900所設計開發生產的全功能越野重型機車頭燈，使用全LED設計，具遠近燈、晝行燈及位置燈功能且符合SAE、ECE、3C法規的要求；利用隱藏式光源並採用在符合法規規範下提升130%的亮度配置經過嚴謹的振動模擬測試，提升越野重機在夜間行駛的視野以提高安全性；此頭燈搭配特有T型晝行燈設計，整體呈現流線視覺外觀並增加客戶的品牌識別度；同時為符合環保節能的趨勢，使用可回收材料，二次加工處理也符合RoHS、REACH的要求，達成巿場減少耗能、降低成本及節能減碳的目標。

translations.name: 電子駐車手煞車系統開關
translations.description: 由於汽車電動化帶來汽車電子的革命性改變，受惠於汽車電子化的改變趨勢，手剎車系統整合於行車電腦的控制，可讓汽車智能化去感測周遭環境，來達到車輛制動的安全性。由電子控制方式實現停車制動的需求。相比傳統手剎系統，EPB 解決了操作舒適性、安全性能等問題，提高了駐車制動性能，節省了質量和設備空間。本產品的設計特色具有二組獨立迴路結構，透過一組連桿速動結構及專為此開關所設計並獲得專利之雙軸同步機構，達到速動結構可以瞬間切換的功能。EPB是車輛中的剎車部件，屬於重要保安部品，因此EPB電子駐車系統上的開關，有非常嚴格的產品特性規格要求。產品須通過37項可靠性驗證，包括功能性驗證、環保性驗證、耐候性驗證、耐久性驗證…再配上自動化生產方式，才能夠生產出高品質高穩定性的產品。ADT08 EPB專用開關。並於2019年8月榮獲中華民國的設計專利，2020年5月榮獲中華民國的發明專利。同時在日本、美國、中國提出專利申請，佈局全球專利以取得業界領先地位。此專案開發計畫最終目的，是因應全球汽車產業之電子化需求及電動化趨勢，並以推動公司轉型及投資核心技術為宗旨，以順應產業潮流，創造企業永續經營之價值。

translations.name: Electronic Parking Break SW
translations.description: Vehicle electrification is a topic that covers many aspects of electrification in vehicles and automotive industry goes through radical changes. EPB system solves the problems of operating comfort and safety performance, improves the parking brake performance, and saves quality and equipment space.ADT08 is mainly used on auto electronic parking brake systems, such as steering wheel infotainment controls. The design features including two independent circuits, through a set of connecting rod quick-action structure and a dual-axis synchronization mechanism. This unique design provides the function of switched instantly.There are strict requirements up to 37 items of reliability verification of ADT08, including functional, environmental protection, weather resistance, and durability verification.The product received the design patent of the R.O.C in August 2019 and the invention patent of the R.O.C in May 2020.Hua-Jie always takes challenges, creates our value and supports our customers.

translations.name: ADI微透鏡LED車燈燈芯
translations.description: 本次參與選拔的產品MHL8R則為此系列之最新研發技術應用，除了能提供具有智能溫控的LED車燈，功能更符合夜間照明的需求、智能溫控設計，採用專利透鏡結合智能晶片技術為基底運用於先進駕駛不眩光智能溫控LED車燈，透過專利光學系統，將光形控光在光學透鏡內，達到行車不眩光之功效，最後再透過溫控晶片智能調控不同色溫的LED晶片，除了原本的5700K白光色溫可以亮度提升，更可以達到在雨天與霧天之下，可以使用4300K低色溫的投射，讓穿透性提升，其頭燈燈芯可以承受惡劣環境之問題，此設計為智能頭燈展開新的一頁，並且將原本的體積縮小40%，原本的產品只能裝在35mm直徑的燈具內，此次將之縮小到可以裝在25mm直徑的燈具內，讓LED置換式燈芯可以使用在更多的交通工具頭燈上，也能獲得更多客戶的青睞。功能上優先考量的是維修人員原本安裝燈的使用習性，採接受度高的H4與H7全球通用介面；並透過產品研發改良，由原本的功耗55瓦大幅降低成18瓦，讓產品可以兼顧環保概念，減省功耗的使用與降低對環境的汙染，為研發的第一指標。

translations.name: ADI micro lens LED headlamp bulbs
translations.description: Participating in this competition is MHL8R the latest technology application. It isn’t only having intelligent temperature control design, but the function is also having to suit in needs of night time. Finally, the LED chip with different color temperature is intelligently controlled through the temperature control chip. The white light of color temperature 5700K of the brightness can be raised and also 4300K color temperature can be used to improve the penetration when they drive / ride under rain and fog days. The headlight bulb can withstand the problem of harsh environments. We reduce size to 25mm diameter, it is allowing more vehicle headlights to be replaced and getting more customers’ like. The functional design we take the priority is how it will be easy way to replace original bulbs, adopting the most accepted sockets H4 and H7 of global universal interface; and through development and improvement, the power consumption is greatly reduced from 55 watts to 18 watts.

translations.name: ADI多面透鏡LED遠近雙光模組
translations.description: 本次參與選拔的產品MHL3S機車遠近雙光頭燈模組；傳統的雙光模組設計使用電磁閥(電子元件)作動達到近光燈及遠光燈的切換，電子元件動作可靠度與耐用性於車用的環境使用條件下一直被列為隱憂，故遲遲無法標準配置於原車廠系統使用。世正光電運用最新的透鏡光學設計及LED封裝專利，將符合法規的配光設計整合於一體，並不須透過電磁閥等電子元件即可達到近光燈及遠光燈合一的車用頭燈模組。則為此系列之最新研發技術應用，除了能提供具有智能溫控的LED車燈，同時單顆符合ECE R113 Class C法規認證，雙顆符合ECE R113 Class D國際法規認證，並搭載智能溫控設計，採用專利透鏡多面光學結合。光學設計同時因應市場廣泛使用60mm直徑透鏡模組，在經過專利光學透鏡設計及結合LED封裝專利大幅度的將同等模組光學設計總長於120mm縮減至55mm，大幅度更提升了車用設計的空間。透鏡外觀設計有別於傳統對稱圓聚光型透鏡；多面光學結合光學透鏡提升了整車的創新與新穎的質感。在目前車燈精益求精的世代，如何創新改變及整合，MHL3S模組提供了更好的選擇，使得車燈魚眼不在只是單純的車用照明、更是車子的眼睛與藝術造型。

translations.name: ADI led high low beam module
translations.description: Participating in this competition is MHL3S high/low beam of dual-light headlight module; the traditional dual-light module is designed by using solenoid valve (electronic component) to switch between low-beam and high-beam lights. The reliability and durability of the electronic components are always been concerned under the environmental conditions of vehicle using, so it’s been unable to use onto original standard car system.ADI OPTICS uses the latest design of lens optical and patent of LED packaging. To integrate the lighting distribution meets the regulations, does not need solenoid valve or any electronic components to have high/low beams into one headlight module. MHL3R is the latest technology application of this series, not only having intelligent temperature control, but also a single module is meeting ECE R113 class C regulation and dual module are meeting ECE R113 class D regulation. The total length of the optical design is reduced from 120mm to 55mm.

translations.model_number: All Metal Prevailing Torque Hex Nut M10-P1.0
translations.name: 高階性能跑車懸吊模組調整螺帽
translations.description:
產品安裝於高階性能跑車使用之避震模組，其開發目的為取代舊式零組件「耐落防鬆螺帽」，以改善掉屑、落屑混入活塞閥、作動時產生異音之缺陷。
1. 產品面：
(1)開發全新壓點製程，以全金屬型式提供避震零組件乘載防鬆使用；壓點製程入料機構改善，提供100%完全選向正確率，提高產品品質。
(2)冷鍛製程技術改善，提高產品表面粗糙度達Rz6.3，適用於避震模組活塞閥腔體內，降低摩擦耗損率；
(3)模具設計技術改善：提高扣件乘載面之平面度公差精密度至0.05mm MAX，增加與對手件安裝緊密度；穩定旋入扭力值，避免過大旋入力道產生崩牙現象，提高組裝穩定性。
2. 行銷面：
(1)同時跨入國際高階品牌車廠、與知名避震器原廠生產供應鏈，有助長期供貨、加速產品擴散至其他產品線。
(2)車用扣件依組裝部位不同，精密程度有所差異。避震模組屬於高精密之車用零組件，專屬使用扣件將有更高價值性，協助璟鋒建立品牌定位。
(3)車廠客戶提供產品預期年使用量達500萬顆，第一年貢獻出口產值達546萬台幣，後續將持續擴大出口額；單一產品毛利超越50%，為完全出口產品，著實屬於高附加價值之台灣精品。

translations.model_number: All Metal Prevailing Torque Hex Nut M10-P1.0
translations.name: Piston Nuts for Performance Car Suspension module.
translations.description:
Product is designed to be installed in the performance car suspension module. Innovations are described as followings:
1.A new thread deform process is developed to provide an all metal locking nut as loaded platform for components within absorber piston. The process innovation comes from the optical material feeding process, which can achieve 100% correct and precise position to enhance quality. 
2.The modified cold forging process can improve surface roughness to Rz 6.3 that significantly reduces the friction loss rate.
3.Upgrade of tooling design and raises flatness tolerance precision of the mounting side to 0.05mm Max by only forging, and further to increase the tightness of installation with the counterparts, which can effectively stabilize the distribution of screwing friction torque.
4.Expected annual usage of single Piston Nut is 5 million pieces, contributing to export value of 0.2 million USD for the first year and expect to drastically excel after the first introduction.

translations.name: AM環保型油封鏈條
translations.description:
產品面
AM環保型油封鏈條以創新專利的構造來取代油封圈，在外鏈片上的凸緣構造除了防止潤滑油脂流失更可阻擋外部粉塵進入軸承部位，避免因粉塵入侵加速軸承部位的磨損，進而提升鏈條的耐磨耗性能。
鏈片表面的EN-PTFE塗層提供鏈條更優異的潤滑性、防鏽性與抗沾黏的特性，降低長期使用時沾附粉塵而影響性能，不僅壽命提升，使用者對鏈條做清潔保養時更加輕鬆有效率。
行銷面
相較於目前市售的油封鏈條大多使用橡膠油封圈作為主要的封油機構，AM環保型油封條以創新專利的構造來取代油封圈，並取得多國的專利權，捨棄使用不可回收的橡膠材料，在提升產品質量的同時也兼顧了環保及降低成本，符合RoHS、RECH 等環保規範；產品外型設計上，凹凸緣設計的外鏈片讓鏈條有別於傳統一成不變、生硬的外型，增添了立體感及獨特的辨識度。

translations.name: AM environmentally friendly chain
translations.description:
AM environmentally friendly chain has an innovative breakthrough to replace the seal ring. The protruding contour of outer plates are innovative design to stop the penetration of dust and keep the grease inside. This is the key point to avoid the friction inside the bearing area and make the wear resistance better.
EN-PTFE surface coating on plates offer excellent lubrication, rustproof effect and adhesion barrier,  which avoided the dust stuck to increase the chain life, and made the cleaning and maintenance easy and efficient.
Set itself apart from the traditional chain which uses rubber ring to retain grease, AM environmentally friendly sealed chain adopted an innovative structure to achieve better result. The patented structure abandoned the use of unrecyclable rubber to increase the quality of the product, meet RoHS, RECH regulations, and reduce cost. 
The one-of -kind flange contour designed outer plates enhance the chain with vivid 3D feel and eye-catching outlook.

translations.name: 機車智慧電池
translations.description: 本公司理念為提倡環保永續經營，因此所有產品皆為環保綠能取向，電池芯、電源管理系統(BMS)、電池外殼等絕無含有重金屬；研發期間為了生產便利及組裝安全，更研發出了” 大電流安全連接裝置”取代傳統正負極導線連接方式，內部不會看到任何電流導線，不但提高導電效率，更杜絕電線鬆脫導致內部短路危險發生，對組裝人員及客戶都是最安全。再者，所有內部使用的鎳片、銅件以及外部上下蓋皆針對此產品開發，強化產品精確度及完整性；未來大量組裝出貨不會用錯零件、安裝錯誤的可能性發生，提升安裝人員的安全，降低不良品出產機率。此外，本公司也研發了App可供客戶購買產品、登錄保固、詢問問題、申請維修保固服務等，不只公司內部流程一致化，消費者也不需要多個窗口洽詢，提升服務效率。

translations.name: Motorcycle Smart Battery
translations.description:
It is our philosophy to keep the world green. From the battery cell and case to the BMS system are hazardous substances free. To prevent any loosen connection, we use Cooper conductor instead of wire. Not only it improve electrical conductivity but also improve safety. All the nickel plate, Cooper and housing are in-house design. It enhances the accuracy and completeness of the product and reduce failure rate on the assembling line.
We also provide an application to offer customers after sales services such as RMA, Q&A, product registration. Customers can directly contact us.

translations.name: 無線LED發光模組-升級版
translations.description:
aurora 20 LED模組創新特色—免與車體接線(擁有獨立電源)與外型輕薄短小的設計，並利用自行開發的《智能感測器內建式磁感應模組》關鍵技術，免去對位磁鐵設置，克服誤動作缺陷，在使用上更加穩定，快速安裝可一貼即用。比較市面上迎賓踏板，主要以帶線材式且需要與車體線路連接居多，安裝不易也有安裝上的車體引火風險。

此產品創新是將磁鐵與磁感測器兩個分開的獨立體再搭配一微處理器結合成單一模組，同時克服空間限制、高斯值變化所引發的限制而能夠具有優於先前技術的高靈敏度、以及節電功能(有效電力長達3年)。

aurora 20 LED模組一體成型的輕薄短小機構設計，不需帶線的獨立電源，內建式磁感應技術且功耗低可使用長達三年，是同業界中唯一LED發光模組，適合任何迎賓踏板產品的設計開發需求，本產品兼具安全、便利、節能的設計，與客戶的LOGO銘版和迎賓踏板外殼搭配，可輕鬆成為無線迎賓踏板，整體產品表達了“輕、薄、短、小、簡易安裝”將客戶的logo透過LED發光，呈現令人賞心悅目的情境。

現有市面上除智佳電子的“aurora 20 LED模組”外，尚無與本產品類似之產品，在市場上供給目前是唯一選擇。

translations.name: Wireless LED Module plus
translations.description:
Aurora 20 LED module innovation features - no cable connection with the car body (with independent power supply) and the appearance of light and short design.and using the self-developed "smart sensor built-in magnetic sensor module”
key technology, eliminating the placement magnet settings, to overcome the error of wrong operation, and make it more stable in use.It can be installed immediately after quick installation.The aurora 20 LED module has an integrated light, thin and short mechanism design.It is the only LED light module in the industry and is suitable for any door sill plate product design and development needs. this product is both safe, convenient, energy-saving design, with the customer's LOGO plate and door still plate shell, can easily become a wireless door sill plate,In addition to the "Aurora 20 LED module" of Zealio electronics, there is no product similar to this product on the market, and supply is the only choice at present.

translations.name: OLED先進環保尾燈
translations.description: DEPO帝寶率先於汽車售後服務市場開發OLED先進環保尾燈，應用於高階車款BENZ C-LASS 2015改裝部件；主要運用OLED (Organic Light Emitting Diode lighting)有機發光二極體有別於LED的特性，應用在行車燈的光學設計上，無需反射器、導光板等光學組件可大幅度減少車燈結構的材料與製程，落實環保與減碳；造型設計上設由多數個幾何構型的OLED照明光源，以簡潔的線條設計，顯現出科技感，構成整體外觀具特異視覺效果，多角度的設計提升整體造型與質感，並充份發揮其光學效益而沒有眩光問題，減少對其他車輛駕駛的視覺干擾。同時搭配LED光源應用的煞車燈、倒車燈、方向燈、霧燈4種功能，讓行車安全層次提升；此款尾燈共執行汽車燈具外部電子試驗/環境性能試驗28項、內部環測試驗5項，計33項，測試基準依據ECE、SAE、FMVSS108要求進行相關信賴性的測試，達到符合車規應用，降低被後方及側方車輛碰撞的交通事故，不只創新更提升安全性。

translations.name: OLED TAIL LAMP
translations.description: DEPO took the lead in developing advanced OLED environmentally friendly taillights for the automotive aftermarket. This technology can be found in the custom parts for Mercedes C-CLASS 2015. To achieve the position light function by OLED, it needs no reflector or light guides. It reduces the components required and the production process of the lamp while achieving environmental protection and reducing CO² footprint. The design is composed of OLED light source with high technology, unique appearance and special visual effects. Multi-angle design enhances the overall feature and reduces glare to other vehicles. This lamp contains 4 functions utilizing LED technology, namely brake, reverse, indicator and fog light. This taillight went through 28 external and 5 internal reliability tests for a total of 33 tests based on ECE and FMVSS108 requirements. OLED can help reduce traffic accidents by vehicles coming from the rear and the sides. It not only is innovative but also improves safety.

translations.name: 休旅車胎
translations.description:
MAXXIS推出一款特別針對台灣多雨潮溼的氣候主打「安靜舒適」及「安全煞車性能」的輪胎，強調煞車多一公分都不行!

Maxxis HPM3休旅車胎，產品核心訴求為保障消費者行車安全性，想停即停，SUV休旅車安全首選。在溼地安全性表現，包含煞停、循跡性等，都有相當出色的成績；乾地安全性方面，HPM3在高速變換車道上的表現，也擁有不錯的循跡性，因此即便在高速公路上遇到前方有緊急車況須閃躲的狀況，也能降低失控的機率。與競品相比，HPM3在舒適性、節能、耐磨方面也有著均衡的表現，且能滿足主流國產與進口的SUV輪胎市場大部分駕駛人的用胎需求，於市場上極具競爭力。

HPM3是一款兼具安全、平衡設定的主流SUV輪胎，適合注重安全，但又不願犧牲舒適、耐磨表現的車主。如果想要擁有超越原廠胎表現的SUV車胎，Maxxis HPM3會是不錯的選擇。

translations.name: Brand new safety standard SUV Tire
translations.description:
MAXXIS launches new tire specified on noiseless, comfortable and good braking performance for rainy and humid weather in Taiwan.

The performance of MAXXIS HPM3 SUV tire focuses on drivers’ safety. For wet road condition, it standouts quite well on braking and traction. Upon dry surface, it performs excellent traction on changing lane under high speed. Therefore, even if front car driver slams on the brakes very suddenly on highway, HPM3 could prevent being out of control. 

Compared with competitor, it brings comfortable, energy saving and wearing strengths, which satisfy most demand of SUV car owners.
HPM3 SUV tire owns safety and mainstream and it is suitable for drivers who care safety, comfort and mileage performance. It would be a nice replacement tire option for changing the original equipment SUV tire if driver pursues higher performance than original equipment could bring.

translations.name: 重機專用運動跑旅胎
translations.description:
MAXXCROSS MX-ST為MAXXIS聚焦頂尖摩托車越野賽事而開發之競技用越野機車胎。

MAXXCROSS MX-ST輪胎胎體導入創新輕量化製程工藝，減少多餘膠料的使用提升環保，並結合高剛性胎體與賽事專用新材料，創造更穩定的高性能與更長的賽事使用壽命。
全新的前後輪Profile設計，提供更順暢容易控制的傾倒過彎，大幅提升過彎安定性。
前輪具侵略式的導向性特殊花紋塊設計，搭配後輪粗曠的優化花紋塊排列設計，提供優秀的操控性及強勁的加速、牽引、剎車與過彎循跡性。

MAXXCROSS MX-ST輪胎藉由與國際一級車隊選手，2019年投入MXGP世界摩托車越野錦標賽，一舉拿下EMX125級距世界冠軍，以大膽創新的研發精神將台灣國產越野機車胎優異的性能展現給全世界。

translations.name: 全地形沙灘車輪胎
translations.description:
MAXXIS ROXXZILLA ML7為業界全地形沙灘車ATV領先開發產品，主要供應 Side by side UTV攀岩車市場，獨特的外觀除了新穎且兼具功能性輪胎因應而生。

PROFILE設計採用別於以往的多層式PROFILE設計及輪廓較平坦設計，多層式PROFILE設計使輪胎輕量化，使用者於攀岩時可擁有游刃有餘的操控性。輪廓較平坦設計，使其接地面積變大，提升卓越的抓地力。

花紋部分-獨特的胎肩高低塊設計，利於嵌合岩石帶動車輛前進；胎邊凹凸設計可有效抵抗胎邊刺傷及有助於抓地性能提升。胎面中心採曲折溝設計可分散花紋塊剛性及應力，高陸比單導向花紋設計可提供輪胎優越的循跡性及抓地力。

MAXXIS ROXXZILLA ML7攀岩胎優異性能，協助許多喜愛戶外探險的車主，出遊攀岩駕馭安全無虞，深獲喜愛。

translations.name: All-Terrain-Vehicle Tire
translations.description:
MAXXIS ROXXZILLA ML7 is the leading product in ATV industry and mainly used in UTV/SXS for rock crawling.

PROFILE - With multi-layer design making the tire lighter, users have excellent handling when crawling. Moreover, flatter PROFILE design gets more contact area with the ground to improve gripping performance.

PATTERN - The unique design of stepped shoulder lugs is good for gripping rock and the concave-convex design of sidewall improves traction and puncture resistance. In addition, the zigzag design in tread center disperses stiffness and stress of pattern block. Besides, high void-ratio and uni-directional design offers excellent tracking and grip.

MAXXIS ROXXZILLA ML7 is in the fond of many outdoor enthusiasts for its safety with its excellent performance of handling, traction, and grip in UTV/SXS for rock crawling.

translations.name: 速克達競賽胎
translations.description:
S98為瑪吉斯最新開發，專為燃油車及電動車市場打造的高階性能胎，著重乾抓性能及操控性

MAXXIS性能車胎S98系列
瑪吉斯團隊持續參與台灣TSR A組賽事，不僅藉由台上模擬分析設計，並透過賽車場是輪胎最好實驗室概念，不斷累積Racing Tire輪胎實戰經驗，提供競賽車手最佳化輪胎設計。

1.前輪-高強度胎體設計，強化操控性及胎邊支撐性，大幅提升正煞制動力。
2.後輪-平均接地面積分佈設計，可展現出過彎抓地力以及循跡性。
S98全系列-高保氣膠導入
1.Butyl含量30% 提升至90% ，輪胎保氣性提升40%。 保持良好胎壓以維持剛性，延長輪胎磨耗使用里程。
2.Ultra-R競賽型專用新配方，可於賽道上快速達到輪胎的工作溫度，發揮極佳抓地力。於直線加速及過彎迴旋性。
3.優異的前輪Profile設計使其擁有極快的傾倒速度，配合後輪增大的接地面積，擁有更佳的出彎安定性。
4.膠料溫升速度快速,於乾地操控、過彎安定性能擁有高抓地表現
S98 PLUS為賽道競技產品定位,有絕佳操控、安定性及膠料快速達到
工作溫度，展現絕佳抓地性能並保持高性能表現至抵達勝利終點線。

translations.name: 全地形多功能車輛用胎
translations.description:
K3211-HAVOK專為All-Terrain Vehicle Tire全地形多功能車輛設計，特殊膠料技術，適合多地形路況及功能的使用，創新X型塊狀花紋設計，搭配平行錯位排列，擁有行駛所需的抓地力和操控穩定性，讓駕馭者能安心體驗騎乘樂趣，目前主要推廣於北美與歐盟市場，擁有越野休閒運動的國家。
(1) 全地形多功能車輛用胎K3211-HAVOK，針對泥濘地形與硬、軟土路面，設計出具功能性的X型花紋塊排列，能迅速排除胎面積泥，賦予全面的抓地力表現，讓駕馭者能安心體驗騎乘樂趣。
(2) 胎體為BIAS結構設計，平行錯位排列的花紋，適合全地形車輛後輪使用，高強度結構層，增加輪胎整體強度及抓地性，並降低穿刺性；胎唇三角膠設計，可降低不良道路行駛時，減少因尖銳物而傷及輪胎，影響行駛安全。
(3) 胎型輪廓為方形胎肩，搭配X型創新花紋及最佳化排列設計，具有優越的排泥性，在行駛過彎時能展現最佳的穩定性及靈活性，讓騎乘者在享受側滑及甩尾樂趣的同時，也兼顧行駛的安全性。

translations.name: All-Terrain Vehicle Tire
translations.description:
“Kenda Havok” is developed for All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV). It is suitable for any kind of terrain, especially for the off-road path. It is promoted in North America and Europe, where is popular with off-road exercise.
(1).	Kenda Havok based on the word “X” to design its pattern and use 3D simulation to find out the best arrangement. So it is very suitable in soft and hard path, and also can remove the mud or water quickly. Then make rider feel safe to ride it. 
(2).	K3211 is for rear use. With high intensity BIAS structure and bead apex strip, it can provide good handle stability and prevent rocks from penetrating the tire. 
(3).	The square shape makes rider feel stable and expected when they make a turn.

	花紋設計為連續性塊狀設計，減少偏磨耗，提升磨耗性能。
	直溝為交錯設計，提升花紋剛性與行駛抓地力。
	花紋多處細溝設計，提升濕地性能與行駛舒適性。

translations.name: 全地形機車用胎
translations.description:
『K6025』–全地形機車用胎，專為速克達設計，搭配使用耐久性「高結構構碳黑 Carbon Black」膠料，創造出高耐磨的特性，花紋採中間連續，兩側類塊狀設計，適用各種路面，主要推廣於中南美洲市場，擁有山區通勤使用需求的國家。
(1) 胎面採用耐磨性膠料配方，延長行駛里程，符合中南美洲市場需求。
(2) 全地形花紋設計，中間連續花紋，可增加直線行駛性，兩側類塊狀搭配，密集性的防滑方格紋路，增加惡路地形爬抓力，並有效加速排水性能，提升騎乘安全性。
(3) 因應全地形路況的需求，採高強度廉紗結構設計，增加輪胎載重能力。
(4) 輪胎製程，使用環保油配方【Non-Aromatic Oils】，降低製造過程中，所產生之危害環境氣體，符合ISO 14001環境管理系統認證，為保護地球盡一份心力！

Change your scooter tire frequently? K6025 can solve your problem. It provides a great mileage than usual. It is promoted in Central and South America. 
(1)	Its compound contains “Carbon Black”, which will make tire have a longer wear and mileage than normal one.
(2)	K6025’s pattern is 40% similar to the off-road tire. Especially its groove in the center and shoulder part, these grooves can eliminate water quickly.
(3)	In order to improve its weight-carrying capacity, we use high intensity nylon in its structure. 
(4)	During the production of K6025, we use “Non-Aromatic Oils” which prevents the air pollution happen. Kenda’s Environmental management system is ISO 14001 certified.

translations.name: NRF泡綿吸音降噪汽車用胎技術
translations.description:
您是否仍然認為超高性能轎車輪胎等於高噪音？
專為電動汽車用胎設計，搭配建大NRF(Noise Reduction Foam Technology)泡綿吸音降噪技術的VEZDA UHP A/S KR400超高性能輪胎，透過胎體內部的專利海綿吸音結構，達到效抑制空腔共鳴的效果，提供更為舒適寧靜的駕駛感受，可在輪胎滾動時降低8％-19％的輪胎噪音。
(1)專利凹型泡綿結構，可節省泡綿的使用，並且達到相同水準的抑制空腔共鳴效果。
(2)泡綿使用高耐熱、高附著力專用黏膠配方，可緊密貼合於輪胎內面膠處，不會脫落。
(3)本產品獲得2019美國IDA(International Design Awards)設計獎的金獎肯定。
(4)輪胎製成使用環保油配方【Non-Aromatic Oils】，降低製造過程中所產生之危害環境氣體，符合ISO 14001環境管理系統認證，為保護地球盡一份心力！

translations.name: Noise Reduction Foam Technology
translations.description:
Do you still think Ultra high performance passenger car tire equals high noise? 
Design for an electric car, the requirement for noise is very high; therefore, Vezda UHP A/S KR400 Ultra High performance passenger car tires with Kenda new NRF technology will supply you full of new driving experience. It will decrease 8%-19% tire noise while the tire is rolling.
1. New patent geometry of sponge can reduce the materials use and make the same effects of resonance suppression.
2. New adhesive formulations can make sure the sponge very firmly on the inside of the tire.
3. This product won the gold award of the IDA(International Design Awards) Design Award 2019.
4. More environmentally friendly! This product uses Non-Aromatic Oils formula to effectively reduce environmental pollution and Kenda’s Environmental management system is ISO 14001 certified.

translations.name: 光板暨光導技術綜合尾燈
translations.description:
26079是適用於歐洲重型卡車的多功能LED複合尾燈，開創性地結合光板科技及新一代光導技術。Lucidity獨家光板科技使尾燈發光更為柔暢不刺眼；新一代光導科技方向燈則提升燈具整體照明效果及造型質感，為業界難得同時具備創新光學技術與造型美學的商用車燈產品。
突破成果特色如下：
1.多功能LED複合尾燈，結合6種必要功能於一體：行車/煞車/方向/後霧/倒車/反射片，光源皆採用LED光源。
2.Lucidity獨特光板光學技術使尾燈呈現飽滿溫柔的光源，降低用路人眼睛疲勞提升駕駛用路安全。
3.方向燈採用新一代光導技術，除了造型時尚、辨識度高外，同時也能帶來明亮、安全的駕駛體驗。
4.使用SMT技術全LED燈具提升穩定性耐用度。
5.插頭採用國際認可AMP 7PIN防水&防塵插頭。
6.燈具的光學設計皆符合歐盟ECE道路行車安全認證標準。

translations.name: Glo & Light Guide tech Rear Combination Lamp
translations.description:
Lucidity once again launched a breakthrough R&D achievement: the first multi-functional LED combination rear lamp for European heavy duty trailers trucks that combines Glo-Trac optical technology and a new generation of light guide technology.
Lucidity's exclusive Glo-Trac optical technology makes the tail lamp glare-free. Furthermore, Lucidity 26079 adopts a new generation of light guide optical design, which makes the overall lighting smoother and accomplishes a stylish physical appearance.
Our breakthrough achievements are as follows:
1. 6-in-1 multifunctional LED rear lamp.
2. Innovative Glo-Trac optical technology as tail function.
3. The cutting edge Light Guide optical technology as direction indicator to provide users with a bright and safe driving experience.
4. Durable SMD LEDs that withstand vibration and other external impacts.
5. Low profile design with plug-and-go AMP connector.
6. European ECE optical homologation.

translations.name: EAGLE EYES 絕地硬漢3D光條全LED皮卡車尾燈
translations.description:
「絕地硬漢3D光條全LED皮卡車尾燈」以上下全LED類梯型光源來取代原廠的鹵素燈泡設計，在外型視覺上更令人注目，也在其路面照明上提升亮度，增加用路人安全。無論是上光源為方向+煞車的雙效功能或下光源的方向+煞車+倒車三效功能，都是以類3D視覺表現出立體照明，而行車燈的斜C形3D雙光條設計, 在導光條上的配置模組中能夠得到最有效的節能功率和最大亮度，能環保且不失高透亮。
    整燈使用全LED發光晶體、燈體採用高強度塑料。LED光源的高亮度、低功耗、長效能、及大視角的特性，提升設計層次也同步提高駕駛者行車安全性。再者其內部的技術工法，方向功能、煞車功能及倒車功能照明皆以精細的LED發光晶體的類3D光條設計，使其亮度及寬闊度大大提升，再以旁側小燈輔其照明，簡約且完整的包覆性結構，沒有一絲多餘的閒置空間，也同時兼顧綠能環保的責任。且符合SAE/DOT法規要求，讓駕駛者與用路者的安全等級提升。

translations.name: EAGLE EYES XTREME TOUGH LED PICKUP TRUCK TAILLIGHT
translations.description:
“EAGLE EYES XTREME TOUGH LED PICKUP TRUCK TAILLIGHT”comes with full LED in trapezoidal shape to increase brightness and be more safety. The above LED includes signal and brake function, the below LED includes signal, brake and backup function, both show stereoscopic lighting with 3D-like vision. Additionally, its DRL comes with the oblique C-shaped 3D dual light bar design, which can obtain most effective energy-saving power and maximum brightness, and also can be environmentally friendly without losing high transparency.

With the full LED design, it is 30% brighter than the original halogen bulb and has at least 50% longer lifespan with better heat radiation to reduce the temperature generated during the operation. The characteristics of LED is high brightness, low power consumption, long performance, and large viewing angle, these can improve the driving safety and also be responsible for the environmental protection. In addition, it complies with SAE / DOT regulations.

translations.name: EAGLE EYES 絕地硬漢 高效能全LED皮卡車頭燈
translations.description:
「EAGLE EYES 絕地硬漢高效能全LED皮卡車頭燈」從盾形外觀設計，完美搭配上CHEVROLET Suburban/Tahoe車型所帶給人的巡邏者的守護形象。整體設計以上下對稱鱗片形反射鏡搭配LED發光晶體來取代原廠的鹵素燈泡設計。而序列式方向燈設計，以排序流動的方式取代傳統燈泡的閃爍，讓後方的用路人、用車都更清楚的看到號誌，強化提醒的功能並降低事故的發生。車燈中段保留日行燈及行車燈雙效LED光源，在車燈設計增加了側翼的Ｃ字型LED光條行車燈與整款車燈的外觀造型更加分。
    車燈設計概念上整燈使用全LED發光晶體光源、燈體採用鍍鉻飾件及高強度塑料。LED燈光源亮度比以往鹵素燈泡高出30%以上，其使用壽命比鹵素燈泡延長至少50%以上，並能達到良好的散熱效果，降低整燈運作時所產生溫度，LED光源的高亮度、低功耗、長效能、及大視角的特性，提升設計層次也同步提高駕駛者行車安全性。再者其內部的技術工法，遠近燈照明以精細的全LED光學設計使亮度及寬闊度大大提升，LED發光晶體高亮度的特性，再以內側小燈輔其方向燈的照明，也能同時兼顧綠能環保的責任。且符合SAE/DOT法規要求。

translations.name: EAGLE EYES XTREME TOUGH LED PICKUP TRUCK HEADLIGHT
translations.description:
Eagle Eye high performance full LED headlights. Its scaly reflector design and efficient LED not only have an attractive appearance, but also enhance brightness. In place of traditional turn signals, sequence signals can provide better clarity. In addition, not only the dual-function LEDs with daytime running lights and driving lights are retained, but also high-brightness C-shaped LED tubes are added on both sides.

The brightness of the LED light source is 30% higher than that of the traditional halogen bulb, the service life is at least 50% longer, and the heat dissipation effect is better. In addition, through internal technical design, brightness and lighting width have been greatly improved. Most importantly, it complies with SAE / DOT regulations. Through unremitting efforts, Eagle Eye has demonstrated our high-performance all-LED headlights here, and constantly achieve our ideal goal of taking into account both safety protection and low energy consumption.

translations.name: Ai-1 Sport ABS
translations.description:
宏佳騰秉持著以「Future Mobility」為精神的主軸，來宣告對於電動車市場的企圖心。將造車工藝融入在Ai-1 Sport之上，並以革命、創新、科技，三大理念來打造出不只時尚而且聰明的都會移動美學。
Ai-1 Sport ABS最具特色的是宏佳騰打造的CROXERA智慧儀錶的搭載，能夠「一鍵導航到站換電」的功能，無需沿途使用手機，不用時時關注著手機，透過計算騎乘習慣、距離等多項參數，將會在低電量時，進行提醒，並設定好路線，透過儀表資訊快速安全的到達換電站。搭載Bosch ABS 10MB煞車防鎖死系統，增進煞車的穩定性。
在外觀設計上車頭圓潤卻不失線條的外觀，順著弧線往下延伸，則是相當具有個性以及辨識度的LED大燈，帶點銳利的線條，在車身線條上，燈具的延伸處都設計較為稜角銳利感，視覺上有相當的層次感。造車工藝與智慧能源完美結合，將智慧電車市場推向更高領域。
秉持不屈於現實的精神，持續挑戰為人們帶來更聰明的騎乘體驗。擁有歐美及台灣的完整市場經驗，用創新思維打造最貼近生活需求的Smarterscooter。傾注不甘於平凡的台灣人氣魄，打破市場規則，搭載更智慧的科技、別樹一格的設計美學

translations.name: Ai-1 Sport ABS
translations.description:
AEON upholds the main axis of "Future Mobility" as the spirit to declare its ambition for the electric vehicle market. Integrate the car-making technology on the Ai-1 Sport, and use the three concepts of revolution, innovation and technology to create a stylish and smart urban mobile aesthetic.
The most distinctive feature of Ai-1 Sport ABS is the CROXERA smart meter built by Hongjia Teng. It can be used to "one-click navigation to the station to change the power" function. There is no need to use the mobile phone along the way. Several parameters such as distance will be reminded when the power is low, and the route will be set, and the instrument information will be used to quickly and safely reach the power station. Equipped with Bosch ABS 10MB Anti-lock Braking System to improve brake stability.
In the appearance design, the front of the car is round but the line is extended. It extends down the arc. It is a very personal and recognizable LED headlight with a little sharp line.

translations.name: Ur1
translations.description:
PGO智慧電車Ur1- You are the one,運用Scooter經典設計語彙,以簡約優雅的曲線打造車身外型,創造出經典、科技、時尚、優雅於一身,將Ur1打造成最獨一無二的工藝精品。 
鋁合金水冷永磁同步馬達,性能更佳釋放出飽的動力,使用電池交換服務,在全台近2千座電池交換站,輕鬆交換電池! 
EQ智慧多功能儀表,操作邏輯更直覺效率。結合限速提醒、低速警示外,透過專屬APP還有車況診斷、車廂開關、車輛自動上鎖設定,還有貼心化的生日快樂歌等功能,讓騎乘充滿各種樂趣。 
Ur1貼心巧思在每個細節中，符合人體工學75cm低坐高、超省力中柱、加高舒適後扶手及超大容量置物箱,即便是體型嬌小的女孩也能輕鬆駕馭。
輪胎採用電動車雙效專屬胎,搭配前後碟CBS煞車系統,制動力道扎實,強大的制動性能將事故發生率降到最低,各個環節都具備絕佳的安全保障。 
33mm前叉加上可調雙避震系統,提供精準直線穩定性,以及面對碎震與坑洞時的細緻處理,大幅提升騎乘舒適性,帶來前所未有的極致操控體驗。 Class-C高規格LED大燈設計搭配尾燈超大導光條,光條U字造型像是一個大大的微笑,讓人在騎乘時不微笑也難呀!

translations.name: Ur1
translations.description:
The PGO smart Ur1 uses top Scooter original design and inherits European classic design vocabulary. Unique craftsmanship.
The power adopts aluminum alloy water-cooled permanent magnet synchronous motor. Using the smart battery exchange service, the battery can be easily exchanged in nearly 2,000 battery exchange stations in 6 seconds.
EQ smart multi-function meters enrich information and make operation logic more intuitive and efficient. 
Ur1 adopts ergonomically 748mm low seat height, easy and super effortless center stand, heightened and comfortable rear armrest and large capacity storage box. 
The tires adopt exclusive double-effect tires for electric vehicles, making riding easier and safer. The front and rear double discs plus CBS braking system provide a solid braking force. 
The 33mm front fork with adjustable dual suspension system provides accurate linear stability.  Class-C high-spec LED headlights are designed with taillights and large light guide strips.

translations.name: NEW J-bubu CBS
translations.description:
NEW J-bubu CBS車身設計承襲歐式風格造型，簡潔富有律動的流線Dynamic Wave(律動的波浪)風格，在保有復古風格的外型中，裸露式把手與擋風板飾條設計再添設計風味。
創新：全新 4V Robust油冷引擎，加入智慧型全時控制系統(SCES)，適時計算噴射之燃油量，讓行駛中的油氣混合更均勻，燃燒更加完全，節省油耗並升級動力，加上運用強健式冷卻技術(Robust Cooling Technology)在動力表現上，最大馬力大幅領先同級車30%以上。
環保：符合七期環保法規的SCES引擎控制科技STOP&GO怠速起停系統，達到省油10%以上的效能，不僅降低油耗更為環保盡一份心力。
節能：藉由BOSCH新一代的噴射系統高霧化噴嘴，讓行駛中的油氣混合更均勻，燃燒更完全，油耗表現顯著進步，大幅減少二氧化碳排放。
安全：搭配LED大燈，壽命比傳統燈泡更長，兼顧安全性及耐用性的使用。
便利：以MMI智慧感知多功能液晶儀錶(Man–Machine Interface Speedometer)結合噴射系統電腦診斷功能，依需求切換功能，精準顯示時間、里程、油量、轉速、ECU及自我檢測等資訊。

translations.name: NEW J-bubu CBS
translations.description:
The body shape of New J-bubu CBS  inherits Europeanized style with simply and dynamic wave design. It also equipped naked handle bar and new designed windshield. 
Innovation: It adopts brand new 4V Robust oil cooling engine with SCES technology and installs new generation injection system to make Air-Fuel Ratio more perfectly and burns completely.It brings 30% more horse power than other the same class competitors. 
Environmental protection: It adopts SCES technology with idle stop system to suit for seventh environmental regulations of Taiwan. It is equal to plant ten trees a year and save fuel consumption more than 10%. It not only reduces the fuel consumption but does the best effort for eco-friendly.
Safety: It equips LED headlight to enhance the brightness of nighttime using. 
Convenience: MMI (Man-Machine Interface) speedometer with LCD displayer which is the original design of PGO. The LCD monitor displays more clearly and feedback all information more quickly.

translations.name: 水冷式永磁同步變頻冰水機
translations.description:
TECO永磁同步變頻冰水機以高品質及高效能為目標，不斷創造空調技術新紀錄。合理簡約結構設計，採用永磁同步DC變頻壓縮機，提昇能效至COP 5.15符合國家能源分級效率1級水準。搭配使用R410A環保新冷媒，達到科技享受與環境保護的完美平衡。 

永磁同步變頻冰水主機特點：
一、永磁同步變頻技術：採用永磁同步變頻驅動技術之壓縮機，較傳統感應壓縮機降低耗功30%，結合高效率熱交換器設計，機組COP 5.15達能源分級效率1級水準。

二、簡約超薄外觀設計：降低體積25%、減小重量19%、減少冷媒充填量12%、減少安裝空間。不論在製造、運送、到最後的使用，都可以減少碳排放量，節省能源。

三、全負載高能效系統：採用高速MCU即時運算，隨時偵測環境與負載的資訊，極佳地優化冷媒系統控制、PWSM壓縮機驅動、DC變頻出力調節以達到全負載，全天候的運轉效率，IPLV可達7.5。
translations.meta_title: 水冷式永磁同步變頻冰水機

translations.name: Water-cooled PMS Inverter Chiller
translations.description:
TECO Water cooled PMSM inverter chiller, researching for producing high efficiency and high quality products, creates a new record in air-conditioner technique. All series of products with environment-friendly refrigerant R410A and energy-saving technology combine to reach the perfect balance of environmental protection.
Features :
1. PMSM inverter technology : PMSM inverter control technology, reduce power consumption 30%, with high efficiency Fan and motor , Can make Energy Efficiency COP 5.15.
2. Simple and slim design : reduce volume 25%, Weight 19% , Refrigerant charge 12%, Reduce installation space, and energy saved. 
3. Full load High efficient system:. High-speed MCU is used for real-time calculation to detect the environment and load information all the time. Optimum refrigerant system control, PMSM compressor drive, and DC inverter output adjustment are optimized to achieve full load. The all-weather operating efficiency IPLV up to 7.5.

translations.name: 智慧節能-聯網商用氣冷變頻箱型機
translations.description:
商用空調主要使用於餐廳、商場、機關辦公室等公共大空間，機組耗能大、冷氣需量變化大，常有過冷產生能源浪費的問題。
東元商用變頻氣冷箱型空調機以節能為目標，採用自主開發變頻壓縮機驅動及控制系統，依環境的冷量需求調整直流變頻壓縮機制冷力輸出，透過多點溫度及壓力回饋迴路，可以提供更精確的制冷力輸出；使用R-410A環保冷媒，達到舒適節能與環境保護的完美平衡。

東元創新商用變頻氣冷箱型空調機產品特點：
1. 採用創新自主開發變頻驅動及控制系統，台灣業界第一。
2. 獨家智慧變頻動力控制，多段能力輸出，流體力學設計高效率風扇，搭配熱交換器最佳化設計，節能30%以上。

translations.name: Networking Energy-Saving Air-cooled Inverter ACs
translations.description:
Commercial air conditioners are mainly used in public large areas such as restaurants, shopping malls, office offices, etc. The power consumption of the unit is large, and the demand for air-conditioning varies greatly. There is often a problem of excessive energy generation caused by excessive cooling.
TECO commercial inverter Air-cooled air conditioners are designed with energy-saving and high quality. The innovative self-developed inverter control system is used to adjust the compressor refrigeration output according to the cooling demand of the environment.
features:
1. Adopting innovative self-developed inverter control system .
2. Exclusive intelligent inverter control, high efficiency fan, optimized heat exchanger design, energy saving more than 30%.
3. Adopt environmentally friendly refrigerant R-410A, with networked remote monitoring and energy management system to create the most effective energy saving and energy saving management

translations.name: CNC五軸重切削型龍門加工中心機
translations.description:
CNC五軸龍門加工中心機 (重切削型)
S5A-4732HH 

特適於鈦合金或其他難削材料之多軸同動加工

特色簡介:
1. 全機身採高剛性結構體設計, 機械式同動二軸頭, BC軸傳動採蝸桿蝸輪傳動, 搭配自製重切削式兩段變速齒輪箱, 加工齒輪模數加大(M=3.5), 齒數比1:1.75及1:7及齒輪式傳動主軸設計, 最大重切削扭矩可達到1155N-m。
2. Z軸主軸頭軌道設計獨家專利-切削加工抑制振動結構設計, 大幅降低難削材料加工的振動, 提升加工效率、表面精度與刀具壽命 (S5A-HH系列專屬)。
3. 全封閉式防濺鈑金護罩, 摺疊式操作門且具備超大門寬設計, 整體外觀更結合時尚美學及安全防護的人因設計。
4. 橫樑安全護欄設計, 保護維修人員安全, 方便機械維修作業。
5. 升降式懸臂操作箱, 可隨時調整高度, 配合操作者所需。

CNC 5-Axis Double Column Machining Center
S5A-4732HH 

Special for Difficult-to-Cut Materials processing, Titanium Alloy processing.

2. Unique patented design of the Z-axis spindle rail structure - vibration restrain in machining. It can largely reduce the vibration in machining hard-to-cut material, enhance the machining efficiency, reduce the surface roughness, and prolong the tool’s life. (Model S5A-HH exclusive)
3. Fully Splash Guarding design. Super large and wide working door design. Fashionable aesthetic and ergonomic safety design.
4. Specific design of safety guardrail upon the cross column. Convenient for machine maintenance.
5. Height-adjustable manipulation control box. Suitable for people of different height.

translations.name: 線切割放電加工機
translations.description: GE-43SA高精度線馬機，控制器為線切割放電加工機業界-唯一可整合上博CIMFORCE生產開發管理系統之機器。可提供從專案管理、模具設計、製程加工到成型試模的End-to-End解決方案，各階段經RFQ、DFM、CAE、CAD CAM、CAPP、PLM、MES等整合串流機台程式數據，提供智慧化的優化方案，一舉解決模具製造中遭遇的所有問題。同時整合FMS功能，可作料倉及電極、模板管理。機台具可靠細線0.07mm自動穿線與加工功能。適用於超微加工，例如:微型連接器、精密拉絲模具與超細纖維抽絲模具應用。機身結構具有＂Direct Force＂機身設計概念，在中小型模具/零件加工場合，具有優異精度表現。並整合創新性之廢料移除機構，利用此機構在模板的廢料切斷落下時，將廢料吸住，並移動至廢料收集盒。此方式不管一個模板上有多少個孔都能將廢料全部自動移除，從頭到尾不需人力介入。真正達到線割機的無人化加工。高加工效率、高稼動率；放電效率及線切割速度皆優於其他競爭者；適用於沖子加工。並結合軟體及硬體機構。

translations.name: Wire Cut EDM
translations.description:
AccuteX's high-end GE-43S Linear motor machine. Its controller can collaborate with commercializing "CIMFORCE" production development management system. It provides “End-to-End” solutions, begins from project management, mold design, production processing to molding test, and integrates streaming program data format from RFQ, DFM, CAE, CAD-CAM, CAPP, PLM, MES, etc. at each stage. 

The GE series is using automatic scrap removing function by built-in electrical magnetic mechanism: a developed new flushing nozzle with the electrical-magnetic coil inside. The Electrical-magnetic will hold the scrap when it is about to drop, and carry it to the collection box. Dropping final scrap into the box by deactivating electrical-magnetic coil. Then, the controller will continuous Skim process until the program ends. The whole process is 100% automatic and programmable.

translations.name: 防疫電梯
translations.description:
2020年席捲全球的新冠肺炎疫情，帶來一場艱辛嚴峻的考驗。依據各國的社區防疫指引都提醒「電梯」是感染新型冠狀病毒風險最高的處所之一，而電梯空間狹窄、空氣不流通、進出人員複雜，病毒與細菌傳播風險絕不亞於飛機等大型交通工具。
易鋒機械於2019年始，開始針對電梯衛生安全進行研發各式產品，並將這些產品運用到電梯上，EPE防疫電梯因而誕生。EPE防疫電梯內分別有「車廂殺菌裝置」、「抗菌濾網風扇」、「非接觸式按鈕」、「電梯語音叫車」、「電梯手勢叫車」、「手機APP智慧叫車」、「電梯腳踏叫車」等防疫產品。不論是原有電梯加裝防疫產品，或是新機「防疫電梯」，易鋒機械皆能滿足客戶對於防疫的需求，領先業界研發創新能力。
EPE防疫電梯最大特色是各式防疫配備精巧設計，可依據客戶需求進行搭配，若原有電梯加裝防疫配備，防疫配備僅需2小時就能安裝完成，對原電梯的變動不大，非常適合原有電梯加裝。

translations.name: Epidemic Prevention Elevator
translations.description:
Early 2020, the global was attacked by COVID19.  It brings along a big challenge to us.  According to warnings from a lot of countries, elevator is one of the major infection media in the epidemic.  Since elevators have narrow space & limited air circulation with frequent occupants in use, the rick of infection is not lower than inside airplane or large transportations.
Started early 2019, E-Feng has been developing certain devices for epidemic controls and already put them into elevators.  Therefore, EPE Epidemic Prevention Elevator was born.  EPE devices are such as Elevator Sterilization Device, Anti-Bacterial Filtration Fan, Non-Contact buttons, Voice Recognition, Gesture Recognition, Smart Elevator APP & Virtual Pedal Button etc.  No matter, it is existing elevators with additional EP devices or new build elevators with build-in EP devices, E-Feng can satisfy both cases.  E-Feng is always ahead in the elevator technologies.

translations.name: 佰龍圓編針織機製造執行系統
translations.description:
a.	長久困擾織造業的再現性問題得以解決
過往由於織造的技術與調整，大多仰賴人力，所以很多的知識與技巧都存在資深的工匠手中，但人力會流動而且師徒制的教學，這對於技術與科技的保存不易；再者，不同的技術人員，對於同一塊布種的手感與布性，都有著其主觀的意識，這造成重現性無法被實踐。MES將織造動作數據化，對於機器的調整也有其對應的量化動作，所以對於重現性能達到近乎完美的水準。

b.	智慧織造的關鍵
對於智慧織造，透過大數據分析所得到的織造數據，或者是在遠端要控制針織機執行來自品牌商設計師的設計參數，若針織機上沒有能夠自動接收並執行的機制，那智慧織造便滯礙難行，所以佰龍將針織機上幾乎所有的調整都建立量化管理，讓調整機器不再你說一套我做一套，也透過許多的感測器，回饋織造的情況，這目前是智慧織造發展的情況。

translations.name: Pailung Manufacturing execution system
translations.description:
a.	Revolutionary solution to repeatability in knitting technology
In the past, the knitting operations and adjustments all rely on manual control. And, much technology and techniques are kept in people’s mind which is not easy to be stored and transferred. Accordingly, the features of fabrics are too arduous to be repeated for mass production. Now, MES digitalizes all the knitting actions and quantifies all the adjustments on machines, so that, repeatability is built up for perfection.

b.	The Key to smart knitting
For smart knitting, it’s all about execution of knitting data which comes from big data base or designers. But if there is no system/item in knitting machine receiving and executing commands then, there will be an extremely difficulty in smart knitting. So, that is the reason that Pailung’s MES has been developed. When all the quantified information is perfectly executed by MES, the distance to smart knitting is getting closer and closer.

translations.name: 長毛機剪三層布圓編針織機
translations.description:
a.  製程革命的布料科技
過往保暖布料的工程，皆獨立織造不同三層布料後，再以貼合技術將不同布料疊加一起，進而發揮保暖效果，包含保暖層、面布與裡布，但因為化學貼合劑容易造成布面的缺損，以及工序的繁複，佰龍三層長毛布於是誕生，將長毛面布、保暖層及裡布同一時間織造完成，無需多餘工段，布面品質也提昇，客戶也無須增加包存空間來集結各種不同布料，也沒有多餘的待料時間，可謂革命性的布料科技。
b.  更高品質及功能性的保暖布料
省去了貼合工段，三個不同的布層緊緊交織一起，更加強了保暖的功能，也能夠做到更輕薄卻維持保暖性的效果，讓現今保暖衣物市場越往輕薄目標的限制，得到更好的解決方案，也創造佰龍客戶更高的經濟價值。

translations.name: Double Face High Pile Circular Knitting Machine
translations.description:
a.  Revolutionary knitting technology
In traditional thermal fabric technology, the fabrics were made of 3 different layers of fabric in 3 different processes, then combined together by lamination. The 3 layers contains thermal layer, face layer, and inner layer, and all laminated by chemistry gel. By this way, it is costly to lamination, time, and materials. But, with Pailung’s new knitting technology, it solves all the problems by knitting 3 layers at once. Then, all the concerns are worked out.

b.  Higher quality and performance in thermal fabrics
Instead of lamination, knitting 3 layers together makes fabric tighter and stronger. Thus, it lifts up the function of thermal and makes light-weight and keeping-warmth happened at the same time. This knitting technology gives the best solution to the market which needs thinner and thinner thermal garment and provides higher and extra product value to the customers.

translations.name: 鏈條輸送型懸吊式噴洗機
translations.description:
產品特色
噴砂是針對素材表面進行的一種破壞性的加工方式，利用細小的研磨砂材顆粒對素材表面衝擊,讓表面產生像顆粒化般的凹陷使之形成霧面或侵蝕面，
而達到除金銹、去毛刺、去氧化層、應力處理、摩擦系數調整、精密度調整、高附著力、美化、霧化、消光、提升素材表面的光潔度等效果。
本機採用PLC自動控制，可連續單次元噴洗，吊桿進關關入噴箱便慢速前進定點後自動關門，門定位後葉輪自動啟動，鋼珠自動供給，開始噴洗。噴洗完成後鋼珠供給葉輪自動關閉，等葉輪完全停止，門自動開，門定位後吊桿鏈條快速輸送換桿進入噴箱便慢速前進定位後，自動關門，連續單次元噴洗。出入門為空壓閥，開、關門安全性高。
鋼珠回收系統:螺旋輸送器設有篩網，可將出粗粒物篩網，並自動排出來。集塵機構造簡單、操作簡便、維護容易不須特別基礎。集塵機以電磁閥控制自動定時使用高壓空氣，連續高壓空氣清洗，性能穩定，可增加濾管之壽命，易於保養，集塵效率高，粉塵捕集效率高，壓力損失固定，風量變動少，效率高收集粉塵或其他懸浮微粒並排除。循環回收系統的內部機構，利用螺旋桿裝置或旋風桶設計，有效地解決粉塵等影響操作人員吸入的危害。

translations.name: 智能化重負荷型高速五軸加工機
translations.description:
1.FCV-620S採用C型動柱結構搭配B/C軸旋轉工作台設計，旋轉工作台荷重達500kg轉速達B：33.3/C：50 rpm業界最佳規格，具備結構精簡佔地面積小且性能規格優越，提升客戶單位廠方空間生產效率。
2. B/C軸旋轉工作台採用滾子凸輪傳動系統，具備高剛性、零背隙與不易磨耗等多項優勢特性，客戶長時間使用不易造成機台精度變化且無需定期調整傳動系統背隙。
3.搭配五軸控制器，讓工件於一次設定可達到五軸同動加工，完成各種角度與曲面加工，符合各式汽車、航太與生醫等高端零件加工需求。
4.外罩雙開式活動門搭配迴轉式操作箱設計，大幅提升使用者的便利性。全密式鈑金設計搭配油霧回收機，可有效隔離回收加工中產生的油氣汙染。
5.側門選用自動門系統，FCV-620S即可搭配機械手臂或多工作台自動交換系統，實現自動化與少量多樣的快速換模等工業4.0生產模式。
6.切屑移除對策：標準即搭配主軸側噴水系統與底座沖屑系統，選購底座不鏽鋼導屑鈑金，減少切屑留停於機台內部有效降低清潔時間。
7.搭配鈑金美學設計融入金屬銘牌與節能LED銘牌，提升外觀視覺感與企業鑑別度。

translations.name: Heavy-duty High Speed Five Axes machining center with intelligence
translations.description:
1.FCV-620S adopts C-type structure with B/C axes rotary table design, has up to 500kg load capacity, and rotary speed up to 33.3/50 rpm (B/C axis). Small footprint and compact structure improves the production space usage for the customer.
2.The roller cam driven rotary table provides enhanced rigidity, no-backlash, and wear resistance. The accuracy of the machine is steady and there is no need to adjust the backlash of the driving system even after long time use.
3.Various angles and curved surfaces of the most complex workpiece could be completed by five-axis simultaneous machining in one set up, fulfilling the needs of diverse high-end parts processing such as automobiles, aerospace and biomedical industry.
4.The design of the double door and the swivel type operation panel greatly enhances the convenience. Fully enclosed splash guard with oil mist collector can effectively isolate oil mist pollution.

translations.name: CNC數控操作模擬工作站
translations.description:
CNC數控操作模擬工作站，以組合式的硬體操作介面與軟體整合設計，解決不同控制器之間的差異，達到多元共享又節省成本之目的，採用數控模擬工作站教學，佔地小、耗電量低、零耗材費用。職訓課程結合模擬工作站與創新五階段ＣＮＣ培訓流程，透過實體3D模擬的方式，來展示切削的過程，可具體提昇學習效率，增加數控技能熟練度。
  CNC工具機佔地廣大、操作運行耗電量高、練習試切過程會產生大量的鐵屑、油汙、油氣等的環境汙染物質，工件材料與切削刀具等經常性耗材費用昂貴，學校經費負擔沈重。
  採用CNC數控模擬工作站，擁有和實機相同的操作功能和實際的操作面盤，為兼具安全和智慧學習的CNC教學設備，佔地小、只需10%耗電量、零耗材費用、無機油污染大地，符合綠色環保之世界趨勢。透過智慧學習工具，CNC操作模擬工作站，讓學生可以在安全的環境下學習CNC的技能，達到綠色教學設備的機能。

translations.name: CNC Operation Simulation Workstation
translations.description:
Currently, technical colleges in Taiwan often fail to satisfy the needs of students due to the lack of CNC training equipment. Furthermore, CNC machines are expensive and complicated to operate, and the school will also face the problem of huge consumable cost during teaching. Ren An's operation simulation workstation is a physical simulation with 3D graphic, showing the cutting and machining process. 
  Its industrial panel remains the same functionality as real machine that students can practice constantly to accumulate hands-on operation skills. There is no need to worry about the expenditure of consumables, and it will not be affected by pollutants such as waste materials and oil and gas. Ren An's CNC operation simulation workstation is a unit of CNC teaching with both safety and smart learning Equipment. Moreover, teacher has no worry about the safety issue while operating; school thus can save the consumable cost and avoid from tool wear.

translations.name: 全自動車載玻璃網印生產線
translations.description:
隨著智能觸控操控技術成熟，加上車聯網應用功能成熟，擴大了車內使用顯示器的應用功能，如影音娛樂、即時導航、路況資訊、行車駕駛輔助等。現今觸控面板被大量導入汽車應用同時朝向更大的尺寸、更特別的造型如曲面、及更高的解析度設計。加上國內/外各大車廠爭相投入車用面板顯示器，故車載顯示器逐漸成為車輛出廠的標準配備種類如下：
根據IHS Markit預估2017-2021全球車載顯示器出貨量預估逐年成長：
2017-5000萬片，2018-5700萬片，2019-6100萬片，2020-6500萬片， 2021-6800萬片，本全自動生產線，具備如下自動化，精準性與安全性的創新價值：
1. MES/CIM聯結，參數上傳與線體全程監控，嚴格管控品質。
2. 配裝刮刀/回墨刀自動水平校準功能，確保印刷墨厚高度勻稱。
3. 高燥爐為防爆等級設計。
4. 全線安全防護，任何門/入口，人員進入系統自動停止。 
5. 電氣件規格要求嚴格，網路信號回饋，安全使用容量，電線顏色等皆達國際標準要求。

Owing to touch screen controlling technology advances, applications of IoV getting mature, it helps increasing functionality of automotive display. When high resolution display is massively used in vehicle, size and profile of panel are getting bigger and unusual. Major manufacturers of vehicle are competing to invest in automotive display, automotive display is become standard configuration.

1.	Combined with MES/CIM for monitoring production, parameter upload and strict quality control.
2.	Equipped auto-leveling calibration system for squeegee/flood coater to assure uniformity of ink layer.
3.	Explosion-proof conveyor dryer
4.	Entire line safety protection, system automatic stop if staff enter into all door and entrance.

translations.name: 高精密旋轉台磨床
translations.description:
液靜壓旋轉盤—此技術之核心為利用油體之特性，使旋轉盤面懸浮在油體表面之上，因為機構間不接觸，達到提高加工精度、穩定度、機器壽命、自動求心度、抵銷偏擺量、吸抗振效果及減少維護費用等優點。等限速度進給技術，因此能達成高精度及高壽命之目標，高剛性結構之應用亦比傳統工具機台，能夠承受更高的加工力度，因此具備更高的精度與使用壽命，屬最新之高精度、高壽命機器。
動力源為伺服馬達，經控制器可以穩定、平順且無停頓的變換旋轉軸轉速。
依旋轉盤面上圓內、外徑所需磨削速度不同，旋轉軸能依照內外徑自動變換加工速度。
有效提高加工精度，並且減低砂輪因不適當加工速度所造成的過度磨耗。
應用等限速度，提高表面精度，減少傳統速度不變，進給時容易造成的表面振紋。
translations.meta_description: 液靜壓旋轉盤—此技術之核心為利用油體之特性，使旋轉盤面懸浮在油體表面之上，因為機構間不接觸，達到提高加工精度、穩定度、機器壽命、自動求心度、抵銷偏擺量...

translations.name: High Precision Rotary Type
translations.description:
Hydrostatic rotating disk— Core of skill uses way of oil body to suspend surface of rotating disk above surface of oil body. No contact between machine, improve accuracy, stability, life, auto centring, and advantages of pin deflection amount, anti-vibration absorption effect and reduced service cost. Constant speed skill achieve goals of high precision & long life. Application of high rigidity structure withstand higher processing strength than traditional machine tools, with higher accuracy.
 Power from servo motor, rotation speed of rotating shaft changed smoothly without pause through controller.
Depending on grinding speed required for inner and outer diameters of circle on rotating disk, rotating shaft automatically change speed according to inner and outer diameters.
 Effectively improve accuracy and reduce excessive wear caused by improper speed of grinding wheel.
Apply equal speed to improve accuracy, reduce vibration caused by constant speed and feed.

translations.name: CAD/CAM新世代控制系統
translations.description: 「控制器整合之智慧型導引式成型平面研磨3D CAD/CAM系統」是應用Open CasCade幾何造型核心建構，建立相關CAD_Based在智慧型成型平面研磨工具機自動化技術應用。為建構此一系統將以Open Cascade 3D幾何造型核心為開發環境，並建構眾程公司的成型平面研磨工具機系統進行功能整合，由於此一智慧型CAD/CAM專業軟體的功能要求為3D實體顯示及3D動態切削模擬，因此有必要在一具有3D幾何造型核心的架構下進行開發，但若3D幾何造型核心自行開發，則開發繁瑣費時且困難度大，成本高。而目前雖有多個商業用的3D幾何造型核心(如ACIS, Parasolid…)，但其授權金及開發後銷售的權利金高，且眾程公司所需的CAD/CAM功能開發是較著重在單一工件的路徑規劃及動態的3D模擬及干涉功能的應用上，另眾程公司依功能需求開發後的單套軟體成本應盡可能系統成本，方具有競爭的優勢。

translations.name: ESG-818CNC/CAD CAM GRINDING
translations.description: "Intelligent Guided Model Surface Grinding 3D CAD/CAM System made by Controller" is core of Open CasCade geometric model, and establishment of CAD_Based applied auto skill of intelligent mold surface grinding machine tool. Core of Open Cascade 3D geometric model will be used as development environment and mold plane grinding machine system of Equiptop built for functional integration. Functional requirements of this intelligent CAD/CAM professional software are 3D physical display and 3D dynamic cutting simulation, develop under framework with 3D geometric model core. Although current multiple commercial 3D geometric model cores (such as ACIS, Parasolid...) with higher licensing fees, CAD/CAM function required by Equiptop focused on path planning of single workpiece application of dynamic 3D simulation and interference functions, cost of single set of software developed by Equiptop as per functional requirements should be as much as possible system cost to have competitive advantage.

translations.name: 自動平盤清廢分模軋盒機
translations.description:
本公司2020年最新型自動平盤清廢分模軋盒機，結合最新研發技術，提升作業速度及方便操作，滿足快捷分類整理完成品的需求，對先進市場極具吸引力及競爭力。創新價值有：
1.光學式紙邊定位裝置(圖1)
採下方真空吸引印刷品，取代傳統由上方壓輪下衝"夾住”印刷品，不當壓傷其表面之方式。可減低高速作業時因壓輪碰撞造成的震動，提高進給精度。
2.分模部快速鎖模(圖2)
系統智慧預警，提供多點偵測模式偵測軋切模具是否過載/滑脫，確保安全。
3.除屑部抓紙排下壓(圖3)
藉彈簧吸震設計、緩衝抓紙排衝擊，使開夾塊產生下壓力以提昇印刷品進給穩定性。
4.軋切部吹風系統(圖4)
吹風系統整合延伸至整體刀模框，無外加吹風管亦可輕易整平印刷品。
5.除屑部快速鎖模(圖5)
   採輕量化設計，方便操作。
6.除屑、分模部紙尾吸風(圖6)
   吸風讓印刷品在減速至停止過程提升穩定度且進入模具區平順不上拱。新增分模部模框強制排氣裝置，高速運轉時，加速成品下降至棧板，提昇收紙成功率。
7.碳纖抓紙排(圖7)
   使用創新碳纖維抓紙排，較傳統鋁合金材質可減少重量約1/3，強度增加1/2，並延長傳動鏈條之壽命。

translations.name: Automatic Diecutting and Creasing Platen with Stripping and Blanking
translations.description:
Combining the most cutting edge technology with the enhancement of running speed and easy-operation, SBL introduces the Automatic Diecutting and Creasing platen with Stripping and Blanking in 2020 to  meet customers’ needs of easily sorting of finished products and will be competitive for SBL in USA and Europe.
Innovations are as follows:
1.Optical lateral sheet registration unit：To improve the sheets feeding precision .
2.Quick lock Tool Frame with Dial indicator：To provide a smart warning to ensure the integrity of dies.
3.Push-Down device at Stripping Section：To strengthen stability of job running.
4.Air-Blowing System at Stripping Section：To ensure smooth job running without extra air pipes.
5.Quick Lock Tool Frame With Dial Indicator：Light-weight design for easy operating.
6.Air Braking System at Stripping and Blanking sections：To reduce the risk of sheet collection failure.
7.Carbon Fiber Gripper bars：To increase the strength and extend the life span of transmission chain.

translations.name: 雷射雕刻切割機
translations.description:
星雲憑藉在雷射產品線的深耕與經驗的累積，聆聽每個客戶對產品的需求。集結所有的不可能，成為我們創新的來源，透過專業的研發能力，將所有的不可能，實現在這台GCC LaserPro S400 雷射雕刻機台。幫助所有的終端用戶，創造更多的獲利。
1.速度140IPS, 為星雲雷射產品線之旗艦機，為客戶帶來可觀的產能。
2.工作檯面40" x 20" 搭配Z軸深度11inch, 可處理大型的物件，提高加工彈性，帶來便利。
3.簡易好上手的操作介面，大幅提升工作效率。
4.SmartLIDTM設計，機型側掀式設計，簡易好維修。
5.SmartFLOWTM 特殊風路設計，確保加工過程中產生的煙塵或雜物可被輕易排出機器外，不會累積於機器內，造成零件損壞。
6.雙管機種，巧妙結合CO2 & Fiber雷射源，達到一機多用，可做金屬與非金屬切割應用。
7.導入CCD (Charge-Coupled Device)camera 技術，利用讀點對位，讓Print & Cut 應用更到位。

星雲以專業且成熟的自有技術，結合亞洲廠商獨有的價格優勢，成功切入一向以歐美廠商為主導的雷射雕刻機市場。
