translations.name: Fradox Venting Master
translations.description: The principle of Chimney Effect states that hot air rises and cold air falls, so the closer you are to the roof, the hotter you will feel. If there’s no good exhaust outlet on the roof, heat will accumulate causing the entire indoor to be hot and stuffy. 冬瓜 Roof Vent has upward opening which is the best way for heat dissipation.  Multi-patented design can effectively extract heat, avoiding indoor buildup. Rainwater drains quickly, eliminating the possibility of strong wind blowing water into the building, perfectly overcoming the weak points of traditional Rotary Vent like short circulation, short service life, water leakage, broken head, etc. 冬瓜 is the first to combine natural and mechanical heat dissipation functions into one. Ventilation effect is maximized by natural convection supplemented with forced extraction. Test on exhaust volume: Natural (no power) = 82m³/hr. ; Mechanical (powered) = 820m³/hr. 冬瓜 is the best solution to the problem of sultry space.

translations.name: LED水母燈
translations.description:
LED水母燈最大的優勢在於將LED軟性燈絲燈泡結合不同玻璃燈罩，結合燈泡與燈具為一體，具有傳統鎢絲燈泡的外觀、發光效果及LED燈泡技術，提供兩全其美的設計，解決各國政府禁用白熾燈泡的問題，更能表現光的精緻感，讓燈具設計更有彈性，耐用度提高6倍，拉長產品壽命，可以長期使用而無需更換，減少人工更換費用及能源消耗，不造成環境負擔，尤其受到更換之人工費用比燈泡費用高昂之歐洲國家青睞，且均使用可回收材質，同時達到回收與節能的雙重環保理念。
本公司以獨家製程製作軟性燈絲燈泡，創新研發「LED水母燈」，除了針對燈泡裡的光源表現不斷突破，利用可折彎繞絲的特性並以水母為原型，設計燈條嵌入之多樣玻璃燈罩，使產品如同深海中發光的水母，產生更多樣化的照明效果，提高整體視覺設計感，更能符合酒吧、餐廳及旅舘等注重精緻視覺設計及環境美學設計的市場。在產品開發上，也採用少量多樣模式，創造更多市場的可能性，並保持領先全球之LED軟性燈絲燈泡製造技術。本產品通過歐洲CE、美國ETL、RoHS、UL等多項國際認證，期望透過獨創之優質產品快速跳脫LED產業低質、低價的惡性競爭，讓台灣品牌優質技術及品質於全球市場發光發熱。

translations.name: Jellyfish LED
translations.description: The biggest advantage of the Jellyfish LED is combining LED flexible filament bulbs with different glass lampshades, integrating bulb and lamp as one. The product has the appearance and luminous effect of the traditional tungsten light bulb with an LED technique. It solves the problem of the prohibition of incandescent light bulbs, and shows the finesse of light, making the design more flexible. Increasing the durability by 6 times, extending product life, using recyclable materials, it achieves both recycling and energy saving.With an exclusive process of manufacture, we innovatively develop the “Jellyfish LED.” We use the feature of bendable wire to design a variety of LED light bars embedded in the glass lampshade, making the product look like the jellyfish, producing more diversified lighting effects, improving the overall visual design for those focus on interior decoration such as bars, restaurants, and hotels and also places that focus on environmental aesthetics.

translations.model_number: LOF mono perc half cut color solar panel
translations.name: 樂福單晶半切彩色太陽能模組
translations.description:
樂福為全球唯一生產彩色電池片的生產製造商，為提供給客戶時尚美觀且轉換效能更高的產品，樂福持續創新研發，新產品半切模組大幅降低度電成本，產品目標客群以歐洲、美洲為主，安裝於屋頂、外牆，對業主而言，可以提高投資報酬效率，更滿足屋主的品味美學。

樂福首次將半切工藝納入模組，單晶120片半切電池封裝成半切彩色模組，瓦數可達310W。成功降低電池阻抗與耗損，提高電池發電效率，並不受遮蔭問題影響，在不增加生產成本下，大幅提高模組總瓦數，並且克服單晶鍍色問題，歷經一年多測試實驗，於2020年第二季已達穩定量產，滿足客戶時尚外觀及高轉換效率的雙重需求。

隨著各國政府對於太陽能補助減緩，太陽能安裝需求將回歸市場基本面。以往為取得政府補助金額，安裝投資報酬率高的傳統藍色或黑色太陽能模組，為市場大宗。近幾年因太陽能電池片轉換效率逐年精進提高，故取得電力成本大幅下降，在政府補助金額減少的情況下，屋主對於太陽能的安裝選擇，有更多的自主喜好。樂福單晶半切彩色太陽能模組，對屋主而言，除了提供高投資報酬率外，在建築體視覺搭配上，有多款顏色供選擇，彩色太陽能模組更像是裝飾外牆的建材，或是藝術品的展示。

translations.model_number: LOF mono perc half cut color solar panel
translations.name: mono perc half cut color solar panel
translations.description: Lof Solar has launched the color mono half-cut cell modules, providing higher total yields than standard, full cell panels. The power output for a 120-piece color mono half cut cell module ranges from 300-310 W. Besides the enhanced output performance, other main features for this new product line include (1) decrease module temperatures (2) reduce the risk of hot spot effect (3) reduce the adverse impact of shadowing effect. For instance, the half-cut cells can still generate a 50% performance with the upper half of the module, even when the lower half is shaded. For those looking for a stylish solar solution and a high performer, this is the one. In a half-cell module, standard color full cells are cut into two equal halves. The wattage produced per cell is halved and resistance losses on cell and module level are reduced to one quarter, after cutting the cell. The path of the generated current is shortened by dividing the modules, further reducing resistance losses.

translations.name: 商用高流量過濾設備
translations.description:
力霸致力於提供「隨時可託付的健康飲用水」，整台設備榮獲政府認證核可實驗室NSF/ANSI 42/58 性能測試合格，從潔淨、安全、節能、創新各面向，提供您好水的保證。

力霸商用高流量過濾設備採用流體控制結構，上進下出分流設計，儲水容量大，出水壓力不減弱，雙馬達同時製水，製水速度快，利用桶內預存逆滲透水反沖洗，有效的延長濾芯壽命，獨家離子濾除技術不僅廢水量極少，還可依據需求調整水質增添飲品風味，節省水費珍惜水資源，儲水桶與過濾設備模組化設計不占空間且施工快速，具有四項警報(缺水、流量、流速、水質異常警報)及四項管理(製水量、廢水量、濾芯流量及時間壽命提醒)控制系統，整合了微濾、超濾、納濾、滲透、殺菌五項系統、八大特色、八大控制，在極差的水質環境下仍維持絕佳的處理效能，卓越的技術，人性化設計，以人為本專注為您做到最好。

力霸成立於1975年，商用飲水設備製造商，透過專業的技術提供商業用水的系統規劃，全台唯一擁有環保署認證核可水質實驗室，擁有最完整的水質資訊及服務團隊，主要客戶群有學校、醫院、商辦大樓，在台灣商用飲用水市場占有率達60%以上，榮獲各大連鎖餐飲店及超商首選品牌。

translations.name: Commercial High Flow Reverse Osmosis
translations.description:
The commercial filtration equipment made by LEPA adopts fluid control structure, large amounts of water storage and not weakens the effluent pressure. Moreover, water produced by the usage of double motors at the same time can increase its speed. 

Using the RO water to backwash can extend the life of the filter element effectively, the unique ion filtration technology not only creates least wastewater, but also adjusts water quality with demand, saves water costs and cherishes water resources.

The modular design of the water storage tank and filtration equipment does not occupy space and the speed for construction is fast.

It contains four alarm systems such as water shortage, the amount of flow, flow speed, warning of abnormal water quality. Another four control systems include water production, the amounts of wastewater, filter flow and warning of time life.
This integrates five systems: MF, UF, NF, RO, and sterilization.

Humanized design and under the people-oriented basis.

translations.name: 太陽能發電混合型儲能系統
translations.description:
隨著全球再生能源蓬勃發展，電力供應從傳統集中式電廠走向分散式、可自發自用的再生能源與微電網。為了提高家用太陽能系統的電力利用率、發揮售電經濟效益，並打造家庭備用電源，台達推出ES6JB1太陽能發電混合型儲能系統，整合儲能電池、電源量測器與人機介面打造高度整合的解決方案，滿足家用市場對於再生能源創能、儲能與控能/管理的需求，透過電力調度與控制優化家庭能源使用效率並穩定電力供應，實現台達「環保、節能、愛地球」的核心價值。

ES6JB1太陽能發電混合型儲能系統專為屋頂設有太陽能系統的住宅所設計，為智慧電網能源基礎設施中的一環，適用於多面向屋頂；轉換效率達96%；外型精巧、重量極輕且採用無風扇靜音設計，讓居家環境同時享有綠能與寧靜；圖形化遠端監控介面與控制器則能方便使用者日常操作、設定與管理。

ES6JB1可將白天或用電離峰時間剩餘的太陽能電力儲存於電池中，並在晚上或尖峰時段使用，實現自家消費模式(Self-consumption)；亦可善用電力公司價差政策，於夜間電價低時買電儲存，於白天電價高時將電池中的電力供家庭用電，發揮最大經濟效益。另外，當遭遇天災或緊急狀況導致電網供電異常時，ES6JB1會自動切換為自立運轉模式(Standalone function)，透過打造家庭備用電源，維持正常居家用電與生活。

translations.name: Hybrid PV System
translations.description:
To improve the power utilization rate of residential solar energy systems and create a backup power source for homes, Delta has launched ES6JB1 hybrid PV system. This system integrates energy storage batteries, power measurement devices, software and HMI to create a solution that meets the needs of residential markets by optimizing household energy use and stabilizing the power supply.

ES6JB1 has an energy efficiency of up to 96%, and its fanless design ensures a quiet living environment. It also has a graphical interface and controller that can facilitate daily operations, configuration, and remote management.

ES6JB1 can store surplus solar power for use at night or during peak hours to minimize consumption from the grid. It can also shift power load by storing power during off-peak times and then using it when electricity prices are high. In addition, during natural disasters or emergency situations that may cause power outages,, ES6JB1 will automatically switch to standalone mode and supply backup power to maintain user lifestyle.

translations.name: 負離子鏡面變頻數位電熱水器
translations.description:
Rewatt QR200F是一台5秒即出熱水，真正恆溫不會忽冷忽熱，智能變頻高效省電，智慧電熱水器。
內部搭載全國唯一專利科技加熱技術「半導體薄膜發熱石英管」，全面升級的Rewatt 3.0電子系統，經檢驗加熱器熱效率高達112%，採用全國唯一玻璃觸控面板，炫彩Led顯示螢幕。

十重安全最佳保障，產品均已投保3200萬產品責任險。

Smart AI monitoring is truly The constant temperature supply is not affected by other factors. The combination of the defogging mirror and the water heater provides a more designed home life, and releases negative ions to purify the air while bathing, such as in a forest.

translations.name: 直升機大風扇
translations.description:
1.運用大風量低轉速HVLS的原理，透過扇葉延伸直徑達到7米、搭載五片式航太流體扇葉設計，並配合每分鐘55rpm的轉速，達成1-3m/s的間歇自然風。

2.核心動力系統為本公司研發生產的PMSM永磁同步馬達Sensorless無傳感控制，此動力系統的馬達效率達到90%，絕緣等級F，並通過SGS第三方認證達到防水防塵IP57、電機噪音值低於40dB。

3.超輕量化設計，全機結構採用航太鋁合金材質並做耐候性塗層，在懸吊裝置安全上，通過SGS認證七倍的機身負載重量，超越美國UL認證標準，在安全性上無虞。葉扇鎖附固定方式採嵌入式設計，為業界獨家研發專利之最安全的耐撞設計。

4.使用高效節能LED模組，結合風扇本體，確保風扇運轉時下方光線的充足，絕不產生閃影，讓使用者視覺感受更舒適。

5.智慧物聯網AIoT，結合環境空氣品質系統EAS資訊蒐集上傳雲端，透過雲端AI運算反饋控制風扇轉速，創造出最舒適的環流氣場。

　　透過AMA TECH國際精工與專業團隊努力不懈，終於在2020年打造出完美重現間歇自然風，對人體全方位吹拂的直升機大風扇®

translations.name: High Volume Low Speed Fan
translations.description:
Use the principle of large air volume & low rotational speed HVLS, extend diameter to 7 meters through fan blade, have five-piece aerospace fluid fan blade design, with rotational speed of 55rpm, achieve 1-3m/s intermittent natural wind. 

Core power system is PMSM permanent magnet synchronous motor developed by the Co. with sensorless control. Motor efficiency is over 90%.

With utralight patent design, whole equipment structure is made of aerospace aluminum alloy with weather resistant coating.Blade fan locking & fixing way adopts embedded design, it is safest patented crash-resistant design exclusively developed in the industry. 

Patented efficient & energy-saving LED module ensures adequate light below when the fan is running, visual perception is more comfortable. 

AIoT combines with ambient air quality system EAS information to collect & upload information to the cloud, and controls fan speed through cloud AI calculation feedback.

translations.name: 智能電動車交流充電樁
translations.description:
Noodoe Smart EV Charger 採人性化的介面設計，「超輕鬆」掃描即充電的設計，首要考量的是使用者的便利性，只需掃描主機上的 “QR code” 做啟動。外觀設計上有別於一般 LED 指示燈，獨特的 QR code 燈板設計，易於辨識且能與使用者「互動」，透過4色 RGBW LED 的均勻混光可顯示出各情況代表色，可令使用者直覺判斷目前充電狀態。

使用者面向：
藉掃描 QR code，使用者可在手機上選擇常用的支付工具，例如：Google Pay、Apple Pay、信用卡⋯⋯等，完成付款設定後，即開始充電。充電過程中也能隨時於手機上查看即時的充電狀況。最貼心的是，整個充電服務完全不用下載 APP，或是註冊會員等繁雜的手續就能開始為車輛充電。

商業營運面向：
除上述一般使用者面向，機台上也保有 RFID 功能，能為品牌之原廠車主、停車場、飯店、商場⋯⋯等特定場域開啟「客製化」的充電服務。

For users:

translations.name: 粗糠爐乾燥中心
translations.description:
三久公司為了幫助農民大幅降低乾燥成本，提高米質，解決排放大量二氧化碳的問題，研發出獨創專利技術，以粗糠取代燃油及天然氣來乾燥穀物。「三久粗糠爐乾燥中心SB200」利用稻穀碾米後產生的粗糠，作為乾燥機的燃料，來乾燥稻穀。粗糠燃燒後產生的灰燼，作成有機肥再回到稻田中，改善土壤，使水稻植株健壯。如此生態循環再利用，就能生生不息愛地球。從石化農業進入到生態循環農業。

三久專利的粗糠完全燃燒技術，獨創1公噸濕穀產生的粗糠，約可乾燥3公噸的濕穀，經濟效益達3倍。採用全自動化乾燥，一人即可管理，日處理量數十噸、百噸、到數千噸，適用不同規模的種子公司、糧庫、農會、米廠等。熱風溫度精準控制在±1℃，恒溫乾燥，烘出高品質、高單價的小包裝米及高發芽率的種子，幫助用戶降低營運成本、提高競爭力、獲利率。

三久以獨創先進的研發能力，獲得「德國紐倫堡國際發明展金牌獎」、「日本東京世界創新發明展--金牌獎及特別天才獎」等多項大獎。擁有健全的顧客服務系統、完善保養維修服務系統，積極佈局全球通路，國內外乾燥機經銷商超過150家，成功外銷日本、韓國、東南亞、歐洲、中南美洲及全球50餘國，廣受客戶肯定與讚賞。

translations.name: HUSK FURNACE GRAIN DRYING CENTER
translations.description:
To help farmers reduce drying costs, Suncue produced innovative SB-200 husk furnace grain drying center, using husk to replace diesel. Husk ashes produce organic fertilizer, returning to paddy fields to improve soil and paddy. The ecological cycle forms an endless reproduction.
Suncue’s patented husk complete combustion technique and fully automatic drying enable one to manage the husk furnace drying center of seed companies and rice mills of daily capacity from hundreds to thousands of tons. Precise control of hot air temperature and constant-temperature drying yield high-quality, high-price grains and seeds to reduce operation costs and increase profitability. Hence Suncue was awarded with Gold Medal of Germany & Japan Invention Expo.
Suncue has a well-built customer service system and is working on global channels, including 150 dryer distributors worldwide. Products exported to Japan, Korea, Southeast Asia, Europe, Latin America and more than 50 countries bring global praise.

translations.name: 緊急醫療物資運輸無人直升機
translations.description:
[緊急醫療物資運輸無人直升機]的特點:
1.新科技應用: 雷虎科技全新開發之[緊急醫療物資運輸無人直升機]具有長時間及跨城市飛行的酬載能力。由於以往醫療物資之運輸若以商用載人飛機進行則成本相當高，若以一般道路或通過物流車輛運送則時間及意外延誤風險高，因此以無人機運送醫療物資便成為新的商業應用。雷虎科技應用最新技術開發的長程引擎無人直升機可攜帶重要醫療物資例如人體移植器官/血清/藥物/急救裝備等，在有效時間內抵達需求之醫療院所。無人直升機可搭載重達15kg醫療或裝備(如AED等)。這種單軸式引擎直升機時速可達100公里。任務半徑可達150~200公里，飛行時間可達4小時。。
2.完善的安全系統：直升機頂部設計有光達避障感應器，可即時偵測周遭障礙物。雙引擎動力輸入系統具完整的保護機制，可讓直升機在操作過程中若有狀況時，即時啟動自動降落系統，另外航電系統均搭配雙GPS/雙IMU元件，能夠讓無人機能夠更安全的執行任務。最新的AI影像辨識降落系統讓直升機精準智能的自動降落。地面三螢幕監控裝備搭配通訊的智能應用，無人機可縮短醫療運送及救援的整備時間，增加器官受贈者的移植成功率。

translations.name: Emergency Medical Service UAH
translations.description: The Raptor EMS 250 ( the Emergency Medical Service Unmanned Helicopter)  has the payload capacity for long-endurance and inter-cities flight and for delivering urgently needed medical supplies and life saving equipment and even executing time-sensitive task of delivering donated live organs.  It can carry medical supplies or equipment weighing up to 15kgs  to high mountain destinations and places affected by natural disasters.The mission flight time can reach 4 hours. It has twin-engines that make sure the helicopter carrying emergent medical equipment and donated organs can land safely even encountering a single engine failure. The top of the helicopter is designed with LiDAR , which can detect the surrounding obstacles in real time. the AI image recognition landing system allows to land automatically and accurately. the avionics system is equipped with dual GPS/dual IMU components , whose redundancy in control and navigation can enable the UAV to perform tasks more safely.

translations.description: 為因應產業自動化趨勢，東元以自力生產的AGV(智慧移動平台)為基礎，搭配智慧移動解決方案，為客戶提供節省人力資源且將工作效率最大化的服務，從工廠端應用至消費者需求，滿足客製化因應對策。東元開發團隊擁有最新研發AGV導航驅動控制模組與搭配感測器資訊採集與晶片處理模組，使AGV能穩定且快速的移動並搭載光學雷達及超音波感測器，擁有智能避障/避停等功能，確保移動時滿足智能安全需求。現行商品開發設計階段，已於送餐、收餐、導覽等方面有實際應用，未來規劃可運用潛遁與牽引設計方式提高應用場域範圍，如工廠、物流整合應用等等。

translations.description: To keep up with industry automation trend, TECO has invented our own AGV (Automatic Guided Vehicle), and provide our customer with intelligent moving solution, which can help our customer save labor costs, and also maximize effectiveness. Also, we have intelligent avoid/stop function by equipped with LiDAR and ultrasonic, which make sure safety requirements when moving. For now, we have actual solution for meal delivering, plates collecting and tour guiding. In the future planning, we will dedicate to improve our AGV capability, and figure out more fields to provide our solution.

translations.name: 智慧UVC防疫機器人
translations.description:
東元集團推出的智慧UVC防疫機器人，體態輕盈，動作靈巧，利於在場域間往來進行消毒防疫工作。基於東元自主開發生產的智慧移動機器人，提供機身上簡易操作按鈕，搭配語音安全提醒與穩定的行進速度，根據不同的應用環境，可客制的工作路徑及停留消毒殺菌時間。紫外線採用LED UVC燈粒組合之燈柱與燈條，除了節省用電之外，更不會產生傳統燈管造成的臭氧溢散對人體和環境的不良影響。
本產品旨在解決COVID-19引發的防疫期間，醫護及清潔人員增力許多工作，短期內人力招募困難，採用此產品，可減少人力負擔，提高應用場域的感染控制，使人員有更多時間與精力提供對人的服務，易於留住珍貴的人力資源，提昇顧客友好度，又可同時增加營運效率，增加營收，可謂一舉數得。
東元新推出智慧UVC防疫服務型機器人，顯現東元集團藉由高科技與智慧的結合，對於未來以服務型機器人提供更多元應用的雄心與決心，帶領東元集團與社會迎向更加美好的未來。

The intelligent UVC anti-epidemic robot launched by TECO, is agile based on the AGV development by TECO. It provides simple buttons HMI, with the sound safety reminder and steady moving speed, according to the application environment, the guest working path and the stop sterilization time. The use of LED UVC lampholders not only saves electricity, but also does not produce the harmful effects of ozone spillage caused by conventional UVC light tubes on the human body and the environment.

TECO shows her ambition and determination to provide more diverse applications to the future through the combination of high technology and intelligence, leading TECO and society to a better future.

translations.name: 智慧聯網-複合式自清淨變頻空調
translations.description:
一、研發產品策略以「節能、減排、智能、自動」為設計核心，致力發展變頻空調自動清淨技術，追求智慧化運作並結合雲端智慧聯網科技，以達成主動偵測和自動清淨系統。
二、研發產品佈局以高能效複合式清淨管理為智慧空調發展主軸，並結合產品研發減碳設計及生產。
三、結合節能及空氣清淨品質管理和物聯網技術，開發符合國家「智慧家庭物聯網通訊標準」之TaiSEIA智慧空調，將家用空調清淨效能提升到智慧清淨的高水準。
四、東元專利核心技術過濾技術清淨模組並搭載自清淨技術，雙效淨化，終身零耗材，減少資源耗用及環境之衝擊，並達減碳效益。
東元今年全新開發的家用空調創新提出自清淨變頻空調概念，並可搭載獨家專利清淨模組，多層防護，有效過濾PM2.5，擁有智慧清淨空調同時擁有健康空氣！除了搭載智慧聯網TaiSEIA模組雲端模組，機體優化設計能效CSPF=5.61超越國家一級標準10%、使用最頂級高規格之三大功能：自清淨/健康吹/關機防霉。創造產品創新、永續之價值新標準。

translations.name: Smart ultrasonic spray anti-epidemic mobile robot
translations.description: The intelligent UVC anti-epidemic robot launched by TECO, is light in form and dexterous in action, which facilitates the sterilization and prevention of epidemics between the fields. Based on the AMR by TECO, it provides simple operation buttons on the machine, along with the sound safety reminder and steady moving speed, according to the application environment, the guest working path and the stop sterilization time. The ultrasonic atomizer can increase the coverage rate and save the use of the Japanese patented high pH Potassium ion disinfectant, which is non-toxic and non-environmental. The ultraviolet light adopts the lamp post and light bar combined with LED UVC lamp particles. In addition to saving electricity, It will not produce adverse effects on the human body and the environment caused by the ozone overflow caused by traditional lamps.

translations.name: 32x32 模組化矩陣式切換器 Gen.2
translations.description:
VM3250模組化矩陣式切換器Gen. 2提供進階的存取與即時控制功能，透過單台系統便能即時控制多重近端和遠端AV 輸入裝置及顯示裝置。VM3250讓使用者只需輕按前面板按鍵，即可獨立切換視訊和/ 或音訊內容並傳送至各種螢幕、顯示裝置、投影機和/或喇叭。整合了榮獲紅點大獎的ATEN GUI（使用者圖像化介面），使用者只需透過網路即可隨時隨地連線進行設定。可查看視訊源的即時影像串流、設定電視牆配置，並可利用日曆排程功能事先排定特定時段內欲播放的設定檔，藉此提高配置效率並降低操作成本。
內建的升頻器可高效轉譯影像格式，以確保無縫、即時的切換與顯示。此外，前面板的LCD顯示讓使用者可快速檢視目前各連接埠的連線狀態。
VM3250的擴充十分簡易，並支援一系列可熱插拔的ATEN I/O板卡。它具備自動訊號轉換功能，可支援各種數位/類比視訊介面的搭配組合，包括光纖、HDBaseT、DisplayPort、HDMI、DVI、3G-SDI 及VGA。備源的機制，也讓使用者能輕鬆地維護且穩定的使用。

translations.name: 32x32 Modular Matrix Switch Gen.2
translations.description:
The VM3250 Modular Matrix Switch Gen. 2 offers advanced access and real-time control of multiple local and remote A/V input devices and displays from a single chassis. The VM3250 allows users to independently switch and route video and/or audio content directly to various monitors, displays, projectors, and/or speakers from the front panel pushbuttons. Also incorporates an Award-winning GUI that can be accessed from anywhere over a network or the internet. Through the intuitive web interface, video sources can be previewed in real-time via live streaming and video walls can be easily set up. A built-in Scaler encodes the video format in order to provide seamless, real-time switching. 

The VM3250 is easily expandable and accommodates a lineup of hot-swappable ATEN I/O boards. Equipped with automatic signal conversion, it allows various combinations of digital and analog video interfaces, including Fiber Optic, HDBaseT, DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI, 3G-SDI, and VGA.

In recent years, smart speaker has become a commander of home appliances. INNOLUX develops an advanced smart speaker with three features: the R250 curved screens show information, such as weather, temperature or security, with wide viewing angle; the floating image display combines the music and the 3D image, which enhances the interaction between users and AI; the non-contact gesture control implements epidemic prevention and also provides intuitive operation.

translations.name: 互動式液晶顯示器
translations.description:
科技不斷創新，顯示器不再只是顯示的功能，越來越多的功能整合於顯示器之中是未來的一大趨勢。互動性液晶顯示器的特色，主要是在操作觸控顯示螢幕時，除了視覺畫面的感受，並帶有觸覺與聲音的回饋，讓使用者能更有沉浸式的體驗。例如像在彈奏樂器的軟體應用下，可藉由觸碰畫面的琴弦產生聲音，並搭配琴弦振動產生的觸覺回饋，讓使用者有如同真實撥動琴弦的感受。
互動式液晶顯示器的技術是將喇叭、振動馬達元件合一，在驅動方案上是種創新的作法，要達到在同一個元件上，同時輸出觸覺與聲音，除了透過IC將對應之訊號進行處理過後，再輸入給元件。並搭配特殊元件設計，優化聲音與振動品質。
而本產品將此元件貼附在螢幕的背面，利用的是輸入訊號使元件產生振動，直接推動前方的螢幕，使螢幕同時發出聲音與震感。此時聲音由螢幕正面發出，可減少傳統揚聲器技術需要導音孔，並且聲音來源與影像更貼近一致，並同時可以提高屏佔比，減少導音孔更可以提高防水防塵之功效。

translations.name: Interactive LCD
translations.description:
(1)	The characteristic of the interactive LCD is that in addition to the visual screen experience when touching display screen, it also has tactile and sound feedback, allowing users to have a more immersive experience.
(2)	The technology of the interactive LCD is to integrate the speaker and vibration motor components. After processing the corresponding signal through the IC, it is input to the vibrating element to generate tactile and sound feedback at the same time. It is also designed with special components to optimize the sound and vibration quality.
(3)	The sound is produced from the screen, which can reduce the sound holes, and the sound source is closer to the image. The screen-to-body ratio can be increased, and the reduction of sound holes can improve the level of waterproof and dustproof.

translations.name: 6.39" 非對稱拼接顯示器
translations.description:
近來COVID-19疫情肆虐，居家辦公及居家線上教學已變成日常必須活動，此時方便攜帶的行動裝置需求也大幅增加，相較於一般摺疊顯示器其重量較重、厚度較厚及耐用度也較差，本產品以創新方法開發非對稱顯示器使用情境，同時在規格上也有重大的進步，平常除具單機使用輕量化與便利性之外，在進行拼接時也能夠符合視訊及辦公的裝置，分拆後好收納更是讓效率提升。
● 非對稱新穎設計極具視覺衝擊的外觀，突破消費者對手機外觀的想像
　此設計可讓左/右側單邊達極窄邊框，除可單屏獨立使用，也可將極窄邊框側進行無縫拼接，讓螢幕瞬間變大，可進行較舒適的影片觀看也可進行娛樂性的互動，提升人性化及增加互動性。
● 144Hz超高頻顯示器讓手機在進行瀏覽、遊戲及影片觀看更為順暢。
● 全球最窄0.9mm 下邊框提供更大屏佔比及立體感，讓手機螢幕集結功能性、外觀性、實用性於一身的美型行動裝置。

translations.name: 16" 240 Hz with HDR1,000 miniLED Display
translations.description: According to the TredForce LED (LEDinside) latest research "Mini LED and HDR High-end Display Market Report", mini LED backlight displays have significant advantages in terms of brightness and reliability. It is estimated that the penetration rate of Mini LED backlight in IT, TV and Tablet applications in 2024 has the chance to grow to 20%, 15% and 10% respectively. The Mini LED backlight display efficacy is almost the same as OLED display, but the power consumption is much lower than OLED display. The challenges of Mini LED backlight technology are mainly cost, power consumption and SMT efficiency.

translations.name: LED感應浮光燈
translations.description:
居家裝潢完成，卻發現還少一盞燈，無論是美感搭配或安裝施作，總會令人傷神。做為後裝輔助照明，LED感應浮光燈™以專利技術，在不到1cm的燈體空間中，打造無邊框整面式照明、快裝快拆、免接觸導引式感控三大設計，簡單卻確切符合使用者需求。
1.超薄無邊框 : 運用【短側長距導光】專利工程技術，創造超薄光磚效果。以「光」為主角，讓燈具自然融入安裝面，不被框架外型所囿；亦因無邊框設計，多面向發光，強化工作檯面的輔助照明範圍。
2.磁吸導電快裝結構 : 將電源線整合於專屬燈座，為燈體除去線材之束縛，運用磁吸導電快裝結構，讓燈體可輕易與燈座結合，更可輕易離座離線，便於日後實際使用時之維護更換，打造新型態快裝快拆安裝模式。燈體本身亦自帶USB插槽，提供簡化安裝甚至可攜之選擇。
3.免接觸導引式感控開關 : 內藏式紅外線感應元件，遮蔽感應器即可無接觸感控，使用於廚衛，溼手亦可開關燈具；使用於閱讀或夜間照明，揮手免起身即可開關；使用於入門玄關輔助照明，符合大疫情時代之安全衛生需求。獨家掌心燈開關導引提示，則讓本產品即便隱身於平視線甚至低於視線之安裝面，亦可透過橘紅光導引指示點燈，避免摸黑探尋感應開關位置。

translations.name: epoLimitless
translations.description:
epoLimitless_the possibilities of next-generation task illumination.
1. Slim & Frameless : 
1cm ultra-slim and frameless appearance without LED glare dots, sets up a technical barriers for competitors. Minimalist design makes it could be installed invisibly, immerse into any space, easy to integrate with existing architecture.
2. Uniform Flawless Plate Light : 
Adopts edge-lit tech, which allows using fewer LEDs in design, and lets LED light source to be uniform and cozy without glare, makes it an eco-friendly and comfortable choice of illumination.
3. Touch-Free Sensor Switch : 
Lit-up by gesture control without touching, safe, convenient, and keeps the cleanliness of the luminaire. The sensing position indicator creates a better feedback for users, makes it friendly for using even in darkness.
4. Quick Release Magnetic System for Multiple-use : 
Innovative structure makes it easy to install and to remove. The light could be fixed, or quickly released when needed to carry-on.

translations.name: 全覆蓋家用智慧Wi-Fi 漏水偵測器套組
translations.description:
主設備
+ 內建802.11b/g/n及BLE藍芽無線網路, 可直接連到無線路由器。
+ 內建100dB 警報器及遠距離無線通信閘道器跟遠距漏水偵測器連接
+ 高亮度LED警示燈及LED狀態顯示燈, 使用者可清楚知道是否有地方漏水或設備是否工作正常.
+ 提供RJ11介面偵測介面, 可接RJ-11漏水偵測線, 並可藉由一般RJ11的延伸線延伸偵測的範圍.
+ 體積小,直接插牆設計, + 整機通過UL安全規範認證. 安裝方便, 使用安全.
遠端設備
+ 外殼為IP65防水防塵等級.
+ 使用AA電池2顆, 不需插電, 只要放在要偵測漏水點即可使用。
+ 低耗電量, 正常使用下, 電池壽命可達5年以上.
+ 通信距離遠, 在戶外空曠處可達300公尺, 可含蓋多數家中的每一處.
+ 整套系統能夠跟友訊其他智能家庭系列產品互通。
+ 使用友訊自行開發的雲端系統, 目前此系統已有數百萬用戶正在使用中。
+ 支持Google Assistant等智慧音箱操作

translations.name: Whole Home Smart Wi-Fi Water Leak Sensor Kit
translations.description: Water leaks can be a major risk that can destroy property and even endanger lives. With more people staying at home due to the pandemic, D-Link’s DCH-S1621KT helps to enhance home safety. Consisting of a paired hub/sensor (DCH-S162) and accompanying battery-powered sensor (DCH-S163), this smart home solution provides high-reliability water detection. The DCH-S162 is a water sensor that features stable connectivity and uses a lengthy cable to detect liquid – at which time it can trigger a visible or audible alarm and also a signal to the cloud to send a warning to the user through the mydlink app. This ensures that users have the opportunity to deal with water leaks before they cause significant damage or risk the safety of people at home. The DCS-S163 accessory sensors are waterproof, compact and utilize proprietary wireless technology that is both long range and low power, allowing it to be placed in any areas of interest.

translations.name: 內輪差與盲區毫米波雷達偵測告警系統
translations.description:
一、符合市場需求：
(1)解決目前大型車內輪差與盲區偵測裝置被動告知的問題與多種裝置介面相互干擾及準確度疑慮。
(2)視線死角與內輪差為大型車事故主因，為此針對大型車市場提供高性價比、高準確度的內輪差與盲區告警系統。

二、產品特色：
(1)首創以77GHz毫米波雷達具有高精準度、高解析度、高涵蓋範圍、不受天候影響的偵測告警技術。
(2)180度廣角專利設計，全方位偵測、幾乎零死角，解決大型車的內輪差與視野盲區。
(3)具有複合式兩階段視覺與聽覺的主動告警特色，讓駕駛不用分心盯螢幕，符合眼看前方、手放方向盤之安全駕駛準則，使用方便、安全守護!
(4)車用雷達裝置達成體積小型化且符合相關規定。
(5)符合歐盟/日本ECE R151與德國BMVI法規。
(6)醒目色彩與薄型化流線體設計。
(7)具車用IATF16949品質認證及友善環境的製程與包材。

三、利基目標市場
因大型車市場客製化程度與相關應用技術門檻高，為升具有自主研發與客製化能力可開發適用於各大型車款，各國法規開始強制實施相關大型車盲區以及內輪差之規範，因此鎖定大型車的剛性需求以高性價比的產品策略打入市場，爭取商機贏得利基!

Market Demand:
a)Innovative 77GHz millimeter wave radar technology with advantages of high precision, resolution, area coverage, and weather resistence. 
b)Dead angle of human vision and Wide Turning are main causes of traffic accident by large vehicles. Focus on large vehicle market to provide best bargain and high precision radar system for Wide Turn and Blind Spot detection.

c)Featuring visually and auditory warning with two level presentation. Convenient usage, driver may follow standard driving form (eyes focus at front, hands on handle wheel).
d)Attractive color and thinner aerodynamic product design.
e)Comply with EU/JP ECE R151 and BMVI regulations.

translations.name: Gaming Laptop
translations.description: Premium Windows 10 Pro gaming and creativity reach new heights with the ROG Zephyrus S17. Up to an 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i9 CPU cooled with liquid metal and a GeForce RTX™ 3080 GPU deliver top performance supercharged by AAS Plus cooling. The rising keyboard’s 5° angle maximizes typing comfort with an ergonomic tilt that echoes the slope of desktop mechanical keyboards, while a programmable Multiwheel and noise-reducing camera add extra convenience. The touchpad is always in reach with a surface area that’s 125% larger than the last generation.Storage options including a three-drive HyperDrive Ultimate SSD RAID array offer lightning-fast access to games and media. The 17” display immerses with two panel options—QHD 165Hz/3ms with G-SYNC™ and Advanced Optimus or 4K 120Hz/3ms with Adaptive-Sync. World’s best speakers in gaming laptop: Six speakers with dual force-canceling woofers, and Dolby Atmos® technology.Thunderbolt™ 4 introduces a wide range of possibilities.

translations.name: 智慧型手機
translations.description: Zenfone 8 為一支蘊含強大效能的單手旗艦手機。結合頂尖效能、先進技術以及質感的外觀設計，並將諸多旗艦規格塞入精巧機身，帶給消費者「單手剛好，效能更好」的使用體驗。5.9吋的別緻體積搭配客製化的「單手操作模式」以及新加入的螢幕下指紋辨識功能，打造市場上最便利、流暢的單手操作體驗。而絲滑、講究的3D曲面背蓋，不僅能完美地貼合手掌，帶來絕佳的握持舒適度，更巧妙且不妥協地包覆住4000豪安培大容量電池，足以支撐一整天不間斷的使用；此外，雙聲道立體聲與3.5mm耳機孔更為用戶帶來高規格的影音沉浸感。Zenfone 8 的外觀設計採用細緻綿密的霧面背蓋，具備了絲順、不沾指紋的特性，讓機身隨時保有簡潔、俐落的外型，同時螢幕採用最新的康寧Gorilla® Glass Victus™玻璃，整機配有IP68等級的防水防塵認證，提供給用戶最堅固的全面防護。Zenfone 8 不妥協任何旗艦規格，以使用者角度出發設計產品，在精巧的尺寸中兼顧全方位性能，完美實現了單手旗艦手機的目標。

translations.name: Smartphone
translations.description:
Zenfone 8 is a smartphone that offers more benefits to users, but in a compact size. Its 5.9-inch display size allows for easy one-hand control, and an in-display fingerprint sensor enables intuitive and fast unlocking. The sleek curved back ensures comfort, and underneath it an impressive 4000 mAh high-capacity battery enables a full day of heavy use on a single charge. Plus, a 3.5 mm audio jack allows users to enjoy premium-quality audio experiences.
The understated matte-glass finish on the back makes the phone resistant to fingerprints and scratching while providing a sleek and clean look. Zenfone 8 also features the latest screen protection to guard against drops, and it is water-resistant. 
All of the features offered in Zenfone 8 were developed with users in mind, with the goal of providing a feature-rich solution that offers balanced functionality and ease of use.

translations.name: 穿戴式負離子空氣清淨機
translations.description:
目前ible Airvida家族有三個成員，其中Airvida L1時尚的外型是專門為時尚的女性設計，尤其在日本樂天購物平台上獲得日本網友4.37超高分推薦（參考網址：https://review.rakuten.co.jp/item/1/205798_10064548/1.1/）的ible Airvida 家族，能夠有效減少使用者吸入的PM2.5、過敏原、細菌與花粉。
ible Airvida家族擁有多國專利，可於出風口處15cm的地方產生約200萬負離子/ cm3。相較於自然界最高負離子量的森林瀑布，200萬負離子/ cm3約是瀑布旁負離子量的上百倍。如此高濃度的負離子量可快速作用讓空氣中的懸浮粒子墜落至地面，如同一個隱形面罩，防止使用者吸入有害人體或導致過敏的懸浮微粒（如PM2.5、甲醛或花粉）。各款Airvida的PM2.5去除率皆達99.9%，是空氣汙染環境下的最佳貼身幫手。
除了SGS、日本負離子機能協會與日本遠紅外線應用研究會專業驗證淨化空氣的效能之外，ible Airvida家族皆通過歐盟CE認證，確認臭氧及電磁波量安全無虞，適合長時間穿戴，隨時提供清新好空氣。

translations.name: Wearable Ionic Air Purifier
translations.description:
ible Airvida family, since 2016, is famous for its PM2.5, pollen, and allergen removal ability. Refer to the customer reviews in Japan Rakuten (Reference: https://review.rakuten.co.jp/item/1/205798_10064548/1.1/), ible Airvida has 4.37 high point from Japanese end users.

ible Airvida family features with powerful 2 million negative ions/ cm3 generation capacity, 100 times than a natural waterfall produces. Numerous negative ions can efficiently make the airborne particles, including PM2.5 (99.9% removal rate), pollen, allergen, and bacteria, dropped to the ground. This functionality is very beneficial to users which can protect them from breathing too much allergic and harmful substance into their body.

ible Airvida family is certified by professional laboratories, including SGS, Japan Association of Ion Research, and Far Infrared Association (Japan), for its air purifying ability. Moreover, ible Airvida family also complies with CE, EU regulations on ozone and radiation safety.

translations.name: Ｑ熊寶貝－嬰兒哭聲AI翻譯機
translations.description:
Ｑ熊寶貝－嬰兒哭聲AI翻譯機，輕鬆聽懂寶貝悄悄話。
帶著剛出生的寶寶回家，雖然甜蜜又開心，但育兒的路上卻是困難重重。​寶寶的哭聲，總是讓爸媽不知所措， Ｑ熊寶貝－嬰兒哭聲AI翻譯是新手爸媽的育兒神隊友！利用獨家的 AI 智慧科技，分析寶寶的哭聲及需求，幫爸媽們聽懂寶寶想說的話。
可辨識需求分別為：肚子餓、尿布濕、想睡覺、需要安撫​
​除了這四個需求外，還能偵測寶寶的 不適指數，讓爸媽能夠了解孩子是否有肚子痛、生病不舒服的狀況，掌握寶寶健康狀況。​
 Q熊寶貝5大特色
 #量子音樂獨家研發｜AI智慧科技 X 專利演算技術
 #偵測寶寶四大需求｜以及不適指數了解寶寶狀況​
 #十秒快速翻譯哭聲｜使用越久需求翻譯更加精準​ 
 #專利寶寶安撫音樂｜想睡覺時自動播放安撫音樂​
 #多彩情境燈光設計｜刺激褪黑激素也能助眠安撫

translations.name: Qbear
translations.description:
Q bear- An Al baby crying translator that tells you about babies’ needs.
We use exclusive artificial intelligence technology to analyze babies’ needs from the crying, in order to help parents react easily when babies’ needs easily are recognized. 
There are four Identifiable needs: Hungry, Diaper changing, Sleepy and Comforting.
Furthermore, Q bear can also detects babies’ discomfort index for parents to further understanding about babies’ health situation. 
5 Features
- Exclusive produce of Quantum music | Artificial intelligence + patent computational technology
- Easily detect Four needs from baby | Including discomfort index to help parents understand babies’ situation.

translations.name: 視訊協作攝影機
translations.description:
DO-CAM 視訊協作攝影機採用穩固金屬底座與機身耐用塑膠材質，重量極輕僅335公克，是市面上最輕的視訊教學攝影機。可調整結構設計加上一指翻轉鏡頭設計，使用者不必屈就鏡頭角度，可隨時調整最適和的角度入鏡或拍攝文件。無論使用於居家辦公或遠距教學，或攜帶外出會議簡報皆適宜。

搭載800萬像素相機，最高解析度達3264 x 2448像素。全自動對焦鏡頭，對焦速度更快，切換不同物品、文件零干擾。鏡頭搭載載Sony CMOS感光元件，低光源下可快速對焦、抑制雜訊抑制讓彩色重現。動態影像流暢，Full HD幀率最高可達30fps。

獨特摺疊機制和收納結構設計，完全摺疊後似口袋型筆盒，輕巧便攜於攜帶。折疊後 22.0 x 6.3 x 2.2 公分(長 x 寬 x 高) 。

translations.name: Document Camera
translations.description:
DO-CAM document camera uses a stable metal base and durable plastic material. It weighs only 335 grams, making it the lightest document camera on the market. Adjustable structure design plus one-finger flip lens design, users do not need to bend the lens angle, and can adjust the most suitable angle to enter the lens or take a document at any time. Whether it is used for home office or remote teaching, or to carry out meeting briefings, it is suitable.

Equipped with an 8-megapixel camera with a maximum resolution of 3264 x 2448 pixels. Fully automatic focusing lens, faster focusing speed, zero interference when switching between different items and files. The lens is equipped with a Sony CMOS sensor, which can quickly focus under low light sources, suppress noise and suppress color reproduction. The dynamic images are smooth, and the Full HD frame rate can reach up to 30fps.

translations.name: AiR擴增實境AR眼鏡
translations.description:
擴增實境AR眼鏡-AiR，滿足工業、醫療和商業三大主要應用領域的需求。AiR加入人工智能AI演算技術，為各個領域的專業人員提供即時擴增實境互動體驗，例如技術人員、設施維護技師、醫生和企業高階主管。AiR結合眼鏡、智慧手機和控制手環這三個元素，透過5G高速傳輸運算，達到輕便、簡單、時尚的AR體驗。AiR眼鏡重136克，雙眼視野40度，用戶配戴時無需脫下隱形眼鏡或框架眼鏡。同時還配備了可熱插拔的電池模組，以提供持續的電力傳輸，為穿戴式裝置的關鍵特性。AiR具有30層卷積神經網路(CNN)，透過AI邊緣設備在10 毫秒內實現臉部辨識，在LFW上的準確度達99.5%。
AiR首創彈性式人體工學鏡腳設計，可滿足各種不同人種的頭型尺寸並支援佩戴矯正型鏡片再加上世界首創的雙電池架構的設計，不僅讓使用者免去額外準備一個行動電源配件的不便，也由於抽換式電池為可熱插拔替換，此設計更讓使用者不需要擔心因系統低電量時，需要重新開機的窘境，進而能更盡情且長時間無限制地體驗AR內容。

translations.name: AiR AR Glasses
translations.description: AiR in an Augmented Reality AR Glasses with AI algorithm; its interaction applications are specialized for industrial, medical, and commercial use. AiR utilizes three elements to provide a lightweight, real-time, and intuitive AR experience; the computing is done on a smart device, and the result is 5G transmitted through the wristband controller to the 136g AR glasses. AiR is a comfortable AR device that can be easily adapted to our daily lives; users can equip AiR on top of regular glasses and enjoy a 40-degree wide viewing angle; and the hot-swapping battery module provides a long continuous battery life which is the key to wearable devices. AiR is the first AR device to feature flexible ergonomic frames that allows to accommodate a wide range of head sizes and head shapes, and it could also be mounted over corrective lenses and glasses. The dual hot-swapping battery modules could ensure long battery life, thus opening more practical functionality rather than just for entertainment.

translations.model_number: EVS系列 電力型保險絲
translations.name: 電動汽車電路保險絲
translations.description:
電動車充電設備能量轉換過程中分有AC慢充與DC快充兩種電壓，此系列額定電壓達到500Vdc/275Vac可充份保護電動車充電系統的電路安全
1焊接更可靠
憑藉自行開發的高週波焊接工藝，搭配紅外線溫度監控裝置與自動啟停功能，提升焊接穩定性，減少待機時間，藉由傳送速度與功率大小精確控制加熱能量減少能源損耗
2材料選用
管體使用的陶瓷材質，具備高熔點、高強度、高絕緣性能，取代同業常用的玻璃纖維材質，熔絲採用多段式限流設計快速清除故障電流，為過載電流和短路電流提供保護組件並隔離損壞模塊功能
3使用便利
可搭配熔斷器座之應用，易於終端產品故障維修。另有附腳型設計，可依客戶的製程方式，有不同的安裝選擇，適用於回流焊、波峰焊與手工焊等多種焊接方式
4國際安全規範認證
通過ISO車用熔斷器保護標準，製程與產品符合歐盟RoHS危害性物質限制指令，以及國際無鉛、無鹵標準
5國際品質驗證系統
功得電子致力發展保險絲技術及環境友善生產技術，取得IATF16949、ISO9001、ISO14001、ISO14064、ISO50001及SONY Green Partner國際環境管理及生產評估等相關驗證

translations.name: Electric Vehicle Auxiliary Fuses
translations.description:
The followings are the competitive advantages of EVS power fuses:
1.Reliable soldering process 
By the self-developed high-frequency soldering process, infrared temperature monitoring and automatic start-stop function, the soldering process is more stable.
2.Material
The ceramic material used in the tube body has a high melting point, high strength, and high insulation performance. The "neck" design used in the fuse element can quickly cut off the fault currents.
3.Easy to use
It can be used with the fuse holder, which is easy to repair the fault of the terminal product. The other PCB type fuse is suitable for various soldering methods as reflow, wave and manual soldering process.
4.Safety certification
EVS power fuses comply with ISO regulation of fuse-links in road vehicles and EU RoHS directive, lead free and halogen free.
5.Quality system
We are approved with international quality and environmental management system as IATF16949, ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO14064, ISO50001.

translations.name: UNOnext 室內空氣品質偵測器
translations.description:
UNOnext室內空氣品質偵測器，可針對7種室內有害空氣因子一網打盡，連續監測即時數據，偵測範圍包括如一氧化碳(CO)、二氧化碳(CO2)、細懸浮微粒(PM2.5)、懸浮微粒(PM10)、甲醛(HCHO)、臭氧(O3)、總揮發性有機物(TVOC) 及溫度、溼度、照度等。
此外，UNOnext不但具備偵測功能，更可獨立連動通風換氣設備，或與中央空調整合，在室內空氣品質不佳時啟動告警並引入新風，於第一時間排除室內空氣不良狀態。創新設計可於LEED綠建築標準、WELL健康建築標準得到加分。
UNOnext更是新一代UNO室內空氣品質方案的核心成員。以其為骨幹，提供多樣化管理工具以及使用者介面：包含管理主機UNOcentral，面向使用者的UNOnext App與UNOweb等等，更有API服務便於系統整合商或第三方開發者使用。彈性化的搭配組合，使UNO室內空氣品質方案能夠更廣泛的應對不同市場，以達到全面性改善國人居住/辦公環境的室內空氣品質的目標，為國人的健康築起一道堅固的長城。

translations.name: UNOnext Indoor Air Quality Monitor
translations.description:
The UNOnext Indoor Air Quality Monitor can continuously monitor real-time data for seven types of harmful indoor air factors. The detection range includes Carbon Monoxide (CO), Carbon Dioxide (CO2), Fine Suspended Particulates (PM2.5), and Suspended Particulates ( PM10), Formaldehyde (HCHO), Ozone (O3), Total Volatile Organic Compounds (TVOC) and Temperature, Humidity, Illuminance, etc. UNOnext not only has a detection function, but it can also independently link ventilation equipment or integrate with central air conditioning. When indoor air quality turns poor, UNOnext immediately sets off an alarm and introduces fresh air to eliminate the bad indoor air. The innovative design of UNOnext also earns extra points for LEED green building standards and WELL healthy building standards.
UNOnext is also the core of the New-Gen UNOsolution. As the backbone to provide diversified management tools and user interfaces: includes UNOcentral, UNOnext app and UNOweb and API services.

translations.name: C6 Duo USB-C 萬用充電器
translations.description:
Innergie C6 Duo是一款最智能的USB-C萬用充電器，適用於筆記型電腦、手機、平板、遊戲機等。獨家採用雙 USB-PD與雙孔任意充技術，讓您可以通過任何端口同時為兩個裝置自由快速充電。無「插」別，最速配，不同於市面上通常為特定瓦數分配特定端口的電源適配器，在您充電之前無需再摸索！

1. 雙孔任意充具有自動偵測裝置與最佳化動態功率分配，任意單口充電可高達 60瓦，任意雙口充電時則為 45瓦+18瓦 或 30瓦+30瓦。

2. 具有折疊版與國際轉換版兩種方便使用的插頭設計。其專利的轉換插頭採用雙向鎖定機制，結構安全耐用，讓您在150多個國家旅行時無憂無慮。

3. 內置 InnerShield™ 技術可實現多重安全供電，包括過電流保護、過電壓保護、過熱保護、過載保護與短路保護。

4. 獨家 GreenSense™ 技術承諾超過標準的節能效率，並改進從設計到製造的模組化流程，以實現環境可持續性。

5. One For All，一勞永逸地解決您的充電需求。易於攜帶的緊湊尺寸（89cc）與 45 度接合的無縫簡潔外型，讓充電變得直覺與簡單。

translations.name: C6 Duo USB-C Power Adapter
translations.description:
Innergie C6 Duo is the most intelligent USB-C power adapter featuring exclusive Dual-Port Charging technology to freely charge two devices with any port. Its dynamic power can auto-allocate a single device charge up to 60W and two devices charge up to either 45W+18W or 30W+30W. Unlike other power adapters on the market that usually allocate specific ports for specific wattages, no more fumble before you charge!

The patented interchangeable plug design features a user-friendly two-way locking connection. Traveling in more than 150 countries without hassle.

InnerShield™ technology allows multi-protection, including over-current, over-voltage, over-temperature, overpower, and over-circuit.

GreenSense™ technology promises over standard energy-saving efficiency and improves processes from design to manufacture for environmental sustainability. 

The easy carry 89cc compact size and the 45-degree assembly seamless look make the charging experience more intuitive and simple.

translations.name: 程控智能除菌飲水機
translations.description:
這是一台特別設計可以雙人同時取水，藉由面板雙邊斜向15º設計讓靠近的人能夠自然面向操作取水面板，二人同時使用時可以有舒服的使用空間，寬度相當於普通飲水機的大小卻不會有擁擠感，而且左右二人可以各自取用不同水溫的飲用水，減少公共場合排隊取水的不便，我們更在溫水及冰水的出水口設計了一個Multi-Guard技術除菌器，出水口除菌能力達99.9%，水質完全符合國家標準。
飲水機內部採用專利水平層層溢流即時熱交換系統，熱交換回收溫度可達50度，高效率回收熱能，生水快速升溫減少加熱耗電，熱開水快速降溫至50度以下供應溫開水並提高冰水製冷效率，這都是過去產品所沒有的環保節能優勢。

translations.name: Duo Series Computerized Water Dispenser
translations.description:
This is a unique two-in-one water dispenser. Double 15 degrees slanted control panels fit two users who can use different water temperatures simultaneously. It is space-saving and also means much less queuing time for public facilities. Equipped with Multi-guard® filters, the water outlet taps have anti-bacterial properties up to 99.9%. Every drop of water taken is guaranteed to fall within national drinking water standards. 
The patented water-to-water heat exchange system makes sure that boiled water can be swiftly cooled down to 50℃ warm water by circulating cool water around the warm water tank. Optimal heat exchange and cooling efficiency is achieved at very low energy costs. The dispenser is able to provide large quantities of warm water while being very environmentally friendly compared to its predecessors.

translations.name: 空氣淨化器
translations.description: 「AIR6 Plus 空氣淨化器」是採用光分解倍增引擎，搭配初級靜電濾網、可水洗光觸媒殺菌濾網可過濾90%以上懸浮微粒，可快速淨化甲醛、異味與菸味，長效抑菌，可分解過敏原，有效解決空氣中PM2.5的問題。「AIR6 Plus 空氣淨化器」通過美國FDA認可權威病毒實驗室驗證，以MS2病毒模擬新冠病毒同樣，證明消滅病毒之效率高達99.9%，且終身零耗材，體積不占空間，可方便且快速地進行移動，是一款CP值極高的空氣清淨機產品，百分之百在台灣製造，極致省電節能，不怕過度耗電之外，更解決了一般空氣清淨機常見之運轉噪音問題。「AIR6 Plus 空氣淨化器」雖然體積不大，但是效能卻很大！清淨範圍更不會受到體積而受限影響，可達到淨化高達10坪空間，是一款高效能與高靈活性之空氣清淨機產品。

translations.name: Air Purifier
translations.description: "AIR6 Plus air purifier" adopts a light decomposition multiplying engine, with a primary electrostatic filter, a washable photocatalyst sterilization filter that can filter more than 90% of suspended particles, can quickly purify formaldehyde, peculiar smell and smoke, long-lasting antibacterial, can be decomposed Allergens, effectively solve the problem of PM2.5 in the air."AIR6 Plus air purifier" has been verified by an authoritative virus laboratory accredited by the US FDA, and the MS2 virus is used to simulate the new coronavirus, which proves that the efficiency of eliminating the virus is as high as 99.9%, and it has zero consumables for life. It does not occupy space and can be moved easily and quickly.  Is an air purifier product with extremely high CP value.

translations.name: 空氣清淨機
translations.description:
清淨機與循環扇的完美結合，讓淨化後的空氣能透過強勁的循環扇傳遞到室內空間的各個角落。4合1HEPA濾網四層防護Plus+，前置濾網 : 隔絕毛髮與灰塵。acerpure淨防護塗層 :有效去除空氣中近99%的細菌、對抗病毒活性(H1N1)高達99%。 HEPA13濾網 : 隔絕空氣中的PM1.0、99.97%的懸浮微粒。活性碳濾網 : 去除有害氣體與異味。acerpure cool能釋放高濃度的負離子，極速淨化家中的有害氣體、即時捕捉固態微粒(如灰塵、PM1.0)。
長距螺旋風流任意擺動更便利: 將淨化的乾淨空氣透過強勁螺旋狀風流將空氣吹的更遠，提高室內空氣循環之效率，更可自由操作上下90度和左右80度的擺動位置。
智能感測自動化調節: LCD面板即時顯示空氣品質與異味偵測，能自動調整成適合的清淨模式。
搭載全新APP應用程式:在外也能連線監控居家空氣品質，更能搜集、共共享數據變化。
DC馬達低耗能．高效率, 耗能榮獲國家級效能認證，超低耗能依舊維持高效率的淨化。最低風速運轉為25dB，遠低於室內圖書館之40dB。
零誤觸人性設計:貼心設計兒童安全鎖功能，不用擔心孩童觸碰與寵物誤觸

translations.name: Air purifier
translations.description:
The acerpure cool AC551 series is a purifier with a 6-inch circulation fan on top that generates 10 speeds of spiral airflow. It makes the purified air coverage wider and deeper compared to an air purifier only. Wider: The circulation fan has a 90° up and down air circulator swing and 80° left to right rotation. Deeper: Circulation fan air delivery distance is up to 12 meters. 
Multiple filtration systems include a pre-filter, antivirus coated filter, activated carbon filter, and HEPA 13 filter to remove 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns, such as PM2.5, allergies, pollen, 99% of bacteria and viruses — also eliminating gases and odors. 
With the acerpure App support makes the control easier and convenient. The App also provides outdoor and indoor air quality monitoring and reminds users to be mindful of poor air quality. The DC motor inside provides silent, low power consumption, and high performance. The noise level at low fan speed is 25dB compared to 40 dB in libraries.

translations.name: 無線心率體脂計
translations.description:
FTG-588無線心率體脂計，特別針對熱愛運動，注重身體數值的人設計而成，添加了各種運動相關的數值，其中包含了肌肉量、骨骼肌、基礎代謝率…等10項數值，其中最特別的一項就是「心率」，心率是運動訓練的最新指標，許多運動員都會監測安靜心率，確認是否有運動性竇性心動徐緩，進而瞭解目前身體的鍛鍊狀態。

除此之外，透過連線到O'Care健康管家App，搭配直覺的圖像顯示與量測結果，人性化的介面與簡易操作流程，還能將每次量測的結果，做成歷史圖表，方便使用者在家就能追蹤身體數值趨勢，來確認目前身體狀態。App也有提供連接到Apple Care, Google Health的功能，讓量測資料同步在其他App出現，滿足更多使用者的需求。

產品採用鋼化玻璃面板，取消傳統的按壓/觸控螢幕，並收起傳統電極板，改用ITO電鍍薄膜技術，讓它的踩踏面板，形成平滑的鏡面，不僅不易受外力破壞，更容易清潔擦拭，不怕水或是灰塵從表面滲入，也因此延長了產品的使用年限。堅固、耐用的設計，全黑的視覺，低調又有格調，搭配家中居家擺飾，更能展示個人品味。

translations.name: Wireless Body Composition & Cardio Scale
translations.description:
The FTG-588 Wireless Cardio & Body Composition Scale is designed to make it easy to track key fitness results, including body water, fat, muscle, metabolism, heart rate, and more. Utilizing advanced Ballistocardiography (BCG) technology, the device allows for seamless measurement of heart rate, providing a key output for evaluation of fitness and health.

Utilizing the O'Care Health Management App, results are synced automatically to Android and iOS devices, for intuitive tracking of results, with optional integration with services such as Apple Care and Google Health.

Smooth glass ITO surface does away with obtrusive electrodes or buttons, using power-saving auto-on for a streamlined measurement process and easier cleaning.

translations.name: （裸眼式）3D 抬頭顯示器
translations.description:
現今社會已逐步走向人工AI的時代，車內以裸視、廣角、 3D 、實際尺寸、實際距離的虛擬物件與前方路況結合，達到直覺的精準的交通指引效果。怡利採用3D顯示技術運用了當今市場主流的AR(擴增實境)功能，將所顯示行車資訊的文字、圖像等輪廓加深，使駕駛者在濃霧或下雪等行車視線差的狀況下，透過高精密3D地圖及定位系統的演算，創造更加立體的影像投射並標出正確行車路線，讓駕駛者在視線不佳的狀況下能仍安全開車。

特點：

1) 使用(楔形)玻璃，影像品質優

2) 採最新光學架構，專利技術領先全球

3) 高效能，低功耗，輕鬆升級光學系統

translations.name: 3D AR HUD
translations.description:
Nowadays, the society has gradually moved towards the era of artificial AI. In the car, naked, wide-angle, 3D, actual size, and actual distance virtual objects are combined with the road conditions ahead to achieve intuitive and accurate traffic guidance. Yili adopts 3D display technology and uses the mainstream AR (Amplified Reality) function in the market today to deepen the outline of the text and images of the displayed driving information, so that the driver can experience poor visibility when driving in dense fog or snow. , Through the calculation of high-precision 3D map and positioning system, create a more three-dimensional image projection and mark the correct driving route, so that the driver can still drive safely under the condition of poor sight.

Features:

1) Using (wedge-shaped) glass, excellent image quality

2) Adopt the latest optical architecture, leading the world in patented technology

3) High efficiency, low power consumption, easy to upgrade the optical system

translations.name: ScreenBar Halo螢幕智能掛燈
translations.description:
ScreenBar Halo螢幕智能掛燈是既有ScreenBar系列產品的升級版本，旨在提供螢幕前方紙本和數位閱讀最舒適的光線：
1) 實時偵測亮度，智能補足500Lux
2) 特殊光學設計，前後補光減少反光
3) 後燈多向補光，均勻柔和不刺眼，平衡對比眩光

使用者可以透過高級質感的無線控制器輕鬆操作以下功能：
1) 三種光模式：前燈亮、後燈亮、前後燈亮，滿足不同的使用情境。
2) 亮度調整：明暗照度隨心切換，前後燈同步調整。
3) 色溫調整：冷暖色溫自由選擇，前後燈同步調整。
4) 自動調光：自動偵測環境亮度，智慧補足500Lux照明光線。
5) 我的最愛模式：記憶喜歡的亮度、色溫和光模式，一鍵回到最愛的光線。

硬體規格上，ScreenBar Halo選用接近自然光的高演色性LED，可以真實呈現物體鮮豔色彩，同時透過組合曲率反射片、特殊角度傾斜鏡片、吸光棉結構，達到更厲害的不對稱光學設計，有效避免螢幕反光，也貼心地加長前燈屋簷避免直視光源。另外ScreenBar Halo改良了原本就很厲害的專利夾具，可以1秒掛上窄邊框、厚邊框、曲面等各種螢幕，不占桌面空間也不傷螢幕。

translations.name: ScreenBar Halo
translations.description:
ScreenBar Halo, upgraded from the current ScreenBar series, aims to be the best lighting solution for the tasks in front of monitors: auto dimming to 500lux at any time, no reflection on screen, and no contrast glare.
User can easily switch to different functions below with the wireless control:
• 3 Light Modes: User can switch to front-light, backlight, or front-and-back light according to preference and different scenarios.
• Dimmable Luminance: The brightness can be adjusted as needed. The front-light and backlight are lighten or darken at the same time.
• Adjustable Color Temperature: The color temperature can be turned as needed. The front-light and backlight are turned cold or warm simultaneously.
• Auto Dimming: Halo is equipped with sensor that promptly detects the surrounding brightness and then supplements it with just the right light.
• My Favorite: User can set the favorite brightness, color temperature, and light mode and access to this mode quickly by tapping the button.

translations.name: LED 行動微型投影機
translations.description:
目前市售微型投影機多數僅著重滿足基本使用需求“隨處投放大畫面” ，但Y世代及Z世代消費者早已習慣高品質的數位串流影音，對於一般大畫面不因此滿足，進而期待更沉浸式的體驗。

BenQ研發團隊整合集團內部資源，從消費者調研中發掘此群消費者需求。 由投影機產品設計中心結合色彩、聲音調教團隊，與整合最新的串流影音應用，打造出第一款搭載2.1聲道喇叭，內建Android TV及支援多角度投影的720P 智慧微型投影機。

•	機構設計:135度無段數磁吸式角度調整設計、附皮質提把方便好挪動，且具備防摔 (70cm)的產品保護功能。
•	聲音設計: 透過BenQ treVolo 喇叭設計團隊，打造2.1 聲道喇叭，配合獨立的音效晶片，調教出適合此產品專屬的各種音效模式。
•	畫質: 720p, 300 ANSI Lumen，足以在微亮環境下投影清晰畫面。 
•	便利與豐富的串流影音體驗: 內建Android TV，支援雙系統投屏，及附帶支援Google assistant語音搜尋的遙控器

translations.name: 人臉辨識電子鎖
translations.description:
L600人臉辨識電子鎖，為台灣第一把自行研發、設計、生產製造的人臉辨識電子鎖。採用最新3D辨識晶片，可完全阻絕假照片，且支援夜間模式，於光線昏暗環境下也可有效辨識。L600採用金屬面板與把手，鎖匣通過UL/ANSI一級鎖認證，產品安全性與耐用性均優於他牌。滑蓋設計，隱藏式備用機械鑰匙孔，外型美觀大方。
L600使用圖示化的操作設定介面，且有語音提示開關門狀態，人性化的設計，使操作更加容易。卡片格式(Mifare classis)也能與悠遊卡相容，使用者可享受一卡通的便利。也可搭配自行開發的WAFERKEY APP，透過手機APP可授權其他使用者開門或遠端開門。
創新的節能省電設計，使用時才喚醒電路以降低耗電量，電池使用時間可長達一年以上。當電池電力不足時，會有語音提前警示更換電池，也可由外部9V電池接點暫時供電及操作門鎖。
行銷通路在B2B方面，會配合建設公司在建案規畫設計初期，即將產品規格納入標單內容。在B2C通路方面，消費者可透過官網www.waferlock.com.tw、Line帳號@waferlock、MOMO、PCHOME等電商通路，或特力屋、經銷鎖店等實體通路購買。

translations.name: Face ID Electronic Lock
translations.description:
L600, face recognition electronic lock, combines beauty and durability with metal escutcheons and levers, and grade 1 UL/ANSI mortises. It implmented the latest 3D recognition chip, which can accurately recognize and reject 2D photos, even supports night mode, for we can operate to access in dimly environments.
The lock does not only equip multiple access methods, face recognition, pin codes, and cards, but also mobile APP. With the friendly interface, users can simply and easily operate the door locks. Moreover, the battery lasts for more than one year with innovated energy-saving design to reduce battery changing. Even in the case of flat battery, there are hidden mechanical key override and external power supply point designs as backup plan.
It is easy for end customers to purchase through our official website www.waferlock.com.tw, Line account @ waferlock, MOMO, PCHOME, other e-commerce channels, or through physical shop such as B&Q or from locksmith.

translations.name: 專利易裝散熱M.2固態硬碟
translations.description:
隨著科技發展，各家科技大廠皆在積極開發小尺寸的電子產品，M.2規格成為市場主流規範，然而M.2的產品卻也存在著組裝不易的問題。宇瞻深耕儲存裝置領域多年，考量消費者在安裝M.2固態硬碟時，需要準備螺絲起子，且螺絲容易在鎖附的過程中掉落，造成組裝不便，為解決此組裝痛點，宇瞻成功開發出結合防脫落螺絲、快拆桿及散熱鋁片的「易裝散熱M.2固態硬碟」。
快速安裝 免螺絲
此產品讓使用者在安裝M.2 SSD時可將散熱片當作螺絲起子，並透過防脫落螺絲上的旋轉插銷結構，不需使用任何工具，便可輕鬆完成組裝工作。
散熱鋁片有效降溫25%
PCIe隨著多元電子產品發展趨勢日趨小型且須具備高效能處理能力，而高溫運作環境下將會導致資料的損毀或是硬體元件的故障，突顯出存放資料的NAND Flash特別需要強化熱能的保護機制，產品所附的散熱鋁片也可解決固態硬碟運作時所產生的高溫問題，達到降溫25%的散熱效果，讓使用者無需擔心因長時間高速運行產生高溫而導致降速的狀況。
專利認證
「易裝散熱M.2固態硬碟」為一款多功能的創新儲存裝置，目前此項產品已申請台灣及中國之發明專利，期望為消費者提供簡易安裝、有效散熱的解決方案。

translations.name: Easy-mount Cooling M.2 SSD
translations.description: Apacer developed the Easy-mount Cooling M.2 SSD after hearing reports from frustrated customers who dropped their mounting screw into their PC case. We designed this product so the screw is integrated and can’t fall free, and also included a rotating latch structure that makes a screwdriver unnecessary. Suddenly, installation is simple. That’s where the Easy part of the name comes from: the Cool part comes from the aluminum heat sink that speeds heat dissipation and lets the drive run smoothly. In fact, operating temperatures will be reduced by up to 25%, protecting the components and letting the device last longer. Patents are pending for this innovative product in Taiwan and mainland China.

translations.name: 智慧工廠無線電子紙解決方案
translations.description:
在早期工廠的庫存管理與產線管理，產線人員需要手動去填寫並更新產品資訊，增加了許多資訊遺失或錯誤的管理，所有流程資訊更新與校隊不但耗時且也不見得精準。
研華EPD-230無線電子紙解決方案賦予智能工廠全新的面貌：讓資料訊息能自動更新，大幅提高作業效率，減少人為錯誤。其次，電子紙裝置透過面板提供實時的庫存和生產信息的可視化。第三，無論是電子紙裝置是安裝在庫房還是在工廠台車，電子紙設備縮短了倉庫/生產線中的通信線程。 
EPD-230的創新價值如下：
1.	提供3顆按鈕可以切換屏幕頁面，並通過雙向通信反饋動作，操作者可以通過DeviceOn/ePaper實時高效地反饋請求。
2.	電子紙裝置在不同的路由器中漫遊，保持設備在線和信息更新。此外，電子紙裝置位置可以根據路由器安裝位置進行推斷。 
3.	解決方案可與RFID結合，無需任何移動手持設備查詢或者更新即可顯示實時庫存狀態。

translations.name: 新一代控制系統主機
translations.description:
自動化整合是我們持續觀察的發展趨勢, 由工業,商業一直延伸到居家住宅, 為了因應智能整合以及大數據分析的需求, 我們研發出新一代控制主機運算平台, 3大特點如下.
1.採用多核心運算架構以及多工處理能力, 滿足高度邏輯運算同時大量資訊剖析, 舉例開關窗簾, 除了需要判斷當前時間外, 也需要判讀日照強度作為輔助資訊, 因此邏輯運算整合能力是成功自動化整合的關鍵因素, 在現今高資訊量時代, 如何更快速處理龐大資訊以及從中分析並做出正確判斷, 是成功的關鍵之一. 
2.針對越來越注重安全等級的網路環境, 此新主機平台導入了雙網卡架構, 透過隔離且獨立的網路環境提供給政府或企業絕對安全的防護, 此外, DHCP自動網路地址派送功能提供給使用者更方便友善的網路架設, 大大節省網路佈建所需耗的人力與設備成本.
3.導入LCD 面板顯示功能, 我們發現針對網路設備, 使用者常常無法快速取得需要的訊息, 譬如 IP 地址, 對於建置或是障礙排除皆是個困擾, 而LCD 面板提供給使用者更方便的資訊呈現以及更友善的設定方式, 此新主機平台不但滿足高度整合需求也考量了使用者方便架設與操控的需求.

This new structure fully take the advantages of the multi-core processor, especially in today's era, how to quickly process massive amounts of information while analyzing them at the same time is the key to success.
2. The security level of the network has also been requested. Therefore, the new control platform introduces a dual network architecture. The complete isolation dual network feature provides absolute security for the government or enterprise.
3. The LCD panel provides convenience for discovering system information and configurations. For example: the IP address is essential important for a network device. The LCD panel can bring many benefits to the user's troubleshooting and the following maintenance.

translations.name: 2K QHD無線網路攝影機
translations.description:
DCS-8350LH是一台室內無線雙頻網路攝影機，可以由iOS及Android下載mydlink APP，透過遠端監控，出門在外可以隨時留意居家附近的任何突發狀況。DCS-8350LH為四倍的高解析度攝影機，並內建7米夜視距離在夜間自動啟用紅外線照明，達到24小時不間斷監控，為使用者守護居家安全。DCS-8350LH內建人體/移動偵測，如在畫面中偵測到不明移動物體，會立刻發送手機告警通知，讓使用者即時透過APP連線查看，是否有可疑事件發生，也可以調閱microSD記憶卡中錄影錄音的記錄，確保安全無虞。

+ 最高解析度是2560x1440, H.265壓縮技術
+ 內建802.11n/ac無線雙頻網路與支援WPA3無線網路加密協定
+ 內建microSD卡介面可進行本機事件影像錄影儲存
+ 支援人體/移動偵測機制可觸發告警錄影及透過APP通知
+ 提供mydlink遠端觀看平台服務輕鬆觀看攝影機即時影像
+ 雙向語音, 內建麥克風及喇叭
+ 邊緣運算技術智慧影像分析-人體偵測, 一氧化碳/煙霧警示聲音偵測
+ 支援Google assistant and Amazon Alexa 語音

translations.name: 2K QHD Indoor Wi-Fi Camera
translations.description: D-Link’s DCS-8350LH is an indoor dual band wireless network camera that can be remotely managed by the free mydlink app. Users are provided with peace of mind as they can keep an eye on every corner of the home from wherever they are. The 2K QHD high-resolution camera features a built-in 7-meter infrared (IR) and switchable filter (ICR) to support day and night modes. It automatically activates infrared lighting at night and can monitor continuously for 24 hours to provide comprehensive home safety. The DCS-8350LH is equipped with human and motion detection. If an unknown moving object is detected, it will immediately send a mobile phone alert notification. Users can instantly check in the app to see if any suspicious events have occurred or replay recorded video recordings from the microSD memory card. The camera also supports H.265 compression technology for improved efficiency and the latest WPA3 security standard for enhanced network protection.

translations.name: AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 無線智慧管理系統
translations.description:
AX創新領航，為企業無線提速

EDIMAX PrimeAX 1-2-3專為中小企業創新研發，採用最新Wi-Fi 6 技術， 2.4GHz/5GHz雙頻運行，功能強大、傳輸穩定、覆蓋率高且室內穿透性強，以創新技術滿足企業無線網路需求。

獨創安全智慧響導，插電即配對
打破傳統網路的安裝困難，PrimeAX 1-2-3內建智慧響導功能，Plug-and-Play插電聯網就可以透過主機，找到訊號範圍內不限地點的從屬基地台，輕鬆完成安裝、配對、連線、上網等超複雜步驟，且具備WPA3高強度安全加密。

創新Ｗi-Fi 6，技術領先就是快。
內建802.11ax BSS Coloring訊號著色技術、DL/UL OFDMA、DL/UL MU-MIMO、TWT 等高新功能，大幅提高無線訊號吞吐量，並支援多台設備同時連線，無論視訊監控、遠端會議、高畫質媒體共享，PrimeAX 1-2-3符合SMB需求，並有降低功耗的環保節電效果。

高速無線連網，低調吸頂設計
全新設計友善介面，部署擴充零負擔。吸頂式天花板安裝設計，低調淺白隱匿於無形。滿足辦公室、校園、商業空間等場所的高速無線網路需求。

translations.description:
The EDIMAX PrimeAX 1-2-3 is newly developed to cater to businesses who seek hassle-free installation and powerful performance to match. 

The PrimeAX 1-2-3 hosts a robust set of features with the aid of the latest AX Wi-Fi 6 technology, users can expect speeds up to 1800Mbps (574Mbps at 2.4GHz and 1201Mbps at 5GHz), BSS coloring, DL/UL OFDMA, DL/UL MU-MIMO, TWT provides improvements in throughput, multi-device support, and Wi-Fi spectrum efficiency for high demands such as streaming, gaming, and media sharing.

The PrimeAX 1-2-3 2-pack kit comes equipped with an additional pre-configured Slave AX1800 AP that achieves seamless Wi-Fi coverage and eliminates Wi-Fi dead zones. Built-in smart wizard makes network setup and management efficient and friendly, users can easily configure admin username/password, choose different time zones, find paired devices via an exclusive Device Discovery Tool, including 2.4G/5G Wi-Fi SSID name/password configuration and up-to-date security (WPA/WPA2/WPA3)

translations.description:
360度全方位AI智能居家安全保鑣具備了看、聽、說、聞的4合1功能，創新整合包含360度AI智能影像分析攝影機「看」的功能、高感度低雜訊度收音和喇叭及AI智能聲音分析「聽」和「說」的功能，空氣品質偵測器「聞」的功能，適用於居家保全監控，安全無線連網，簡單快速安裝，AI時代立即啟動智慧生活超高規居家防護。

360度零死角魚眼鏡頭含Dewarping技術的全景攝影機，確保影像傳送在低流量高解析的最高效率，全天候維持最佳視訊品質，AI智能影像分析含跌倒、動態、人臉、物件(貓狗)偵測等；高感度低雜訊廣角收音，專業級喇叭傳聲清晰，雙向語音通話功能，即時親近溝通，AI智能聲音分析含嬰兒哭聲、警报聲、玻璃破碎聲、車輛噪音、警笛聲、異常聲音等辨別分析；支援AI智能影音自動追蹤功能；內建八款空氣品質偵測器，含一氣化碳瓦斯、二氣化碳、PM2.5、PM10懸浮微粒、TVOC揮發性有機物、甲醛、濕度和溫度等偵測，即時彩色OLED顯示空氣品質, 支援alexa連動其他智慧家庭聯網設備如空氣清淨機，改善空氣品質，AI智能辨別分析結合AI 技術深度學習領域的應用及演算法優化，過濾不必要的錯誤警報，推播警報更精準。

translations.name: 360 Degree All-in-one AI Smart Home Security Guard
translations.description: The 360-Degree All-in-one AI Smart Home Security Guard, WatchDog360, is an innovative device that includes seeing, listening, speaking and smelling functions. Integrated is a 360-degree AI imagery analysis camera that offers “no blind spot”, capable of capturing every moment with precision, in conjunction with high-sensitivity, low-noise radio and speaker makes this an all-round package. The seeing and listening functions passes through AI to produce logical actions and notify users with push App notifications. The EDIMAX AI deep learning and algorithm optimization technology makes the WatchDog360 smart enough to filter out unnecessary false alarms and more. A unique “smelling” feature uses 8 built-in air quality detectors to sniff out harmful air quality particles, the information are then displayed in an easy-to-read color OLED display on the unit, further Alexa support links other smart home IoT devices such as air purifiers for further air quality improvements.

translations.name: 4K視訊鏡頭
translations.description:
CAM130 配備4K 超廣角鏡頭及智能補光，Sony 4K 感光元件，即使與會者在高反差照明環境，能自動調整曝光、白平衡及補足光線，並提供 120 度 /90 度視野角度，呈現優異的影像表現。AI智能補光因應光線條件，智能感光照明，提供全範圍色溫的調節，不論身處小會議室或居家辦公，皆能擁有好氣色。

全新升級的SmartFrame智能對焦框圖技術，鏡頭穩定追蹤並對焦螢幕上或特定區域的與會者，讓會議流暢進行。自動框圖預設區域技術，能流暢追蹤及捕捉與會者的動向，即使與會者戴著口罩，也能精準對焦，節省時間且增進會議效率。

攝影機內建鏡頭蓋，輕鬆保護您的隱私，不需擔心網路駭客竊取影像資料，關上鏡頭蓋，保護個人資料不外洩。

為了守護與會者的健康與安全，CAM130 表面皆有加強版三層抗菌塗層，讓使用者能安心使用並降低感染風險，帶給您更清晰、明亮且安全防護的視訊溝通。

translations.name: 4K Conference Camera
translations.description:
The CAM130 is a 4K camera with Intelligent Lighting. The powerful lighting function offers full-range color temperature and automatic lighting-level adjustments, ensuring users look great in any light. It’s also equipped with high-performance imaging functions like auto exposure, white balance, backlight compensation, and dual-lens viewing angles (120°/90°).

But it’s not all about the lighting. Embedded auto and preset framing enhance meeting efficiency by following and capturing meeting participants. It even works when users wear masks. 

The CAM130 is super safe, too. A built-in lens cover protects users’ privacy from hackers and keep personal information secure. Also, three spray-coating layers blanket the camera with antibacterial protection, so users can operate it without worrying about risk of infection. 

All that innovation adds up to brighter and better conferences, helping the CAM130 make a strong case for being the best camera to use in huddle room and WFH scenarios.

translations.name: 4K 視訊會議系統
translations.description:
一體成形 VB130 視訊會議系統，可調整影像角度視野，可靈活適用於不同會議環境，無論在家工作或者是小型空間，都能確保與會者位於視訊會議中最佳位置，呈現超高清晰畫質影像。其擁有最新智能感光照明技術，擁有全範圍色溫(2700–5700 K)調節，能在昏暗視訊環境中*，自動偵測調節攝影機燈光，讓與會者在任何環境，都能呈現專業及好氣色！提供不只清晰，且更明亮的會議體驗。

VB130 全新升級噪音隔絕技術，能根據會議室需求，調節收音範圍，屏蔽會議視野以外的任何噪音，而聲音波束成型技術擁有5個收音麥克風，能精準收音每個發言者，再現共鳴音質，讓每個與會者皆能參與其中成為會議關鍵角色，幫助團隊能充分專注於會議討論，充分取得商業優勢及機會。

另，研發最新AI技術，觸發視野調整，能啟動聲音自動追蹤模式，能讓鏡頭自動追隨發言者，還有聲音預設追蹤區域模式，能鎖定追中區域中的人聲，進行會議視野轉換，可有效減少碰觸，達到高效且安全的視訊會議！

*最佳照明效果，須距離鏡頭1米以內。

translations.name: 4K Video Bar
translations.description:
The all-in-one VB130 is equipped with Intelligent Lighting that automatically adjusts lighting levels during virtual meetings in dim rooms. It also offers full-range color temperature (2700–5700 K) to fit any environment.

AVer’s noise-blocking technology provides an adjustable audio fence that silences any sound outside the viewing angle. A beamforming five-microphone array precisely picks up and reproduces resonant voices from anywhere in the room. This innovative audio control lets users maintain focus on the meeting at hand and take advantage of every business opportunity.

Finally, VB130 users enjoy less touching and increased efficiency with AI-triggered viewing-angle adjustment. The camera’s audio tracking function automatically focuses on the person speaking, and Audio Preset Tracking Mode identifies and follows the human voice to track based on preset areas. 

Stay efficient and safe. Activate a brighter and better video conferencing experience with the VB130.

translations.name: 智慧錄播站
translations.description:
1. AREC LS-US2智慧錄播站是輕量化、多功合一且平價的影音直錄播主機（AV-over-IP device），擁有高效能數位影音處理及網路串流技術。
2. 提供2路Full HD 1080p畫面和多路聲音同步擷取、融合、導播切換、錄影、線上直播、遠程管理和自動備份等全方位服務。
3. 新提供可支援Android系統的App軟體，可與教室電子白板快速整合，允許老師可直接透過電子白板進行錄影直播開始∕停止、版型切換等操控。
4. 可與常見雲端視訊會議系統相容，讓遠距教學、視訊會議錄影更加簡便。
5. 內建「課程管理平台」，方便遠端進行影片管理。
6. 內建「數位導播平台」，提供多種簡單易上手的導播操控，包括電腦網頁、電腦軟體、手機網頁、圖像化UI等。
7. 搭配「AREC中央控制管理平台」和全新「AREC雲平台」，所有校園內的數位影音教學、影音智聯錄播站都能整合成單一系統，讓管理者透過電腦就能進行遠端監看與中控操作，讓管理工作更加便利。

translations.name: Media Station
translations.description:
1. AREC LS-US2 Media Station is an AV-over-IP, compact, all-in-one, and cost-saving recording and streaming device, providing high quality AV processing and streaming technology.
2. Supports 2 Full HD 1080p video sources and audio sources capturing, mixing, switching, recording, live streaming, remote management and scheduling control.
3. With new touch control app that supports Android system, users can start/stop recording or streaming via integrated digital whiteboard easily.
4. Compatible with popular cloud video conferencing software, including Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, and Zoom, making conference recording easily.
5. Built-In "Video Manager" for remote management conveniently.
6. Built in “Online Director”, providing versatile control options and making video look professional.
7. With “AREC Station Manager" and all-new “ARECloud”, all AREC Media Stations in the campus can be integrated into 1 single system, allowing administrators to monitor and central control remotely.

translations.name: ELSA智慧電子標籤
translations.description:
ELSA智慧電子標籤是一套由台灣團隊研發的完整解決方案，含電子標籤、基站、雲端後台軟體。擁有同步更新內容、人力節省、節能環保等優勢，可取代紙張價格標籤。在無線低功耗長距離通訊傳輸及電子紙顯示技術的基礎上，能正確呈現即時資訊，可廣泛應用於智慧零售、物流倉儲及工廠自動化等領域。具備以下特色：

節能環保 
•節省頻繁更換紙標籤的人力與資源耗損
•藉由創新開發的超低功耗無線通訊技術PLATANUS，一組標準電池可使用7年至10年

智慧高效
•獨家採用Sub-1GHz技術，避免受BT、Wi-Fi等常見訊號干擾
•標籤可配合環境智慧調整連線品質，達最佳接收狀態，大幅降低安裝與維護成本
•工業等級99.99%的傳輸可靠度、3萬平方公尺的涵蓋範圍、小於60秒的更新速度
•可與後台ERP、POS、WMS協同工作，整合變價、庫存管理、產品訊息等作業，方便高效

簡單易用
•具備不同螢幕尺寸及功能設計的電子標籤，切合各種使用需求
•業內最小的基站，支援5VDC和PoE雙電源，便於架設維護
•直覺式操作軟體界面，具雲端監控機能，容易上手與管理

translations.name: 工業級5G NR IoT閘道器系列
translations.description:
普萊德科技工業級5G NR IoT閘道器系列專為工業環境5G網路通訊及強化5G網路安全傳輸而設計，首創整合5G NR、Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax)超高速傳輸、Dual SIM連網備援、Dual WAN負載平衡以及PoE管理功能，降低網路通訊延遲並提升資訊傳輸效率，提供工業級高規格VPN加密搭配使用者驗證服務，嚴密保護網路資訊安全，內建高效友善雲端化管理，即時遠端監控網路設備運作，提升智慧交通、電信行動網路、工業自動化5G網路佈署彈性和節能效益。
- 支援5G NR NSA和SA組網類型
- 雙頻 Wi-Fi 6、1800Mbps 超高速傳輸 (ICG-2515W-NR、ICG-2515PW-NR)
- Dual WAN負載平衡頻寬管理
- Captive Portal及RADIUS伺服器，使用者驗證服務
- 工業級標準VPN協定、SPI防火牆及IPS入侵防禦
- IP30防護機殼，耐攝氏-40至75度工作環境
- 遠端安全管理，加密封包內容SNMPv3 
- 智慧PoE管理 (ICG-2515PW-NR) 
- 支援普萊德中央網管平台及CloudViewer網路雲端管理App

translations.name: Industrial 5G NR IoT Gateway Series
translations.description:
PLANET Industrial 5G NR IoT Gateway Series is designed for 5G transmission in the harsh environment and to enhance the information security of 5G network. It is the first Industrial IoT Gateway that integrates 5G NR, Wi-Fi 6, Dual SIM, Dual WAN and PLANET PoE management functions. The central management function via cloud enables IT staffs to remotely monitor the network operation status in real time, all to realize high-efficiency and energy-saving 5G network deployments for ITS, telecommunication and industrial automation.
-Supports 5G NR NSA and SA deployments.
-Dual Band Wi-Fi 6 high-speed data rate of 1800Mbps (ICG-2515W-NR, ICG-2515PW-NR)
-Dual WAN and Dual SIM for uninterrupted 5G networking
-Captive portal with RADIUS authentication
-Industrial-grade VPN protection, SPI firewall and IPS
-IP30 metal case, -40 to 75 degrees C operating temperature
-Remote security management with SNMPv3 
-PoE management functions (ICG-2515PW-NR)
-Supports PLANET NMS Solution &  CloudViewer App.

translations.name: 耐候型 OLED 顯示器
translations.description:
「 耐候性OLED顯示器-WEO012864」採用自行研發且具專利技術之fin設計，該fin多變化設計與材料特質，具有超強阻擋外部水氣的侵入效果，達到優良的耐候特性，延長產品壽命，提高了該產品市場競爭力與市占率。耐候型OLED具有傑出的顯示效果、高對比度、高視角、快速響應時間、超輕薄、5萬小時以上的長壽命等優勢，擁有獨特產品競爭力。面板外型設計具備產品美學設計，可創造出驚豔的顯示效果，對於講究空間利用率的工業性或消費性產品是絕佳的解決方案，已銷售全球數40多個國家，可應用於可攜裝置、穿戴裝置、智能家電、商務電子和工控設備等產品。
「 耐候性OLED顯示器」的製程以友善綠色為生產方針，有計劃的降低汙水、廢氣及廢棄物生成量，進而降低成本；且產品製程重視環保與節能減碳，盡可能使用無毒無汙染的原物料，符合RoHS與REACH:SVHC高關注物質限用標章，實現華凌光電以科技貢獻人類、重視環境保護的企業使命，達到永續經營理念。

translations.name: Moisture Control OLED
translations.description:
Winstar Moisture Control OLED is a powerful product which is adopted our patent pending fin technology that can block the penetration of external water vapor to achieve excellent weather resistance and extend product lifetime.  Moisture Control OLED has significant superiority over other displays:
	Self-emitting, no need backlight
	Faster response time：10 μ sec.
	Wider viewing angle：Up to 160 degree
	Module Structure: Chip on Glass
	High contrast ratio：Up to 2000:1
	Wide temperature range：-40 ℃ ~ +85 ℃
	Low power consumption：< 200 mw
	Fin technology extend product lifetime.
Moisture Control OLED is 100% made in Taiwan through fully automatic production line and quality control facilities. Weather-resistant OLED is designed to fit for medical devices, wearable devices, IoT system, etc. 
Due to the above advantages, Winstar “Moisture Control OLED- WEO12864 series” is the best choice for industry and consumer applications.

translations.name: ArmorFlash™安全快閃記憶體
translations.description:
旺宏電子ArmorFlash™安全快閃記憶體為因應萬物聯網時代所衍生的資安問題提出最佳解方，獨創 PUF Code技術巳獲得多國專利。
ArmorFlash™結合傳統Serial NOR Flash與安全晶片於單一晶片，獨創全球晶片指紋技術(PUF Code)，具有無法複製的獨特性，每一晶片PUF Code均不相同，即使單一晶片遭破解侵入也不會擴及其他晶片，確保整體系統安全性，提供使用者認證、資料加解密及可組態的安全區域等多元功能。
ArmorFlash™特色包括：
1.提供標準序列介面傳輸，加上更高容量加解密安全記憶體，方便使用者快速開發。
2.具有亂數產生器與計數器(Non-volatile Monotonic Counter)以產生不同憑證，以時序概念防止資料於匯流排(Bus)傳輸過程中遭攔截或竄改。
3.防止重放攻擊、物理性的探測、竄改及破壞，如盔申般(Armor)保護資安。
4.符合資安防護亟需之機密性、完整性與可用性三大目標。
ArmorFlash™ 加解密演算法已通過美國NIST CAVP 驗證，更獲全球自駕車平台領導廠商NVIDIA採用，將用於L2+~L5的自動駕駛中。

ArmorFlash™結合傳統Serial NOR Flash...

translations.name: ArmorFlash™ Secure Flash Memory
translations.description:
ArmorFlash™ provides the best solution for the serious data security issues of Internet for Everything. Our unique PUF Code technology has obtained many global patents. 
ArmorFlash™ combines the standard Serial Flash and the security features into a single chip with a chip fingerprint (PUF Code), and therefore can ensure the security of the overall system. It also provides functions of authentication, data encryption/decryption, and configurable secure zones. 
It provides standard serial peripheral interface, plus a secure encryption-decryption memory of high density. ArmorFlash™ prevents the data from being tampered during the transmission in the bus as well as replay attacks, physical probing, tampering and content destruction. It solves the issues of data security: confidentiality, integrity and availability.
The ArmorFlash™ algorithms have been validated by NIST CAVP. It has been adopted by NVIDIA for its autonomous driving systems from L2+ to L5.

translations.name: Kaleido Plus彩色印刷電子紙顯示器
translations.description:
E Ink Kaleido Plus電子紙顯示器針對需要快速換頁的電子書閱讀器及手寫筆記本市場所開發，提供優異的彩色讀寫介面。
利用彩色印刷電子紙技術(Print Color Technology)，將彩色油墨(彩色濾光片)噴印在黑白電子墨水層上，以RGB混色原理，達成4096色的柔和溫潤色彩。
特色
1.色調溫和、類似印刷紙張質感
2.翻頁速度快，適合閱讀科普、商管、漫畫、繪本等擁有彩色內容的書籍，擴大電子書適用範疇，不再被黑白侷限
3.導入手寫功能，可製成彩色電子紙手寫筆記本，提供彩色筆記、螢光筆劃線等功能，適合教育應用、研究學習使用，擴大應用市場
4.提升色彩表現：開發圖像建構技術(Rendering)、導光板(Light Guide)調整，提升色彩表現和精細度
5.提升文字解析度：透過印刷設計協定(Protocol)，純文字能擁有與黑白電子紙同樣的解析度
6.濾除藍光：透過印刷色阻技術濾除2/3的藍光，大幅提升護眼效益、並降低功耗
7.擁有電子紙原生特性：類似紙張的視覺體驗、省電、反射式技術在陽光下清晰可視
8.減少環境污染、開發速度快：噴印製程可減少塗佈與黃光製程消耗的資源

translations.name: Kaleido Plus Print Color ePaper Display
translations.description:
E Ink Kaleido Plus is developed for eReader and eNote market for faster, smoother response time needed. Color is printed on B/W E Ink film with E Ink Print Color Technology, soft-and-tender 4096-color is achieved by RGB-mixing algorithms.
1.Soft-and-tender color, printed paper quality
2.Fast page-turn for image-rich eBook content, such as illustrated books, magazines and comics.
3.Pen writing function added for education, and professional and work use.
4.Color and image quality are optimized through printed color filter design, image and color rendering algorithms, and brand new front light design.
5.Crisper text achieved by printing protocol, and providing the same text resolution as shown on B/W ePaper.
6.2/3 of blue light is being filtered by the chromatic photoresist, easy-on-the-eyes.
7.Paper-like viewing experience, low power consumption, sunlight readable.
8.Fast product development achieved without resource draining conventional glass color filter mask design and manufacturing.

translations.model_number: K8F / K5F系列 電力型保險絲
translations.name: 螺栓式半導體管狀保險絲
translations.description:
憑藉K8F 118x35mm / K5F 112x50mm，功得電子推出了一種高性能保險絲，適用於高達800 VAC/DC的特別高電壓和高達700 A的電流，特別適合要求苛刻的汽車應用，K8F / K5F產品品質競爭優勢分述如下：
1.焊接更可靠 
每個保險絲的弱點是熔絲和接觸帽之間的連接，通常將其設計為焊點，但是，在保險絲生產過程中，該技術並非總是100％無差錯，通過阻抗焊接進行接觸更加可靠，CONQUER使用一種新的專利工藝，可以確保最高的可靠性。
2.陶瓷材質選用
本產品整體材質為均質化的陶瓷，具有良好的物理結構特性，耐衝擊性及防爆能力較好。
3.國際安全規範認證
K8F / K5F電力型保險絲通過國際級UL安全規範認證，製程符合歐盟RoHS危害性物質限制指令標準，且產品及生產過程中皆不含鉛及鹵素。
4.國際品質驗證系統
功得電子致力發展保險絲技術及環境友善的生產技術，陸續取得IATF16949、ISO9001、ISO14001、ISO14064、ISO50001及SONY Green Partner等國際環境管理及生產評估等相關驗證，提升客戶之滿意度及信任。

translations.name: North American Bolted Style Semiconductor Fuse
translations.description:
The followings are the competitive advantages of K8F/K5F power fuses:
1.Welding is more reliable 
A weak point of every fuse is the connection between the melting wire and the contact cap. This is usually designed as a solder joint. Contact by means of welding is way more reliable. CONQUER uses a new, patented process which guarantees highest reliability.
2. Material: ceramic
K8F / K5F power fuses are made from homogeneous ceramic materials which have good physics structural properties and provide high shock resistance and explosion prevention.
3. International safety certification
K8F / K5F power fuses are approved with international UL safety regulation and EU RoHS standards. The manufacturing processes of K8F / K5F power fuses are lead free and halogen free.
4. International quality approval system
We have approved with international quality approval system as IATF16949, ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO14064, ISO50001.

translations.name: DBMaker
translations.description:
「DBMaker 5.4.4關聯式資料庫系統」是國人少數能自行研發的關聯式資料庫系統，多年來致力於創新研發，產品功能及品質足以媲美國際大廠；從資料庫基本功能到多語言全文檢索、優異的多媒體支援能力、獨特的COBOL開發解決方案及雲端開放式資料連結介面Cloud ODBC。面對大數據趨勢來臨，提供彈性動態欄位、自動索引、過濾索引、外掛式索引引擎，以處理多變性資料型態。因應容器技術來臨，提供了容器化 DBMaker Docker image，支援微服務架構，亦可運用於容器的平台如K8S中。在網頁框架的風行下，DBMaker支援PHP Laravel、Python Django框架，能更有效率開發網站及存取資料庫。有別於競爭對手的 bundle 形式，可無痕地篏入ISV系統，且通過SEI CMMI ML3認證，是台灣IT業界的榮耀。
由於DBMaker優異的產品特性，在日、中、泰、越、美、巴西、義大利等地都有廣大用戶，橫跨金融、製造、通訊、物流、零售、交通能源、農業、公共事業及媒體各領域。在日本已超過50萬使用者、1,200家以上企業使用；巴西與義大利夥伴合作舉辦大型研討會推廣，獲得廣大肯定。

translations.name: DBMaker
translations.description: Syscom DBMaker 5.4.4, the relational database developed in Taiwan. Product features and quality equal to its international competitors. DBMaker has RDBMS access functions, multi-language full-text search, multimedia support, unique COBOL solutions, Cloud ODBC, big data features like flexible dynamic columns, automatic indexing, filter index, and an external indexing engine. DBMaker also provides containerized DBMaker Docker image to support micro-service architecture via virtualization technology. DBMaker supports PHP Laravel and Python Django web frameworks for efficient website development and databases access. Different from our competitors, DBMaker integrates seamlessly with ISV systems. We passed SEI CMMI ML3 certification. With constantly updated features, DBMaker remains a popular solution in Japan, China, USA, Brazil, Italy, and more. DBMaker is used in many industries, including: finance, manufacturing, and communications. For over 26 years, customers worldwide trust DBMaker.

translations.name: NETCenter
translations.description:
凌群電腦憑藉40餘年的系統整合經驗與根據客戶服務經驗，發展出數位轉型最佳解決方案[NETCenter網路監控中心]，以縱向來看，兼具跨領域之解決方案；以橫向來看，具備跨品牌整合的能力。
本系統提供創新獨特的功能模組：監控告警、Log紀錄管理、資產管理、直覺式儀表板、多廠牌備份、進階流量分析、可視化拓樸、指令供裝派送與無線網路監控。可依照設備屬性，利用不同的協定進行監控，協助 IT 管理者全面掌握 IT 基礎設備的狀態與資訊，並強化日常維運工作的效率，獨家的Dashboard設計讓管理者及相關人員可以一目瞭然且迅速上手。　
NETCenter以統一介面、分權管理的方式有效降低管理人力負擔，提供報表分析迅速掌握管理的資產相關情報。跨單位監控服務時，本系統可整合不同版本、品牌之設備，各單位可自行管理各單位監控之設備，而總監控中心可管控所有設備，如有異常狀態，可透過E-mail或LINE即時告警，並利用拓樸圖掌握設備實體架構，透過備份功能線上比對檔案，線上即時故障排除，使網路營運快速恢復服務，簡而言之，NETCenter是全方位的IT監控解決方案。

translations.name: NETCenter
translations.description:
“NETCenter IT Infrastructure Management,” developed by SYSCOM COMPUTER ENGINEERING Co., is based on our 40 years of system integration experience and our customers’ networking experience. It provides cross-unit monitoring services, which means it can integrate different versions and brands of equipment.
NETCenter has creative functional modules: Alerts, Multi-brand Backup, Log Record, Asset Management, Dashboard, Network Entity Topology, Advanced Flow(NetFlow) Analysis Management, Script Provision and Wireless Monitoring. When abnormal situation occurs, NETCenter will showing alert on Dashboard, sending real-time alert via E-mail or LINE, present topology map which locating the physical structure of the device. These functions can effectively reduce the burden of IT personnel. What’s more, it has backup files for IT personnel to compare and do online troubleshooting. These functions helped shorten the time span of restoring malfunction equipment.

translations.name: Face8台灣臉霸
translations.description:
Face8台灣臉霸是台灣本土人臉辨識引擎，由研勤科技完全自主研發，可隨時提供企業整廠輸出服務，將平台建置在機關或企業內部私有網域架構上，供企業內部封閉使用，防止資訊外洩、提升資安規格，技術及資訊安全完全無慮。有高度辨識準確度，根據NIST 2020年2月26日公告之一對多(1:N)人臉辨識引擎測試報告，在1200萬人臉資料庫之辨識準確度，排名為全台灣第一。可應用於人臉辨識考勤打卡、門禁管理、報到系統、熟客系統、人流系統。並提供API接口及辨識引擎實測展示平台供各軟體開發業者理解及使用。目前已是台灣地區落地量最大的人臉引擎，超過八千家客戶採用，每天五十萬次以上辨識量。

強化亮點：
研發戴口罩人臉辨識核心技術，在防疫期間使用者通常是戴著口罩進行人臉辨識，可避免非必要之接觸，降低疫情傳播機會，Face8台灣臉霸以AI深度學習及強化學習技術強化戴口罩時人臉辨識引擎(增強眼精、鼻子等露出特徵)，目標是增強30%以上的戴口罩情境的辨識能力。可協助企業將考勤打卡系統、門禁管理系統、閘門系統、電子看板大數據人流系統整合口罩人臉辨識核心技術，高效率一站式管理。

translations.name: 對話服務平台
translations.description:
提供「企業級」的「對話式」IT服務機制，以最完整、快捷的建置/管理介面，協助企業以最經濟的方式搭建出比行動化更高效的IT服務。不需撰寫程式，利用Web介面進行Chatbot互動步驟及互動內容之設計，因此非IT人員也能輕鬆設計優於業界的Chatbot流程及卡片式對話。另外，可介接企業既有系統API，提供用戶透過「聊天室」就能直覺存取各式企業後台資料的高效作業體驗，協助企業在流程效率得到提升。產品特性：
(1)腳本「拖拉」：免寫客製程式就能設計最豐富互動元素，在聊天室中呈現申請表單、一覽表、明細表等資訊格式，創造員工免學習、節省IT操作的「一鍵化」IT存取體驗
(2)後台介接：供IT人員快速進行整合API之介接設定。無API情況下亦能「模擬API」介接結果

(4)快捷NLU訓練：非IT人員亦能維護NLU訓練素材，使用戶透過自然語言發號施令或做QA詢問
(4)多機器人架構：支援多機器人上線，不限介接之自然語言模型、服務腳本數。管理聊天機器人的完整生命週期，且支援多人分工管理

translations.name: FaceMe Security
translations.description:
訊連科技開發之FaceMe® Security為一款專為智慧安控設計的人臉辨識解決方案。以下為三大產品特色：
1.　非接觸式的企業門禁打卡系統：訊連科技因應防疫需求，全球首創結合人臉辨識、口罩辨識和體溫量測之一站式整合門禁方案。搭配熱感攝影機並結合企業打卡系統，提供企業非接觸的門禁打卡系統。在場所入口處辨識訪客身分，自動進行體溫量測和打卡紀錄，大幅降低門禁的勞動力成本與接觸感染風險。
2.　口罩辨識與體溫量測等防疫功能：因應疫情防疫管理需求，訊連科技將人臉辨識加上口罩辨識和體溫量測功能，可偵測及判別人員是否配戴口罩，或口鼻露出、使用其他物品遮住口鼻等非正確配戴狀況，準確率達98%以上。並可結合熱感應攝影機，能量測訪客體溫。
3.　支援主流影像管理系統 串接即時通訊警示：FaceMe® Security可支援Milestone XProtect、Network Optix Nx Witness 與 VIVOTEK VAST2 等各大主流影像管理系統(VMS)。系統辨識出VIP、黑名單，或未遵守防疫規定之人員進入特定區域時，即時發送訊息到影像管理系統，通知相關人員進行應對。

translations.name: FaceMe Security
translations.description:
FaceMe® Security is a one-stopped solution enabling facial recognition for smart surveillance. Here are the key features : 
1.	Contactless solution for access control: FaceMe Security detects individuals within a crowd and can identify them by matching the live capture with profiles in a database, providing quick and contactless access control and health screenings. 
2.	Mask Detection & Temperature Measurement : Even when someone is wearing a mask, FaceMe® Security provides an authentication accuracy rate of up to 98%. It also displays their body temperature, detects anyone not wearing a mask properly.
3.	Integrate Mainstream VMS & Instant Messenger : FaceMe® Security supports mainstream VMS (video management systems), including Milestone, Network Optix Nx Witness and VIVOTEK VAST2. The integration gives FaceMe® Security the ability to trigger real-time notifications to security personnel when events such as the arrival of VIPs, people of interest, and employees.

translations.name: 威力導演 365 Mac版
translations.description:
威力導演365 macOS版為全方位影片剪輯軟體，具備一系列專業影片剪輯工具與強大效能，結合簡易上手的操作介面，提供豐富的剪輯工具，如專業級關鍵畫格、色度去背功能，以及遮罩、色調調節與文字設計師，無論是入門初學者或專業工作者，macOS用戶皆能活用一系列專業級編輯工具，輕鬆快速將任何素材打造為高質感的影音作品。

	關鍵畫格
於任何一個時間點上添加特效，輕鬆控制影片屬性，打造媲美好萊塢等級之影音大作。
此外，威力導演365 macOS版每月皆新增素材與套件，包含動態標題、轉場特效、調色範本及背景音樂等。另也針對社群影音需求，提供豐富的部落格與社群媒體專屬包、漏光效果套件包、都會風格LUT調色範本等，讓使用者影音創作更上一層樓！

translations.description:
PowerDirector app is the best full-featured video editor, which won the Google Play “Editors’ Choice” award in 2018, previously received the “Best App of the Year” award from Google Play in 2016 and 2017. In 2020, PowerDirector app also won the Taiwan Excellence Silver Award.

New Feature:
1. NEW Transitions and Overlays – Monthly release multiple effect with dynamic carousel transitions and stylish overlays.
2. NEW Titles – Excite, entertain and sparkle with brand new customizable title effects. Also, preview premium effects before you buy to find the perfect match for your videos. 
3. Add stock images from Getty Images. What's more, powered by Shutterstock®, users also can access to a professional stock library of more than 2M videos and images and 10K music tracks!

With a large selection of powerful editing tools that are updated monthly and a simple, intuitive app interface, users will find themselves creating slow-motion videos, slideshows, and even video collages in no time.

translations.description: 玩美彩妝為一款由專業虛擬試妝和自拍修圖App，以玩美移動獨家開發之AI（人工智慧）科技精準偵測使用者臉部輪廓，及AR（虛擬實境）技術提供數百種極為擬真的AR妝容、彩妝、美瞳、3D眼鏡、配件等系列，以及數十種AI髮色包含單色、雙色、漸層或渲染，瞬秒變換超逼真妝容和多變髮色，並有多種彩妝品牌上架虛擬彩妝商品，即試即買，為用戶提供最好的虛擬試妝體驗！廣受喜愛的肌膚檢測功能，透過先進的AI和AR技術在幾秒鐘內掃描和分析您的膚質健康狀況，還能獲得護膚技巧和推薦的保養品。全新開發自動偵測辨識背景功能，虛擬套裝同時提供令人驚豔的動態特效和背景，能在短短幾秒內更換喜歡的背景，快速升級自拍照；以玩美移動專利Agile® 臉部輪廓追蹤技術打造的強大實時美顏及牙齒美白功能，一鍵微調五官輪廓、移除泛紅、黑眼圈、打造紅潤平滑肌膚。App內建「玩美圈」社群平台由官方每週發布潮流新訊外，於部分國家地區開放線上AR直播，多位精選美妝直播主定期於玩美圈平台與使用者互動；使用者亦可隨時上傳、分享自拍及動態後，與好友們共享最新訊息。

translations.description: MAKAR讓使用者透過拖拉介面設定就可以自行操作建立AR/VR內容，無需再委託專業廠商，透過MAKAR平台可以進行創作分享，加速AR/VR普及化。以下為本產品MAKAR的4大獨特性：1.) 快速開發《開發迅速，十分鐘快速體驗》，簡易的編輯與操作方式，讓您在90分鐘內就快速製作出AR/VR內容，編輯器內容即時更改，移動顯示端裝置便即時更新，讓您發揮創意不受限。 2). 低成本《免費開發，隨需購買》，免費提供多樣性的功能體驗，再讓您依照需求進行購買。用最低成本讓您創建ARVR。 3.) 好上手《學習曲線短，適用任何年齡層》，不管您是學生、社會人士都可以快速學習製作與開發，多元化的教學影片與資源，讓您學習無煩惱、更能和創客們一同激發創意。4). 通用於各個產業《任何產業都可以快速跟擴增實境做連接》，快速與產業進行鏈接，並利用AR/VR進行各種廣告行銷活動，趣味又直覺的互動內容，讓您的產業比別人更容易被看見。

translations.name: MiAIOT人工智慧決策平台
translations.description:
本產品研發策略是為建立台灣在人工智慧物聯網的國際市場之輸出能力。產品價值最主要是整合前瞻AIOT技術，讓MiAIOT平台可以開發出各式應用。等於直接將現有各式舊有系統AI化，使之具備預測、提前告警和挖掘系統隱性知識的能力，進而當作決策輔助，本產品的創新特色:
1. 內建國際物聯網標準，讓匯入的資料格式標準化可立即AI運算，讓新建立的應用使用，每次投資都不會浪費，國際輸出時也可與各國系統無縫接軌(如歐盟、北美與新加坡)。
2. 採取無程式碼或少程式碼(No Code和Low code)，讓客戶不需要專業AI技術人員和學習繁瑣程式，透過類PowerPoint圖形使用者介面，直觀的拖拉功能元件完成AI分析。
3. 提供積木式AI模組串接功能，MiAIOT具有影像辨識和時間序列兩種AI引擎，內建13種以上AI應用模型，可交互運用於未來之新創開發。
4. MiAIOT平台內建台北市200多項開放資料集，數據皆符合OGC國際標準。運用平台可以享受到標準化資料的好處，提供AI關聯運算與決策。
5. 產品除提供高效運算能力，也內建與節能、綠能和低碳應用整合的元件，例如聯合國CSR永續指標之運算範本。
