translations.name: Ju Qing
translations.description:
Ju Qing - a kettle made of cast iron specially for Chinese tea. T In addition, a University of Medicine was invited to conduct experiments on the kettles and research confirmed that the water from Taku Ironware’s cast iron kettles can maintain good bacteria in the intestines, enhance the heart’s antioxidant capacity, and delay the aging of human organs.
The Ju Qing’s design was co-developed with professional tea masters to meet the professional and nitpicky standards of tea connoisseurs.
Features: 1. The unique and embracing handle to guide drinkers unconsciously hold the handle correctly. 2. The throat of the spout is long enough to allow smooth and natural flow control of the water column. 3. The tea can be cut off neatly and collected elegantly. 4. Plug and latch mechanism: even if the kettle is tilted vigorously, the lid won’t fall off the kettle to prevent injury and protect precious tea ware from being damaged due to the lid falling off.

translations.name: 檯上智慧型三段式生飲淨水器
translations.description: CTME-301檯上智慧型三段式生飲淨水器簡約外型設計能搭配小廚房設計，外蓋省時省力的卡榫設計，只要輕輕拿起打開即可更換安裝，濾心快拆式結構，具有安裝3分鐘，6秒換濾芯的便利性，能讓消費者自行DIY更換濾芯。新穎的外觀設計可與多數的現代廚房裝潢相匹配。LED智慧型燈號可智能提醒設定，只要單一按鍵操作，定期提醒濾心壽命到期日。使用介面兼具美觀與人體工學，不僅降低客戶因為維護複雜而導致漏水的風險產生，更具備了人性化之特性。使用複合式中空絲膜，孔徑達0.15微米以下過濾技術，有效攔截水中細菌，通水比表面積大，遠比市面檯上淨水器納汙量大上好幾倍，搭配PP纖維濾心能阻擋水中砂石，活性碳濾材能快速去除水中餘氯、農藥、異味等有害物質。擁有多層過濾機制設計，能濾除更多有害物質，過濾效果優於市面上其他產品。直覺式燈號與警示聲提醒，具備貼心的智能設計可提醒消費者更換濾心，避免喝到不健康的飲用水。所有通水零件皆使用無毒食品級材質，在環保考量上，大多使用環保材質(如塑膠材質PP可以100%回收再利用)，為了確保整個品質要求標準，產品通過耐久壽命與強度等品質測試，除了保障品質外，也為地球環境多盡一份心力。

translations.name: Water Filter
translations.description:
The CTME-301 water purifier has a simple design and quick-change cartridge. The installation is very simple and quick. LED smart lights and warning sounds can remind users to replace the filter regularly. The user interface is both beautiful and ergonomic, which not only reduces the risk of water leakage due to complex maintenance but also has humane characteristics.
The hollow fiber membrane with a pore size of fewer than 0.15 microns can effectively intercept bacteria in the water. The PP filter can block sand and gravel in the water, and the activated carbon filter can remove harmful substances such as chlorine, pesticides, and peculiar smells in the water. All water-passing parts are made of non-toxic food-grade materials. In terms of environmental protection, most of them use environmentally friendly materials (such as plastic material PP can be 100% recycled). The product has passed quality tests such as durability and strength and has also contributed to the global environment.

translations.name: 渦輪變頻除油煙機
translations.description:
DR3882BSL渦輪變頻系統比以往傳統斜背吸力增加5%，能夠有效的快速補抓油煙、且一體式中架板無縫隙可輕鬆地擦拭油煙機。
◎渦輪變頻系統，最強Ｔurbo吸力與低噪音，效力強更安靜，節能又省電。
◎靜音除味設計，排除廚房餘味，常保居家空氣清新
◎『油網+熱熔解』除油，油機壽命更持久
◎時尚流線造型與日系白色家電風格；搭配雙層線條設計，擺脫傳統油煙機呆板厚重感，櫥櫃搭配更靈活。
◎圓弧中架板，不卡油好擦拭；304不鏽鋼，質感佳耐腐蝕。
◎高亮度LED燈泡照明，節能又省電

translations.description:
Equipped with an easy-to-clean integrated middle plate rack, the DR3882BSL Turbo VFD Range Hood can effectively and rapidly capture smoke with a 5% increase in suction power comparing with conventional diagonal design.
◎The turbo system designed with a VFD controller features the powerful suction power and low noise, making the cooking exhaust process efficient, quiet and energy-saving.
◎The quiet smoke suction design can eliminate bad smell from kitchen, providing ◎The filter net plus fusion heat design can remove oil and extend the service life of range hood.

translations.name: 環吸系列除油煙機
translations.description:
R3751XL環吸設計可擴大攏煙範圍並提升進煙速度，搭配二合一導流板結構能有效的快速拆卸油網讓消費者能更便利的清潔及換網。
1、環吸設計，前後左右四面進氣，擴大攏煙範圍提升18%，利用側邊進煙特性，進煙速度提升23%。
2、創新二合一導流板，將導流板結合油杯。油垢滴落至導流板後，再匯集至集油槽，只需拆卸導流板，即可一次清潔，方便省時。
3、導流板採磁吸式＋掛勾設計，結構簡單秒拆卸，不需要拆卸螺絲，清潔不再擔心油垢沾手，輕鬆拆卸，省時省力。

translations.description:
The ring suction design of R3751XL can increase the smoke capture area and enhance the efficiency thereof. Together with the two-in-one deflection, users can efficiently and rapidly remove the filter net for cleaning or replacement.
1.The ring suction design allows all-round powerful suction while increasing the smoke capture area by 18% and speeding up the smoke removal process by 23%.
2.The flat filter plus the innovative two-in-one deflector can facilitate the replacement and cleaning of filter net.
3.With the magnetic deflector and filter designed with a slide-switch, the filter net removal process is easy and time- and effort-saving.

translations.name: 智能雙炫火瓦斯爐
translations.description: 智能雙炫火瓦斯爐透過專利雙炫火的高效性能，大幅提升火焰包覆性與加熱均勻性，達到國家一級節能。亦更著重於料理便利性，搭配內建三大智能料理功能，定時、定溫、自動煲湯讓各種菜餚更上手，料理不失敗又提升烹飪樂趣；智能功能設定採觸控介面，搭配簡易且直覺式流程，方便又快速地完成設定；具備主動式安全監控，透過智能控火，讓鍋子離開爐火時自動轉小火，放回即恢復火力，並設計防乾燒及過溫保護的安全裝置，兼顧安全便利及節能。

translations.name: stove
translations.description: With our patented double flare technology, the Smart Double-Flare Burner Hob has largely minimized the space between flares and enhanced the heating uniformity to reach national Grade 1 energy efficiency. To optimize cooking convenience, it is designed with 3 smart cooking functions – timing, constant temperature and automatic soup cooking function – to facilitate the cooking process, avoid cooking failure and increase the fun of cooking. Its touch panel control and simple intuitive process allow users to set the said functions conveniently and rapidly. The hob is also designed with an automatic smart safety monitoring system: when the cooking appliance leaves the burner, the burner will automatically switch to low fire; when the cooking appliance returns to the burner, the burner will go back to the original position. Besides, the anti-dry burning and over temperature protection device can guarantee users’ safety and convenience and minimize energy consumption.

translations.name: 21型LED照明變頻暖房乾燥機
translations.description:
本參賽產品經由團隊不斷努力研究，除了延續前一年度獲獎產品，突破傳統型浴室乾燥機安裝方式之外，也延續業界最小21cm×21cm安裝尺寸、最輕量機型，研發出新一代杰利安「21型LED照明變頻暖房乾燥機」：

1. 主機全新採用DC變頻馬達：不同於以往使用的電容馬達，全新一代DC變頻馬達耗電量有效減少50%，產品更省電更耐用。
2. 創新AUTO模式：自動偵測環境溫度調整運轉模式，能更有效的節省能源。
3. HMP濾網：使用PP聚丙烯環保材質，耐強酸、強鹼，能高效抑菌，快速過濾空氣髒汙、塵蟎花粉，降低過敏原。濾網結合面板設計，由乾燥機側邊直接抽取，可以水洗重複使用，清潔便利、大幅減少更換成本。
4. 輕量化設備：機殼材質採用防火ABS，搭配DC變頻馬達，馬達重量減少60%，達到整體輕量化。
5. LED照明功能：主機面板直接結合LED燈設計，簡潔美觀且不須額外施工即可有效改善舊宅衛浴空間照明亮度不足的問題。

translations.name: 21*21 LED DC bathroom heating fan
translations.description:
Our R&D team has developed a new generation of products with the 21*21 LED DC bathroom heating fan :

1. Newly adopted DC inverter motor: The power consumption of this new generation of DC inverter motors is effectively reduced by 50%.
2. Innovative AUTO mode: Constantly detects the ambient temperature and adjusts the operation mode automatically, for huge energy savings.
3. HMP filter: Uses an environmentally friendly PP material, which is resistant to strong acids and bases, and quickly filter air pollution. The filter can be directly removed from the side and washed for repeated use.
4. Lightweight equipment: The case material is made of fire-resistant ABS, with an ultralight DC inverter motor. The weight of the motor was reduced by 60%.
5. LED lighting function: The main panel is combined with an inlaid LED design, and it can effectively improve issues with insufficient lighting by brightening the bathroom spaces of the old homes, without the need for additional renovation.

translations.name: DC直流雙渦輪多向循環扇
translations.description:
室內通風換氣的重要性在疫情嚴峻的這一年特別有感，從居家空間，到餐廳、賣場、旅館等的公共空間，需要經常的清潔消毒之外，加強空間氣流循環，才能避免飛沫在不流通的空氣造成傳染。台達空氣品質方案，為此推出兼顧通風換氣及節能環保的高效產品。
【高效靜音的省電好物】
+直流無刷馬達: 比交流馬達產品節能超過200%，低噪音僅43分貝(低風量1300CMH)，使用更無擾
+專利雙輪葉，效率高實現大風量(2000CMH)
【隨插即用的通風神器】
+兩側電源插座含10安培電流保護，無需延長插座即可串接最多5台機器同時運轉，加大送風範圍5倍，應用於大型空間通風
+出風口頸縮設計，讓風量更集中，送風距離長達 13 米
+弧形工學把手可攜式設計，攜帶移動更方便
+穩固堆疊設計，可節省75% 收納儲存面積
【三種角度不同情境、方便好用】
+三種可擺放角度，輕鬆轉換應用情境 : 水平出風(0度)-吹乾地毯及剛清洗的地面; 45度出風-油漆牆面速乾、空氣循環; 垂直出風(90度)-天花板油漆速乾、空氣循環
+數位式操作面板: 可視化面板直覺易懂，調整3段風速控制及最長8小時定時
+內建記憶功能，方便下次開機直接使用

1. With brushless DC motor, which can save energy over 200% compared with AC motor products and low operating noise
2. 3-angle drying positions are used to help user effectively and efficiently dry or ventilate:

-45 degree wind: quick drying of painted walls, air circulation
-Vertical wind (90 degrees): quick drying of ceiling paint, air circulation
3. Applied digital control panel & LED display to realize 3 speed control and up to 8Hrs timing function
4. Memory settings
5. Patented dual-blade design with large amount of air (2000CMH)
6. Stackable design for easy storage to save 75% space
7. Daisy chain with 2 Receptacle (both sides) to connect 5 units in series at most (10A breaker). Without additional extension electrical outlets, the air supply range is increased by 5 times
8. Outlet necking can centralize the air stream and the air supply distance can reach 13 meters
9. Portable fan with arc-shaped handle design, easy to carry & move

translations.name: 三孔臉盆混合栓
translations.description:
C-319三孔臉盆混合栓獨特的螺旋造型本體與左右兩端錐形開關，搭配網狀交錯的出水水花，讓整組龍頭呈現科技與藝術的感官結合，獲得2021年美國MUSE 設計獎的銀獎；把手開關人因工程設計省力不滑手，特殊的斜坡角度設計能順利排水，杜絕螺旋溝的積水風險，克服螺旋本體斜坡結構，縮減本體內流道的空間，提升產能並降低成本與漏水風險，減少許多電能與作業污染，搭配獲得2016年紅點獎的起波器可省水80%，具備省水、節能、減廢，並使用無毒材料兼具安全訴求。
AWA的精緻產品市場，行銷據點包含法國、歐洲、台灣市場，產品定位在高階價位精品產品，水龍頭結合建築師、室內設計師、酒店、經銷商及每一個顧客使用者的專業和用心。行銷策略：1.設置AWA（歐瓦）官網；2.設置品牌行銷團隊；3.並藉由獲獎讓產品加值，系列產品已獲得2013與2015年共2個德國Red Dot獎、2020年2個美國IDA銅獎、2021年2個台灣精品獎、1個美國MUSE金獎與2個銀獎，期許C-319未來能獲得台灣精品與其他國際設計獎，讓C-319推展到歐洲、美洲與日本市場，帶動公司更新、精緻的設計；4.經營亞馬遜電商市場；5.投入參展。

translations.name: Zesty 3 points
translations.description:
ZESTY The Zesty reinvents the typical 3-point faucet aesthetic with its contemporary visuals.It pushes the boundaries with its twisty neck that holds a hidden waterway. The sheer technical challenge of achieving this look tests the limits and achieves new feats of innovative manufacturing.
Designed by Christian Laudet for Awa Faucet, this eclectic take on the conventional faucet also boasts a refined modern aesthetic. The twists and turns are finished in a sleek finish and the handles are designed to accommodate easy water adjustment and general maneuverability.
Zesty boasts an exquisite Taiwanese craftsmanship and high quality ceramic cartridges, and German-made aerator. This skillful combination ensures amazing functionality and ease of use.
It is designed to have as minimal an impact on the environment. Its manufacturing is very controlled, featuring a body made out of recyclable brass. The parts of it that come in contact with drinkable water are designed in lead-free materials.

translations.description:
C-339廚房混合栓多顏色多樣式的拉拖軟管增加多元選擇，無須使用配重器，提高廚下使用空間，獲得2021年美國MUSE 設計獎的銀獎；閥心特殊設計實現環保可避免直接開啟熱水造成燙傷的危險；特殊設計起波器讓使用者拆裝出水起波器時，僅需硬幣即可輕鬆拆裝；陶瓷閥及消音網可降低水流噪音，花灑頭組件採中空銅管組合設計降低材料成本；改良型起泡器可省水40%，本體是鋁管陽極處理節省40％重量，具備省水、節能、減廢、減碳排放，並使用無毒材料兼具安全訴求。

translations.name: jun spring
translations.description:
Inspired by the architecture of bridges and daring construction elements.The Robin takes leave from traditional aesthetics and materials. It’s made out of robust extruded aluminum tubes and high-performance glass fiber reinforced nylon. These materials are not only eco-friendly and recyclable, but also incredibly durable, don’t corrode, and the aluminum can be anodized in bright, vibrant, eye-catching colors! Moreover, the parts that come in contact with drinkable water are Lead Free while the German-made aerator ensures 40% water saving.
The best feature of the Robin faucet is it’s incredibly ergonomic. The arm has been developed using high-tech composite fiber materials, which not only ensures smooth, easy rotation but also holds the sprayer in position. It can easily click in and out of the arm innumerable times. To make things even more user friendly, its cold-touch metal ensures that you won’t ever burn yourself when using hot water.

translations.name: 浴缸和淋浴水龍頭
translations.description:
Sydney浴缸和淋浴水龍頭出水本體構成的線條像雪梨歌劇院屋頂般的曲線造型，獲得2021年美國MUSE 設計獎的金獎；只需轉動一個把手可同時控制需要出水水溫，把手開關人因工程設計省力不滑手；閥心特殊設計可避免直接開啟熱水造成燙傷的危險；特殊設計起波器讓使用者拆裝出水起波器時，僅需硬幣即可輕鬆拆裝；陶瓷閥及消音網可降低水流噪音，改良型起泡器可省水40%，排除水流轉換器機構直接減少將近二十個零組件，具備省水、節能、減廢，並使用無毒材料兼具安全訴求。
AWA的精緻產品市場，行銷據點包含法國、歐洲、台灣市場，產品定位在高階價位精品產品，水龍頭結合建築師、室內設計師、經銷商及每一個顧客使用者的專業和用心。行銷策略：1.設置AWA官網；2.設置品牌行銷團隊；3.並藉由獲獎讓產品加值，系列產品已獲得2013與2015年共2個德國Red Dot獎、2020年2個美國IDA銅獎、2021年2個台灣精品獎、1個美國MUSE金獎與2個銀獎，期許Sydney未來能獲得台灣精品與其他國際設計獎的殊榮，讓Sydney推展到歐洲、美洲與日本市場，帶動公司更新、精緻的設計；4.經營亞馬遜電商市場；5.投入參展。

translations.name: bath shower
translations.description:
Sydney is an elegant mix of classical feeling and modernity. The lines are dynamic, open, and yet, the shape remains smooth and silky. The angles and the esthetic are inspired by the Sydney Opera House. Sydney bath shower mixer belongs to a family of Award winner, the basin version was awarded by Red Dot, and Taiwan Excellence.
The design intent was to bring simplicity in the command of the mixer. The idea was to allow the user to control the water temperature and choose between bath and shower with only one handle. This was made possible thanks to the use of a uniquely designed ceramic cartridge. The handle shape allows a confident grip even with wet and soapy fingers. Turn it upward and the water flows to the hand-shower, downward for the bath.
In the fight against limescale, simply unscrew the "coin-slot" aerator to clean it. Awa Faucet, a brand with this simple idea: create smart faucets with expert craftsmanship. Proudly Made in Taiwan.

translations.name: allongé 蘊蜜鉑金PPSU防脹氣奶瓶系列
translations.description:
在繁忙的哺育生活裡，奶瓶是哺育的重要工具之一，讓使用者變成「業餘餵養專家」，進入生活才有真實價值。「一支奶瓶八種用法」首創模組化奶瓶配件，依成長階段循序漸進，以數字作為奶瓶配件編號，讓使用者選購配件時更易懂，完整建立儲乳、餵乳、學飲一瓶完成的科學餵養系統，也落實「奶瓶壽命延長」的研發宗旨，為世界環境考量，更環保、更永續。

台灣擁有最好的製造基礎，做出世界最好的奶瓶！業界唯一批批經SGS嚴格檢驗，不含雙酚A&S，貼心於瓶身印上追溯碼；選用世界級高性能PPSU材質，兼具玻璃奶瓶的通透性與塑性奶瓶的輕盈、耐摔，是奶瓶理想材質的不二之選。

歷經三年悉心研發，獲得多項獨家專利；配件「Vigor防噴系統」水杯吸管取得專利，溫水不噴，倒放不漏；奶嘴採「黃金軟度25°」100%矽膠製成，高度還原母乳餵感，搭載專利「Aspir 5.0智能防脹氣減壓系統」，高敏控流雙排氣技術，有效減少脹氣和嗆奶現象，深受權威醫院嬰兒室肯定使用。

作為奶瓶的領導者，除了不斷革新奶瓶功能，既重視孩子美學養成，深信色彩將影響快樂激素多巴胺、也是孩子貼身教材；因此蘊蜜奶瓶外觀取自有機氣息大地色，是美感與功能平衡的絕佳代表。

translations.name: allongé  PPSU Feeding Bottle Collection
translations.description:
Feeding bottles are a part of daily life. It is about facilitating the living of a more authentic life and sharing the parenting load.

1 bottle transforms itself into playing 8 different roles! The pioneering modularization of the accessories allows for the bottle to pair up with any of its multifunctional accessories, numbered 1-8 for the convenience of consumers. Simply change the upper parts according to the need for breast milk storage, feeding or learning at every stage of nursing the baby.

The sustainability of the all-round functions successfully creates “a bottle that lasts”, generating the long-term value of the multipurpose bottle; be ready to benefit from the revolutionized Aspir 5.0 Smart Anti-Colic Decompression System of the teat and the patented VIGOR Anti-Splash Backflow Prevention System of the straw.

The allongé Collection perfectly symbolizes the balance between aesthetics and functionality on the basis of our expertise in bottle making.

translations.name: 智慧電腦馬桶座
translations.description:
相較市面上大多是中國或韓國製造的電腦馬桶座，和光本次參獎的瞬熱式電腦馬桶座為台灣本土設計製造，具有多項發明及新型專利的創新產品。除了內部水路切換、瞬熱器排出積水等創新結構設計外，也有許多使用者友善的功能。例如使用者最在意的噴嘴衛生，和光使用316不鏽鋼一體成形的的無縫噴嘴，使用前後共四段自動清洗，加上內部的紫外線殺菌燈，確保每次使用都潔淨如新。便座也添加日本SIAA抗菌協會認可之抗菌劑，抗菌率高達99%，力圖使消費者每次入座都安心。主要前後洗按鍵也首創以紅、藍燈號指示，配合大字體和直覺圖示，無論長輩或幼童都能輕鬆使用。此外，和光的脫臭裝置也是市面上唯一加入負離子產生器的產品，脫臭之外更使氣味清新。

除了眾多創新功能，品質與環保也是和光非常重視的要點。和光的瞬熱式馬桶座不需持續耗電加熱水箱，而是選用成本高於他牌兩倍的日本京瓷精密陶瓷，使用同時瞬間加熱，確保熱水溫度穩定又新鮮衛生。同樣環保的還有智慧省電功能，當無人使用半小時後會自動降低便座溫度，家中無人時也可設定八小時固定調低便座溫度，希望使用者能夠有方便舒適的體驗卻不需犧牲電費和能源。

translations.name: Smart Toilet Seat
translations.description: The innovative instant heated smart toilet seat that Hokwang developed has already received several design patents. These patents includes not only the optimized internal design, but also thoughtful features. For example, we have designed the UV light sterilizer which the 316 stainless steel seamless nozzle will be sterilized with the bacteria-killing UV light when the self-cleaning process is done after each use. Also, the most frequently used front and rear wash are indicate with red and blue LED lights while the control panel is designed with large size font and simple symbols so that anyone can use it without learning process. In addition, we have visualized the seat temperature with intuitive color codes so user can have an idea of what to expect before sitting down. On the other hand, we have implement both carbon filter and ions deodorizer to neutralize odor which activates automatically when seated.

translations.name: 自動酒精消毒站
translations.description:
不同於市面上常見的壁掛型或桌面型消毒機，和光本次參獎的消毒站是以不鏽鋼304凹折成形的可獨立站立自動酒精消毒站。和光是專業的公共場所衛浴設備製造商，耐用及環保是和光的設計重點。堅固且高質感的外型搭配三公升大容量皂罐，皂閥壽命達十萬次，機構壽命更高達五十萬次，省去清潔人員維修及補充皂液的麻煩。另可透過配件直接使用現成量販皂液桶，進一步提升容量更不須花費時間填充。相較於目的是販售皂液的製造商所提供的拋棄式皂袋皂閥消毒機，我們設計方便重複填充的皂罐，使用可自由選擇喜好的皂液，減少耗材也友善環境。

本消毒站另一創新之處在於能透過更換閥頭和出皂口來適用於三種消毒液型態（消毒凝膠、消毒泡沫或75%酒精霧化噴灑），考量到用錯消毒液的可能，我們一併設計了智慧提醒功能，當皂閥因使用錯誤皂液而堵塞時，龍頭的指示燈便會亮起警示，提醒維護人員及時清洗並更換。此外，接電方式也非常彈性，可插電也可使用電池，電池電量不足時也會在龍頭的LED指示燈閃爍提醒。

translations.name: Auto Hand Sanitizer Station
translations.description:
With the large capacity soap tank and timeless full stainless steel 304 robust cover that allows the product to stand alone on the floor, Hokwang auto hand sanitizer station is suitable for any area that cares about hygiene. In addition, by simply changing the soap pump and soap outlet, the hand sanitizer stand can be used for all different sanitizing products that includes sanitizer gel, foam and alcohol spray. 

Also, we have designed a smart LED indicator which the green light will be on when the wrong type of soap is used while it red light flashes when the battery is low. Other than the above mentioned thoughtful features, as the soap pump can be used for over 100k times with the mechanism’s life cycle reaches over 500k times, our hand sanitizer stand requires less maintenance effort than any other sanitizer dispenser that can be found in the market.

translations.name: 全智能電動百葉窗
translations.description:
本產品具備以下特色
1. 自動偵測現場的環境，依預設條件執行程式，達到不用人為操作。
2. 具備節能、舒適、隱私、安靜、高雅質感、安裝簡單、清潔容易、操作方便等特性，沒有複雜的安裝程序，即可操作控制百葉窗。
3. 也可遠端操操，不在家時，也可以利用手機來控制家中的百葉窗做開啟或關閉。
4. 若遇上火災或其它逃生需求時，可利用緊急逃生扣片，可輕鬆將百葉窗拆除，不會因斷電而導致百葉窗無法開啟，造成逃生困難之現象。
5. 主體材料為可重複使用之鋁合金環保材質，發揮環保概念 。

translations.name: Fully Intelligent Electric Shutters
translations.description:
This product has the following features
1. Automatically detect the on-site environment and execute the program according to the preset conditions to achieve no human operation.
2. It has the characteristics of energy saving, comfort, privacy, quietness, elegant texture, simple installation, easy cleaning, and convenient operation. There is no complicated installation procedure, and the shutters can be operated and controlled.
3. It can also be operated remotely. When you are not at home, you can also use your mobile phone to control the shutters at home to open or close.
4. In case of fire or other escape needs, emergency escape clasps can be used to easily remove the shutters, and the shutters will not be unable to open due to power failure, which will cause difficulty in escape.
5. The main material is a reusable aluminum alloy environmentally friendly material, giving full play to the concept of environmental protection.

translations.name: 樂活台北系列木地板
translations.description:
量身訂做的台式規格【樂活台北系列木地板】

Ua Floors成功在複合式木地板的實木層添加「抗刮」、「抑菌」功能，藉由高科技的塗裝技術與程序，成功讓表層產生抗刮、抑菌效果，經實驗證實通過馬丁代爾抗刮2級測試，精密的塗裝技術不僅降低複合式地板的實木層易刮傷特性，更能滿足後疫情時代的居家抗疫選擇！

1.AB級材料：樂活台北系列除了具上述的抗刮、抑菌性能外，材料的選擇也是令人驚豔！整個系列全部取材自AB級表層實木製作而成，符合多數亞洲人的選擇喜好-顏色勻稱、紋理自然。在室內裝修中，選擇色澤純粹、紋理乾淨的木地板，可營造出舒心自然感受，既不搶家具家飾的風采，又可襯托整體環境的完整性，搭配各式室內設計風格都是相當適合的選擇。

2.大寬板：樂活台北系列在規格面採用佳評如潮的191mm大寬板、搭配11種長度，以符合多樣化的空間與坪數限制，能有效減少餘料、減少浪費。

3.台灣色：台北的歷程與發展可視為台灣文化大熔爐下的縮影，樂活台北系列針對台北提煉出8種顏色，有簡約現代的灰階色系、自然侘寂的原木色系、復古懷舊的「煙燻色」等，期望透過色彩呼應兼容並蓄的台灣味。

translations.name: 無障礙防掀紗門
translations.description:
產品基於住宅全齡化的需求、以人為本進行設計思考；有別於鉸鏈式旋轉門需要迴轉空間、落地橫拉門具有門檻下橫結構，本產品不須固定的門檻下橫，並有可收折隱藏的優勢，減少無效空間耗用，及提高使用者行動便利性；作為公共空間無障礙環境的區隔元件，考慮到行動不便者、高齡者及幼童族群，營造友善環境；作為住宅中的玄關紗門、隔間紗簾，滿足高齡社會長者能夠自立生活，或幼齡兒童居家安全需求。設計要點在防止鏈條脫離軌道使故障機率減少；且將機構零件單元進行更短節距的設計，並增加弧面、彈片以改善行進順暢度、改善前代的噪音及推拉力，其測試數值更超越世界第一的日本產品，且增加產品抗風能力，紗網受風時鏈條仍可勾抓在僅4.5mm高的導引軌道上,使產品更適用於亞熱帶氣候環境。在製程上重新規劃組裝程序，減少產線冗餘動作，配合可拆式功能鏈條的設計，使具方便拆裝、縮減組裝維修工時之效，具可全面降低製造成本的優勢。
可因應不同的門框尺寸訂製產品，其模組化架構易於改變設置紗門開向，可配合消費者空間格局動線的高度客製化需求。
面對目前covid-19嚴峻疫情，本著企業的使命，在節能通風的市場上提供消費者增進生活環境安全與便利性更佳選擇

translations.name: Anti Derailment Barrier Free Screen Door
translations.description:
With 4.5 mm (approx.) track height, the Barrier Free Screen Door is design for people in all ages. It doesn’t require a fan-shape space to operate. It can be retained in the housing when not in use which greatly improves space utilization.
It can be use as partition in large space which provide a friendly environment, and caters to the needs of disabled, elders and children. Being as a partition in the entryway, it not only makes elders’life more easier, but keep your child safe at home.
To reduce the repair rate, the Anti-Derailment design keeps caterpillar in the 4 mm – high track during windy days. Moreover, we shortened the structure of chain unit which improved sliding fluency and reduced noise when sliding. The test report indicates that this product surpasses the world's No.1 Japanese product, increasing the wind resistance, making the product suitable for subtropical climates.
The assembly procedure has been reorganized, reduced redundancies and add in detachable chain design

translations.name: 全平面通風門
translations.description:
平面通風氣密門是利於消費者之簡約美觀,多功能性創新產品。
美學:隱藏式把手&開關設計造型簡約，關閉時上下做動之兩活動扇外觀會呈現幾乎平行狀態，不會有過多線條感，融合拉窗外觀與生活品味於家居環境中。
安全/省力設計 : 
通過CNS最高氣密/水密等級&最高抗風壓等級測試,首創隱藏式開關設計導入兒童安全鎖防護;
加裝防暴掛網可全面提升防盜安全,強化型材厚度達2mm;高性能綠建材氣密結構有效阻隔室外喧囂的噪音，鋼索傳動方式降低拉扇的開啟力單手即能輕鬆拉動。
維修/清潔便利耐久使用 : 拉扇可由框體直接拆卸,可拆式掛網簡易拆卸紗網,提供快速維修、清洗與安裝；通過拉動壽命10萬回測試,每日拉動10回可承受30年使用壽命。
從顧客角度思考：是建構在客戶需求而完成的一種精品級產品。
產品在關閉特殊加壓鎖、隱藏門弓器、中空複層玻璃、模組化掛網；
客戶多樣性搭配適用環境需求設計，不需拆除整個網框,即可將紗網拆下清洗或置換。不需外推內拉即可達到通風效果，不佔空間,取代並改善傳統推拉門窗多耗空間缺點。
產品美觀與符合個人品味需求，鋁材採圓角與提供多樣化色系設計，並可搭配客戶裝璜色系處理，更易於營造舒適環境

translations.name: 智慧防護通風門
translations.description:
本產品以門禁防盜、監控錄影、視訊通話、通風防霾功能性為前提去設計製造，因此將智慧門鈴結合在本公司自行開發的通風門上，搭配這兩者即可打造成一個新的具有高功能性的智慧型防護通風門。
智慧門鈴功能當有訪客來訪時，可以透過裝置在通風門框上的鏡頭來觀測到外面的訪客是誰，也可以透過鏡頭進行視訊通話，即使無人在家裡的時候也可以透過網路連線至手機即可立即監控門外面的情況也可立即進行通訊溝通。
而通風的功能，可讓使用者利用安全定位鎖設計，可避免兒童操作不慎發生意外、及紗網使用防霧霾紗網，具有通風、撥水、高透視及不需耗電即可阻隔PM2.5霧霾之特性，使室內與戶外空間能安全無慮的聯結，增加空間開闊感及自然通風環境，可在Covid-19疫情環境下達到室內外空氣循環及改善空氣品質，亦可降低對空調及清淨機的依賴所造成的能源消耗。
本公司持續關注環境保護議題，產品在研發過程中須以節能減碳為基礎。所以智慧防護通風門在選用相關配件上優先使用舊有已生產機種80%的零配件且本產品可因應不同的門框尺寸高度需求訂製產品，並有著各種功能性的優勢，可符合消費者高度客制化的需求。

translations.name: 慈悲科技善行系列
translations.description: 在受災區沒水、沒電的情況下，賑災、救災的人員總是需在第一時間伸出援手進行救援，慈悲科技產品因應而生，大愛感恩科技結合回收寶特瓶的環保紡織科技與再生太陽能技術，研發出能提供救災、備災的防護配備產品「慈悲科技善行系列」三合一「大愛環保拉桿四輪後背包」、「大愛環保多功能防災背心」、「大愛環保太陽能充氣燈」及「大愛環保多功能守護包」。「大愛環保拉桿四輪後背包」以鋁合金拉桿加上連體四輪行李箱，可後背可手提可拖行，超容量多功能口袋方便收納，同時裝載著三樣產品，包含「大愛環保多功能防災背心」，穿在身上可防潑水、輕量，前後有反光條，增加夜間的安全性，多達19個大小不同的口袋，可收納防災必需物品，還兼防寒；「大愛環保太陽能充氣燈」使用太陽能天然能源充電。充氣後，能漂浮於水上；可因應海嘯或風災等緊急狀況，點亮燈可協助救難人員於黃金時間加速救援；「大愛環保多功能守護包」防潑水，可做防災防疫包、醫護包、盥洗收納包。大愛感恩科技致力研發環保產品不是鼓勵消費，而是源自對大地及人群的愛與慈悲，藉由科技研發，提供賑災與備災應用，同時能傳遞環保、科技與人文之精神，藉此傳遞「淨化人心、祥和社會」的理想世界。

translations.model_number: 大愛環保拉桿四輪後背包DD2104005/ 大愛環保多功能防災背心DD2103023/大愛環保太陽能充氣燈  DD2102012/愛環保多功能守護包DD2103006
translations.name: Compassion Technology Benevolence Series
translations.description: In the case of no water or electricity in the disaster area, disaster relief personnel always need to reach out to rescue at the first time. Hence DA.AI combined the eco textile technology with renewable solar energy and developed protective equipment “Compassion Technology Benevolence Series” that can provide disaster relief and preparedness. The Eco Four-Wheel Travel Backpack can change the backpack into trolley bag. It has large capacity and contain 3 products, including the Eco Safety Vest, which is water-repellent and lightweight, has reflective strips, increases safety at night, with 19 pockets of different sizes, can store emergency kit, and protects against cold; Eco Inflatable Solar Light used solar energy for charging, after being inflated, it can float on water, in response to emergency situations, the lights can help rescue personnel to speed up rescue time; Eco Emergency Bag is water-repellent and can be used as an epidemic prevention bag, medical care bag or toiletry bag.

translations.name: 慈悲科技防疫守護
translations.description: 2019年12月起發生的新型冠狀病毒傳染(俗稱：新冠肺炎)，如今隨著疫情演變，大愛感恩期盼盡一份心力，解決防疫醫療物資短缺危機，而在解決一個防疫問題的同時，是否增加了新的環保問題？面對現在的COVID-19以及未來可能出現的新興傳染病，防護衣是第一線醫療與防疫人員最重要的防護裝備，依照衛福部建議需穿著C級防護衣，方符合防止病原接觸防疫或醫療人員造成傳染的風險。目前市售防護衣是以不織布為主要基材，常見結構有熔噴不織布配合貼膜，或是紡黏-熔噴-紡黏不織布三層結構，材質以聚丙烯或聚乙烯為多，不織布質輕但強度相對較低，屬於一次性使用，不利於防疫工作進行，拋棄防護衣的處理也會造成能源大量消耗的危害。「慈悲科技防疫守護系列」運用環保異形斷面纖維與複合布料結合，賦予布料高強度，開發環保可重複水洗防護衣。環保布料經表面機能加工與貼膜處理後，防護衣人體工學剪裁與特殊緻密縫合手法，具有防體液與病毒滲透性，與市售一次使用防護衣具有相同功能，且經多次消毒清洗後其功能性仍可維持，具有重複使用功能，可應用於醫療防護領域，提供相關從業人員液體或粉塵隔離防護，有利於維持防疫體系完整性，兼具環境永續維持。

translations.name: Compassion Technology PPE Series
translations.description: According to MOH, it is necessary to wear Class C protective clothing to prevent medical personnel from the risk of infection. Protective clothing on the market is basically one-time-use non-woven fabric. Disposing of protective clothing will cause a large amount of resource consumption.Compassion Technology PPE Series uses eco cross-sectional fibers combined with composite fabrics to provide high strength. After the function processing and filming treatment of the surface, the protective clothing is ergonomically tailored with special stitching techniques, which can prevent body fluids and virus penetration. It has the same function as the general single-use protective clothing, and after repeated disinfection and cleaning, the functionality can still be maintained and can be reused. It is used in medical protection field to provide liquid or dust isolation for relevant personnel, while maintaining the integrity of the epidemic prevention system and sustaining the environment.

translations.model_number: Total Solution for lab air pollution control
translations.name: 實驗室廢氣排放整體解決方案
translations.description:
本方案主要依據美國ANSI/AIHA Z9.5實驗室通風規範，整合硬、軟體及服務三大面向。硬體部分涵蓋局部排氣設備、風門、風機、過濾設備及機電控制等；軟體部分包括智能控制的可變風量系統(VAV)、風速異常警報、風量及系統設計；搭配TAF認證性能檢驗、執行資料收集、分析等服務；以實驗室裝修設計施工服務整合達到國際主流規範要求。
本方案提供之產品擁有多項我國新型專利，C型排氣櫃在2015年曾獲得台灣精品獎肯定及經濟部頒發創新研究獎與獎金之殊榮。
以公司名「禮學社LABTECH」做為中英文服務標章與品牌識別，在市場已累積41年優良商譽與知名度，並透過口碑、數位行銷、線上服務等優於同業的創新方法，首創整體解決方案之「整包」服務，結合TAF認證檢驗與軟硬體整合的綜效，符合國際安全與節能規範，進而行銷亞洲地區，成為市場知名品牌之一。
禮學社於創立時便鎖定實驗室營建為目標市場，以實驗室建築的固定設備及裝修為公司研發、開發重點。除固定設備的產品符合國內外規範作為上市依據外，也包括建築物裝修服務及建立TAF認證檢驗方法，以一站式整包的服務能力，創新實驗室建設的商業模式，並對安全與節能的公益做出貢獻。

translations.model_number: Total Solution for lab air pollution control
translations.name: Total Solution for lab air pollution control
translations.description: This solution is based on the American ANSI/AIHA Z9.5 guideline, with hardware, software and services.  The hardware includes exhaust system, damper, fan, filtering and electrical control systems.  The software includes VAV system, airflow alarm, air volume and system design.  The services include TAF certified validation test.  The goal is to combine lab. Interior decoration with construction and follow the primary international guidelines. The Type C fume hood has many patents and has won the Taiwan Excellence and Taiwan SMEs Innovation Award. The company name Labtech has accumulated good reputation for over 41 years, the goals of our R&D are to focus in the lab. equipment and interior decoration in the lab. field. Not only that our equipment meet the international guidelines, we also provide good interior decoration services and TAF approved testing organization.   We provide a one stop solution to our customer for a better,safer and energy saving lab.

translations.name: 箱根系列  岩面石英晶釉瓷板
translations.description:
親攬自然山景，享身心靈的暢快。
在原石與大自然的環繞下，彷彿所有的壓力與煩惱都一掃而空。以溫泉最常使用的岩石肌理，打造私人專屬衛浴空間，在家就能好好放鬆、好好享受沐浴的樂趣。
「白馬磁磚─箱根系列」設計靈感來自於自然質樸的箱根湯宿，將岩石肌理、線紋等元素融合，打造出內斂中又略帶野性的原始追求；色調柔和，細膩而又富於變化，將自然與藝術完美演繹，在如水墨畫般的淡雅，展現返璞歸真的自然、簡約、時尚。
本產品以高解晰數位多版噴墨印刷設備，搭配四款3D板岩模花，創造出多片不同的花色肌理，透過獨特的紋理層次、豐沛的創造力，傳達出自然、有機、富生命力的原始輪廓；採用止滑釉藥，防滑係數達0.55以上。讓消費者在視覺上感受與山林和諧共處的極致舒壓，觸覺上體驗高度防滑的全齡安心生活。
「箱根系列」重視細節的精緻度，不僅掌握了空間的立體層次，也帶出悠閒且富於質感的個性品味。產品質地堅硬、耐磨抗壓、防滑安全、易潔好保養，最適用於私人湯屋、浴室地壁、室外陽台、私人露天SPA等。

translations.name: Hakone  Glazed Porcelain Tile
translations.description:
Surrounded by genuine rock and nature, Hakone, a famous hot spring area, is a place to ease stress and troubles. With the texture of rocks commonly found in hot springs, we build the private hot spring for customers to relax themselves and enjoy the fun spa.
Whitehorse R & D team, with simple fashion design, using high-resolution digital inkjet printing technology, embossing sugar glazes, has created innovative Hakone series. Rough style and texture of natural stone, superior degree of verisimilitude; special particle effects, changing the monotony on surface. Hakone series, let your life is more extraordinary.  
After high temperature firing, Mohs hardness of 6 degrees (3-4 degrees on natural stone only), the water absorption of 0.5% or less, and the antifouling effect of CNS Certification highest grade 5; wear-resistant but easy clean, that suitable for advanced buildings, villas and public indoor use.

translations.name: 崗玉系列  超硬石英磚
translations.description:
超硬質感，耐磨抗壓的好選擇。
運用淡雅色調詮釋居家場域的過渡空間，優雅地鋪陳空間氛圍。樓梯磚專屬設計，可採同色系搭配，整體一致的規劃，延伸整體感，更顯空間流暢，在細節中彰顯雋永品味。
「白馬磁磚─崗玉系列」是專為樓梯設計的專屬用磚，以打造精品的信念，將人因工程規劃在內。採用一體成型防滑溝槽，高科技止滑釉藥，達到0.55以上防滑效果；規劃27cm深度，符合建築學鞋面踩踏單層階梯面的深度，不僅降低鋪設時的耗損率，更能全方位守護樓梯行走安全。
本產品經不因小尺寸而忽略產品的設計細節，以高溫高壓焠煉，硬度更高、保養更易，日久彌新。是鋪設樓梯磚的不二選擇。

Light colors are used to decorate the transitional space in household to create a graceful spatial atmosphere. Exclusively designed stair tiles allow matching with the same color for a consistent setting where the overall sense of space extends to smoothen the physical space where through-provoking details are emphasized.

translations.name: 木化石系列  岩面石英晶釉瓷板
translations.description:
彷若珍貴木化石，面對時間風化和世事變遷，巍然不動。
以天然木材經高溫高壓而形成之珍貴木化石為設計發想，精選石英原料，刻劃木質紋理。細膩的質感與豐富的色彩，仿若億年木化石，為您拂去心靈的微塵。
「白馬磁磚─木化石系列」靈感源自珍貴木化石，採用高解晰數位噴墨印刷搭配精雕石紋立體模花，呈現出耐看而不炫耀的天然肌理，讓人見識到石材的不同表情及無限可能。自然的浮凸效果，如天然木化石渾然天成，透過天然石韻的風采，感受簡約卻深層的美麗，展現岩面粗獷自然的風化痕跡。
本產品精選石英材質，經製程改良，燒結出質地堅硬、耐磨抗壓，易潔好保養的全方位升級版石英磚。兼具「恆久耐用、易潔抗污、環保永續、自然擬真」的優異特性，為消費者提供了長年不敗的優質選擇。

translations.name: Fossil Wood  Glazed Porcelain Tile
translations.description:
Creating A Natural and Tranquil Temperament of Grace.
Starting from the idea of fossil wood, the Fossil Wood series is made of selected quartz material through kilning to present the texture of wood. The delicate touch and rich colors are like wood fossils from tens of millions of years ago, helping you remove the dust in mind.
The natural relief effect is like the formation of natural stone demonstrating the rough weathering marks of rocks in nature. With a robust, wear-resistant, and bend-resistant texture, it is easy to clean and an ideal option for long-time use.

translations.name: 任意連紋大理石系列
translations.description:
昇元磁磚引領建材潮流，首推「連紋大理石系列」，以連續石紋重新詮釋磁磚語彙，精妙工藝將紋理鋪貼成完美自然的無限延伸，漂亮紋路美感不中斷，為居家場域注入流暢大氣的視覺延伸。昇元磁磚「連紋大石系列」分成無限連紋與任意連紋兩種設計選擇，讓追求紋理自然的您打造出理想的居家空間。

　　每款設計以四片至八片為一組，四邊相鄰併貼，紋路自然會接紋，相較於時下流行的大理石大板磁磚，雖能呈現大面積紋路延伸，但在銷售、運輸、加工等過程中的破損率高、鋪貼成本高等問題也逐漸浮現，高額的預算，並不是一般的消費者能夠接受，所以以市場上接受度最高的60x60規格設計連紋，一樣媲美原石材的紋路視覺不間斷，大幅省去材料的預算與高額的施工成本。

　　任意連紋大理石系列，恣意鋪貼，美感行雲流水，透過獨特紋理設計，使花紋在恣意拼貼中自然形成廣闊的視覺延伸，磚與磚之間，美學華麗貫穿，展現偌大空間的真石氣韻。

translations.name: Infinite Marble Series
translations.description:
A leader in building material trend, Sheng Yuan Ceramics’ first 'Continuous Veining Marble Series' reinterprets tiles with its extended veining. Laid with fine craftsmanship, the tiles create a perfect and infinite continuity of natural beautiful lines to infuse fluent and generous visual space into the home. 

  Each design comes in a set of four to eight tiles; the veins align naturally when laid side by side. While trendy marble slabs may offer large areas of extended veining, they are prone to damage during sale, shipping and processing; their costly installation is not cost-effective. So the 60 x 60 size of the series is popular in the market. 

  	The Random Series can be freely laid to create an aesthetic of clouds and flowing water. Its unique design allows the veins to naturally form a random collage of wide and extended visual space and reveal the charm of real stone weaving through the tiles.

translations.description:
昇元磁磚引領建材潮流，首推「連紋大理石系列」，以連續石紋重新詮釋磁磚語彙，精妙工藝將紋理鋪貼成完美自然的無限延伸，漂亮紋路美感不中斷，為居家場域注入流暢大氣的視覺延伸。昇元磁磚「連紋大石系列」分成無限連紋與任意連紋兩種設計選擇，讓追求紋理自然的您打造出理想的居家空間。

　　每款設計以四片至八片為一組，四邊相鄰併貼，紋路自然會接紋，相較於時下流行的大理石大板磁磚，雖能呈現大面積紋路延伸，但在銷售、運輸、加工等過程中的破損率高、鋪貼成本高等問題也逐漸浮現，高額的預算，並不是一般的消費者能夠接受，所以以市場上接受度最高的60x60規格設計連紋，一樣媲美原石材的紋路視覺不間斷，大幅省去材料的預算與高額的施工成本。
　　
　　無限連紋大理石系列其紋理連貫，形塑大氣風範，四至八⾯⼀組延續紋理之美，引導視線、擴大空間視覺，取代昂貴進口大板石材天然瑕疵、斷紋缺點，塑造出細節與尺度兼具的美學宅。

translations.name: Infinite Marble Series
translations.description:
A leader in building material trend, Sheng Yuan Ceramics’ first 'Continuous Veining Marble Series' reinterprets tiles with its extended veining. Laid with fine craftsmanship, the tiles create a perfect and infinite continuity of natural beautiful lines to infuse fluent and generous visual space into the home. 

  Each design comes in a set of four to eight tiles; the veins align naturally when laid side by side. While trendy marble slabs may offer large areas of extended veining, they are prone to damage during sale, shipping and processing; their costly installation is not cost-effective. So the 60 x 60 size of the series is popular in the market. 

  The Infinite Series creates an aura of coherence. The extended veins formed by the tiles lead the eyes into an expanded visual space, replace the natural flaws and broken lines of expensive imported slabs, and infuse the home with aesthetic details and scale.

translations.name: e+自動關特仕版
translations.description:
本產品「e+自動關特仕版」為「e+自動關經典版」的進階版。
「e+自動關經典版」自2019年上市以來已成功守護了全台超過八萬戶家庭的用火安全，成為瓦斯爐火安全的代名詞，經典版亦榮獲2021台灣精品獎。
秉持對人們的用火安全的堅持，本次特仕版以國內外所有使用者的回饋為基礎，除保留了一代產品的特色之外並提升了諸多特點。
1. 瓦斯爐通用性高：搭配專利設計旋鈕，可符合國內外絕大多數的瓦斯爐款式，達到擴大使用範圍的效果。
2.安裝簡單：外掛式設計，不須更換爐具
3.自動啟動：當瓦斯爐旋鈕開火，防護機制自動啟動
4.不改習慣：維持正常烹煮習慣，消費者接受度高。
5.時間調整：時間可設定1-99 分鐘更有彈性
6.愛心提醒：以燈號及聲響做到最大程度的提醒
7.主動協助關閉爐火：當無任何處置動作，即自動旋轉旋鈕至關閉位置
8.省電耐用：四號電池在國內外皆容易取得，特別是東南亞國家.
9.安全鎖功能：避免幼童任意開火造成的危險。
10.悶煮計時提醒：無需開火即可計時，使用方式更多元
11.好設定：薄膜按鍵，方便設定使用
12.更好清潔：外觀造型及材質更好清潔

translations.name: e+Autoff Special Edition
translations.description:
“e+AutOff” is launched at 2019 and has successfully secure over 80k households from occurring stove fire incidents. Proudly, e+AutOff was awarded with Taiwan Excellence product, 2021.
“e+AutOff SE” is an advanced version, not only based on feedback from markets but also for export market.
Main features of “e+AutOff SE” are as follows:
1.Universality: patented knob can be applied to all kinds of stove 
2.Easy installation: no need to replace original stove
3.Auto-start: “e+AutOff SE” always turn on while you are cooking.
4.Habit unchanged: keep usual cooking habits
5.Adjustable time: from 1 to 99 min
6.Thoughtful reminder: reminder with sound and light
7.Automatic turn off fire: switch off stove fire when necessary
8.Durable battery: battery (AAA) is easy to get, especially in SE Asia
9.Safe lock: avoid from accidentally turning on stove
10. Timer setting: build-in timer function
11. Button design: Easy to set up and use
12. Easily clean: appearance design and material for easy cleaning

translations.name: 氣密橫拉窗
translations.description:
『YS850 crossover氣密橫拉窗』以宇生精品窗的品牌核心—氣密、水密、堅固、安全及實用作為開發基礎，並以跨界設計作為核心研發概念，在8公分厚度的結構下，設計引入10公分厚度的窗體結構，且是目前業界唯一在鋁擠型設計上導入電腦輔助工程CAE (Computer Aided Engineering)，大幅提昇產品的外框、內框及紗窗強度，並採用品牌獨家專利技術『斷水連動把手』、『氣密上阻風板』提升產品的水密、氣密性。因此YS850是引進「跨界」設計概念的橫拉窗，結構堅固且具有優越的氣密及水密性能，適合安裝於各種情況與環境，是房子通風採光與遮擋風雨的最佳建材。

YS850 is a horizontal sliding window that introduces the "crossover" design concept. Robust structure and superior air and water tight performance.
Suitable for installation in various situations and environments. It is the best building material for house ventilation and sunlight and shelter from wind and rain.

translations.name: 管線固定座
translations.description:
一、創新理念
以「創新更適合使用者的產品」為研發目的，以人因設計為考量，在兩側設有公母扣結構，使其可連續扣接，即便是不同型號規格也能做組合，讓配管、配線作業能更系統化、整齊性的配置與管理。底座特別設有螺絲孔洞，施工更加穩固、安全，可應用於機電設備、建築工程、各式裝潢、水電配置等領域，滿足使用者追求快速與便利的需求，使環境更加整齊、美觀。

二、綠色生產
1.通過ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO45001, IATF16949, ISO17025等多項國際管理認證，品質值得信賴。
2.致力推展綠色環保的企業社會責任。
3.採用美國UL合格高級原料。
4.產品經SGS驗證符合RoHS2.0，不含重金屬、塑化劑物質。

三、產品特色
1.側邊公母扣，拇指推入即可結合。 
2.不同規格皆可連續扣接，無限延伸。
3.底部螺絲孔洞，施工更穩固、安全。
4.經SGS驗證環保無毒，使用安全無虞。

translations.description:
南亞在SMC (Sheet Molding Compound) 玻纖複合門擁有超過20年以上生產經驗，以先進材質打造適合英國潮濕寒冷氣候的門扇產品，產品一體成型耐候性佳，門花肚板造型深刻而立體，融入英國當地建築風格，經典而實用。
南亞是英國最大SMC門供應商，在英國市占率超過40%，運用多年對市場需求的了解與防火材料科技的突破，打造出全新的防火玄關門系列產品。而防火門產品最重要的是在火災發生時，在時效內確保住戶的生命財產安全。
透過大量的產品測試以及第三方防火門品質認證單位Qmark的品質監督下，產品從上游製造到下游組裝，皆依循產品標準製造。"We want to earn your trust" 是我們在英國行銷的主軸，目的為市場提供堅實可信賴的產品。提供市場從愛用南亞的產品，到信賴這個由原品牌延伸而出的新防火門品牌Neuma fds，將來自台灣的好產品更加深化到英國市場的家家戶戶中。

translations.name: HDPE Pipe (FM) for Underground fire protection
translations.description: Based on the foundation of quality assurance established by ISO certification, OHSAS certification, CNS certification, and TAF national laboratory certification, Nan Ya has applied for the FM certification of FM 1613 underground fire-protection PE pipes with higher quality standards and stricter requirements. Various improvements and enhancements in raw materials, equipment, molds, test equipment, etc., officially passed FM certification in 2019, becoming the first company in Greater China to pass FM 1613 certification. Nan Ya's high-quality FM-grade PE pipe has the advantages of earthquke resistance, the best corrosion resistance, and excellent ductility. Long-term use will not cause the pipe wall to crack. The service life is more than 50 years. It can ensure the safety, usability, and durability for underground fire-protection piping.

translations.name: 智慧型電動地鉸鏈
translations.description:
人類的居住環境裡，門扇-是我們生活起居每天必須接觸與使用的產品。

為何要使用自動門? 因為自動門有四個好處與必須：出入方便、衛生管理、節能環保、門禁管控，

尤其在疫情肆虐全世界的現在，更需要自動門來避免不必要的接觸傳染，每一個門扇把手的接觸，皆是一個未明感染風險的來源。

在建築物裡，推拉式門扇的使用佔建築物門扇使用的絕大部分，而在這些門扇裡，使用地鉸鏈(Floor Sprint)讓門扇回歸關門的功能，更是佔建築五金裡很大的使用比重。也因為如此，我們產生了將地鉸鏈變成電動(自動)的想法，讓這些門扇也可以享受自動門帶來的方便與安全，若在適當的搭配周邊產品之應用，更可享受到自動門提供的多元全方位的好處。

我們的創新價值，在於運用自身的技術研發能力，採用伺服無刷馬達的精良設計，讓整體產品體積小，效率高，功能多，同時可透過WIFI與藍芽，搭配手機去設定功能與維護，亦可連結物聯網，讓產品的應用發揮到我們的生活細節裡。此設計無需另外再打鑿地板，由於尺寸上設計的精小，只需要將原有地鉸鏈主體取出，置換上我們設計的產品，無論是置換舊有的地鉸鏈或是新增一個，將會帶來龐大的商機與使用習慣的改變。

translations.name: Intelligent Automatic Floor Spring
translations.description:
Why using the automatic door? The advantages of automatic doors can be classified into four points: convenient access, sanitary management, ecofriendly, access control.

Each time touching the door handle is the unknown risk of getting an infection, it is more essential to use an automatic door system to prevent unnecessary contagious infections.

The traditional floor spring has occupied a large proportion of the swing door in the architecture. To increase the convenience and safety of the traditional floor spring, we came up with the idea of turning the traditional floor spring into automatic, provide various functions when properly matched with peripheral products.

We have adapted the sophisticated design of the servo brush-less motor to the floor spring. The design for our new automatic floor spring could be replaced with the existing floor spring without chiseling. It is a huge business opportunity no matter replacing the existing floor spring or having a new purchase.

translations.name: 無中柱推射百葉門
translations.description:
1.	直軸式門軸：大幅提高門載重至100kg與隔音可能性。隱藏直軸可降低磨耗與鏽蝕機會，提高產品耐久性與安全性。同時也因去除傳統門後鈕設計與四連桿，因而有更平整的外觀。
2.	內框雙膠條設計：窗戶兩側框內皆鋪設環保膠條，使窗戶關起時比業界同業更加防漏與防噪。
3.	省力旋鈕裝置：將省力傳動裝置裝入特殊設計盒體，以連桿及面板作動轉動構件，搭配各式省力傳動裝置，成功降低連桿受力，並解決變形及運動不順導致傳動力增加的常見設計議題。
4.	超高組裝精度：關鍵結構加強，組裝後不易變形，間隙減少，精度提高，不再有門窗間隙過大會有濺水的困擾，且開關更容易也更輕巧。同時，也大幅提高製程設計效率，達到節省材料效果，並進而將交期提前（平均縮短到3到4天），讓產品出貨過程「快／狠／準」。
5.	無中柱設計：無中柱設計讓顧客得以在狹窄的都市居家環境有更寬廣的格局。

translations.name: 歐式鋁質木百葉直軸推窗
translations.description:
1.	直軸式窗軸：大幅提高窗戶載重至100kg與隔音可能性。隱藏直軸可降低磨耗與鏽蝕機會，提高產品耐久性、安全性（墜窗事件）。同時也因去除傳統窗戶後鈕設計與四連桿，因而有更平整的外觀。
2.	模組化雙框設計：兩框之間的簡易彈簧拆卸構件，使內外側窗可直覺地手動拆卸與替換，便於客製化調整與裝修維護，提高產品修繕效率。
3.	內框雙膠條設計：窗戶兩側框內皆鋪設環保膠條，使窗戶關起時比業界同業更加防漏與防噪。
4.	簡易硬式百葉：硬式百葉可取代傳統窗戶對窗簾的需求，因而省去窗簾易髒易損的麻煩，並以直覺式地手動操作取代複雜的旋鈕，降低產品易損性。硬式百葉也使產品能看兼具開窗與通風，無須擔憂入室竊盜問題。
5.	安全機制設計：本產品設有兩道安全機制。開窗裝置刻意設於孩童難以觸及的高度，而窗戶內框也設有難以轉動之安全旋鈕，可依據使用者需求設定窗戶最大開合角度，防止家中孩童誤開墜樓。

translations.name: 輕量農作三腳梯
translations.description:
在農用的梯具領域中，有梯具重量太重、梯具承受力不足、地形凹凸不平等三大課題，
而【輕量農作三腳梯】可解決這三大課題，它的產品特點如下：
1.	追求輕量化的省料設計，淨重僅6 KG，憑單手即可提走，降低作業負擔。一般市售重6.7 KG。
2.	外形結構設計精巧，能承受450 KG，限重120 KG，符合ANSI規範。一般市售耐重100 KG。
3.	因應台灣山坡地形設計出3隻腳皆能自由伸縮的功能，三隻腳都能伸縮30公分，可適應地形凹凸不平。一般市售尚無此功能。
4.	三隻腳的底部有4爪能插入土裡，在野外的使用上更加平穩。
5.	三隻腳可套上附帶的止滑橡膠腳套，在平地也可使用，不傷害地面。

translations.name: Lightweight Agricultural Ladder
translations.description:
In the field of agricultural ladders, there are three issues: the weight of the ladder is too heavy, the capacity of the ladder is insufficient, and the terrain is uneven.
The [lightweight agricultural three-legged ladder] can solve these three issues, and its product features are as follows:
1. Pursue a lightweight material-saving design, with a net weight of only 6KG, which can be lifted with one hand to reduce the burden of work.
2. The shape and structure are exquisitely designed, which can withstand 450KG and the weight limit is 120KG, which conforms to ANSI specifications.
3. The three legs of the support can be extended and shortened 30cm, which can adapt to uneven terrain.
4. There are 4 claws on the bottom of the three legs that can be inserted into the soil, making it more stable in the field.
5. The three feet can be put on the attached non-slip rubber foot covers, which can also be used on flat ground.

translations.name: 絕緣棘輪扳手
translations.description:
全球對環保意識抬頭，電動車使用頻率已逐漸普及，因此對於電動車修配需求也會大幅增加，因電動車會產生高壓電，故維修時必須使用絕緣工具，而【絕緣棘輪扳手】具備下列功能以滿足消費者需求。
1. 採用全新專利設計結構，將【換向功能】與【套筒鬆脫】結合，降低觸電風險。(世界首創)
2. 外觀採用流線優美造型。
3. 採用全新72齒驅動結構，操作更輕鬆。
4. 具備安全機構以防止觸電。
5. 本產品經過嚴格品質測試，安全有保障。
6. 握把採用人因工程設計，使用更舒適。

translations.name: VDE Ratchet Handle
translations.description:
As the global awareness to environmental protection is rising. The frequency of use of electric vehicles has gradually increased, and so the demand for electric vehicle repairs will also greatly increase. By reason that electric vehicles need and are equipped with high-voltage power supplies, Therefore, insulating tools must be used for disassembly and assembly when repairing. The VDE Ratchet Handle has the following features that meet consumers' needs.
1. Adopted with the brand new patented structure design,  combines the feature of 【direction switching】and 【Socket detaching】to reduce the risk of electric shock (World's first design). 
2. Elegant streamlined appearance.
3. It's adopts a new 72 teeth drive structure, which can correspond to more narrow working environments.
4. Built in safety mechanism to prevent electric shock.
5. Rigorously tested to guarantee safety.
6. Ergo-designed handle for more comfort when use.

translations.name: 智慧農業解決方案
translations.description:
廣達智慧農業解決方案QOFA是一種新興的解決方案，利用現代化的資訊及通訊科技實現智能的農場管理，不但可以優化所需的資源且同時促進農作物的收穫產量及質量，
廣達智慧農業QOFA由廣達電腦構建和製造，以最高質量和技術能力提供具有5G聯網能力的硬體解決方案。
通過前端環境感測器、監控和自動化設備以及聯合陽明交通大學孵化的智慧農業解決方案的平台實時監控作物生長環境達到完全、完美的智慧農業解決方案，讓農場主或用戶能”秀才不出門，也能知天下事” 一指完成許多日常事務並掌握農場狀態，確保作物最佳生長條件以達到產能提升、減少休耕及工作量等巨大好處。
廣達智慧農業解決方案已於台灣多地架設，並在苗栗南庄的薑黃農場取得豐厚成果，年產量增加三倍並協助從一年一耕達到一年三耕的卓越改良。
廣達電腦相信隨著物聯網產品的成熟、大數據的整合、人工智能的進步，廣達電腦智慧能業解決方案QOFA將能使更廣泛的農業行業如水產養殖等受益，替台灣傳統農業注入新的活力。

translations.name: Smart Agriculture Solution
translations.description:
Smart agriculture is an emerging solution that enables smart farm management using modern information and communication technologies to increase the quantity and quality of products while optimizing the resources required.

QOFA*, built and manufactured by Quanta Computer, with the highest standard in quality and proficiency, provides the fundamental integrated hardware solution with 5G connectivity capability.
By aggregating seamless integration with front-end environmental sensors, monitoring systems, and automated equipment as well as connect with the smart agriculture platform incubated by NYCU and Quanta Computer.
Farm owners or users are able to do precision farming remotely and effortlessly. Great feedback such as increased yield, reduced fallow and workload are just a few of the great benefits.

The QOFA smart agriculture solution has been set up in many fields in Taiwan and has achieved fruitful results. For example, the annual yield of the turmeric farm in Nanzhuang, Miaoli.

translations.name: 航空剪
translations.description:
傳統的鐵皮剪因刀身較薄、刀柄較短且硬度不足，因此無法裁切較厚硬的特殊材質；在國際競爭市場上，又因國外大廠不斷推出高硬度、高性能需求的技術，故我司推出以：改善結構提升剪刀壽命、修改刀片槓桿比降低施力、透過魚眼孔與包覆飾片減少收納與施工的干涉、鑽頭研磨新技術增加剪刀加工精度，使剪切過程更為穩定此四大構面做為本產品的研發方向。
本案產品開發時間約18個月，關鍵技術投入成本逾800萬元，又引進製程智慧自動化技術提升製程效率與精密度，並與雲林科技大學進行產學合作設計改良，共投入成本超過新臺幣2,000萬元，該系列產品目前在美市占率約30%，產品生命週期依照使用頻率不同而有3-20年之年限，其擁有更高的耐用壽命與可供不同材質循環剪切，價格仍與競爭者持平，以此優質平價策略來進入新興市場與大陸市場，並將市場定位在高階、中高階層的使用者，以具有功能的高規格、高品質的優勢，搭配能讓廣大使用者接受的平價策略，向下延伸至中階市場，進而增加市占率。

translations.name: AVIATION TIN SNIPS
translations.description:
Traditional iron shears are unable to cut thicker and hard special materials because of their thin blades, favorite handles, and insufficient texture. In the international competitive market, foreign manufacturers have introduced high-tech and special-demand technologies. The company introduced the following four major features: improving the structure to increase the life of the scissors, modifying the component ratio to reduce the force, reducing the participation in the production through the fisheye hole and the package attachment piece, and adding the precision of the scissors to the drill bit grinding to make the cutting process more stable. The surface will destroy the structural direction of the product.
In 18 months, the key technology development technology was completed approximately and more than 80 months, and the introduction of intelligent manufacturing technology to improve the process efficiency and precision, and cooperated with Yunlin University to design and train.

translations.name: 航空剪
translations.description: 為精進手工具業者進入精密高階熱處理製程的手工具市場、提升高值化金屬應用能力，本產品研發策略瞄準: 刀具性能製程再提升、熱處理物理性質突破、先進熱處理製程改善三大區塊;在刀材的熱處理上，我們一舉突破關鍵製程的技術瓶頸，利用熱處理來強化此鐵皮剪產品的精度與耐用度，大幅提升鋼材剪切厚度與使用壽命，以新開發而成的72CRH新材料，使本鐵皮剪不但能剪切0.8mm不鏽鋼壽命達50,000次以上，仍可正常剪斷，再循環使用來剪切1.2mm冷軋鋼板之壽命即使已經120,000次以上，仍可正常剪斷一般硬物而此剪刀仍無磨損之高性能產品。

translations.name: 手／電兩用快拆擴管器
translations.description: 產品為冷凍空調專業維修必備的管類工具之一，設計以人本需求為出發點，深入實地將使用者的作業模式、工作環境及安全因素列入研發核心；快速管材定位與夾持功能，以直覺性思維破除繁複的作業工序；快結快拆機構搭配獨立式規格設計，在狹小空間便能提升76%施作效率，同時降低手持負擔且攜出更具彈性。創新打滑結構已取得台灣發明專利，專利審查同步在美國及中國進行，量身訂作的保護裝置為客戶打造出產品專屬的市場優勢。產品從設計端到生產製造，經過嚴謹的參數計算與評估：運用軟體分析模擬產品的破斷點與最大承受應力，設計出最佳的外殼厚度與擴管結構，亦同時兼具安全與輕量化的需求，成品實際通過落地測試與拉力機的驗證，確保其產品的使用壽命，讓操作者攜帶輕便、操作安全、施工快速，做到完美安裝，達到效率提升。台灣是世界手工具生產重鎮，消費市場尤以歐美市場需求量最大。行銷運用多元管道佈局國內外通路：聯合品牌工具商打入國際市場、配合設備及管類零配件廠商間接導入消費端及透過網路直接行銷，擴展產品品牌知名度。業務善用公司所建置的顧客服務系統，即時因應市場變化，深度重視客戶需求，提供優質的服務達到有效銷售及精準行銷。

Flaring Tool is for the maintenance of refrigeration and air conditioning. Our design is based on the working environment, operation mode and safety factors. The body and clamp offer quick-connect functionality. The operation enhances 76% efficiency by the fast lock and tube- quick stop design. The individual clamp makes less pressure on the hand with carrying flexibility. It has got the Taiwanese invention patent and conducted in the United States and China which creates a market advantage.
By software analysis to simulate the product’s “breaking point” and the maximum bearing stress which made the best body thickness and structure to meet the “safety” and “lightweight” for the end-user. 
Marketing channels are diversified through co-branded tool vendors and cooperated with the equipment and tubing parts manufacturers to enter the international market, and by direct marketing to expand our brand worldwide. We implement CRM system to succeed in marketing strategies and effective sales.

translations.name: 三段可調打薄剪
translations.description:
瑞麗刀剪股份有限公司以自有品牌「OHKA-SAKURA櫻花」為註冊商標行銷國內外市場，儘管公司創辦時間相對於日、德等國之同業公司較短，然而本公司的全球市佔率也不遑多讓（全球各級美髮剪中市佔率達15%）。
T320三段可調打薄剪之設計成員含括2D至3D繪圖員與美工設計，並特別網羅擁有5年以上經驗的美髮師共同參與，T320是世界首獲專利的三段可調式打薄剪刀，同一把剪刀地同心雙齒刀片由帶有特殊精密螺絲的偏心轉盤控制，當比例設定為10％、20％、30％時，可以因應比例縮放打薄修剪稀疏、正常而到大量的頭髮，省去了傳統刀剪在一般髮型師在打薄/修剪作業時可能需要三把剪刀才能獲得滿意的髮型效果。
截至2020年底為止，「OHKA-SAKURA櫻花」品牌專用剪刀的版圖已跨足世界各大洲，在品牌的推廣上除了透過參展外，也積極建置電商平台，累積之經銷商/代理商也持續成長中。T320已實現公司所強調「可讓使用者不斷銜接、匹配既有熟悉的使用工具，用過OHKA-SAKURA品牌的髮型刀剪就永遠忠誠」之目標，美髮界專業人士曾美譽：「擁有OHKA-SAKURA美髮專用剪刀，夫復何求」。

translations.name: 3-Stage Adjustable Hair Scissors
translations.description:
Relee Scissors Co, Ltd. sells its own brand “OHKA-SAKURA” as a registered trademark in domestic and foreign markets. 
T320 is the world’s first patented three-stage adjustable thinning scissor, the concentric double tooth blade of the same scissor is controlled by an eccentric turnable with special precision screws. When the scale is set to 10%, 20%, 30%, it can trim sparse, normal, large amounts of hair in response to scaling and thinning. Save the effect that traditionally requires three scissors to achieve.
As the end of 2020,”OHKA-SAKURA” brand scissors have spread across all continents of the world. In addition to exhibiting the brand, also actively built an e-commerce platform and accumulated distributors and agents.
T320 has achieved the company’s goal and with the reputation of ”Owning OHKA-SAKURA scissors, no other tools are needed”.

translations.name: 可程式線性直流電源供應器
translations.description:
GPP系列可程式線性直流電源供應器，是全台唯一直接將電源供應器結合電子負載的功能，使用單一台電源供應器就可以進行功率輸出與負載測試，使用者無需再額外添購電子負載設備即可直接測試。他具備高設定解析度(1mV/0.1mA)及顯示解析度(0.1mV/0.1mA)、最佳低漣波雜訊特性 ≦350uVrms/≦2mArms及 ≦50uS輸出瞬態回復能力，並且提供各通道獨立輸出開關。

在串/並聯使用上，本產品的跟踪功能(Tracking)採用內部線路將輸出端自動切換成串聯或並聯輸出，無需額外的外部配線，提供使用者操作程序上的便利與穩定的輸出。而獨特的負載(DC Load)設計，可讓單一台電源供應器直接變成電源輸出搭配負載功能來進行供電與加載的應用，可以滿足如基本電池充放電測試、產品壽命檢測等測試。

GPP系列提供序列式輸出功能(Sequence)，可以讓使用者自行編輯電源輸出波形，也可以讓使用者設定序列式的定電壓(CV)或定電流(CC)拉載波形。為了簡化波形編輯的設定，GPP系列在序列式輸出功能裡，內建8種波形在Templet  waveform，供使用者直接套用輸出。

translations.name: Multi-Output Programmable D.C. Power Supply
translations.description:
The GPP series multi-channel programmable DC power supply provides high setting resolution (1mV / 0.1mA) and display resolution (0.1mV / 0.1mA), best low ripple noise characteristics ≦ 350uVrms / ≦ 2mArms and ≦ 50uS output transient recovery capability, and also provides independent output switch for each channel.

For serial / parallel application, the tracking function of this product adopts internal wirings to automatically switch the output to serial or parallel output without the need for additional external wirings, providing users with convenient operating procedures and stable output.

For models with more than two channels, CH1 / CH2 are designed with a load function. A single power supply can set one channel as the power output and the other channel as the load function to consume the power of the DUT to meet the basic battery charge and discharge test requirement.

translations.name: 高精度源表
translations.description:
GSM-20H10是一台精密的電源量測設備(Source Meter)，是一台可以精確地使用電壓或電流，並同時量測電壓和/或電流的儀器。其電源與量測範圍為±210V / ±1.05A / 22W，其結合了數位萬用電錶 (DMM)、電源供應器、準確電流源、電子負載的實用功能。本產品提供了0.012%的精準量測準確度，以及具備6位半高解析度的電錶功能，在量測的精度上最高可達1uV/10pA。

GSM-20H10可適用的應用很多，如電池的特性評估、半導體的特性測試、各種電子材料的特性評估等都是可以量測的。在電阻的量測部分，支援最高六線式的量測功能，相較於一般設備僅支援4線式量測，能夠量測到更精準的數值。

取樣的速度上，GSM-20H10支援最高50k點/每秒的取樣速度，可更精準地針對待測物的特性進行分析。透過4.3吋的大尺寸螢幕，更可以將所有的量測設定、參數與結果都完整的顯示在屏幕上。

translations.name: 數位儲存示波器
translations.description:
為了協助使用者對於當前5G時代的電源產品開發, 嵌入式系統開發或是智慧物聯網(AIoT)偵錯, GDS-3000A數位示波器系列. 分別具備350 MHz和650 MHz的頻寬, 高達5GSa/s即時取樣率與200M點的記憶長度讓使用者不會錯過任何待測訊號的細節, 並搭配10.2吋超大顯示器提供使用者開發工作所需的最佳量測儀器.
標配的電源分析套件可用於”電源品質”,“切換損耗”,“諧波失真”,“漣波”, ”湧浪電流”,“調變分析”,“安全工作區域”,“負載瞬態”,“電源效率”,“B-H曲線”,“控制迴路分析”,“電源供應器抑制比”與“電源開/關分析”等13種電源量測項目, 並且內建頻率響應分析(FRA) APP, 藉由控制迴路分析功能, 使用者可透過單一測試設定更快速, 更有效地進行相關設計,校驗,驗證和測試.
GDS-3000A系列不僅僅是示波器, 除了前述功能外還可選配1G取樣率16個數位輸入通道的邏輯分析儀可用於混合訊號分析是市場上高性價比示波器的最佳選擇.

translations.name: Digital Storage Oscilloscope
translations.description:
In order to assist users in the current 5G era of power product development, embedded system development or Intelligent Internet of Things (AIoT) debugging, GWInstek will proudly launch the new GDS-3000A digital oscilloscope series in 2021. With the bandwidth of 350 MHz and 650 MHz, real-time sampling rate of up to 5GSa/s and memory length of 200M points, users will not miss any details of the signal to be tested. The 10.2" large display provides users with the best measurement instruments for development work.
The standard power analysis kit can be used for 13 power measurement items such as "Power Quality", "Switching Loss", "Harmonic", "Ripple", "Inrush Current", "Modulation", "Safe Operation Area", "Transient", "power efficiency", "B-H curve", "control loop analysis", "Power Supply Rejection Ratio" and "power on/off analysis", etc.

translations.description: Chroma最新的SoC/模擬測試系統3680提供靈活的配置和廣泛的覆蓋範圍，以高度兼容性測試不同類型的設備。3680測試系統可靈活地在24個通用插槽內部署多達2048數字通道管腳的數字信號，其數字性能高達1Gbps最大的默認256MW向量內存，可在高速應用中提供出色的定時精准度±150ps EPA，並提供多種測試板選擇，例如HDADDA2用於轉換器測試、HDVI用於高電壓和車用、混合信號HDAVO用於具有400Msps AWG和250Msps DIG的影像應用以及高精度24bit AWG和DIG的音頻應用。

The system is flexible to deploy the conflagration up to 2048 pins within 24 universal slots with the digital performance up to 1Gbps, the largest default 256MW vector memory, ±150ps EPA for superior timing accuracy in high speed application, and provides various options such as HDADDA2 for converter test, HDVI for high voltage & automotive, HDAVO for performance mix signal with video applications of 400Msps AWG & 250Msps DIG and another high precision audio application of 24bit AWG & DIG.

translations.name: Regenerative Grid Simulator
translations.description: Chroma 61815 is only 3U high (approximately 13cm) but has 15kVA output power capability. This high power density design and technological innovation cause it be the leading status. Compared with USA’s and Japanese brand competitors, the space utilization rate is up to five times. Let customers to configure the test space flexibly and bring the unique value of the testing instruments. Besides, in response to the globally main awareness of green energy and environmental protection, this product has 100% energy regenerative function, allowing customers to return the power consumption while testing to the grid. It not only saving testing costs for customers, but also achieving energy recovery, achieving the goal of energy saving and carbon reduction.

translations.name: 高精度通用測量偵測頭
translations.description: Chroma 71241配備符合CIE 1931配色函數之感應器，可精確量測顯示器面板之亮度與色度。使用者可自由切換多種不同之顯示模式，包含色度座標 xyY、TΔuvY、u’v’Y、XYZ 四種量測模式及閃爍量測FMA、FLVL兩種量測方法。特別針對自動化需求，在不使用電腦的情況下，可與Chroma信號產生器結合達成自動化測試需求；亦可使用電腦操作，進一步提供對比量測、結果判定及可程式化測試項目之功能，使能滿足客戶自動化測試之需求，進而達到提昇生產效率之目的。所搭配的光學量測軟體，提供在電腦 上進行色度、亮度、閃爍及 Gamma 量測的功 能。可將量測到的資料直接顯示在CIE1931及CIE1976 UCS色度座標圖上，並提供繪製Gamma曲線的功能。

translations.name: High Accuracy Universal Measuring Probe
translations.description: Developed with the most advanced digital signal processor and the technology of optoelectronic transfer as well as precision optical parts and circuit design, Chroma 71241 High Accuracy Universal Measuring Probe is capable of performing high speed, accurate and stable color tests. Users can switch to various types of chromaticity coordinates freely including four display types of chromaticity coordinates xyY, TΔuvY, u'v'Y, XYZ, and FMA, FLVL two flicker measurements modes. The 71241 also has the functions of contrast measurement, result judgment and programmable test items that can fulfill the auto test requirements to enhance the production efficiency. The Optical Measurement Software incorporated by Chroma 71241 is able to do chromaticity, luminance, Flicker and Gamma measurements on PC, and then show the measured data on CIE 1931 and CIE1976 UCS chromaticity coordinate chart directly.

translations.name: 全自動核酸萃取系統
translations.description: MagXtract 3200為第一台由台灣研發製造的整合核酸萃取與精密移液功能的開放式全自動核酸萃取系統，提供一站式系統完成核酸萃取與PCR反應試劑製備，大幅簡化核酸檢測所需之繁複工作流程，可節省超過90%的人工操作(hands-on)時間，提升整體核酸檢測之效率，並可降低醫檢人員於檢測過程中受感染的風險與工作負擔。產品採用開放式平台的系統軟體設計，可廣納市場上現有試劑產品搭配使用，增加產品應用之廣度與彈性，可應用於如傳染性疾病等之核酸檢測、精準醫療與核酸檢測試劑開發等應用市場。致茂作為分子診斷領域的新興品牌，透過標竿學習與創新商業模式運用，打破國際大廠利用封閉式系統儀器綁定試劑銷售商業模式，與試劑製造廠商形成策略結盟，以優勢互補的方式提供具備市場競爭性的自動化核酸檢測解決方案進入分子診斷市場，藉以拓展市場通路與降低行銷成本，並透過縝密的專利及商標布局與完整的法規布局加速進入國際市場，建立致茂於分子診斷領域所需的自動化儀器產品的堅強實力與品牌信賴度。

translations.name: Automated Nucleic Acid Extraction system (Non-Sterile)
translations.description: MagXtract 3200 is Taiwan’s first novel open-platform performing the nucleic acid purification and PCR setup in a compact bench-top workstation. It greatly eliminates tedious and complex steps, reduces hands-on time by more than 90%, improves overall operative efficiency and reduces the risks of bio-specimen infection for medical laboratory scientists. Based on the open and flexible software architecture, MagXtract 3200 supports the various extraction PCR sample preps and accelerates progress of PCR downstream applications such as NGS. As an emerging brand in the field of molecular diagnostics, Chroma develops an innovative business model and establishes market segmentation. We cooperate with reagent manufactures to expand market access and create a win-win situation. Furthermore, MagXtract 3200 has received CE-IVD, FDA and TFDA product approval for multinational markets, and has completed patent and trademark applications to protect intellectual property rights.

translations.name: 智慧高效防護型滅菌器
translations.description: Prime 60L 具有新駿品牌核心價值與顧客潛在需求功能，高防護性與追蹤系統能有效對滅菌流程的掌控、降低環境的潛在感染風險，保護第一線操作人員的安全，搭配高海拔、高廣域、高強度的特點，具備網通數位傳遞滅菌研究成果，20多種的滅菌程式與功能搭配細膩直覺的人機操作介面，讓使用者能夠在簡單清楚知道研究過程所有細膩訊息及循環歷程，展現產品之專業性與細膩度。滿足末端使用者要求的最佳滅菌品質效果，提升實驗室研究人員之工作效率，滿足客戶與市場需求。

translations.name: 電動液壓手術台
translations.description:
C800電動液壓手術台是Mediland鼎眾中階手術台C系列的新革命，該系統積累十五年以上的品質能量，產品穩定性和靈活性在市場上享有盛譽。C800除了簡潔優雅的外觀設計，具體創新價值體現於以下幾點: 
◆Cratos Force智能控速系統(專利申請中): 為手術台操作及角度調整提供更精確細緻的手術台操控體位定位和速度控制，可依醫護人員需求調快或調慢，體位跟角度位置更精確，大幅提升醫護人員在手術過程中的工作流程效率。體位作動緩起動緩停止設計，可有效減少振動造成的不適，提供患者更好的手術體驗及安全性。在緊急情況如急救時，可將手術台從各種體位立刻調整為水平賦歸體位，減少30 ％的調整時間，為病人及手術團隊爭取更多施救時間。
◆床身頭尾互調設計:手術床台的頭部段及腳部段採快速拆卸設計，可在臨床使用上快速改變床身方向，以符合不同科別、不同體位之手術需求。
◆良好的X光成像空間: 碳纖材質腰橋設計透視度高，搭配可折疊收起的腰橋齒排設計(專利設計)，使C-Arm照射空間暢通無阻，成像更佳。 
◆安全性設計: 手術台防滑落邊軌及防墬鉤設計，可防止手術台附件意外掉落，保護患者及醫療人員安全。

E.	可銜接巡檢模組，成為巡檢機器人。

translations.name: 智能化病蟲害監測與預警系統
translations.description:
台灣海博特投入農業科技研究設備生產已逾30年，成套的解決方案是本公司產品的核心價值，此次報名的產品「智能化病蟲害監測與預警系統」設計是經過市場調查評估、農業研究專家需求訪查與農民農作實務經驗分享，綜合多方問題由客戶角度來準備。

  應用物聯網傳感器資訊收集技術、微型攝影影像擷取、無線網路傳輸、資料上傳雲端伺服器儲存與演算分析、導入AI影像分析辨識、行動裝置網頁介面、病蟲害風險分級與預警功能。田間架設資料收集器進行影像及氣候環境收集==>資料即時上傳雲端進行演算分析==>即時警報及田間資訊即可在行動裝置上查看。

  有別於傳統機殼設計，為適應戶外極端氣候環境，本產品機殼採用高規UL f1聚合材料，具抗UV、耐熱等特性，射出成型並具有導水與內嵌散熱機構等設計，可適應環境條件-40℃~70℃，通過SGS測試IP67防水防塵等級。外觀符合實際使用場域的設計，縮小體積、減少遮陰，可因應場域不同，可以懸吊、立柱、壁吊方式架設，以不影響作物成長為主，重新打造堅實強韌的軍規外觀造型，擺脫電子產品容易損壞的印象。頂部崁入太陽能板達到蓄電、用電的節能設計，符合智慧產品於田間長時間應用的需求。

translations.name: Pest Detection System
translations.description:
The intelligent "Pest Detection System" (PDS) applies IoT sensor information collection technology, wireless network transmission technology, self-owned cloud server storage & calculation analysis, AI image analysis & identification. PDS uses the mobile device web interface to display pest risk classification and early warning functions. Set up => collect information => upload data =>alarms and real-time information can be viewed on mobile devices.

Different from the traditional hardware design, in order to adapt to the extreme outdoor climate environment, the PDS is made of high-profile UL f1 polymer material, which has the characteristics of UV resistance and heat resistance. It is injection-molded and has a design of water conduction and a built-in heat dissipation mechanism that can adapt to environmental conditions from -40°C to 70°C. The PDS has passed the SGS test of IP67 waterproof and dustproof level, its overall design is presenting a simple and easy-to-maintain purpose.

A transparent protective film can instantly be developed after the application to help maintain the moisture balance of the scar while excluding the water, germ and other contaminates. With UV protection, it protects scars against damaging UV radiation, and helps reduce red or brown discoloration and helps the scar fade faster.

translations.name: 優士達二代腫瘤重建型人工關節系統
translations.description:
USTAR Ⅱ系統為一項當病友罹患骨腫瘤需截除大量患部、或遭受重大創傷造成嚴重骨缺損時，所設計盡量保留骨本的肢體重建人工關節，提供病友與醫師完善的治療策略。汲取第一代產品超過2800例的手術經驗，以臨床需求為本的精神重新打造新一代的肢體保留系統(Limb Salvage System)，新開發旋轉鉸鍊式膝關節(Rotating Hinge Knee)，強化產品結構穩定、鎖合機制重視患者安全，同時賦予醫師便捷的操作步驟、系統元件相互搭配的彈性，相輔相成之下使患者術後重回自然的步態。
2020年USTAR Ⅱ不畏全球疫情影響，獲得全美骨科排名第三的西奈山醫學中心採用，目前國內外已有170例手術，USTAR Ⅱ三大產品亮點如下：
1. 保留骨本，翻修無礙：USTAR Ⅱ為市面上切骨量最少的產品，患者能保留較多自身的骨本。此優勢可避免未來執行翻修手術時窒礙難行，以及減少術中骨折的風險
2. 髁間承重，降低磨耗：膝關節彎曲與伸直全程保持髁間承重，增加關節之間的接觸面積，改變受力方式降低鉸鍊內襯損壞與鬆脫
3. 手術步驟，化繁為簡：新穎的預鎖式樞紐設計，手術中組裝膝關節鉸鍊裝置只需1把工具即可完成

translations.name: USTAR II Hip & Knee system
translations.description:
The USTAR Ⅱ system is designed for extensive reconstruction of the hip and knee joint. Components have been designed based on over 20 years of clinical experience with the USTAR system and inherit the design concepts with the U2 Primary and Revision Knee system. Intraoperative surgical flexibility to convert different constraint level of implants or even to a limb salvage prosthesis with similar instrumentation concepts.
USTAR Ⅱ Hinge Knee features a small profile, pre-assembled hinge mechanism centered on the femur and tibia with a hinge assembly connected intra-operatively by a single screw.
USTAR Ⅱ Limb Salvage System characterizes a comprehensive range of segment and stem options, soft tissue friendly components with more secured connection. The bone preserving implant design allows the possibility to salvage more bone.

translations.name: 仰樂多2
translations.description:
可躺可翹二合一 安心照護舒適乘坐
仰樂多2系列是款結合後躺與空中傾倒功能的二合一照護型手動輪椅，提供穩固坐姿、減少坐壓、輕鬆照護三大功能，適合身體與頭部控制能力微弱的使用者。搭配其他進化功能，用心照護好安心；可折疊收納、輕鬆放入後車廂，外出方便、自在生活。

零重力空中傾倒 無段式後躺 穩姿減壓抗前滑
單手可操作的零重力空中傾倒，照護者無需費力將滑落的乘坐者奮力拉起，達到支撐使用者久坐不下滑、同時釋放臀部座壓的雙重效果；獨創連桿作動設計，讓座椅在後躺過程中同身體連動，座椅與乘坐者的乘坐重心更接近，避免乘坐者身體因後躺下滑而產生剪力、拉扯皮膚，降低褥瘡產生的機會。

從照護者需求出發 挺立握把挺你而生
考量到照護者需頻繁彎腰駝背推著輪椅，長期下來容易因姿勢不良造成肩膀僵硬。挺立握把，讓你用最自然的姿勢、最省力的方式推行，減少彎腰次數，照顧家人也保護自己!

雙移位結構 日常照護超輕鬆
工具拆裝的全拆式升降扶手，讓照護者方便將乘坐者側向移動到床鋪、座椅或車座；可拆式內外雙向旋轉撥腳可依照空間條件內外旋動、快速騰出輪椅腳部空間，方便移位；免工具拆卸與直覺性安裝，讓收納變得輕鬆簡單。

translations.name: VIP 2
translations.description:
VIP 2 is the 2-in-1 positioning wheelchair that combines recline and tilt-in-space. These positions ensure a comfortable ride, a stable sitting posture, reduce sitting pressure, and make care easier. 

VIP 2 is suitable for users with unstable trunk control but good head control. It can be folded, stored easily or placed in the car. It is convenient for hospital visits and day trips. 

Caregivers don’t need to struggle to reposition a user who has slid down the chair with the anti-sliding system, which supports the sitting position and relieves pressure. This original design mimics the motion of the body to reduce shearing and chance of bedsores. 

The J-Hooks allow the caregiver to stand upright, preventing poor posture or other secondary injuries. 

The detachable armrests allow the caregiver to do side transfers to a bed or seat. The detachable footrests can be rotated to accommodate small transfer spaces and convenient storage.

translations.name: 隨身心電圖量測儀
translations.description: QOCA隨身心電圖量測儀符合現在醫療行為遠距化與智慧化的需求，屏除舊式多導線與龐大的設計，裝設後不會干擾使用者日常活動，適合長天期居間或在病房監測心電圖．Ecg102D為乾式電極設計，使用者僅需將手指置放於乾式電極上即可量測單導程心電圖，適合極度敏感又需即時紀錄不定時的不適症狀．簡約的設計適合日常隨身攜帶使用．Ecg103專為長天期心電圖監控需求設計，搭配長效型電極貼片，可連續監控心臟狀況長達14天，適合偵測長時間暫停、室性心動過速、心室顫動．Ecg701為市面上首款可長天期同時量測7種不同導程心電圖，分別為Lead I、 II、 III、aVR、 aVL、 aVF 及一個胸部導程，由於可觀察到心臟不同面向，適合偵測心肌梗塞與心肌缺氧． ecg701輕、薄、短、小、低耗電、具備防水功能，搭配長效型電極貼片，只須貼附於使用者胸前，即可連續7天不間斷量測多導程心電圖。使用者於量測使用期間可以淋浴洗澡，從事正常活動。因對日常生活的干擾度降至最低，適合日常生活中長時間配戴，有利於早期發現病因及早治療。

translations.name: Portable ECG Monitoring Device
translations.description: QOCA Portable ECG Monitoring Device is designed to fulfill the need of smart and long-distance medical care.  Unlike traditional ECG monitor or holter, the deisgn of QOCA Portable ECG Monitoring Device series is compact and lightweight, suitable for daily and multiple day monitor at home or wards.  Ecg102D is dry electrode design.  Users can easily get their ECG measured by simply put fingers on the electrode pad.  Such design is suitable for extremely allergic users but have the need for prompt measurement whenever a symptom occurs.Ecg103 is a wearable single-lead ECG monitoring device.  With the dedicated multiple-day use body patch, users can measure their daily ECG up to 14 days without the need of charging the battery or removing the device for shower.  Ideal for detecting long pulse, ventricular tachycardia, and Ventricular Fibrillation.Ecg701 is the first multiple day ECG recorder which can offer 7 leads ECG (I/II/III/aVR/aVL/aVF/a V lead) in the market.

translations.name: L816 高活動型輪椅
translations.description: Merits L816高活動型輪椅最重要的特色就是低背、輕量、結構強∼最主要是給那些下肢行動受限，但上肢功能正常的使用者使用，通常使用高活動型輪椅的使用者是因為意外導致下半身癱瘓，但上半身還擁有不錯的活動力，後背的高度降低，讓雙手可以自由活動，方便自行推動輪椅，做大動作的手部運動，也方便他們在室內及室外活動。為了方便使用者自行駕車或搭乘交通工具自行搬運上車的需求，產品使用超輕鋁合金車架，包含輪圈及車架僅11公斤、快拆後輪、收折式車架、多處儲存收納空間。也為了讓經銷商能夠更容易的適配給不同身高及體型的使用者，背靠角度可調、前後重心可調、座高高低可調、可拆式扶手、腳踏板長度可調、後輪外傾角度可選等。也因應台灣市場使用者通常都會架上機車頭使用，故在結構上則是比普通的手動輪椅測試更為嚴苛(正常輪椅使用速度為6 km/h，而機車頭使用可能會最高到25 km/h)，外型上則保持簡潔有力的設計風格。也符合日本市場的外型期待。

translations.name: L816 Jaguar Z Active Wheelchair
translations.description: Merits L816 Active Wheelchair is designed for young users with restricted lower limbs but normal upper body. While using L816, the users’ hands can move freely, which is convenient for pushing the wheelchair by themselves and making large hand movements, and convenient for them to move indoors and outdoors. In order to facilitate the needs of users to drive or take transportation on their own, the product uses an ultra-light aluminum alloy frame, totally weight of only 11 kg. A quick-release rear wheel, a folding frame, and multiple storage space. In order to make it easier for dealers to adapt to users of different heights and body types, the backrest angle, the front and rear center of gravity, the seat height, and the foot pedal length can be adjusted. The users in Taiwan will install power assist drive, the structure has to be stronger than the ordinary manual wheelchair test (the normal wheelchair speed is 6 km/h, wheelchair with power assist drive may be used up to 25 km/h).

translations.name: W469豪華行鋁製四輪助行車
translations.description: Merits W469豪華行鋁製四輪助行車是為需要輔助行走的使用者設計，通常使用者為老年人需要於室內和外出行走或購物，並為使用者提供在戶外行走，需要休息時能隨時提供座椅而研發設計的。產品在設計初期皆經過力學分析，模擬人在推動助行器時如何能夠達到最佳推力及符合人體工學；前輪加大使用10”萬向輪，後輪使用8”輪，為了能夠讓使用者在戶外方便穿越各種地形及障礙物，；也為了能夠符合及超越市面上產品的輕量化需求，產品結構設計最佳化及輕量化航空等級鋁材質，重量僅6.5KG，讓老年人也能夠輕易的搬運；各零件設計採用模組化，可多項產品共用、大量製造、降低成本；也為了美觀特別將剎車線改用隱藏式設計，避免剎車線外露也能兼顧美觀；可收折式設計方便收納；弧形寬版靠背帶提供舒適支撐；扶手高度5檔可調。

As well as to meet and exceed the lightweight requirements, the product structure design is optimized and use aviation-grade aluminum material, weighs only 6.5KG. So that the elderly can easy to carry. Modular design of each part allows multiple products to be shared, mass-manufactured, and cost reduction. translations.name: 輕．時尚口鏡探針
translations.description:
BenQ 輕．時尚口鏡探針的研發構想，源自多年深入洞察牙醫師的需求，我們觀察到市售牙科診斷用口腔鏡及探針，多為不環保的一次性拋棄耗材，或有重量可重複使用的金屬材質，對手腕是種負擔，因此選擇環保可重複使用的樹脂材料，設計出高階輕量化的口鏡探針系列。
1.	輕量化與人體工學，純白一體成型工藝 
產品相當輕巧，重量相當於兩枚十元硬幣（15公克），約為傳統金屬器械的20%，輕量化與柄身採用人體工學設計，增加醫師握持器械的舒適度與靈活性，也降低長時間握持的負擔，帶來臨床操作的全新體驗。
2.	可重複使用的熱固性樹脂材料，兼具環保與耐用
材質無毒符合生物安全性，握柄使用熱固性樹脂製造，材質安全能耐高溫135℃、耐高壓及耐酸鹼。高溫滅菌或使用清潔液消毒後，可重複使用，在反覆滅菌下不影響其韌性及斷裂伸長率，擁有耐用性與抗斷裂性。
3.	高階無影口鏡及尾端附加尺規設計
新穎的橢圓型口鏡設計，可提升操作視野，加上特殊頸部彎角設計，使口鏡兼備牙科拉勾張口的功能。鏡前反射鍍膜，影像更清晰明亮，鏡面採用三層處理：抗刮層、防霧層及反射層，具抗刮與防霧功能的高階無無影口鏡。單頭握柄尾端附有根管銼針測量尺規設計。
translations.meta_description: BenQ 輕．時尚口鏡探針的研發構想，源自多年深入洞察牙醫師的需求，我們觀察到市售牙科診斷用口腔鏡及探針，多為不環保的一次性拋棄耗材，或有重量可重複使用的...

translations.name: Lightweight Reusable Instruments
translations.description:
1. BenQ Lightweight Reusable Instruments has a net weight of only 15 g equivalent to a CD, which is just 20% of a conventional metal one, and provides a novel handle with an ergonomic design that not only ensures comfort and maneuverability but also reduces occupational injuries.
2. The one piece in pure white design.
3. Unlike disposable dental instruments, this lightweight instrument sterilized by autoclaves or detergents is reusable. It is thermal resistant up to 135 degrees Celsius, high pressure resistant, and pH/chemical resistant, so repeated sterilization fails to affect its ductility and elongation at break.
4. Advanced dental mirror: High-reflection coatings result in clear and vivid images and are scratch and fog resistant. The edgy oval dental mirror broadens operational vision, while the curvy neck turns the mouth mirror into a dental retractor.
5. A ruler added at the end of the single-end handle is handy for gauging endodontic files.

translations.name: 俯臥位氣墊床
translations.description: 雃博 APEX Pro-care Optima Prone 俯臥位氣墊床主要是針對急性呼吸窘迫症候群（Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome，簡稱 ARDS）患者而設計，可應用於 COVID-19 引起的中重度 ARDS 患者，進行俯臥治療使用，預防患者產生壓瘡風險，避免添增無謂治療難度。由於可讓患者以趴臥方式進行治療，幫助改善中重症 COVID-19 病患常併發的呼吸窘迫症狀、改善氧合狀態，減少臥床的不適，有望成主流商品；其中單人護理的設計，可釋放出雙倍以上的護理人力照護患者，減輕醫療量能的負擔，藉由模擬傳統人力抬肩設計，護理人員得以單人協助患者進行每 2 小時面部翻面作業，除了確保病患俯臥通氣治療時避免管路壓迫與滑脫的安全性，更有效降低患者俯臥壓瘡風險，減輕護理人員照護之壓力。

translations.name: Pro-care Optima Prone
translations.description: APEX Pro-care Optima Prone is designed for patients with Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS).  It can be used to help patients with moderate to severe ARDS caused by COVID-19 during prone positioning treatment, reduces the risk of pressure injuries, and avoids potential complications.  Patients can take prone positions more comfortably with the product, especially patients with severe COVID-19 who need prone positioning treatment, it can also help improve the oxygenation state and reduce discomfort from long-term bed rest.  The Single-Handed Care design can reduce the number of nurses required, and alleviate the burdens of insufficient medical staff.  With the simulation of human shoulder lifting design, a nurse can operate facial turning for patients every 2 hours alone.  Not only does this reduce the risk of patients suffering pipeline compression and slippage, but it also effectively reduces the risk of pressure injuries and alleviates stresses caused by manpower shortages.

translations.name: 安鎂睡眠呼吸治療裝置-模組式口部介面
translations.description:
iNAP安鎂睡眠呼吸治療裝置為採用口內負壓治療阻塞性睡眠呼吸中止症之治療方案。裝置利用負壓牽引口腔軟組織，維持舌顎後方呼吸道通暢，使患者自然呼吸，達到治療OSA目的。有別於陽壓呼吸器(CPAP)需於睡眠時穿戴面罩常引起不適，iNAP ONE採非面罩式設計，使用者只需於口腔配戴軟質“口部介面”，大幅提升療程舒適度。
“口部介面”作為負壓睡眠呼吸器與CPAP最大差異，不僅是產品的核心，也是使用者於睡眠過程全程配戴，能否長期採行負壓睡眠呼吸治療的關鍵；基於讓使用者擁有最佳體驗，與“每個人都能找到最適合自己的口部介面”的理想，用戶導向設計的「模組式口部介面I08」應運而生。
iNAP安鎂睡眠呼吸治療裝置「模組式口部介面I08」透過模組化三個部件：嘴唇擋片、舌頭擋片與負壓傳遞板，提供5 x 4 x 4多達80種的組合，達成全客製化目的。材質選用無毒且生物相容的矽膠製作而成。求診者經醫師專業建議搭配出專屬於個人，舒適度勝出、固定性更佳且夜間使用時負壓氣密性提升的口部介面組合。
iNAP「模組式口部介面I08」已完成歐盟CE取證並試行，初期先推行3x3共9種的組合，已能滿足八成以上的族群需求。

translations.name: iNAP Sleep Therapy System - Oral Interface
translations.description:
To improve the deficiencies of mainstream OSA treatment solutions such as CPAP, the iNAP One Sleep Therapy using intraoral negative air pressure that treats the problem differently and without a mask: it delivers a light, oral vacuum to comfortably open the airway while breathing normally through the nose during sleep.
iNAP has a soft, flexible Oral Interface that user wearing during sleep, which giving excellent wearing comfort comparing to face mask. Echo to the need for user-oriented therapy experiences, the new generation iNAP Oral Interface I08 not only improving the fixing in the oral cavity, enabling higher negative air pressure for better therapy result, but also supporting fully customizable module for every user.
iNAP Oral Interface I08 is combined with 3 parts: Lip Shield, Tongue Shield and Flexible Plate, each part with different sizes result in total 80 combination available. User can select proper iNAP Oral Interface size according to physician's evaluation.

translations.name: 自動化核酸萃取機
translations.description:
精浚開發的自動化核酸萃取機(NAPB-16)係以國際領導品牌日本精準系統科學公司(PSS)所研製的magLEAD 12GC為目標開發
NAPB-16具備下述幾項優勢：
1. 可同步平行處理16個檢體，優於PSS的12個
2. 定位槽數達PSS的4倍以上，可配合更多元的試劑應用
3. 液體移載體積、解析度與誤差皆優於國際市場領導品牌，不只提高樣品適用範圍，更符合精準醫療需求
4. 支援電腦控制，無顯示器大小與儲存容量的限制，也因此具備遠端更新、線上支援服務
5. 可於電腦上自行編輯所需自動化流程，因此能加速試劑開發與最佳化性能參數
6. 支援標準規格耗材，增加操作人員的使用意願與熟悉度

產品以「品質」為核心，「研發」為驅動，「顧客服務」為目標。兼容開放式架構與客戶導向開發創新產品，更符合客製化需求
1. 理性價值：於ISO 9001、ISO 13485與GMP規範下的品質保證
2. 感性價值：全MIT產品研發、設計與製造，引導相關組織重視醫療設備在地化
3. 象徵價值：全自製自動化核酸萃取機協助整合並打造國產醫療體系與台製供應鏈

translations.name: 高效隔離與透氣之可沖洗式環保口罩
translations.description:
(1)由雙模組結構所構成，達到可水洗200次以上仍具備99%以上的抗病毒/菌效果，且可依據不同場合環境做組合搭配。
(2)第一模組由雙層特殊紗布結合，具防潑水、可水洗、抗菌防護效果，具快速排熱與親膚性的效果，且經抗UV與 抗菌處理，可以水洗重覆使用。
(3)第二模組由五層特殊材質合而為一的物理隔離技術，第一層是要以能夠塑型為重點，第二、四層是特殊保護材(保護第三層)，第三層是奈米薄膜，第五層是以親膚性材質為主，此模組酒精消毒後可以重複使用，此層結構是要安置於內藏式口袋內，
(4)雙心扁條式的鼻樑壓條設計，為全面性的防護，其扁條可以舒適的密合在鼻樑處，並以雙壓條方式達到更舒適與密合的防護。
(5)舒適便利可快速調節之耳扣設計：扁狀式矽膠調節扣設計，以符合手指按壓的人體工學設計與使用矽膠材質，可在調節長度的時候方便按壓移動，而不造成耳朵的負擔。
(6)特殊的丄縫法與立體裁剪(draping)方式， 讓鼻腔部可以具備些許的空間，並可將臉頰兩側更為密合，達到高度防護效果。
(7)內藏式口袋設計 ：在口罩內層部位，設計一個可以再插入濾片(第二模組)的口袋設計，達到攜帶、置換等多項便利性。

translations.name: 智慧傷口照護機
translations.description:
本產品為全球第一台成功將彩色、熱感及3D等三種取像裝置同時應用於傷口照護的產品。茲簡要說明各項特色功能之創新價值如下:
(1)3D相機: 用於傷口的輪廓偵測以及面積/體積計算，相較於傳統透過紙尺估算或描繪方格紙所進行的人工尺寸量測，本產品可大幅縮減醫護人員的護理時間。
(2)彩色相機: 用於肉芽/腐肉/焦痂等各類型傷口組織之紀錄及佔比分析，相較於傳統手工紀錄及人眼判別，本產品可大幅縮減時間並提升準確度。
(3)熱感相機: 用於紀錄傷口及附近區域之體溫分布，進而作為醫護人員關於該區域血流(復原)狀況的重要參考資訊。
(4)搭載WiFi及視訊功能，可讓執行在宅醫療的護理人員直接與院內醫生進行遠端診療討論，大幅提升醫療效率並延伸服務範圍。
(5)產品所記錄之傷口相關資訊並可依照病例號進行彙集整理，讓醫護病三方均可迅速得知傷口復原與治療方式的歷史趨勢，做為後續治療及保健的參考。
(6)產品同步搭載一維/二維條碼掃描以及IC卡功能，便於病例資料的讀取及記錄，讓整個醫療服務程序更加流暢。

translations.name: Smart Wound Carer
translations.description:
“Smart wound carer” is the very first product in the world integrating color, thermal and 3D sensors for the wound caring application. The innovative characteristics are,
(1)3D camera detects contour and calculates dimension/volume of wound areas. It decreases time spent comparing to traditional process, with scaled paper strips or ruled papers.
(2)Color camera records the skin status, such as granulating, sloughy or necrotic, and analyzes the proportion of each type. It sharply raises efficiency and analyzing accuracy.
(3)Thermal camera records temperature distribution around wound area to provide promising reference of blood velocity and recovery trends.
(4)WiFi and video call functions deliver remote treatment of doctors in hospitals during home healthcare and also extend service range and improve efficiency.
(5)Recorded info. could be documented and sorted for a history of recovery and treatment.
(6)Bar code scanner and IC(smart) card reader smoothen the archiving and service flow.

translations.name: InsightEyes EGD System
translations.description:
Insight Medical Solutions developed the world's first magnetically controlled capsule endoscope capable of completely examining the upper digestive tract (EGD).

The InsightEyes EGD System is a medical device designed to observe the upper digestive tract (esophagus, stomach, duodenum). The device provides responsive real-time video and control is achieved through a magnetic field navigator. The InsightEyes EGD System realizes anesthesia-free, painless, disposable and cross infection-free upper gastrointestinal endoscopy with an easy examination process and high patient acceptance. The fear of traditional endoscopic examinations, medical risks of anesthesia and postoperative complications can be avoided. It can provide early diagnosis and early treatment for various common diseases of the esophagus and stomach.

translations.name: 720° 雙效紫外線多功能消毒盒
translations.description:
1.本產品以紫外線光學消毒為研發基礎，為打破傳統消毒之概念(ex：熱水煮沸消毒、陽光曝曬殺菌、消毒液殺菌等)，研發非典型消毒模式之殺菌產品；以UVC為基礎，搭配專利導光盒，使UVC光線實現全周720°照射功效。
2.市場上同類型之產品，多以UVC直接照射消毒為主，而此類產品皆有一項通病「死角」，在物品放至消毒裝置內時，該物品的底部，大部分無法被UVC光源照射到；本產品為解決此通病，在多次篩選合適的材質與測試後，研發出UVC消毒裝置專屬的「導光盒」，導光盒能使UVC LED在作用時，使光源擴散至裝置內全範圍，藉此達到「無死角」的消毒。

translations.name: 720°Double-Effect Multi-Function UV Sterilizer Box
translations.description:
1.The sterilizer box is an atypical sterilizing device based on UV, breaking the concept of traditional disinfection such as sun-exposed method, water-boiled method or other liquid sanitizers. The patented fantastic box along with the UVC maximize the efficacy of 720 ° sterilization, and also succeed in the product proposition of high efficacy.
2.The same types of sterilizer boxes in the market, primarily using the direct UVC exposure for disinfection, have a common disadvantage - the blind spot. A large proportion of the object's bottom couldn't receive the UVC light when placed in the sterilizer box. However, our product solves the issue, the blind spot, after series of screening and testing for the material. The invention of the exclusive fantastic box for UVC LED sterilizer boxes eliminates the blind spot. During the operation of UVC,The fantastic box assists the light source in spreading out the full range in the equipment/ sterilizer box to reach the proposition of no blind spot.

translations.name: 隔膜式抽水真空幫浦
translations.description:
洛科全新設計的「Alligator 200隔膜式抽水真空幫浦」重新定義過濾架構，採創新的「直接排水」設計，讓濾液流經幫浦並直接排除，以簡便的操作方式克服傳統抽氣過濾的不便，以「省時、省力、省空間、安全」四大特點為用戶創造最大價值：

(1)「省時」- 加快30%過濾速度
抽水幫浦整體過濾時間較傳統抽氣組合縮減30%以上。
(2) 「省力」- 增進30%效率
直接排水設計不需清除廢液，免除拆裝瓶組、倒除廢液、清潔管線等步驟，簡化流程、節省人力。
(3)「省空間」 - 節省40%空間
不需廢液瓶直接排除廢液，節省40%空間，解決實驗室空間不足的困惱。
(4) 「安全」
避免廢液處理有害物質的接觸，也不需擔憂廢液滿溢而損壞幫浦，專注於實驗流程。

Alligator 200隔膜式抽水真空幫浦符合ISO 8199 國際標準，是微生物、懸浮固形物(SS)過濾的最佳選擇。 洛科 讓過濾更簡單！

translations.name: Diaphragm Liquid Pump
translations.description:
Rocker “Alligator 200, Diaphragm Liquid Pump” comes with a built-in liquid pump that transferring filtered liquid directly to waste which overcomes the disadvantages of traditional filtration. 

Alligator 200 touches customers’ heart by 4 main features: “time-, effort-, space-saving, and safe”.

(1) 30% Time-Saving
The filtration time of liquid pump system is 30% faster than air pump system.
(2) Effort-Saving
Improve 30% efficiency by simplifying manpower process, such as cleaning, disconnecting and installing steps.
(3) 40% Space-Saving
No need of waste bottle to collect waste liquid, save 40% bench space.
(4) Safe
No need to worry about contact hazardous in waste liquid or pump damage from overflowing.

Alligator 200, Diaphragm Liquid Pump, which complies with ISO8199, is widely used in water analysis, such as microbiological test and suspended solid test (SS). 
Rocker makes filtration easy!

translations.name: Pvix Oral  AR擴增實境專業口腔照護與保健訓練系統
translations.description:
PVIX Oral是全球首創的AR技術應用於口腔保健與照護的訓練系統，透過提倡口腔健康教育來推動國民口腔保健意識以減少健保支出的問題。藉此訓練系統協助公衛照護相關科系、社區健康中心等機構作為口腔照護及保健所需的必備訓練課程，期望達成年長者80歲後保持口腔內有20顆牙之終極目標，可更加落實口腔醫學深根台灣預防醫學內。

Pvix Oral系統是全球首套針對口腔保健的互動式AR擴增實境模擬訓練系統，利用光學定位追蹤裝有光學定位元件之牙刷、牙間刷及口腔軟組織棉刷，搭配貝氏刷牙法及模擬食物殘渣與牙菌斑的清潔課程軟體，訓練者或被照護者在實境模擬後立即得知操作手勢、角度、力道與潔淨評分，可即時改善口腔清潔訓練成效。

1. 豐富且完整之軟體，未來擴充性高：
  1) 擁有即時互動與真實呈現3D可視化界面
  2) 具備完整的牙刷、牙間刷及口腔軟組織棉刷等口腔清潔課程
2. 多種產品組合，硬體可高度適應配合客戶環境：
  1) 配合不同訓練空間與需求提供多種硬體裝設方式
  2) 可結合市面任何牙刷、牙間刷及口腔軟組織棉刷品牌，達成最大適用性

translations.name: 威力秀雷射治療儀
translations.description:
威力秀雷射治療儀藉由非侵入性的低能量紅光和近紅外光雷射(low-level laser therapy, LLLT)照射體表，改善局部血液循環、使肌肉放鬆、緩和神經痛、肌肉痛、肩膀痠痛及關節疾病產生的疼痛，並促進傷口癒合。本產品由336個紅光雷射二極體及30多個低能量的雷射模組發射光能量，專為大面積患部使用而設計，雷射光源為發散型半導體雷射，非聚焦光源。可藉光回授系統以確保光功率穩定。具彩色控制面板，調整輸出功率及照射時間。
近年來分子生物學提出了證據，解讀LLLT作用機制如下：人類細胞內粒線體內有細胞色素C氧化酶(cytochrome C oxidase)在吸收近紅外光後會釋放出一氧化氮基(NO) ，增加電子遷移、粒線體膜電位與ATP，從而增加新陳代謝率，增加局部血流量，也會導致抗氧化保護作用，有抗發炎作用，並且促成神經和突觸再生，使神經營養蛋白增加。紅光增強金屬蛋白酶(MMP)之表現，進而促成細胞外膠原蛋白生成及重組，剌激膠原蛋白生成的受動器分子是β轉換生長因子(TGF-β)，經由SMAD訊號路徑受到近紅外光調變。

translations.name: Venusure Light System
translations.description: The Venusure laser light system irradiates the body surface with non-invasive low-power red light and near-infrared light (low-level laser therapy, LLLT) to improve local blood circulation, relax muscles, and relieve neuralgia and muscle pain, shoulder pain and joint disease pain, and promote wound healing. Venusure emits light energy from 336 red light and 30 infrared light laser diodes, which are specially designed for use on a large, and divergent and non-focused light source. The built-in optical feedback system is used to ensure stable optical power. With a color control panel, the user can adjust the output power and irradiation time.
