translations.name: 安心臥照護系統- 天才床墊
translations.description:
本產品「WhizPad天才床墊」以「舒適為核心、用健康做加值」為設計理念，首創將舒適減壓（褥瘡防護）、睡眠健康管理與即時照顧提醒功能（離床預警）合而為一。
床墊材質採用「IMAGER-37 ®」品牌核心溫感釋壓記憶泡綿，特殊泡綿材質可隨人體體溫變化軟硬度，為睡眠者提供良好減壓放鬆與脊椎支撐效果；床墊內嵌軟質壓力感測器，以舒適、非穿非戴方式結合「AI智慧」大數據分析進行智能睡眠感測，後端搭配「標準物聯網技術」開發的系統平台提供即時臥床資訊顯示、睡眠品質及生活常模報告查閱、離床與異常臥床事件通報、日常生理量測(血壓、血糖、血氧、體溫)及環境溫溼度資訊查閱等功能；產品首創採用非插電式的電池供電設計，安全性高且可長時間運作；近端搭配NBIoT通信路由器，插電後即可主動上傳睡眠感測活動與其它藍牙設備量測資料至雲端平台進行後續分析與應用；床墊布套可選擇高品質涼感抗菌纖維布套/高防水難燃抗菌PU布套，滿足不同使用情境與需求。
「WhizPad天才床墊」具備高舒適、安裝簡單、直覺使用、安全等產品優勢，使用者無需改變生活習慣，即可隨時隨地進行「自我健康管理、科技照顧應用」，提升日常生活品質與健康狀態。

translations.description:
「WhizPad」 innovates to integrate the applications of sleep comfort and pressure relief, health management, and care reminders. 
The mattress material is adopting the exclusive temperature-sensitive and viscoelastic memory foam to facilitate the perfect pressure redistribution and body support；The embedded soft sensing units of the mattress middle to collect the sleep movements in an unwearable way；By integrating the technologies of AI machine learning, standard IoT protocol, and NBIoT, the mattress system could turn out meaningful health data and life pattern (real-time and historical data of sleep, vital signals of BP, Glucose, SpO2, BT, and environmental parameters), and transmit out for further applications without complex setting.
The features of「WhizPad」are high comfort, ease to install, Intuitive to use, and high safety so that users could do self-health management or telecare applications to enhance the life quality and health status without changing any habits or environment.

translations.name: 克微粒口罩
translations.description:
戴口罩是希望可以得到多一些的保護，然而一般的醫療口罩所使用的靜電熔噴濾材會隨著使用的時間，過濾效能逐漸下降，針對氣溶膠粒子的汙染也無法有效的過濾。 克微粒口罩採用奈米薄膜，以物理性孔洞大小比較進行過濾，不怕濕氣，可以長時間保持一定的過濾效能，同時針對氣溶膠的粒子可以進行有效過濾，提供更好的防護性。

一般的靜電熔噴濾材為了達到高效過濾, 會用較多層的濾材層層堆疊, 進而造成口罩的透氣率差, 配戴的舒適度不足。 克微粒口罩採微多孔過濾概念, 孔洞非常小, 因此可以過濾 PM0.075 達99% 等同N95等級 , 同時薄膜的開孔率達  85%以上, 利用把孔做小達到高效過濾, 與把孔做多, 增加換氣面積的概念, 同時兼具高效過濾與舒適透氣， 並起加入時尚的美感設計。

克微粒口罩可水洗再使用, 也可噴灑酒精進行消毒, 大量的減少垃圾汙染, 保護自己也環保保護地球

克微粒口罩定位高階的空汙防護口罩與醫用口罩的防護性差異議很大， 因此捨棄一般口罩常用的通路系統，例如:藥局，美妝與超市等大家所熟識的通路。 克微粒與健康專業通路進行合作, 例如 康健雜誌, 安永鮮物與長榮航空。

translations.description: 【光電薄膜貼布】產品特色是一款全球首創「遠紅外線+負電位」2in1的薄膜醫療保健貼布，具高度創新性且能開啟醫療保健貼布2.0新世代的藍海市場。功能設計是利用高效陶瓷粒子、四氧化三鐵(Fe3O4)及磁化鈦等作為基材，運用高效陶瓷粒子釋放生育光線6－14μm波長遠紅外線，發放率高達98%以上。行銷通路上，本公司以『0800新零售商業平台』為全球首創結合電信、互聯網、自媒體、新零售的新商業系統服務模式，消費者只需以0800-53 7885（零八零零-我痠 請幫幫我）即可進入線上服務管理平台，藉由精準操作介面可以完成個人化痠痛健康管理、個人化商品推薦、線上影音及直播等系統服務，創造消費者認同感及實質銷售與回購。目前已與四川柏泰生物科技有限公司、廣東藍健醫藥有限公司、湖南愛腦健康科技有限公司與福建美度商貿有限公司簽署授權經銷。除瞄準台灣及中國大陸市場之外，亦逐步申請多國專利與清真認證，積極佈局東南亞國際市場。此外，亦與全球安麗（Amway）、日本大塚製藥及北京同仁堂等接洽產品市場合作。

Consumers can enter the online service management platform with 0800-53 7885 through the precise operation interface. Currently, we are signed the authorized distribution with Sichuan Botai Biological Technology, Guangdong Lanjian Pharmaceutical, Hunan Love Brain Health Technology and Fujian Mido Trading Company.

translations.name: 可重複使用施夾器及血管扣夾
translations.description:
台灣先進『Inno-Hook™可重複使用施夾器』，搭配塑膠聚合物材質(Polymer)的『Inno-Hook™台灣先進血管扣夾』使用。Inno-Hook™血管扣夾的專利扣合設計，在閉合血管後夾持力更牢固，且止血扣夾的尺寸與包裝選擇較多，定位於閉合血管數目較少、或是需閉合較大的血管組織的內視鏡手術 (例如:闌尾切除術、腎臟切除術)。
『Inno-Hook™可重複使用施夾器』的創新可拆式設計，可直接更換耗損的鉗嘴組件，而毋須汰換整把施夾器，降低材料與零件的浪費並提升維修的便利性；而未來，將會開發加長型鉗嘴 (適用於肥胖手術的血管閉合)、帶有25~40度轉折的鉗嘴 (適用於肺葉切除術的血管閉合)，以及移除止血夾的鉗嘴組件。即單一可拆式施夾器的本體，可搭配多種內視鏡手術功能需求的鉗嘴組件；此創新獨家設計，可大幅提升止血夾施夾於手術使用的多元性與效益，符合環保意識抬頭、因應醫療院所大量使用時的經濟成本考量。
Inno-Hook™可重複使用施夾器與台灣先進於2020獲獎的連發鈦止血夾之InnoClip™『可重複使用施夾器』，在產品的設計與應用上互補，提供內視鏡手專業醫療人員完整的止血夾閉合方案。

translations.name: Inno-Hook™ Reusable Clip Applier and Ligating Clip
translations.description:
The Inno-Hook™ Reusable Clip Applier and Ligating Clip are dedicated to the ligation of laparoscopic minimal invasive surgery. The Inno-Hook™ Ligating Clips are single-fire polymer clips with patented design for secure clip retention performance, applicable to ligating larger size of vessels and tissues, such as those of laparoscopic Appendectomy and Nephrectomy.

The Inno-Hook™ Reusable Clip Applier is innovative with the changeable tip, which allows the replacement of worn-out jaws by changing the tip instead of disposing the whole applier. Apart from the standard jaw tip, the applier body can also be assembled with the extended jaw for bariatric surgery, 20°and 45°angled jaw for lobectomy surgery, and clip remover tip for unlocking the closed clip. This unique design broadens its application in surgery procedures and reduces the maintenance cost for hospitals.

translations.description: 安必測®新冠肺炎抗原檢測是智能抗原快篩解決方案，它是台灣製造開發廠唯一以分析儀精密判讀之數位快篩產品。透過電腦快速分析快篩結果的優勢，降低傳統快篩試劑由人為判讀和誤測產生的公共衛生風險。此外，安必測®檢測結果以分析儀同步發送至受測者的PixoHealth數位通行證和企業健康管理平台，為企業、學校、旅遊產業以及受測者本身皆提供高度便利的快篩檢測和環境安全管理流程。安盛生科建構數位快篩結合健康數據管理兩大應用場域，開發全端數位化之智能抗原快篩解決方案，幫助採用機構在社區或半封閉式的群聚場所進行快速、便利、具防堵疫情爆發效益的疫情管理措施，展現安必測®降低營運停擺危機和風險管控的價值。

translations.name: digital COVID-19 rapid antigen test
translations.description:
PixoTest® POCT COVID-19 Antigen Test is the end-to-end digitalized solution to prevent further outbreaks. The fully digitized testing and reporting design shortens the test-to-report time to 15 minutes. In addition to overcoming the lab testing limitations, the solution allows for scaling in large screening settings, thereby enabling business continuity and reopening.

Computer-powered accurate results in 15 minutes: The PixoTest® POCT Analyzer reads test results objectively, healthcare organizations and corporations can minimize the risks of having false-negative cases compared to rapid tests interpreted by human eyes.

Concurrent reporting and digital health pass issuance: The PixoTest® POCT Analyzer transmits test results simultaneously to the PixoHealth Pass App users via an encrypted QR code. The digital health pass also records App users’ vaccination certificates, helping free movement in the upcoming summer holiday season.

translations.name: 變頻水冷電動抽吸機
translations.description:
「變頻水冷電動抽吸機」特別針對耗水、節能以及故障率問題進行改良，安裝有節水裝置，可大幅降低運轉水耗，比市面上現有水冷吸唾機可減少47%耗水量，且有配置自來水穩壓裝置，避免過高水壓造成管理元件之損耗，還加入2道自來水過濾器，減少進水管路因堵塞造成之漏水與水壓不足等狀況，每年可省下可觀的水費。機殼內包含有一組「變頻驅動控制模組」，此模組導入本公司獨有專利(M587984U)技術，搭載高性能(採用日本富士電機)的變頻驅動系統來控制真空泵，不僅可解決患者因為真空吸唾機吸力不穩定而感到不舒適的問題，相較於傳統的泵，本產品更能節電58%，能替牙科診所減少昂貴的電費支出。
本產品採用三相電力泵，完全不須使用電容及機械式開關接點等零組件，省下大筆的耗材支出，更能大幅降低因零組件損耗而造成機械故障的因素。此外，本產品以數位式進行儀器監控，方便使用人員判定異常狀態，可快速診斷故障原因、快速檢修，大幅節省維修時效。本公司一直秉持著讓醫師執業順暢的服務理念，以節能減碳為主軸開發出本產品，為台灣第一台國產變頻式機型，可取代進口產品，顯示本公司創新研發均能針對牙科診所遇到的痛點進行設計開發，符合市場需求。

translations.name: frequency conversion water-cooled suction machine
translations.description:
The product is specially designed for the improvement of water consumption, energy-saving, and failure rate. Equipped with water-saving devices, it can greatly reduce operating water consumption, reducing by 47% compared with others on the market. Containing a set of "variable frequency drive control module", which introduces our unique patent technology, this product can save electricity by 58% compared with traditional pumps and can reduce expensive electricity expenses for dental clinics. By adopting a three-phase electric pump, the product saves a large amount of consumables expenditure, and can greatly reduce the factors of mechanical failure due to component loss. 
With energy-saving and carbon-reduction as the main concept, this is the first domestically-made inverter model in Taiwan, which can replace imported products. It shows that our innovative R&D can target the pain points encountered in dental clinics, and also meet market needs.

translations.description:

「EZYPRO®心律不整檢測方案：藍牙即時監測版」
1. ECG Recorder 心電訊號記錄器

- 獨家研發AI演算法，深度訓練龐大的心電訊號數據庫，使分析精確度不斷進化
- 獨有的專業心電圖分析中心，嚴格培訓來自醫檢/護理背景的專業人員，快速精準產出高品質的心電圖分析報告，協助醫師心律不整診斷率>60%，即時病灶治療

The groundbreaking patent patch complies with international biocompatibility regulations and can better accommodate Asia climate due to greater permeability and dry quicker. Patients can complete wear time as prescribed in comfort. Low skin irritation, High clinical satisfaction.
3.	ECG Analyzer
The analysis software keeps improving due to the well-trained AI algorithm. Along with our ECG analysis center, we provide accurate and comprehensive ECG analysis reports, helping doctors make further diagnoses and treatments

translations.name: 隨護
translations.description: 產品擁有高機動性及輕量化的隔離屏風，採用自我研發專利的移動式輪組結構，移動時能吸收路面顛簸所產生的振動，產品具模組化能快速組裝及摺疊設計，在不需使用時進行暫時收摺，降低產品體積，在緊急時刻大量立即佈署於各大場域使用，更適合取代大型負壓檢疫亭的不便性，為了避免病患間交互感染，手套使用磁扣式快速拆換設計，讓醫護不需工具能自行更換手套，為了保護醫護人員避免直接的病毒接觸，在屏風開發上特別設計防止口腔飛沫溢散的阻隔結構，達到安全零接觸的採檢作業，為了讓產品提供極佳的防護力以及感染控制能力，研發團隊透過材質及表面處理，進行屏風表面抑菌材質測試選用以及銀離子噴塗技術，噴塗於產品主架構，並搭配UVC殺菌燈，使產品達到主動抑菌殺菌之能力，透過SGS及台美檢驗等第三方公證，有效的立即清潔便達到抗菌滅菌的雙重效果。另外，與工研院研發團隊共同合作開發智慧型辨識系統及光源追蹤系統，藉由雙重確認機制避免檢體誤取後造成更多錯誤的處置措施，及臉部辨識光源追蹤，實現達成醫護零接觸採檢的可能。

translations.name: 微型空氣品質感測器II
translations.description:
經昌VISION，微型空氣品質感測器I，在苗栗縣創下良好的評價與實績，成功協助縣政府環保局，查獲10家不法工廠，及預防阻止一場瓦斯外洩，可能氣爆的公安危機。

「微型空氣品質感測器II」，以I代實務經驗與反饋為依據，延續發展設計，適用於戶外不同場域，可依不同需求，輕鬆擴充感測功能，具有「多感測模組化的設計」；PM2.5感測，使用工研院技轉技術，是目前空氣品質監測網中，唯一台灣研發設計製造，有「優異的感測性能」；網路傳輸，採LTE通信技術及具有GPS定位功能；考量施工維護需求，具備可視化設計及遠端維護管理，「便利設備維護檢查」；在外觀色彩，以藍、白顏色搭配，跳脫呆板視覺，融入環境色彩。

微型空氣品質感測器II，已運用於「行政院環境保護署－空氣品質監測網」，做為空氣品質感測器之一，為民眾的空氣品質把關。

translations.name: AI精準上下肢協調及肌力訓練機
translations.description:
本產品為國內首創結合肩推跟抬腿一機雙用智慧運動機，透過負重阻力運動，達到增進肌力效果，運用AI人工智慧分析，提供精準個人化訓練處方。疫後時代消費者逐漸將健身習慣移至家中或傾向使用個人型健身房，透過虛擬教練與遠端視訊的設計，使用時如有專業個人教練在旁，真人教練可不受時空限制給予建議，安全與專業兼具。

三、個人化結合智慧化，整合量測數據、運動即時紀錄，運用AI分析，協助建立個人化之健康促進計畫，不須繁瑣數據紀錄或目標換算，就可進行自我健康管理，滿足現代人期待。以虛擬智能教練與動態軌跡追蹤，互動人性化設計，達到正確且有效的訓練。結合人臉辨識、Line、RFID卡多元登入，免帶會員卡。結合體溫監控、實聯制，滿足疫後需求

translations.name: 智復寶
translations.description:
關節疾病、五十肩、中風患者們經常要面對手術後的復健，這段復健旅程關係到癒後優劣。復健期間主治醫師會運用量角器來判斷患者恢復的程度，進而決定下一階段的復健計畫，智復寶(BoostFix)從提升醫師在關節角度量測的準確度出發，降低醫師使用傳統量角器15度的誤差範圍至1度，讓患者復健的細微變化能被察覺。

2020年因應疫情爆發，依循市場遠距需求，智復寶從原先數位化關節角度，新增線上復健平台、骨骼肌肉照護服務，綜合提供遠距復健解決方案。醫師能遠端開立復健處方讓患者在家中施作，系統會自動記錄患者的動作軌跡、統計施作頻率，方便醫護電話關心患者、叮嚀需要注意的復健狀況，避免離開醫院後的居家復健，患者因醫護不在身旁指導、以及不規律的練習頻率導致二度受傷。

近期神寶團隊甚至讓智復寶由被動診療轉變為主動篩檢的工具，針對糖尿病患者提供「智復寶五十肩風險評估服務」，搭配展覽活動協助民眾早期發現五十肩，就醫時也能搭配智復寶的遠距照護服務縮短療程。智復寶由數位化設備起頭，現階段已能提供多元化的數位醫療解決方案，包含骨骼肌肉照護、遠距復健療程、五十肩風險評估。

translations.name: 輔聽器
translations.description:
產品創新與獨特性
1.	人聲分離及人聲突顯技術: 能夠將環境噪音降低10dB 。於多人交談情況下，對於聆聽人聲加強突顯，能夠對目標人聲提高6dB的S/N, 周圍所有的聲音同步放大，處理後的人聲容易混進其他噪音裡，使用者在過程中無法順利交談. 
2.	尋找遺失輔聽器:當使用者遺失輔聽器，配合手機GPS 功能，標示出輔聽器位置並發出聲音，方便尋找遺失輔聽器.
3.	數位動態音頻補償及音頻調整	使用WDRC系統及 8個頻道數處理，放大率隨著輸入音量的大小而改變，小聲時放大率最大，而大聲時則減小，增加可聽度及舒適度。無法針對各個動態音頻補償及音頻調整做設定，會出現小聲的音放大量不夠，而大聲響會不舒適，影響使用者能夠長時間配戴. 
行銷創新
1.	積極參與台灣與國際性產品賽事，提升產品價值與理念.
2.	積極參與國內聽覺公益團體合作，提升品牌知名度.

translations.name: 4D極舒感支撐型醫療口罩
translations.description:
「4D極舒感支撐型醫療口罩」系列產品獨創楊氏支撐(Yang's support )專利技術，以內建雙支撐條，擴大呼吸空間100%，就像充滿氣體、膨脹升空的熱氣球般飽滿，使口罩在不影響本身防護效果、不改變民眾對於平面口罩的使用習慣下，直接將結構升級成具多項優點的創新口罩，同時解決了市面上平面口罩常見的痛點，具備「呼吸空間超飽滿、換氣順暢不遮鼻、不碰口鼻超乾爽、空間硬挺不沾妝、眼睛鏡片不起霧」的優點。
本產品符合醫療等級，罩體第一層使用親膚柔軟不織布，透氣性佳，可吸附呼吸的水氣，長時間配舒適乾爽，中間層使用熔噴不織布過濾網，有效阻隔、過濾各種病菌粉塵或微粒，最外層使用PP防潑水不織布，防止口沫、霧氣滲透，本產品已通過CNS 14774、CNS 14775、CNS 14776、CNS 14777、CNS 10285、ASTM F2299-2003等國家標準測試，經實測壓差(呼吸阻抗)4mm H2O/cm2以下，可阻斷95%的3微米(µm)以上微粒，細菌過濾率(BFE) ≥95%，足以證實能有效阻斷病毒透過飛沫途徑傳播，可作為防疫、對抗COVID-19的重要利器。

translations.name: 4D Extremely Comfortable Supporting Medical Mask
translations.description:
With the original Yang's support of built-in double-support strips patented technology, the"4D extremely comfortable supportive medical mask " expands the breathing space by 100%, similar to an inflated hot air balloon, without affecting its protective effect and changing people’s wearing habits, directly upgrades its structure to an innovative mask with many advantages. It also solves the common pain points of masks, having the advantages of full breathing space, smooth air without covering the nose, super dry without touching the mouth and nose, stiff space without makeup, and no fogging on lenses. 
The product has passed numerous national testing standards. The measured pressure difference (respiratory impedance) is below 4mm H2O/cm2, and it can block 95% of particles above 3 microns (µm), and the bacterial filtration rate ≥95%, which can effectively block the virus from spreading, and can be used as an important weapon for epidemic prevention and fighting COVID-19.

translations.description: WMP-24M針對手術房研發的醫療級觸控電腦，採獨特抗菌鋁壓鑄設計，達95%以上抑菌，能防醫院爆發二次感染，兼具造型美觀優勢；業界獨創電源不外露設計，促使手術安全進行；前框升級為五面IP65防水防塵，領先同業設計，大幅提升手術行進的清潔抑菌安全性。搭載Intel最新的第10代CPU Comet Lake系列Core i7-10700TE (Passmark: 16332)，中美萬泰自主研發無風扇技術控溫散熱，以智慧化i-Control智能軟體能最佳化用電量、電腦效能及散熱，使WMP-24M在各種醫院系統運作下依然穩定並能延長使用壽命，通過最新醫療認證MDR/UL/EN 60601-1，在高電壓環境下，與眾多精密醫療設備結合，依然可以保有產品的安全性與穩定度。並透過I.O.絕緣設計，有效防止醫療設備的電源回朔，避免昂貴器材燒毀的風險。此外，採用不斷電設計，增加手術穩定安全性，及三段式DICOM支援各種醫療影像顯示更準確，影像輸入Video-In為針對醫療手術應用的獨到設計，與多年深耕醫療產業的策略夥伴共同開發此手術醫療級專用觸控電腦，已獲醫院預訂。

translations.name: 海昌真水感月拋隱形眼鏡
translations.description:
「海昌®真水感月拋拋隱形眼鏡」秉持「舒適源自於專業」的信念之下開發出「38%低含水率鏡片配方」、「保存液添加PMB頂極保濕潤澤配方」、「BCC獨特切角設計」、「雙非球面技術」、「抗UV配方」等五項核心技術，使鏡片備齊了以下特性：
(1) 低含水鏡片不和眼睛搶水份，也更穩定耐用、不易變形；(2) 保存液添加PMB頂極保濕潤澤配方讓鏡片更水潤舒適，不易乾澀；(3) BCC獨特切角設計，增加濕潤減低配戴的異物感；(4) 雙非球面技術，夜間視物更清晰；(5)抗UV配方保護雙眼不受紫外線侵害。
以低含水隱形眼鏡作定位與市場做區隔，產品以專業觀點出發「不和眼睛搶水份」，在包裝設計上，提供2片輕巧貼心裝，來滿足各種消費者的需求。
綜合以上特性，提供消費者最舒適且又高品質的隱形眼鏡產品，同時此核心價值緊扣品牌信念，使產品不僅具有專業特質，並透過持續導入「自動化生產系統」，降低生產成本，創造高C/P質產品，輕鬆減輕消費者荷包負擔(月拋主要目標對象為學生及社會新鮮人)。除了網路、口碑宣傳外，同時也將行銷範圍擴大至社群網路與實體活動，完整涵蓋所有面向消費者，持續且不間斷的推廣產品核心價值與品牌特性。

translations.description:
歐萊德顛覆市面常見造型品類型及油類質地厚重的既定印象，以保養品規格製造符合純素(Vegan)、無麩質(Gluten-Free)、不含基因改造生物(non-GMO)的綠色原料，揭開天然植物油奧秘，黃金比例調和，全新打造兼具護髮功效的油類質地造型品，掀起造型品嶄新革命，成為台灣第一個獲得美國官方USDA Biobased 100%生物基天然永續認證的造型品，更名列全球唯一3支以最高標準通過的造型品之一。

植萃彈力造型油不僅具有打底塑型、彈力支撐等造型效果，更可於造型同時修護受損髮絲，提升秀髮防護力，輕鬆打造唯美捲髮，造型、保養一次完成，讓消費者不須擔心頻繁變換造型導致秀髮受損，讓美麗油然新生。

包裝更以零環境衝擊為目標，瓶身選用100% PCR消費品回收再製塑膠PET材質製成，瓶蓋懷抱著對大自然崇尚與感恩的態度，使用天然素材孟宗竹永續設計，外盒採用FSC森林永續認證與其他可管控資源，並使用植物油墨印製，瓶身顏色更展現設計巧思，嚴選微透金黃瓶器，加乘黃金比例植物油質感，完美綻放植物油金黃色澤，打造綠色永續新時尚，與地球綻放由內而外的美麗。

translations.name: Botanical Curl Defining Oil
translations.description:
Unlike typical beauty oils, Botanical Curl Defining Oil is not heavy or thick. Formulated with vegan, gluten-free and non-GMO ingredients, we discovered the power of natural plants and concocted the perfect balancing botanical blend. It is the first hair styling product in Taiwan to be certified by USDA to contain 100% biobased content.

Botanical Curl Defining Oil creates the ideal foundation for a bouncy hold while bringing luster back to damaged hair. Achieve effortlessly luscious locks and enhanced shine with just one bottle.

With a zero impact mindset, the bottle is made from 100% post-consumer recycled PET materials and topped with a natural moso bamboo cap. The FSC certified outer box promotes the responsible management of the world’s forests. Plant-based ink is also used to ensure the health and well-being of earth. The semi-transparent yellow bottle perfectly blends with the golden color of the oil, enhancing the product’s appeal and visual impression.

translations.name: 智慧健康監測方案2.0
translations.description:
疫情於今年仍舊持續肆虐，伴隨原先的全球高齡化趨勢，加劇「醫療照護資源供不應求」議題，「遠距」的相關商務模式逐漸成型，如「遠距醫療」、「遠距照護」、「遠距健身」，帶動產業紛紛投入轉型。
聚陽與電子科技產業已攜手多年，不侷限於紡織成衣的製作，藉由跨域研發的能量，從了解需求端出發，嘗試滿足健康產業的轉型，以及帶給人們生活實質的幫助。WIIM ONE藉由智慧感測技術結合紡織成衣，與專業領域聯合，透過專利版型、新穎設計、布料優勢，發展出一套智慧健康監測的解決方案。
今年更將感測技術、APP功能與舒適性能，進行大幅度的優化升級，並著手進行國際醫療認證的申請作業，讓產品能更加滿足智慧健康領域的需求。
WIIM ONE搭載即時生理量測之智慧健康平台，友善的使用者介面，提供使用者24小時進行監控，如心率、睡眠、飲水量、活動報告等，協助日常生活、健康、醫療照顧，同時，透過遠端連線及數據上傳，能將使用者的健康監測與安全維護等級優化提升，無論是運動還是生活皆可直接將個人用戶串聯到使用場域，如: 健檢中心、健身房，以利達成有效的鍛鍊，實現真正的遠距健康促進。

WIIM ONE is equipped with a smart health platform with real-time physiological measurement and a friendly user interface. It provides users with 24-hour monitoring, such as heart rate, sleep, water consumption, activity reports, etc., to assist daily life, health, and medical care. At the same time, through remote connection and data upload can optimize the user's health monitoring and safety maintenance level.

translations.name: 智冷衣系統
translations.description:
Covid-19的爆發，帶動民眾通勤習慣的改變，在運動風潮及節能減碳潮流的助攻下，自行車、滑板等非大眾交通工具成為新的熱門首選，但全球升溫加速，帶來極端天氣等氣候危機，戶外溫度異常炎熱，長時間處於高氣溫下，研究指出易造成心血管或呼吸系統問題，甚至嚴重引起熱衰竭。
聚陽及國際消費型電子領導品牌合作，利用日本冷氣壓縮機概念將空調微型化，讓「冷氣」穿著走，透過服飾上特殊專利設計結合導冷模組，貼附於人體的最高溫的中樞上，穿上即可瞬間降溫，讓人處於最舒適的溫度下。
WIIMTEC穿戴式空調服，透過特殊布料、專利服裝版型、製作工法的設計，為整合科技、冷傳導技術與紡織成衣融合的全新概念。選用特殊的涼感材質，配合特殊加工來反射近紅外線(NIR)及阻隔紫外線，達到更好的導冷隔熱效果。
透過手機APP直覺式的操作，可隨時調整溫度，使人體調節至最佳體溫，有效解決各種炎熱情境的不適，讓使用者輕鬆穿著極速降溫，舒適生活無需等待。

translations.name: Cooling Personal T-shirt
translations.description:
Makalot collaborates with leading international consumer electronics brands to use the Japanese technology air-conditioning compressor concept to miniaturize the air conditioner so that the "air-conditioning" can be simple carry everywhere. Through the special patented design on the clothing combined with the conduction cooling module, it is attached to the highest temperature center of the human body. 
WIIMTEC wearable air-conditioning tshirt, through the design of special fabrics, patented clothing patterns is a new concept of integration of technology. The use of special cool-sensing materials and special processing to reflect near-infrared rays (NIR) and block ultraviolet rays to achieve better heat conduction and heat insulation. Simply just connect by mobile phone and APP, the temperature can be adjusted at any time, so that the human body can be adjusted to the best body temperature.
translations.meta_description: Makalot collaborates with leading international consumer electronics brands to use the Japanese technology air-conditioning compressor concept to mini...

translations.name: 熱燙燙金箔
translations.description:
岱稜身為全球前三大燙金箔廠商，在開發熱燙金箔705新系列時，為滿足國際消費品集團對於使用環保包材的承諾(如於2025年包裝有75%以上符合可回收、可再填充、可重複使用)，以及自身對永續的目標。不僅考量燙印在包裝上的安全無毒，將部分配方轉換為環保水性材料，同時亦完美符合國際脫墨認證和EN 13432可堆肥認證的檢驗標準，驗證燙金後的紙張不僅可以回收再利用，亦可被分解，在植物生長實驗中，不含重金屬，不影響植物生長，可做為堆肥使用。
在燙金表現上延續泛用性高的特質，成功兼顧清晰細字線與大面積飽滿度的設計需求，可同時燙印於粗糙與平滑程度不一的紙張，燙金設計的靈活度高，產品寬容度高，可減少印刷廠客戶的備庫困擾。此外，燙金是一門跟溫度和壓力有關的工藝，為了降低燙金時高溫高壓可能形成的燙金缺陷，使燙金面積表現更加飽滿具質感，705新系列配方根據材料黏彈學理論，以流變設備量測材料黏性與彈性行為，重新進行材料設計，確認705新系列在燙印後移除載體膜的瞬間，材料具備足夠的彈性形成內聚力，讓材料從界面之間脫離，完整呈現燙金亮度與色澤。突破綠色包裝既定的設計限制想像。

translations.name: Hot Stamping Foil
translations.description:
Univacco's hot foil 705 new series brings outstanding luster and high-speed performance to the marketplace along with the sustainability needed to meet the world's environmentally-friendly commitments. As certificated by INGEDE and EN13432, the 705 new series is a deinkable, compostable option for brands seeking recyclable, refillable, and reusable packaging solutions. After decomposition, substrates decorated by 705 new series leave no toxic residues nor show any negative effects on the environment.
The 705 new series is designed to be more broadly applicable and usable. It exhibits subtle details, excellent brightness on wide-ranging areas, heat resistance, good adhesion over a wide range of substrates, and advanced performance when used in high-speed stamping jobs, which leads to better stamping efficiency for our printer customers. It is safe and hazard-free, complies with ten different packaging, food contact safety, and consumer product packaging regulations.
translations.meta_description: Univacco's hot foil 705 new series brings outstanding luster and high-speed performance to the marketplace along with the sustainability needed to mee...

translations.name: 愛防水
translations.description:
華彩塗料美杜莎是「建築物保健與預防醫學專家」，參賽產品「愛防水-添加劑」（i-WaterProof），傳承千年古法智慧，以糯米水、沙漿的防水的概念，用植物提煉出天然、無毒、安全的液態型防水，此專利技術可以延長結構體壽命，阻止混擬土孔隙吸水現象所衍生的壁癌問題，是全台首創植物性無機長晶質鈣化物液態防水材料。

本品無毒、無味、安全水性配方，添加於水泥沙中，施工簡易與水泥共工，建築體完工防水即同步完成，省時省工50%以上。

施作後即使長時間浸泡於水中長青苔，敲開後僅表面1mm微溼，內在結構仍維持乾燥，優越的防水效果稱之為「會呼吸的防水材」。

「愛防水-添加劑」（i-WaterProof）解決亞熱帶國家潮溼多雨氣候之建築痛點，有效預防磁磚白華！經過SGS認證防水吸水比0.19，符合CNS3763防水規範；通過CNS12611拉拔測試，亦歷經ISO9001：2008及CNS12681驗證，安全、環保、耐久、無毒。產品熱銷台灣、東南亞及中國，榮獲各大建商指名愛用，為全球消費者提供安全優質無毒的生活環境。
translations.meta_description: 華彩塗料美杜莎是「建築物保健與預防醫學專家」，參賽產品「愛防水-添加劑」（i-WaterProof），傳承千年古法智慧，以糯米水、沙漿的防水的概念，用植物提煉出天...

translations.name: i-WaterProof
translations.description:
Taiwan Medusa is a "Building Health Expert". Our product “i-WaterProof” is based on an ancient method using glutinous rice and mortar with natural plant extracts.  As durable as mortar, it's the first made in Taiwan, plant-based inorganic long-crystalline calcified liquid waterproof material,.  Patented technology extends building life, preventing "wall cancer" from water absorption.

Non-toxic, odorless, and safe it is a waterproof additive for cement and concrete.  Easily applied to cement, it quickly provides complete waterproofing.  If the building is immersed in water, the surface only becomes damp to 0.05mm.  The internal structure remains dry.  This enhances waterproofing and health safety of walls and foundations.

Meticulous adherence to quality is our beauty secret!

translations.name: CADEX 36 無內胎碟煞輪組
translations.description:
CADEX 36碟煞輪組，由巨大集團總部研發團隊設計開發，經由國外專業風洞實驗室與一級職業車隊測試，達成更輕、更快的目標，成為騎士的極速選擇！領先業界的無框鈎輪圈技術，加上使操控性大幅提升的22.4mm輪圈內徑，不論是面對陡坡、艱難的路況或者是強烈陣風，CADEX 36 DISC皆可提升你的絕對戰力！
頂級的加速表現:獨家專利的動態平衡編輪科技(DBL)技術與精準強化碳纖疊層技術，以及高強度的碳纖空力輻條，打造出無可匹敵的加速性能！
頂尖效率:超輕量、高剛性碳纖輻條提供CADEX 36極佳的側向剛性，側向剛性重量比相較Zipp 303 Firecrest Tubeless, Roval Alpinist CLX 和 Bontrager AEOLUS RSL 37等市場一級競品，高出30% 的性能表現；同時低摩擦阻力R1-C30花鼓，搭配陶瓷培林，相較一般金屬培林更提升1.5倍的滾動滑順度。
全面操控:領先業界的無框鈎輪圈技術，搭配22.4mm輪圈內徑，提供輪胎更穩定地支撐，加上36mm低側風影響的框高設計，不論是高速過彎、下坡或是遇到強烈陣風，換上CADEX 36皆無所畏懼。
translations.meta_description: CADEX 36碟煞輪組，由巨大集團總部研發團隊設計開發，經由國外專業風洞實驗室與一級職業車隊測試，達成更輕、更快的目標，成為騎士的極速選擇！領先業界的無框鈎...

translations.name: CADEX 36 DISC TUBELESS
translations.description:
CADEX 36 DISC is designed by the Giant Group Head Quarter R&D team in Taiwan, tested by the world-class wind tunnel lab and world tour team riders, the CADEX 36 Disc offers unrivaled acceleration, efficiency and smooth-riding control, even on rough roads and in gusty winds.
Custom-engineered, proprietary patented Dynamic Balanced Lacing (DBL) delivers unbeatable acceleration as reinforced carbon lay-up and high-tensile strength carbon aero spokes provide a transmission stiffness-to-weight ratio that’s up to over 40% better than Bontrager AEOLUS RSL 37 and Roval Alpinist CLX wheels.
Superlight and stiff carbon spokes minimize wheel flex for a lateral stiffness-to-weight ratio that’s up to over 30% better than Bontrager AEOLUS RSL 37 and Roval Alpinist CLX wheels.
Hookless rim design and a wide 22.4mm inner rim width provide greater support for today’s high-volume tires, as class-leading lateral stiffness and a 36mm rim depth deliver outstanding control while cornering and descending.
translations.meta_description: CADEX 36 DISC is designed by the Giant Group Head Quarter R&D team in Taiwan, tested by the world-class wind tunnel lab and world tour team riders, th...

translations.name: 電動(輔助)礫石公路車
translations.description:
這是個將平價的產品設計為有特色、有質感的挑戰。eSILEX是電動(輔助)礫石公路車，但美利達運用巧思從外觀下手，讓人幾乎看不到eSilex的電動馬達，或電池、變速剎車管線，最簡潔的造型，根本就像一款純腳踩的傳統公路車一般，使eSilex和競品比起來顯得特別不一樣。

eSilex的設計已在德國榮獲”2021設計創新獎”的肯定，並獲另一電動自行車媒體測試評”最佳價格-性能”獎。如德國專業測試機構指出，美利達eSILEX最令人讚賞的就是那極盡乾淨俐落的外觀，平凡之中與眾不同的經典之作!

性能方面，為與eSILEX的完美整合為一體，美利達選用精巧且提供可靠動力輔助的Mahle X35+後輪鼓式馬達，標配車架管內藏式電池，搭配一鍵式可切換輔助力的開關，另可加掛增程電池。還有提供舒適騎乘穩定性的寬輪胎、強化首管、舒適型車架幾何等設計之外，更預留許多可加掛行李包、擋泥板/貨架的安裝點。整體而言, eSilex巧妙融合了輕量化、長短旅程兼顧、操作極簡化等特色，不論礫石或柏油路，運動休閒或代步均宜。使用範圍極大化，加上親民的終端市價，eSILEX是一款極具質感且又物超所值的經典好車。

translations.name: electric gravel bike
translations.description:
It is about how Merida makes eSILEX from an ordinary product to be a premium electric gravel bike and features more value for money. Eventually the sleek design is so successful that eSILEX is honored with "Design & Innovation Award 2021" in Germany and also the award of "Best Price-Performance" e gravel bike judged by Radfahren.de.

As indicated by the above mentioned organizations, it is the clear appearance the most compelling from eSILEX.  That is the result partly from an unique “wire port system" applied.  Also, a compact Mahle X35+ rear hub motor unit is almost invisibly integrated into the frame and does its duties quietly and reliably while the battery is build-in and an one-touch switch is beautifully fitted into the top tube.  

More added value: the integrations of wide tires, oversized head tube + tapered fork, comfort-oriented frame geometry offer extremely stable ride feeling, while lots of mounting points for luggage & mudguards extend the use to all types of ride.

translations.name: 公路車競賽胎
translations.description: MAXXIS推出一款新花紋的全能競賽級公路車胎-New High Road，New High Road採用170TPI胎體材料，並導入全新低滾阻簾紗膠，柔軟且輕量化的胎體不僅能降低滾動阻力，同時也提供更佳的騎乘舒適性；防刺層採用最新開發的ZK材質，提供胎體更安全的防刺保護；而胎面膠使用Full Silica配方的HYPR膠料，搭配俐落的花紋與胎邊兩側破水模設計，能有效提升濕地過彎的抓地力與循跡性，整體性能與競品相比，New High Road在溼地抓地力、滾動阻力以及抗穿刺方面皆有良好的表現，同時New High Road也協助一級車隊 Israel Start-Up Nation拿到許多UCI賽事的冠軍與佳績，如2020年環義賽第八站車手Alex Dowsett與2021年雙海賽第三站車手Dan Martin分別獲得單站冠軍，證明New High Road 在賽事上的卓越性能表現 !
translations.meta_description: MAXXIS推出一款新花紋的全能競賽級公路車胎-New High Road，New High Road採用170TPI胎體材料，並導入全新低滾阻簾紗膠，柔軟且輕量化的胎體不僅能降低滾動阻力...

translations.name: Road Racing Bicycle  Tire
translations.description:
For the New High Road, Maxxis wants to provide an all-around competition level tire for customers that can be trusted in all conditions.New High Road is composed of 170TPI casing ,which decreases the rolling resistance and improves the ride comfort. The tread was designed with a smooth center to effectively reduce rolling resistance, with a simple pattern on the sides for better water drainage. The exclusive Full Silica HYPR compound increases wet traction. An additional layer of Maxxis’ZK breaker protection lies beneath the tread, complementing the supple 170TPI casing to become even more durable.
Maxxis New High Road is the tire of choice for UCI World Tour team Israel Start-Up Nation .

translations.name: 自行車-砂礫車胎
translations.description:
MAXXIS推出一款全新半平花紋設計砂礫車胎RECEPTOR，適用於鋪裝道路、硬泥地與輕度碎石地騎乘。RECEPTOR導入120TPI全新高抗撕裂胎體簾紗，輕量化免內胎設計，提供長距離騎乘時更佳的舒適性與安全性能；透過中心菱格紋與胎肩小顆粒花紋的組合，搭配雙膠料配方，同時兼顧了滾動阻力與牽引性的需求。

不只是一般鋪裝道路，砂礫自行車更可征服崎嶇不平的路面，不受地形限制的騎乘多樣性，成為近年歐美單車流行趨勢；MAXXIS RECEPTOR砂礫車胎不僅有輕快的踩踏感，在過彎性與爬坡牽引性能表現更佳，提供消費者在不同地形與環境，有更多的騎乘樂趣。
translations.meta_description: MAXXIS推出一款全新半平花紋設計砂礫車胎RECEPTOR，適用於鋪裝道路、硬泥地與輕度碎石地騎乘。RECEPTOR導入120TPI全新高抗撕裂胎體簾紗，輕量化免內胎設計，提供...

translations.name: Gravel Tire
translations.description:
Maxxis launches all new semi-slick gravel tire, Receptor. Designed to optimize on paved road, hard packed trails and light gravel ridings, the new Receptor is built based on 120TPI anti-tear casing and tubeless ready system. The new structure provides exceptional riding experience and improved safety. With the combination of diamond-shaped tread, granule-like side knobs and double compound, the tire aims for a perfect balance between fast rolling and grip.

Gravel has quickly become one of the mainstream discipline is biking, being no limited to pavements or other limits to the terrain. Maxxis Receptor brings ease to peddling, gains confidence on cornering and boosts climbing performance. The new Receptor is ready to contribute on wide variety of soil and tracks for all riders.
translations.meta_description: Maxxis launches all new semi-slick gravel tire, Receptor. Designed to optimize on paved road, hard packed trails and light gravel ridings, the new Rec...

translations.name: XC越野自行車胎
translations.description:
KARMA2 PRO新一代XC越野自行車胎- K1237，應用建大獨家SCT技術(Sidewall Casing Technology)，並搭配最新胎體結構，胎體抗切割防護更全面，將防彈布材質從胎面延伸到胎邊部位，且提升保氣性並維持輕量化，針對推廣歐美的自行車市場開發，初上市即大受好評。
(1)免內胎技術搭配專用襯帶、防漏液等配件，特殊胎唇設計及專利保氣層，提升保氣性，騎乘力量傳遞效能提升並兼具防刺功能。
(2)全新競賽胎面膠料配方結構開發，同時兼顧速度與低滾動阻力、胎體抗切割，大幅提升XC越野自行車的抓地力與操控性能，尤其是在乾燥的硬石路面與沙地，更能發揮絕佳性能。
(3) 120TPI可摺疊胎體設計，使用「KEVLAR BEAD」材質取代傳統鋼絲胎唇，充分降低重量，讓產品之運送更符合效率，輕量化設計減少膠料用量，更環保。
(4) 本產品為ISO 14001認證合格的廠商，在膠料開發管理報告中，明文規定原材料不得使用環保法規公告列管毒性化學物危害、有害性質項目之材料，符合歐盟要求。

translations.name: XC Mountain Bike Tire
translations.description:
KARMA2 PRO new XC off-road bicycle tire K1237, uses Kenda SCT (Sidewall Casing Technology), maximizing the benefits of fluid based sealants and strengthen sidewall. And the bulletproof material is extended from the tread to the sidewall, improving air retention and keeping light. It has been well reputed for its first launch in Europe and America.
1.Special bead design of Tubeless Ready Technology and the patented air-retaining layer are used for better air retention, improving efficiency on riding and thorn resistance as well.
2.The development of the new compound structure for competition, featuring speed, low rolling and cutting resistance, greatly improve the grip and handling performance, especially on dry terrain with pebbles and sand.
3.The 120 TPI design for folding tire uses "KEVLAR " material to replace the regular steel bead, fully reducing the weight. The design is environment- friendly for reducing the amount of rubber during production.
translations.meta_description: KARMA2 PRO new XC off-road bicycle tire K1237, uses Kenda SCT (Sidewall Casing Technology), maximizing the benefits of fluid based sealants and streng...

translations.name: TPSH超厚耐刺內胎
translations.description:
TPSH超厚耐刺內胎，針對DL越野下坡自行車使用，適用於重度山林越野等崎嶇路面，應用特殊不均厚製程技術，內胎管厚與地面接觸的厚度，較一般內胎強更厚實達4倍，可增加內胎耐刺功效達四倍厚度的抗破壞力，而輪圈面的厚度為一般內胎2倍，提升低風壓的抗拉伸力，這樣不均厚製程較傳統均厚的結構重量更輕量，但又能提升耐刺的保護力，主要外銷自行車運動風氣盛行的北美與歐盟市場。
1.TPSH超厚耐刺內胎在騎乘時若不小心被尖銳物刺到，因結構厚度增加4倍，不會迅速洩氣而導致無法繼續騎乘，在都會地區可勉強騎乘，撐到自行車店更換內胎。 
2.用在越野下坡車或登山車這種騎乘路況較差的車種上，耐刺效果提升，在山林越野騎乘時，比較不用擔心內胎被石子或樹枝…等尖銳物刺破，而導致瞬間爆胎失控，防護性更佳。
3.採用特殊配方，伸長率較一般內胎膠料高，延展性佳，能維持保氣性與可低胎壓結構，低胎壓可增加DL越野下坡車的胎體緩衝，且低風壓增加胎體接觸面積，更能強化林道下坡時極端惡路的操控性能。
4.規格齊全，可裝配於XC登山車與DL越野下坡車，簡約結構，搭配高精度密練製成的內胎配方，打造最優質的TPSH超厚耐刺內胎。

translations.name: TPSH Thickened Puncture Resistance Tube
translations.description:
TPSH Thickened Puncture Resistance Tube is designed for DL off-road downhill bikes. The tube is perfect for rugged terrain such as cross-country in mountain forest. The special uneven thickness processing technology is applied on the tube. The thickness of the inner tube, the part contacting ground, is 4 times thicker than the general tubes, also increasing puncture resistance to 4 times. And the thickness of the side surface is 2 times that of the general tube, which improves the tensile strength of low wind pressure, lighter than even one, and improves the puncture resistance. It is mainly exported to the North America and Europe where riding bikes is popular. 
1.Thanks to the thickened structure, the tube will not flat in short time if the tube is accidentally punctured.
2.Improved protection on puncture, preventing popping tires. 
3.Special formula used in compound, higher elongation and better ductility than general compound.
4.Completed range of specification on XC and DL bikes.

translations.name: 自行車導航解決方案
translations.description:
Cyclo Discover產品線以「休閒旅遊」為導向，目標族群為45~70歲的中老年者。考量其生理（視力）與心理（科技準備度），Cyclo Discover Pal在設計上，不僅提供淺顯易懂的圖形化使用者介面並「加大」重點功能之字級、按鈕尺寸、強化色彩對比、與簡化操作步驟，完全不會因為小螢幕而影響操作的容易性。
全機防水，不怕汗水、泥水、雨水侵襲。此外，歐洲一些國家，如荷蘭、西班牙禁止自行車騎士於騎乘時使用手機。本產品提供了來電與訊息通知，增加了騎乘的便利性與安全性。
本機導入新軟體平台提升效能，搭配新開發的MioShare手機app，結合雲端OTA更新，增加未來服務的「擴充性」與「彈性」，以快速因應市場的變遷，滿足不同族群的需求。可幫助用戶依據地區、月份、騎乘距離與時間，快速搜尋附近的路線，並儲存下載到Cyclo裝置上。其中的WeJoin群騎功能，讓Cyclo Discover Pal用戶可以輕鬆邀請親朋好友透過App一起騎乘同一條路線，不論他們是否擁有Mio的Cyclo裝置。

translations.name: Cycling Navigation Solution
translations.description:
The Cyclo Discover product line is oriented towards "leisure travel" and targets middle-aged and elderly people aged 45-70. Taking into account their physiological and psychological, Cyclo Discover Pal is designed with an intuitive graphical user interface, larger font and button size, and high color contrast.
The device is waterproof, and resistant to sweat, mud, and rain. In addition, some countries, such as the Netherlands and Spain, prohibit cyclists from using mobile phones while riding; this product provides call and message notifications, which increases convenience and safety.
The newly developed MioShare App, together with cloud OTA updates, users can search for nearby routes by region, month, distance and time of ride, and save and download them to Cyclo devices. The WeJoin group ride feature allows Cyclo Discover Pal users to easily invite friends and family to ride the same route through the app, regardless of whether they own a Cyclo device or not.

translations.name: TT Racing Chain
translations.description:
KMC開發全球第一條專為計時賽、三鐵賽設計的專用鏈條－TT Racing Chain，量身打造符合競速賽的高強度騎乘環境，每個零件都為競速而生，晉升直線加速最快的鏈條行列。

【極致系統加速性能 / 提升4%傳動系統效率】
藉由鍛造加壓和特殊熱處理技術等多重精緻工法，創造出獨家浮凸式雙X橋型、結合動態外導角以及俐落斜面的內導角，加大入齒角度，提升入齒滑順及變速順暢度，綜合提升速度傳導效率；纖薄鏈片整體結構、鏤空輕量排泥孔，不僅整體減輕重量並於高速運行引流空氣排除泥沙，降低阻力，極致鏈條的加速性能，創造出優於一般競賽鏈條5%的騎乘距離，同時提升4%的傳動系統效率，讓TT Racing Chain成為速度的代名詞。

【保持最佳動力速度輸出】
嶄新設計提升鏈條剛性，加速零件嚙合時間及提高嚙合度，滑順的動力轉換降低零件磨耗阻力，大幅節省瓦數功耗並創造高效轉換踩踏動能，創造百分百吻合厚薄齒尖的鏈條間距，能準確地作動騎乘弧度，貼合每個動能瞬間，經實測，TT Racing Chain 相比一般競賽鏈條提升9%的加速度，運用最少的力量產出最大化的動力速度輸出，成為極速競賽的決勝關鍵。
translations.meta_description: KMC開發全球第一條專為計時賽、三鐵賽設計的專用鏈條－TT Racing Chain，量身打造符合競速賽的高強度騎乘環境，每個零件都為競速而生，晉升直線加速最快的鏈條行...

translations.name: TT Racing Chain
translations.description:
TT Racing Chain is the first of its kind to be specifically designed for ultimate success in the most competitive environments. Each component has been meticulously crafted with speed and efficiency as the top priorities.    

【Faster acceleration / Enhanced 4% Drivetrain Efficiency】
Fabricated by tailored forging and heat treatment procedures has created an embossed double X-Bridge and optimal chamfering to provide smoother chain and tooth interaction. The hollow plates reduce weight while the overall chain construction reduces rider effort and therefore improves riding distance 5% farther and drivetrain efficiency by 4%.

【Maintain Maximum Speed】
The unique design of each component perfectly complements speed and efficiency through swift shifting and smooth running via chain and gear tooth interference. Energy consumption is reduced via significantly increased cohesion by 9% to effectively reach and maintain top speed with less effort of all chain components working together.
translations.meta_description: TT Racing Chain is the first of its kind to be specifically designed for ultimate success in the most competitive environments. Each component has bee...

translations.name: e-Bike Solution
translations.description:
KMC獨家提供齒盤與鏈條的配套解決方案，計算齒盤齒片與鏈條的最佳密合弧度，結合齒盤設計結構，打造高效超群的Chain Mate力量傳輸效率做為e-Bike Solution的設計核心，提供業界最佳配套於e-Bike上，帶來極佳的使用壽命。

【Chain Mate】
獨家研發齒盤的齒間弧度與鏈條羅拉，使二者達到最佳囓合度而設計，形成獨特的鏈結槽完美吻合羅拉底部弧形，打造最強密不可分的Chain Mate效益，降低齒盤與鏈條間磨損，帶來高速力量傳導，創造出無可比擬、更長效的騎乘距離。

【獨家Shield Tech鉚合設計】
新型圓盾鉚合技術，擴增10%的小軸面積，大幅提升小軸嵌合力至450kgf以上，具有抗衡電動車中驅馬達傳動系統之高扭力及高拉力特性，整體提升25%的鏈條剛性，展現絕佳的耐受等級。

【最佳齒型設計】
滑順且雙側不對稱地齒型，打造「齒盤鏈條保留性能」，在齒盤和鏈條的接觸面創造如磁力般的吸引力，抓附齒盤的齒型並確實穩住鏈條蘿拉，大幅提升Chainring Solutions配套的穩定性，因電動車的馬達傳動輸出強大，保留性能可顯著地避免掉鏈狀況，帶來極佳的產品壽命周期。
translations.meta_description: KMC獨家提供齒盤與鏈條的配套解決方案，計算齒盤齒片與鏈條的最佳密合弧度，結合齒盤設計結構，打造高效超群的Chain Mate力量傳輸效率做為e-Bike Solution的設計...

translations.name: e-Bike Solution
translations.description:
KMC offers a total e-Bike Solution with unique Chain Mate design for superior chain and cog tooth running efficiency and specially designed teeth for enhanced chain retention.

【Chain Mate】
The Chainring roller seats between teeth are perfectly matched to chain rollers for exceptional component engagement. Benefits of this unparalleled “Chain Mate” are higher power transmission efficiency and longer component lifespan.

【KMC Shield Riveting】
Shield Tech is a patented new riveting tech that utilizes a reinforced pin design, the pin surface raise 10% and significantly increases 25% pin power.

【Optimal Tooth Design】
Chain retention is enhanced via an optimized tooth design to hold the rollers in place, significantly preventing chain drop while also reducing friction associated with traditional narrow/wide designs. In addition, the tooth is vertically asymmetrical to avoid interference while at extreme chain angles to the rear cassette.

translations.name: E系列節能遊艇
translations.description: 全新的 E-Class ecHo 系列船型是一款強調透過低船體阻力、低能耗來達到所設定的環保節能與長距離航行的目標，同時又能提供寬敞與舒適的內部空間。此系列遊艇是由國際知名的設計師 Rob Humphreys Yacht Design所設計。融合了環保意識與設計者的名字，將E-CLASS 這系列的遊艇命名為 ecHo。推出的第一款船型是E85 ecHo，她不僅具有遠洋航行遊艇的能力，更提供了豪華、遠距離航行的舒適旅程，讓她帶著您與家人朋友航行到世界各地，盡情享受歡樂悠閒的遊艇假期。

translations.name: E Class Explorer Yacht
translations.description: The new ecHo range has been developed in response to the demand for yachts that offer exceptional efficient hull, minimal environmental impact without any loss in comfort or amenity. Designed by Humphreys Yacht Design, the ecHo name is a melding of "eco-friendly" and the Humphreys name. The first model to be introduced is the E85 ecHo, and in keeping with the ethos that underlies the concept it has been created to be as much a destination in its own right as a means of travel. The ecHo range offers luxurious, long range cruising to those for whom the journey is just as enjoyable as arriving.

translations.name: SeatUNI  液晶觸控電動豪華椅
translations.description: 友聯全新研發「SeatUNI液晶觸控電動豪華椅」將車用豪華椅設計更智慧化，可透過扶手內建一體式液晶觸控面板，如同操作智慧型手機一般，一根手指即可控制整張座椅，操作上更便利。座椅配備氣袋按摩及電動頂腰功能，能緩解乘客久座的不適感，使乘客在長途旅行中可達到放鬆效果。座墊、座背泡棉分別採用三層式舒壓泡棉及異硬度泡棉，能兼具支撐性及舒適軟Q之乘坐感，使乘員之腰部、胸部、骨盆位置能得到全面的支撐，讓壓力平均分散，符合最佳人體工學。此外，具有三段記憶功能模式，可輕觸一鍵就能將座椅自動到位；配備電動抬腿及電動椅背系統，可任意調整出0~180度的最舒適乘座角度，再搭配椅座加溫通風系統，讓乘客一坐上來感覺就像回到家裡般的舒適與放鬆，產品不僅符合平日高階商務需求，也很適合假日家庭出遊使用。

translations.name: SeatUNI LED Control Luxury Seat
translations.description: "SeatUNI LCD control luxury seat" is customer-oriented, Emphasize the attractive appearance and considers the user's operation. Among the existing car seats, it has a unique intelligent LCD control panel with a three memory mode, which can be control by touched-on and   automatically set the seat in place, fully enjoy the function of "One Key Service & One Key Return"; the seat is equipped with an airbag massage system and an power top waist system, so that passengers can achieve a relaxing effect during long-distance travel; equipped with power ottoman system and power seat back system can adjust the most comfortable seat angle from 0 to 180 degrees at will. With the seat ventilation and heating system, passengers can enjoy the atmosphere like at home when they sit on this luxury seat.

translations.name: 電動三輪車
translations.description: 看好「零排放、低噪音、安全」的電動車將成為未來趨勢，特別是受到COVID-19影響，全球物流需求快速增長，促使USD-01電動三輪車的誕生，以解決物流業運送效率並提升配送人員安全性。USD-01是目前全台唯一符合歐盟轉彎穩定性規定的電動三輪車，並結合唯一被市場接受的換電站系統，整合雲端數據資料庫的管理系統，使物流服務達到最佳化。其載重高達200KG，比一般二輪機車高出近4倍，容積逾800公升；並具備13KW動力，超越現有馬達最高的7 KW，時速最高達每小時80公里，滿電時更可達100公里。USD-01可一鍵倒車，在2.5公尺寬的巷道間迴轉，提升載貨彈性、縮短配送時程，加快商品到貨速度。USD-01同時提供物流業者智能派車管理平台、車隊管理模式及安全監控車輛狀態，有效掌握車輛地點、規劃路線、管理與收發物件等，完美達成物流配送的任務。其核心的電動馬達及控制器系統，皆由威剛自主研發製造，並獲得多項發明與新型專利，車體與宏佳騰合作，電源系統則與Gogoro Network智慧電池交換平台合作，透過兩間大廠的售後維護體系，全省具有200間維護站與1200個換電站，大幅提高電動三輪車的需求。

translations.name: Commercial Electric Tricycle
translations.description: The USD-01 electric logistics tricycle is currently the only electric tricycle in Taiwan that meets EU standards. It brings together an electric powertrain system and cloud data database to optimize logistics services. Compared with current two-wheeled vehicles, which can only carry loads of 50kg, the USD-01 can carry upwards to 200kg. The payload of the USD-01 is space for up to 800 liters of cargo. The USD-01 is equipped with a motor that exceeds the existing market standard of 7 kW at 13 kW, allowing it to reach a maximum speed of 80 kph. The range of the USD-01 is 100 km when fully charged. It’s size allows it to traverse lanes as narrow as 2.5 m with ease, making it ideal for use in busy urban areas. The USD-01 can provide logistics companies with an intelligent vehicle with a dispatch management platform, fleet management mode, and safe vehicle monitoring, effectively mastering vehicle locations, planning routes, managing and receiving and dispatching objects.

translations.name: TOPOWER 沙哈之弓 全LED皮卡車頭燈
translations.description: 「沙哈之弓全LED皮卡車頭燈」將節能且環保的LED照明科技，在弓型雙色光條上完整呈現。全燈照明採LED設計，而光條以行車燈/流光方向燈/迎賓燈多功能的設計合而為一讓整體車燈在合車後能夠俐落簡潔。至寶光電的設計工藝無論在外型或內部科技都在水準之上，該車燈在車輛行進時的行車燈及流光方向燈功能讓駕駛者感到舒適而且令用路人得到安全，弓型光條的迎賓功能更是令人聚焦的一亮點。「沙哈之弓全LED皮卡車頭燈」的方型透鏡設計除了能增加照明區域更增加了照射寬廣度，也跳脫出傳統的圓形刻板印象，替「沙哈之弓全LED皮卡車頭燈」展現出強烈獨特風格。

TOPOWER Sayha's Bow LED HEADLIGHT is equipped with energy-saving and environmentally-friendly LED tech, which is shown on the bow-shaped and double-color light bar. All the beams are LED design and we combine driving light/sequential turn signal light/welcome light functions in one place to make the headlight assembly simpler and neater. No matter internal or external technology, TOPOWER's design and engineering capability are high standard.
Driving light and sequential turn signal light can make driving more comfortable and also make roads safer for pedestrians . In addition, the bow-shaped welcome-light function is another important feature.
TOPOWER Sayha's Bow  LED HEADLIGHT square-shaped projector can expand the beam shinning area, and its design totally differs from the circle-shaped stereotype, which makes the style strong and unique.

translations.name: 92呎豪華遊艇
translations.description: FD92為Horizon FD系列首艘擁有三層甲板(tri-deck)設計的遊艇，同時滿足船主想要包覆式駕駛空間及開放式望台的需求，FD92共規劃五間主客房，其中包含一間位於主甲板的全船寬主人房，以及四間位於下層甲板的客房，後艙則有兩間船員房。上層甲板配有駕駛室及寬敞的交誼空間，前甲板區設有可容納6人的按摩浴缸、座位區、太陽浴墊及冷藏/製冰設備；而升降跳水板的獨特活動式設計，讓船主可輕鬆作為靠岸梯或下水梯台使用，FD92寬敞且豐富的設計，讓船主無論在室內或戶外皆能盡享海上休閒娛樂！

translations.name: 92 feet luxury motor yacht
translations.description: The first tri-deck design of the FD Series, the FD92 satisfies the owner who desires both an enclosed skylounge and an open flybridge. This five-stateroom yacht offers a full-beam, on-deck master and four additional staterooms on the lower deck along with crew quarters for three. The uppermost deck comes equipped with a helm, seating and small bar while a six-person Jacuzzi, seating, sunpads and fridge/icemaker comprise the lounging area on the foredeck. The FD92 features a fully equipped beach club and a Hi/Lo swim platform with a “transformer” stair section to facilitate easy water access.

translations.name: 冒險家越野重機頭燈
translations.description: 本產品由堤維西為越野勁旅KTM 1290 SUPER ADVENTURE R 2021所設計生產以CAN BUS控制的智慧型全功能LED機車頭燈，為符合KTM品牌語彙，提高其識別及共鳴，將遠近燈的兩側加以設計晝行燈、位置燈，以簡潔利落的盾牌外型，呈現越野競技般的視覺感受。晝行燈與位置燈，採用擴散劑內套加上導光條的設計方式，將光源擴展至整個發光面，呈現出均勻柔和的點亮效果。遠近燈及轉向輔助燈則採用隱藏式反射光源設計，不只提升美觀，更能增加反射面積，提高更深更廣的照明範圍，在極端複雜的用路環境下提供無可挑剔的安全照明。全燈符合美國SAE.歐洲ECE與大陸3C的法規要求，材料使用可回收的PC.PP與AL金屬件，二次加工處理也皆符合RoHS、REACH要求，達到巿場節能減碳的目標。

translations.name: FULL LED MOTORCYCLE HEADLAMP
translations.description: The Full LED motorcycle headlamp is designed and manufactured by TYC for KTM 1290 SUPER ADVENTURE R 2021 which is design to control by CAN Bus. The unique and clean shield shape increases KTM brand identity. Using diffusion inner lens and light guide to provide a homogenous diffused illumination pattern for Daytime Running light and position light, the high and low beam with turning light use a concealed reflective light source design, which not only increases aesthetical but also the lighting range and provides impeccable safety lighting in the complex road environment. The headlamp complies with SAE. ECE and CCC vehicle regulations also use recyclable materials such as PC. PP and AL metal parts, the secondary processing meets RoHS and REACH standards to achieve marketing goal for energy saving.

translations.name: 直流快速充電樁 DC Wallbox 50kW
translations.description:
全球減碳目標明確，各國明文訂定禁售燃油車的年限，電動車的推展儼然成為未來交通轉型的趨勢指標。如何有效率使用電能為電動車充電、提升電動車車主的使用者體驗與充電網路營運商的管理效率，是台達電動車充電樁產品研發的三大主軸。 

台達直流快速充電樁DC Wallbox 50kW支援主流國際電動車充電標準接口，提供領先業界的能源轉換效率，能節省可觀的充電電力浪費；並支援RFID與信用卡等多種使用者識別與管理功能，兼具安全性與便利性，能讓車主輕鬆為電動車充電。其極小的佔地面積需求，無須更動緊張的城市停車空間，利用剩餘空間安裝充電樁；可選不同規格的充電槍時，快速適應不同國家充電規格，其絕佳的適應能力，方便營運商布局全球商用充電市場。此外，DC Wallbox 50kW配備有線與無線通訊功能，且支援國際通用的充電樁管理標準協議OCPP，能整合金流收費系統與台達或第三方後臺管理系統，透過網路匯出充電資訊、使用者資訊及警報紀錄等，達到即時監控目的，亦可透過管理系統遠端控制充電、更新韌體，大幅降低營運商的設備營運與維護成本。

translations.name: DC Wallbox 50kW
translations.description: International goals for carbon reduction require countries to eventually stop selling petrol vehicles. The promotion of EVs is now an indicator of future transportation trends. Efficient electricity use, enhancing the user experience, and improving charging network management are three focuses. DC Wallbox 50kW supports international charging standards, providing outstanding conversion efficiency and electricity savings. Its user recognition and management functions include RFID and credit card support, and its security and convenience simplify EV charging. The small footprint is perfect for tight urban parking spaces, and its various specifications make it adaptable for global commercial charging markets. It supports OCPP standard for charging station networks and can integrate backend systems from Delta or a third party. This allows operators to remotely monitor chargers or update firmware over the air, substantially reducing operation and maintenance costs.

translations.name: AI影像辨識商用車輛轉彎盲區輔助系統
translations.description:
☉採用嵌入式AI影像辨識技術：
1、	可依｢保護對象｣作即時偵測、分類、追蹤及分析，並設計不同程度的提醒模式。
2、	｢保護對象｣設定為行人、自行車騎士、摩托車騎士及各式四輪以上車輛。
3、	｢保護對象｣無論是(相對)靜止、相對零速差或任何相對移動方向皆可即時偵測追蹤。
4、	｢保護對象｣即使被公共設施(如電線桿、樹木)短暫或部分屏蔽，仍可有效即時偵測追蹤。
☉突破傳統影像辨識瓶頸：
1、	運用不可見光搭配光學與機構設計，確保夜間甚至無光照環境下本系統仍可正常運作。
2、	鏡頭鏡片周圍加入重力導流設計，經國家實驗室測試在80毫米/h的雨勢下本系統仍可正常運作。
3、	無需額外校正工具、繁雜且要求精準的校正程序，即可發揮正常偵測效果。
☉獨特的人機介面設計：
1、	提供｢燈光及音效｣警示的同時也輸出｢影像標記｣供駕駛員判斷下一步採取甚麼行動 。
2、	即使在未打方向燈前大幅度轉彎，若有碰撞風險本系統仍會主動提醒。   
3、	｢偵測範圍｣與｢警示機制｣會依據當下情境(車速、直行、轉彎)自主即時切換調整。
4、	單一鏡頭同時輸出雙畫面，即｢俯視無盲區視角｣及｢側邊後視鏡的傳統視角｣。

translations.name: Turning Blind spot Assistance system
translations.description:
Embedded AI recognition:
1. Real-time detection, classification, tracking according to the "protected object", & different levels of warning method.
2. Protect VRU objects, pedestrian, bicyclist, motorcyclist & vehicles.
3. The "protected object" can be detected and tracked whether it is still or shielded by bushes or public facilities.
 ☉It has broken through video recognition bottleneck:
1. Invisible IR ensures can still operate normally at night, or non-light environment.
2. Gravity diversion design is added.  Can still operate under 80mm/h rain testing.
3. This system does not require any calibration tools, it can works properly.
☉ Unique HMI design:
1. It provides the driver with a judgment on what action to take next.
2. Even if the vehicle turns sharply before trigger indicator, it will activate remind.
3. "Detection range" & "Warning mechanism" will automatically be switched.
4. Output to dual screen at the same time, they are, "blind spot top view" & "the view of side mirror"

translations.name: 無限全LED高階改裝尾燈
translations.description:
D17-1905為帝寶工業(DEPO)與日本知名改裝品牌無限(MUGEN)聯手打造之新世代全LED高階改裝尾燈，配合MUGEN推出Civic Type R改裝套件；產品連續兩年在日本東京展亮相，人氣話題始終居高不下，並且也是網路論壇上的常客，可見其性能表現及整體造型深受廣大消費者愛戴。
帝寶工業擁有專業的研發能量與技術，運用LED的節能特性及均勻的出光設計，將外觀光源線條重新設計，經過多次的色度調整使行車燈呈現清透多層次的色澤讓產品更顯吸睛，整體造型展現簡約霸氣姿態，而產品之光源皆採用高規格LED來進行設計且耗能更低，不論外觀或質感都大大提升。此為多功能複合型燈具，同時擁有剎車、倒車、行車以及方向功能，依據ECE、FMVSS108測試基準進行車用相關信賴性測試，符合E-Mark認證標準，使用輕量化可回收環保材料，兼具時尚外觀與實用性，在DEPO與MUGEN兩大品牌的加持下，成為當代車用改裝品界的亮眼新星。

translations.name: MUGEN High-End LED Tail lamp
translations.description:
Introducing a top grade light co-developed by Depo and Mugen, the leading brands in auto accessory in Japan, for the Civic Type R. The Depo D17-1905 tail light is a hot topic in online forums and has exhibited in the Tokyo Auto Show for 2 consecutive years.
This light features an energy-saving LED array which produces a balanced beam pattern. The light output is designed to generate an eye-catching color scheme while projecting an aggressive look.  High grade LEDs are used for high performance in appearance, function and energy consumption.  Recyclable light weight materials are used as part of our eco-friendly strategy. It combines tail light, brake light, turn signal and back up functions into one product. To ensure quality,this light is developed with the quality standard of ECE and FMVSS108 and complies with E-Mark.
This light offers both sleek design and practicality.Combining the two biggest brands in automotive accessory industry,D17-1905 will certainly shine like a super star.

translations.description: RAZR AT811是一款特別為喜愛各種戶外活動的使用者設計的全地形輪胎，為公路、越野與雪地駕駛提供良好的行駛體驗。創新的設計增進了行駛穩定性及路面牽引性能，同時新的設計降低輪胎的破壞及報廢，增加輪胎耐用性，進而提升輪胎的使用壽命，響應環保意識。全新RAZR AT811為喜愛冒險及滿足獨特生活風格的使用者，提供了最佳的選擇。RAZR AT在整體性能部分，與既有產品比較，整體性能皆比既有產品優異，尤其在雪地操控及耐久性能部分，分別提升25%及10%，並通過北美3PMSF雪地抓地力測試。

Its innovative design enhances the driving experience with improved handling stability and road traction. The new design also increases durability that extends the service life to reduce failures and scrapped tires for the environment. These improvements make the new RAZA AT811 tire an ideal choice for drivers to enjoy vibrant adventures and fulfill their unique lifestyle.

translations.name: 速克達機車運動胎
translations.description:
MAXXIS MA-WG為高階運動速克達機車胎，為一款強調濕抓性能並兼具通勤使用的全天候功能胎。能避免通勤族群於雨天行駛時機車壓白線後發生車輛打滑現象，MAXXIS特別重視這種安全問題的騎乘。

為提升機車行駛的安全性，並解決消費者的痛點，MAXXIS透過不斷分析及研發推出全新的全天候功能胎，讓消費者不只擁有晴天操控抓地性，並大幅提升濕地穩定性，讓消費者掌握雨天騎乘安全性。

產品特性說明:
一、輪胎胎面膠料導入特殊Silica配方，為全新開發奈米級SiO2膠料，與雨水分子結合能產生強而有力的物理吸附性作用力，以大幅提升濕抓性能，增強雨天行駛車輛安定性，並可於濕地低μ路面縮短煞停距離及擁有良好操控性能。

二、創新花紋發明專利，產品設計經過不斷電腦模擬分析及手刻胎實車驗證，最終參數透過與車手討論性能需求轉化具新穎設計。

三、經車手於ARTC實車測試道性能反饋，相較外廠胎安定性提升5%、乾抓性能提升10%、濕抓性能提升20%、操控性能提升15%、舒適性能提升20%，
總評MA-WG擁有優異操控、乾濕抓、舒適表現絕對可解決消費者痛點。

Featuring wet grip and community-orientation, MA-WG presented by MAXXIS is light sport scoter tire, in order to upgrade driving safety in rain and prevent slipping situation during commuting, MAXXIS develops and launches all weather tire which owns traction and controlling on dry and stability on wet surface.

Characteristics:
1.The special functional groups of modified Nano-SiO2’s surface can combine with water molecules and get a strong physical adsorption force. Low μ road surface with new compound can show excellent wet grip performance.
2. Creative pattern and product design has been through million times simulation analysis and vehicle testing and the final parameter is transferred as concrete new design with combination of drivers’ performance demand.
3. According to driver’s feedback in ARTC proving ground, compared to competitor, MAWG increases 5% in stability, 10% in dry traction, 20% in wet traction and comfort; furthermore, 15% increasing in controlling delivers.

translations.name: 機車用賽道性能胎
translations.description:
K6030/KD2機車用賽道性能胎，區分為前/後輪設計，針對場地賽事的速可達競賽使用，適用於改裝的大馬力與高扭力引擎，透過前兩代賽道胎的比賽經驗，升級開發技術，並與台灣頂尖的TSR賽車團隊和車手，進行數年的密集測試，開啟建大賽道胎技術的全新里程碑，目前主要銷售台灣與美國外銷市場。
(1)K6030/KD2為賽道性能能胎，外觀設計獨特的刀鋒流線型花紋(設計專利申請中)，富有侵略型外觀，區分為前輪與後輪花紋，前輪屬於導向特性，為了增加煞車制動力，特別採用逆花紋設計，後輪為驅動特性，採用順向花紋，能在潮濕路面上，迅速排除路面積水。
(2)胎體結構上，前後輪採用不同的專屬特殊設計，並搭配胎質採用末端改質S-SBR搭配特殊橡膠、補強型樹脂的使用，提高胎面與地面的接著性、暖胎速率，提升輪胎安定感，並藉由更高補強性碳黑維持其抗熱衰竭性能。
(3)歷經兩代賽道胎，全新推出的K6030/KD2於美國改裝市場大受好評，外銷出口數量逐月上升，性能媲美日系與歐系品牌，台灣製造研發的賽道性能胎，將於國際市場大放光明。

K6030/KD2 is second generation KENDA Scooter Racing tire. It is designed for front and rear tire. Kenda R&D team process numbers extreme testings in several years with past experience. The primary sales markets for K6030/KD2 are Taiwan and American market. 
1.K6030/KD2 is the excellent performance tire for racing court. The smooth knife pattern design shows the aggressive appearance. The front tire is the Reverse pattern design for better braking. The rear tire is along pattern design for the driving and aquaplaning resistance.
2.In the carcass’s constructions, the front and rear tires are used by different exclusive special designs.  The S-SBR with special rubber compound and carbon black improve the grip, stability, safety, heat exhaustion resistance. 
3.K6030/KD2 is all new Scooter Racing tire with good reputation in American market. The performance for K6030/KD2 is competed with American, Japanese and European brand.  K6030/KD2 That is made in Taiwan will expend in the worldwide.

translations.name: 非對稱轎車/休旅車用胎
translations.description:
『K201/KR201X』KENETICA專為轎車、休旅車所開發設計，採新世代非對稱花紋造型設計，胎面搶眼的Z字形特徵，強化產品辨識度，已申請台灣設計專利中，兼具美觀與輪胎操控性能使用二氧化矽(Silica)複合配方，有效降低輪胎滾動阻力，符合節能概念，並取得台灣節能標章C級認證，符合國際節能減碳趨勢，外銷歐美市場，逐漸打入高端汽車用胎市場。
1.完美胎邊結構均衡設計，在舒適度與過彎支撐性之間，取得完美平衡。
2.高校排水性能，3+1主溝設計，能有效率排除路面積水，減少水漂與提升直行安定性。
3.非對稱採外側肩部高剛性，強化過彎穩定性，操控性能提升；內側連續性低噪音設計，降低行駛噪音，並減少偏磨耗發生，跨世代設計，花紋性能更全面。
4. 採用可量化壓力數值分析技術運用，由接地壓力及形狀分析模擬找出新產品的最佳輪廓設計方案，良好的接地壓力及形狀可以提供輪胎與的地面均勻的接觸，進而使磨耗較均勻提升輪胎行駛壽命。
5.依歐盟法規產品使用Low PAHs Level非污染性的材料，採用無毒環保配方兼具低滾動阻力特性，能為環保節能盡一份心力。

translations.name: Asymmetric Sedan/SUV Tire
translations.description:
KENETICA KR201 series is designed for sedan and SUV. The new generation asymmetric pattern design, with both aesthetic and functional purposes, and iconic Z-shape tread enhance the product identity. The Taiwan design patent application is proceeding. Uses silica composite formula, effectively reducing rolling resistance and helps with energy-saving without sacrificing high grip performance. It has Taiwan energy-saving certification C class to meet the global eco-friendly trends.
1.The perfect sidewall construction design provides the balance of comfort and corning stability.
2.3+1 main grooves helps evacuate water, stability, and prevent hydroplaning in wet conditions.
3.High rigidity block design on the outside tread for enhanced lateral stability and improved handling when cornering; the inside shoulder has a continuity pattern design, reducing the noise and the possibility of uneven wear. Uses quantifiable pressure analysis techniques to  improving the wear capability and longevity.

translations.name: 商業用割草機/多功能用車胎
translations.description:
『K3012』定義為高性能商業用割草機/多功能用車輪胎，在市場上屬高附加價值產品，並經由北美知名組車廠實車測試評價認可，符合北美市場規格，未來將依據歐洲及其他市場需求的產品特性進行認證，讓消費者能多重選擇，節省成本創造優勢，提高產品競爭力以及信賴度。
1.『K3012』應用特殊膠料與胎面花紋排列，寬大胎面可分善壓力降低草皮傷害，擁有絕佳草地行駛所需的抓地力和操控性能，讓商用割草機能安心行駛在草地上，不會壓傷草坪。
2. 『K3012』為BIAS結構設計，最佳化的輪廓設計搭配規則性花紋排列，可行駛在一般道路上並減少震動的不適，重點是在草地上自由操控也不會傷害草皮，且降低輪胎在草地的空轉滑動，防止草皮植物被拉扯而受傷枯萎。
3.耐磨膠料配方及加強的胎體結構，搭配具層次感設計的方形胎肩設計，增加輪胎使用壽命及使用安全性，增加割草機能順利執行草地養護任務的妥善率。
4.外觀花紋設計方面，於花紋塊上，增加具高度識別仿生樹枝狀細溝，細溝可增加草地上的排水性與爬抓性，同時兼具美感設計與機能設計，雙重效果。

translations.name: LED高功率融雪工作燈
translations.description:
Lucidity始終如一，專研商用車燈設計研發與製造已逾40年，獲得眾多國際商用車廠及業界的肯定，這次再次推出突破性研發成果：
22862 FREEZERO LED高功率融雪工作燈是針對寒冷、嚴峻工作環境的商用車所開發的創新工作燈產品，並且符合歐盟ECE認證。本產品在PC燈殼導入最新科技-可感溫加熱膜，在一定的溫度下會自動啟用加熱功能，將燈殼上的積雪或冰霜融化，為駕駛維持穩定明亮的照明，守護道路的安全。除了實用的功能，燈殼面的花紋也針對融雪的主題設計了雪花造型的花紋，提升燈具整體照明效果及造型質感，為業界難得同時具備創新光學技術與造型美學的商用車燈產品。
突破成果特色如下：
1.搭載自動加熱技術，在惡劣天氣下保持燈具的照明效果
2.符合EMC CISPR25規範，避免產品的電磁雜訊影響其他電子部品，確保駕駛行車安全
3.搭配高功率的 10W LED，帶來高亮度的照明表現
4.燈殼造型為雪花花紋設計，既符合融雪功能主題且提升產品美感
5.燈殼上有5mm積雪，通過加熱系統在-30°C環境模擬: 燈殼溫度1分鐘後提升為-16°C，5分鐘後為6°C，15分鐘後為38°C，有效融化積雪和冰霜

translations.name: FREEZERO Heated LED Work Lamp
translations.description:
The 22862 FREEZERO Heated LED Work Lamp is an innovative product developed for commercial vehicles in cold and severe working environments. This product introduces the latest film heater into the PC housing, which automatically activates the heating function at a certain temperature to melt the snow or frost on the lamp housing, maintain stable and bright lighting for driving.
Our breakthrough achievements are as follows:
1. Integrated automatical heating system to keep brightness and safety in inclement weather
2. Compliant with EMC CISPR 25, provide protection for receivers installed in a vehicle from disturbances produced by components/modules in the same vehicle, ensure the safety of driving
3. Aesthetical snowflake pattern designed lens
4. Environment simulation in -30 °C with 5mm ice on the lens, via the heating system, the lens temperature will be -16 °C after 1 minute, 6 °C after 5 minutes, 38 °C after 15 minutes, effectively melt snow and frost

translations.name: 車載視訊解決方案
translations.description:
MioEYE K series有別於一般市面上DVR的產品、除了前鏡頭的行車影像紀錄之外, 也設計有內鏡頭以及車輛電腦的接續能力, 對於車內環境、駕駛者行為、攝影紀錄與車輛狀態等資訊皆可完整記錄，搭配強大的AI演算能力，可將車內環境、辨識駕駛者駕駛行為、開車狀態、車輛行駛路線以及車輛信息狀態透過4G聯網並紀錄於後台, 透過完善後台管理方案, 提供車隊管理者時時的監控、示警與對駕駛員駕駛風險的管控能力。
除了車隊管理外此產品可應用於行車保險業, 透過人工智慧軟體的偵測功能可以知道車輛可能發生了事故, 除了可以即時將事故影片上傳雲端之外, 也可以提供雙向通話功能立即與相關保險服務人員聯繫。對被保險人來說, 提供必要時的協助以及影像雲端備份做事故原因釐清且可以加快理賠。
三種角度提供最適切的硬體設計：1) 從監控者角度：防止駕駛者拆卸、Plug 防拉設計; 2) 從駕駛者(被監控者)角度：兼具直覺易懂之功能燈號、明顯且好按壓之按鍵設計、便利使用之NFC感應、無顯示螢幕干擾視線之設計; 3) 從使用人員角度：最小移動量之組裝路徑設計、Plug cable 一次性安裝設計、便利拆卸/鎖固配件

translations.name: Video Telematics Solution
translations.description: It is distinct from conventional dashcam products. In addition to the front camera, it features inner camera and car computer connectivity for an all-encompassing recording of the whole vehicle environment, including driver behavior, and vehicle status. With a powerful AI algorithm, the recorded data can be transmitted through the 4G network and run in the back-end. With our complete back-end solutions, we provide fleet managers with real-time monitoring, warning and control. This product can also be used in the car insurance industry. Through the detection function of the AI software, notice will be given of a potential road incident. In addition to instant incident footage uploads, it can also provide a two-way call function.

translations.name: Ai-1 Ultra ABS
translations.description:
宏佳騰秉持著以「Future Mobility」為精神的主軸，來宣告對於電動車市場的企圖心。將造車工藝融入在Ai-1 Ultra ABS之上，並以革命、創新、科技，三大理念來打造出不只時尚而且聰明的都會移動美學。
Ai-1 Ultra ABS最具特色的是採用全新CROXERA 6智慧儀表系統，能夠「一鍵導航到站換電」的功能，無需沿途使用手機，不用時時關注著手機，透過計算騎乘習慣、距離等多項參數，將會在低電量時，進行提醒，並設定好路線，透過儀表資訊快速安全的到達換電站，而「DAPS 死角預防系統」在打方向燈的時候啟動後視影像，降低因過彎、迴轉的危險回頭行為，所引發的事故率。後方影像呈現在儀錶的同時，包括時速、速限、燈號都在儀表上動態顯示。搭載Bosch ABS 10煞車防鎖死系統，增進煞車的穩定性。
在外觀設計上車頭圓潤卻不失線條的外觀，順著弧線往下延伸，則是相當具有個性以及辨識度的LED大燈，帶點銳利的線條，加上霸氣的前導流進氣孔改變，讓外在變得更加兇悍。
 Ai-1 Ultra ABS定調為「超越今日極限，迎戰未來起點」希望帶來更為搶眼、更智慧、更安心、更創新等都有所超越的車款。

translations.name: Ai-1 Ultra ABS
translations.description:
AEON upholds the main axis of "Future Mobility" as the spirit to declare its ambition for the electric vehicle market. Integrate the car-making technology on the Ai-1 Ultra ABS, and use the three concepts of revolution, innovation and technology to create a stylish and smart urban mobile aesthetic.
The most distinctive feature of Ai-1 Ultra ABS is the CROXERA smart meter . It can be used to "one-click navigation to the station to change the power" function. There is no need to use the mobile phone along the way. Several parameters such as distance will be reminded when the power is low, and the route will be set, and the instrument information will be used to quickly and safely reach the power station. Equipped with Bosch ABS 10MB Anti-lock Braking System to improve brake stability.
In the appearance design, the front of the car is round but the line is extended. It extends down the arc. It is a very personal and recognizable LED headlight with a little sharp line.

translations.name: Ur1 Plus
translations.description:
Born to ride，PGO為了滿足更快、更熱血與更多操控樂趣的需求，全新開發的Ur1 plus車款。
使用功率7.6kw G2 鋁合金水冷永磁同步馬達，直線加速0-50km/h只需3.8秒，帶給車主極致的加速體驗。
搭配Class-C LED大燈與全車LED燈具，充足的照明可提升夜間騎乘安全性。
大尺寸多功能正顯智慧液晶儀表，清晰行車資訊與智慧操作功能，隨時體驗絕佳科技。
預載阻尼可調氮瓶避震器，優秀的避震性能操控與舒適兼顧，搭配33mm前叉強化前輪穩定性，整體操控性提升更加輕鬆面對各種路面挑戰
CBS連動式煞車，一手掌握縮短煞車距離，並使用MAXXIS MA-EV電動車專屬配胎，提升濕地抓地力表現。
全新車身彩繪與黑化方向燈，更加彰顯跑格靈魂。跑車坐墊皮革與Ur1 plus專屬電繡字樣，喚醒深層熱血靈魂。

translations.name: Ur2 Plus
translations.description:
Innovation & ECO friendly：Using 3KW GH1 integrated aluminum hub motor with to shuttle in the city easily. Adopting recyclable PP scratch-resistant body cover which not only prevent the injury but also contribute to the environmental protection of the earth.

Technology: NFC smart key card with thin and light design is easy to carry and one- touch start; LCD speedometer plus PGO EQ APP, the owner can use the mobile phone to unlocked the vehicle and open the trunk.

Safety and control: Class-C LED direct-illumination fisheye headlights and full-vehicle LED lights, enhance the night time riding experience; MAXXIS MA-EV electric vehicle exclusive tires and CBS linkage brakes, to ensure riding safety. 

Touching equipment: Only 82 kg of vehicle weight is convenient and fast to move. The seat height is 73 cm, and anyone can easily control it. Aluminum foldable pedals, lightweight rear armrests and storage hooks are all your most intimate partner.

translations.name: Spring
translations.description:
Spring 法式浪漫與絕佳性能 完美匹配
絕佳性能：使用符合七期環保法規4V油冷高效能引擎，油冷技術可克服長時間高速運轉，搭配德國BOSCH噴射系統，創造同級最強馬力。
科技智能：Keyless無鑰匙系統，輕薄NFC智慧鑰匙卡出門攜帶輕便並有281兆組編碼，不再怕愛車被偷。LED+LCD智慧儀表與APP可為車輛創造更多可能。
安全守護：前後碟煞加上BOSCH ABS防鎖死剎車系統，安全規格最高標。全車LED燈具與頭燈，提升夜間騎乘安全。
美好心機：22L大容量車廂、305mm腳踏空間可容納更多物品，740mm低座高與五段可調後雙避震器，專為女性創造絕佳騎乘體驗。QC 3.0 USB充電座隨時為手機帶來滿滿電力。

translations.name: Spring
translations.description:
Excellent performance: The 4V oil-cooled high-performance engine that complies with the Taiwan phase 7 EPA regulations. The oil-cooled technology can overcome long-term high-speed operation. With the BOSCH injection system, it creates the strongest horsepower in its class.

Intelligent technology: Keyless system, designed light and thin NFC smart card, is easy portable and equipped 281 megabytes of codes. Don’t be afraid of vehicle stolen. LED+LCD smart meters with App function can create more possibilities for vehicle.

Safety guard: Front and rear disc brakes plus BOSCH ABS anti-lock brake system is the highest safety standard. All LED lights enhance the safety of riding at night.

Wonderful thinking: 22L large-capacity trunk and 305mm pedal space can accommodate more items. 740mm seat height and five-section adjustable rear double shock absorbers create an excellent riding experience for female. The QC 3.0 USB charger brings full power to the mobile phone at any time.

translations.name: 智慧聯網-資訊中心高顯熱型水冷機
translations.description:
1.高顯熱商用空調機的精準調控功能，可用於對環境顯熱需求較高的場所，例如:大型伺服器，中型電算中心，小型樓宇電算中心，顯熱比需求可達90%以上，利用精準調控功能可達到理想PUE值，達到綠能環保功效。亦可做恆溫恆濕控制，用於控溫濕度需求的環境，例如:酒窖、實驗室、醫院等。
2.聯網遠端監控及能源管理功能，滿足不同監控需求。
3.東元開發之排程控制及備援設計，依使用需求彈性變更設計。
4.可藉由人機介面的顯示及偵測，實現機體的自我診斷，以利機體之故障排除。

translations.description:
1. The smart control function of high sensible heat commercial packaged air conditioners can be used in places with high sensible heat temperatures , such as Rack server ,Electronic Computer Center ,Small-Building Computer Center , etc.The sensible heat ratio can reach more than 90% and The regulation function can reach the ideal PUE value and achieve the green energy and environmental protection effect. It can also be used for constant temperature and humidity control in environments where temperature and humidity are required, such as wine cellars, laboratories, hospitals, etc.
2. Network monitoring and energy management functions to meet the needs of different environments
3. The scheduling control and backup support design developed by TECO can be flexibly changed and manufactured according to demand.
4. Self-diagnosis function, through the display and detection of the human-machine interface, can realize the machine's self-diagnosis to facilitate the machine's troubleshooting.

translations.name: 綠能智慧全直流變頻氣冷式冰水機
translations.description:
TECO綠能DC變頻中央空調主機以高品質及綠能為目標，不斷創造空調技術新紀錄。美白雅緻的簡約外觀設計，DC變頻壓縮機設計與大風量DC風機，提昇能效至COP3.2符合國家節能標章水準。搭配使用R410A環保新冷媒，達到科技享受與環境保護的完美平衡。 

綠能DC變頻中央空調主機特點：
一、DC直流變頻技術：DC變頻驅動節能技術，降低耗功30%，結合高效率風機及馬達設計，機組COP性能達3.2。

二、簡約超薄外觀設計：降低體積25%、減小重量19%、減少冷媒充填量12%、減少安裝空間。不論在製造、運送、到最後的使用，都可以減少碳排放量，節省能源。

三、全負載高能效系統：採用高速MCU即時運算，隨時偵測環境與負載的資訊，極佳地優化冷媒系統控制、DC壓縮機驅動、DC風扇出力調節以達到全負載，全天候的運轉效率，IPLV可達5.3，超越綠建築的4.63要求。
，

translations.name: 多元智慧物流多車系統
translations.description: 多元智慧物流多車系統整體解決方案為臺灣首套三機一體AMR之設計，可因應工作區域安排，靈活切換至單車、多車或自主跟隨車，節省業主建置與維運成本。此系統可結合工廠MES，透過演算法提昇AMR與工廠自動化設備運行整合效益與施作可行性。AMR單體是基於ROS-based之無軌式AMR，TECO Multi-AGVs Intelligence Control System(東元多車智慧控制系統核心)為一智慧管理調度控制系統，以SLAM技術為基底，結合自主研發的交通管理與調度控制演算法，軟硬體系統整合而生。自主跟隨車，透過視覺演算技術，可滿足智慧跟人跟隨/跟線跟隨/自動循線/自駕模式功能，將智慧避障技術整合於智能跟隨系統，提供使用者操作上使跟隨車行動更顯快速輕巧，並能在狹窄通道間能穿梭自如，活動範圍也更為彈性。

translations.name: Smart multiple functional logistic system
translations.description: Smart multiple functional logistic system is a design of three-in-one AMR, which can be flexibly switched to single-vehicle, multi-vehicle or autonomous follow-up vehicles according to the work area arrangement, saving the owner's construction and maintenance costs. TECO Multi-AGVs Intelligence Control System is an intelligent management dispatch control system, based on SLAM technology, combined with self-developed traffic management and Scheduling control algorithm, the integration of software and hardware systems is born. Follow the car autonomously, through the visual calculation technology, it can meet the functions of smart follow people/follow the line/automatic route/self-driving mode, integrate the smart obstacle avoidance technology into the smart follow system, and provide the user to operate the following car more clearly It is fast and light, and can shuttle freely between narrow passages, and the range of motion is more flexible.

translations.name: 半自動(離線式)PCB分板設備
translations.description:
AUO 3000UCD半自動(離線式)PCB分板設備特色有:
1.	專利雙獨立切割軸:提升同產品產能50%，同時切割不同路徑產品，免去過去等待切割的時間創造更多的產能。
2.	專利刀徑量測系統:以自行開發的刀徑量測系統做到高精度的量測，在每次刀具更換後都可確保正確性，降低產品報廢的風險。於切割前可檢查銑刀的直徑是否與設定值相符，避免人員疏失造成損失。另外提供額外防呆檢查：第一次啟動切割程式前進行偵測及每次換刀後切割前進行偵測。
3.	母板掃描功能:使用網路型CCD搭配遠心鏡，利用軟體演算法將產品全板面拼接後展示在介面上進行所見即所得功能切割路徑編輯。
4.	所見即所得功能切割路徑編輯:過往的切割路徑編輯使用的是座標式教導編輯，所見及所得功能編輯模式可直觀性編輯畫面上的切割路徑。
5.	上集塵:縮小集塵範圍並包覆切割區域，減少切割時粉塵沾黏，讓切割粉塵有效去除，保持產品和機台環境的清潔。
6.	自動上蓋設計:過去離線設備的上蓋都是以人工的方式固定上蓋，改為自動最大的優勢第一，節省鎖上固定、取放蓋子的時間，第二，可以搭配機械手臂將半自動設備進化成全自動設備, 更可以邁向工業4.0的佈局。

translations.name: Semi-Automatic PCB Separator
translations.description:
1.	Patented “INDEPENDENT TWO-SPINDLE CIRCUIT BOARD CUTTING EQUIPMENT” with high performance spindles extremely optimization productivity by 50%, eliminating time waiting with different cutting path. 
2.	Patented “MEASURE AND CALIBRATION SYSTEM FOR CUTTING”, achieve high precisions measurement. Easy/simple tool exchange ensured accuracy, lower scrap of value materials. Cutting program for performed before cutting, after each tool changing.
3.	GigE vison type CCD, visual scan for PC board, software algorithm via dedicated interface, be easily to edit for cutting path, production work sheet can be save secured with industrial PC.
4.	Cutting path edit, using visual process teaching edit mode can intuitively show to user. 
5.	Upper dust collector concentrate at cutting area keeps dust away during cutting, it keeps cleanness for environment too.
6.	Upper cover automatic module, shorten tool exchange time and stay cleanness. Aurotek provide solutions to let user to engage with industrial 4.0.

translations.name: 內圓磨床 培林內徑/內溝專用機
translations.description:
OIG-200S產品特色
ㆍ 研磨工件入料、出料與工作主軸頭同動,可縮短調整時間,可選配震動筒或整料裝置,以達成自動化。
ㆍ標配電磁式無心托盤支持,可快速上下料,縮短工時。
ㆍ可選配CBN砂輪,提升研磨效率。
ㆍ目前標配搭載大光長榮自有開發對話式晝面(採用三菱PLC),操作簡單方便易於上手,也可依客戶使用需求選配其他CNC控制器。
ㆍ標配搭載高精度滾輪修整機構,可確保修整精度。
ㆍ依據工件精度需求,可選配加裝光學尺或內徑量測系統。

大光長榮方針秉持以日本機台品質.優異價格來爭取市場佔有率。故此產品強化內藏式主軸減少面積佔地與輕量化，並配合砂輪高週波主軸，高轉速與穩定且工作主軸台側軸座使用固定樣式、軸向移動快速，綜合述優勢，可進行超高精度與難度較高的細小孔加工，搭配旋轉角度大的電磁工作主軸頭，可簡易夾持薄型工件，能有無死角的行程。在性能與可加工產品種類均優於同業。

translations.name: Internal Grinder for bearing ID & inner groove
translations.description:
OIG-200S outstanding Features
ㆍThe workpiece loading, unloading and the workhead movement could operate at the same time in order to shorten the time for setting & adjustment. Machine could equip with vibration feeder or workpiece arranging device in order to have auto loading control.
ㆍMachine with magnetic workhead centerless support device which allows the loading and unloading workpiece
process move quickly and increase work efficiency.
ㆍThe customer could use optional accessory CBN grinding wheel for having better grinding results.
ㆍMachine equipped with Palmary developed conversational control panel (Mitsubishi PLC) for easy operation. The customer could choose to use CNC controller as optional.
ㆍMachine supplied the high precision roller type dressing device to make sure the dressing accuracy.
ㆍAccording to the workpiece accuracies required, it's optional to add the digital linear or in-process ID measuring device.

translations.name: 智能化雙滑枕數控立式車床
translations.description:
VL-400C-2R智能雙滑枕立式車床，鎖定風力發電產業響應政府政策綠能、替代能源的發展。在眾多歐洲、日本競爭中為客戶創造大生產效率以及最高性價比。在產品設計上擁有許多唯一且突破性設計！
1. 以車削加工取代磨技術，表面粗糙度可達Ra0.4之嚴苛要求，不僅生產效率大幅提升、將原本需要兩台配置的工程集約至一台VL-400C-2R即可完成！減少用電及占地面積，可以節省30%加工時間以及30%的整體加工成本。解決客戶對加工效率提升兼具高精度要求的渴望！
2. 專利Solid Lock拉刀系統設計。強力拉刀系統，高達10噸的拉刀力減少刀具震動增加刀具壽命、讓機台加工效能提升一倍。提供車削大型工件和高硬度材料工件高穩定性及精準度。
3.智能化設計：透過智能監控掌握機器耗能及生產狀態可隨時調節，實現生產資訊透明化、機台操作即時化，機台稼動率一目瞭然。

translations.name: Intelligent dual-ram CNC Vertical turning center
translations.description:
VL-400C-2R intelligent dual-ram CNC Vertical turning center is designed for Wind energy industry to response government policies for the development of green energy and alternative energy. It creates high production efficiency and the highest cost-effective for customers. 
1. Using turning processing instead of grinding processing, moreover, the surface roughness can reach Ra0.4 strict requirements. 
2. Save 30% of the processing time and 30% of the overall processing cost. Not only the production efficiency is greatly improved, but the process that originally required two configurations can be integrated into one VL-400C-2R to complete! Reduce electricity consumption and floor utility. 
3. An extremely rigid tool clamping system, provides over 10 tons of clamping force reduces tool vibration, increases tool life and machine productivity.
4.The precise forced lubrication system of the ways and “C3” ball screws with encoder assures high precision during heavy duty machining.

translations.name: 複合式CNC車床
translations.description: (1)一體式成形之硬軌結構，低重心30度斜床身設計，易於切屑處理且近身操作性佳。(2)單一車銑複合機的架構，延展出具有兩台複合機的功能，減少加工流程，有效達到一機多用提高生產效率及品質的效用。(3)負載監視功能，可控管刀具加工對軸向負載值，更可提前發現刀損情況，有效降低產品不良率並提高生產質量。(4)一體式的副主軸傳動座，擺脫一般副主軸馬達固定於副主軸箱體的設計，強化整體剛性及提升維修便利性。(5)直角Y軸，相較於虛擬Y軸設計，直角Y軸可提供更準確的真直度與定位精度，更可滿足高精度的銑削需求。(6)全系列採用變頻式油壓單元，可減少35%以上的耗電量，不僅達到綠色環保的概念更可節省生產成本。(7)不對稱視覺設計，前門大視窗規劃提供良好的觀看視角，可完整觀看機台內部運轉情形。(8)搭配明亮流線式LED呼吸燈設計，即使使用者於夜間操作亦能帶來清楚明亮的照明功能，安全、環保、省電兼具美學。

And ensure great positioning accuracy 6) Inverter hydraulic unit saves more than 35% power consumption 7) Asymmetrical design and large window of the door provides a good viewing, allowing a complete view of the internal operation 8) With LED light design brings clear and bright lighting even at night

translations.name: 智慧機器人自動咖啡販賣機
translations.description:
全球AI技術的突破，完全改變商業模式，「智慧機器人自動咖啡販賣機」產品， 導入勵德的科技研發，可完全達到自動售賣、遠端操控、銷售追蹤，營收最大化等現代化售賣功能。
1. 人性化設計考量:	
本產品在水溫、水量、飲品容量均有電子全數碼控製，精確有效的節省原物料，可24小時無人化自動售賣，一鍵完成咖啡的全部製作過程。尤其在後疫情時代，更能為公共場所提供增值的附加服務。
2. 簡易圖型的直覺操作介面:
本產品採用簡易圖形式的直覺操作介面，搭配六軸機械手臂執行咖啡拉花路徑以及咖啡的製作，精準的還原手工沖製好味道。
3. 影像辨識的消費行為分析與精準行銷:
本產品建置了智能分析系統，能做到統計停留率、購買率、分析年齡層、性別喜好、單點的熱賣品項、時段購買人數曲線，透過大數據分析來滾動式修正菜單與行銷模式。
4. 便捷而安全的支付技術:
本產品整合行動支付及行動辨識技術，大幅降低了物聯網機台資安管理成本及風險。
5. 簡單有效的後台管理系統:
本產品具備完整的雲端後台管理系統：每日消費統計記錄、缺料或故障即時通知、即時及定時發送訊息通知管理者。

translations.name: Robotic Coffee Shop
translations.description:
The AI technology has completely changed the business model. The " Robotic Coffee Shop"  has introduced Reed's technology research and development, which can fully achieve modern sales functions such as automatic sales, remote control, sales tracking, and revenue maximization. 
1. Humanized design 
This product has electronic full digital control of water temperature, water volume, and beverage volume, which saves raw materials accurately and effectively. 
2. Simple graphical intuitive operation interface
This product uses a simple graphical intuitive operation interface, witha six-axis robot to execute the latte art path and coffee production, 
and accurately restore the good taste of hand-made.
3. Consumer behavior analysis and precise marketing based on image recognition
This product has built an intelligent analysis system that can count retention rates, purchase rates, analyze age groups, gender preferences, 
single-point hot-selling items, and time period purchase numbe.

translations.name: 全自動電路板雙面文字噴印生產線
translations.description:
適用於PCB雙面字符、IC載板標識，替代傳統絲網印刷，為製造廠商提供高精密、高品質和高效率的全自動5G伺服主板、通訊板噴印生產解決方案。
智能化噴印設備可節省人力、物力及間接材製作費用。免網版，不需專業人員操作，支援各種作業平台(PC、Mac、Sun)或藉由CAM資料即時轉換噴印圖形，迅速切換料號，高數位智能化流程，並同步滿足噴印輸出高品質要求。
*花崗石基座：採焊接型鋼機架搭配高精度00等级(小于0.01mm)花崗石基座為主體。
*多噴頭設計：9顆數位噴頭，搭載線性馬達+光學尺移動，滿足印件噴印高品質需求。
*專利技術：閃噴防堵塞功能，確保生產過程或長時間不噴印時噴頭不堵塞。
*板翹偵測：自動雷射感測器偵測板翹，避免人工板厚(0.3〜4.0mm)輸入錯誤碰撞噴頭。
*高效產能：平行雙工位交換式噴印，增加產能30%以上。
*自動翻面：氣動夾爪搭配伺服馬達90度翻轉，將料件由A機送至B機，避免接觸印件噴印區域。
*清潔噴頭：採用無塵布捲將滾輪及氣缸加壓的噴頭擦拭。
*圖形即時轉換：CAM自動轉換噴印圖形檔，無網版，切換料號迅速，添加標識碼便捷。

translations.name: Auto PCB Double Sided Legend Ink Jet Printing Line
translations.description:
Replace screen printing legend & label on IC carrier, provided high precision and efficient inkjet solution for automatic production 5G servo and communication board. 
Intellectualized inkjet saves labor & material, free stencil & unskilled printer, support multi-platform (PC, Mac, Sun) or use CAM to convert into inkjet graphic, quick exchange part no, digital process inkjet output. 
*Granite pedestal : collocated framework to attain accuracy 00 class (≦0.01 mm).
*Multi-nozzle : linear motor and optical ruler for 9 nozzle motion.
*Patented technique : flash spray anti-clogging assures unblocked
*Warpage detection : Laser sensor detects to avoid failure input thickness (0.3 ~4.0 mm) to impact the spray nozzle.
*Efficient productivity : parallel double station exchange printing to raise ≧30%
*Auto flip : air clamp with servo motor 90°turn over to place from A to B machine untouchable spray area.
*Graphic Conversion : CAM converts graphic file, fast exchange and adding identification code

translations.name: 全自動車載曲面玻璃網印生產線
translations.description:
針對大曲率R角，低鋼性、高靭性和延展性的曲面玻璃，並採用特殊設計的多功能模治具去承載的全自動曲面玻璃網版印刷線。整線由入出料機與四台雙系統CCD對位網印機搭配UV乾燥組成。玻璃入或出料採用自動吸盤取料或放料，玻璃放置模治具上進行初整定及平面壓合，模治具以獨特電軌跨工作站循環移載玻璃並提供電力及通訊控制，另以精準的視覺輔助對位系統進行玻璃與網版的精準對位印刷後立即UV乾燥，重覆進行四道套印工序後出料，創新特色如下：。
*電軌設計：特製模治具，以電軌跨工作站保持供電及光通訊控制，配附真空檢知全程吸附。
*自動水平校準：光電非接觸式刮刀水平自動校準設計，確保二側高度印刷膜厚均勻性。
*雙抬版功能：數控多段設定，程式運算微分調整抬板高度配合刮刀行程上下斜坡，避免玻璃中間微凸起處黏版或印刷圖像變形。
*取像對位：6支2000萬畫素多邊輪廓相機取像對位，搭配背光源尋玻璃邊緣對位，去除光源干擾，對位精度達±20μm。

translations.name: Auto CCD Registering Automotive Curved Glass Screen Printing Line
translations.description:
Dedicated to print BM & icons onto curved surface of glass for automotive display, and use special vacuum mould with conductor rail and communication control unit to carry glass. Entire line is consisted of Loader, 4 Printers with CCD registering, 4 UV curing units and Unloader. Auto vacuum arm in-feeds and diacharges curved glass onto vacuum mould for pre-registration and flattening, then repeat sequentially process of registering, printing and curing for multi-layer printing. Innovative features as below.
*Conductor rail : supplys 24V power when mould is moved circular across the workstation.
*Auto squeegee leveling : sensors detect both squeegee ends leveling to assure uniformity of printed ink.
*Double peel-off : program calculation adjusts peel-off height to match upward / downward slope of squeegee stroke along with glass protrusion at middle.
*Visual Registration : 6 cameras with 20M pixel for searching glass edge, and 2 cameras for screen alignment. Registration accuracy ±20μm.

translations.name: 全自動電路板塞孔防焊網印生產線
translations.description:
電路板全製程自動網印線興起，市場發展前景大。其中塞孔製程，主要創新原網版改以鋁板替代，提升塞孔速度及塞孔質量，滿足5G通訊板、伺服主板0.25mm小孔徑塞孔，厚徑比從原有8:1提高至12:1。本機台提供完整解決方案，全數位化控制、CCD自動對位、對版使塞孔及雙面防焊作業極易上手操作、生產，將原先三次印刷、三次烘烤，簡化為連線印刷三次、烘烤一次，除節省場地、能耗及成本外，大大提高生產效能，是全球首家創新且具銷售實績百條線，是最有競爭力之產品。
*高生產效能：雙工位循環印刷移載、同步作入出料動作，提高產能30%以上。
*薄厚板共用：全自動厚薄板(0.5〜4.0mm)均能線上生產，全球創新，推廣亮點。
*快速換線：採入料對位以及架設公用治具板以達快速對版，實現精準、快速及快速換線的需求。
*高印壓保持：全製程印刷座採多支滑台汽缸，確保高印壓印刷墨厚之一致性。
*薄板對位拉撐：夾爪力量加大50%，且同時拉撐X、Y方向，CCD對位更準確。
*高穩定性：網版升降採直角電動缸，跨距長，六個動力轉向機構。 
*高印壓功能：印刷座結構加強，刮刀裝配三支導軌氣缸，提高印壓至147kg。

translations.name: Auto PCB Solder Mask Plug-via Screen Printing Line
translations.description:
As automatic PCB production line is desired with strong future demand. This equipment for 5G equipments with 0.25mm via satisfies plugging process for aspect ratio up to 12:1. Efficiency is contributed by digital control and CCD alignment. Reduce 2 times of baking, and now is only 1 time of baking after 3 times of printing to save plant space and costs. This competitive product is sold over hundred lines.
*High productivity: Double station cycle printing increasing over 30% productivity.
*High applicability: Apply for wide range of PCB thickness from 0.5mm to 4.0mm.
*Quick changeover: Fast screen alignment is powered by alignment system and jig board.
*High printing pressure: Print-head equips 3 guide rail cylinders to contribute high printing pressure 147 kgf for uniformity of paste.
*Stretching capability: Grippers stretch panel at X and Y axis together for accurate alignment
*High stability: Adopted synchronous electric cylinder for large size screen lift up/down moving stable

translations.name: 先進智能平面磨床
translations.description: TD NC控制器六大主題說明:(1.)大數據整合應用>材料與砂輪磨料的選配，如硬度、粒度、氣孔、主軸轉速應用,砂輪動平衡震動監控。(2.)即時服務>預警發生時，操作錯誤或參數設定不當、迴路異常，跑馬燈會即時顯示故障問題，各軸I/O 會以紅燈或綠燈呈現，檢知故障問題或透過遠端監控排除問題，售服零件更換也可透過內建QR Code，連結Youtube或 優酷導修影片。(3.)操作介面可視化監控>操作者可依加工尺寸直接以對話填入起始點、目標點、粗磨點、細磨預留量.下刀進刀量都不需要以任何程式編輯節省80%時間，主軸轉速、每日、每週、每月保養點檢等。(4.)智慧聯網>透過Ethnet提供管理者即時監控，從單機到多機連結，讓管理者有效掌握生產動態。( 5.)電子元件壽期管理>機台感測器、軸承運轉的時間及各滑軌潤滑及相關耗材更換提示。(6.)多國語系>歐日控制器只支援提供七國語系，眾程控制器可支援50國語系，大數據應用解決客戶痛點,不需很專業的技術人員即可操作.特色總結:驚奇與亮點:因應疫情數位整合,解決客戶痛點,讓業務,生產,服務不中斷,加速數位整合互聯網,AI人工智慧,提升數位應用新商機。

translations.name: Intelligent DC Inverter Cooler
translations.description:
HABOR [Intelligent DC Inverter Cooler] is a product designed for high-end technology of manufacturing processing. It can meet the application of data integration and analysis of smart equipment demanded in the European market. It is also designed with inverter control and energy-saving system to provide more stable and high accuracy in temperature control.
It provide the function of monitoring cooler characteristics, such as power consumption, cooling efficiency, temperature status of high and low pressure, pump pressure and flow rate, temperature…etc, It is more convenient and easy for customers to realize the cooler status, and also more flexible for equipment operation.
For the application of data integration and analysis of smart equipments in global market, we provide various communication interface including RS485, MOBUS, EtherCAT, PROFINET and ETHERNET/IP for IOT purpose, which is more user-friendly to the end customers all over the world.

translations.name: 鑽孔機
translations.description:
木工鑽孔機自推出以來，歷經數10年間均無重大突破性發展，直到本產品正式問世，以齒輪傳動系統取代傳統皮帶式傳動系統，解決長久以來皮帶打滑及變速困難的問題，並加入更多人性化元素，帶給使用者前所未有的操作感受：
(1)解決傳統鑽孔機皮帶打滑問題，改以齒輪傳動方式(台灣新型專利NO.M562726)克服使用者需更換皮帶來變速的難題。
(2)PWM控制系統加上DC有刷馬達來配合明椿變速齒輪箱，提供使用者無窮的動力來源。
(3)將人體工學的設計概念融入本產品，透過加長20%的操作把手，讓使用者更能輕鬆加工。
(4)高能見度的雷射定位器(台灣新型專利NO.M592972)讓使用者可以精確定位鑽孔位置。
(5)雙LED燈減少大部分的陰影，提高了使用者在操作時的可視度。
(6)輕巧流線型的ABS護罩及精美的外型使本產品置於工作室中亦能如精品般賞心悅目。
(7)本產品在美加地區推出後，即獲得美國WOOD雜誌2021傑出創新的獎項。

translations.name: Drill press
translations.description: Since the launch of drill press, it has not made major progress in decades until this drill press with gear drive system is launched. It replaced traditional belt type drive system with gear type drive system, which solved the problem of belt slipping and speed shifting difficulties that the users has been suffering for a long time. Furthermore, it has more human-based elements which will bring users unprecedented operation experience. Soon after the drill press was launched in North American region, it was awarded with “WOOD Innovate Awards 2021” by the renowned WOOD magazine.

translations.name: 晶圓移載模組
translations.description:
HIWIN晶圓移載模組Equipment Front End Module (EFEM)
1.MIT核心技術，自製關鍵零組件：EFEM系統化整合，包含滾珠螺桿、線性滑軌、諧波減速機、單軸機器人、晶圓機器人、伺服馬達、直驅馬達與驅動器等。
2.滿足市場多元需求與智慧製造趨勢：EFEM適用於半導體與光學檢測設備、太陽能及LED產業等，具高速化、高定位精度及高可靠性等優勢，模組化的類型、尺寸。
3.模組化架構，提供彈性客製：傾聽顧客的使用需求研發，提供彈性選擇1~8個晶圓載入/出埠，有別於業界常見2個。可依客戶各種產線配置，提供最佳模組與最快交期的解決方案。
4.半導體產業的成本節能方案：EFEM可提供20%~40%的成本節能。對應半導體設備交易時的兩個重要指標，每單位晶圓成本以及總體擁有成本。
5.精度誤差小於一根頭髮十分之一：EFEM經不同的感測器，偵測晶圓卡匣擺放，取放時精度可達微米等級。
6.國際安規品質認証：支援SECS/GEN 通訊，通過國際半導體設備SEMI S2安全認證，潔淨度達 Class 1，料件符合ROHS規範。異況時啟動保護機制，防治設備受損，確保人員安全。

translations.name: Equipment Front End Module (EFEM)

1.HIWIN EFEM - MIT, ballscrew, guideway, robot reducer, single axis, wafer robot, drive, servo & direct drive motor, EFEM critical parts made by HIWIN. 
2.Automation of semiconductor, AOI, solar & LED. High speed, accuracy and reliability. HIWIN module design meets market needs & industrie 4.0.  
3.HIWIN Module design, provides flexiblity for customization, up to eight optional wafer load/out ports, better than market two wafer load/out ports. Good quality & short lead time. 
4.Provide cost-saving solutions at 20% to 40% benefit to meet key indicators- cost per wafer and cost of ownership.
5.EFEM detects wafer cassette position by sensors, controls accuracy at micron level, less than 1/10 of a human hair difference.

translations.name: 自動搬運機器人
translations.description:
i-Operator鎖定半導體產業之晶圓盒搬運，並且針對半導體工廠環境的特殊要求與晶圓盒的搬運特點，強化整體的適應性設計，以高效率、體積小、極致安全為訴求，成功的建立產品在市場上的定位。     
   友上科技致力於「微型化技術」研發，將「高精度視覺補償技術」「高效能電池技術」「先進夾爪技術」極致化的縮小整合到機器人中，這樣小的體積針對半導體工廠內狹小的走道寬度有特別好的適應性，適用的範圍也較他廠產品廣泛很多。
   在「高精度視覺補償技術」部份已取得專利，於無人車定位偏差達到±10mm的狀況下，依然可以讓機械手臂的抓取精度提升到±0.1mm。 而「高效能電池技術」更是智能搬運機器人的核心，讓電池可以兼具「高效率充電」「小體積」「極致安全」，並通過電池相關安全認證。「先進夾爪技術」則是針對各式的晶圓盒，研發出小體積/高靈活/高穩定之夾爪結構，在確保搬運過程可靠度時，還可以讓機器人可以在最小空間內完成搬運工作。
