translations.name: 動樑動柱式龍門加工中心機
translations.description:
1. 欣鴻BCM是目前國內使用最大的機型，X軸可達28米，可應用在航太、能源、鐵道、風力發電、工程車輛等產業之超大型工件加工。
2. BCM動柱動樑龍門加工中心機最大特色為W軸採用多重煞車系統硬軌設計，切削移動時兼具保壓機制，確保W軸因熱膨脹而引起的誤差和補償零件製造和裝配誤差，讓切削時獲得更優異的剛性與精度。
3. 配合通過專利的結構，在W軸不煞車的情況下，不會產生前傾，達到W軸和Z軸同動切削，讓連續加工面更大，效率也因此提升。
4. BCM之W軸與Z軸可以同動加工，對於超大型的長工件，或是高低差較大的工件，相較於定樑機型需要二段式加工，BCM可以節省許多加工時間，只要一機就可滿足多樣化的連續加工，是加工產業提升競爭力的最佳利器。
5. 適合薄件及超高、超長工件加工，X軸比同行程小30%-40%；佔地面積縮小30-40%。

translations.name: Beam and Column Moving Type
translations.description:
1. BCM Series adopts W axis and Z axis of box way design move simultaneously and process with a 5-face milling head. 
2. W axis comes with multi-brakes control system and pressure-holding mechanism to ensure minimum backlash compensation when W axis moves.
3. The patent of crossbeam clamping mechanism is designed with hydraulic braked and full-travel wear compensation to perfectly maintain accuracy when moving. 
4. The W axis and Z axis of BCM can be processed at the same time. For extra large and long workpieces or with large height differences, compared with fixed beam models that require two-stage processing, BCM can save a lot of processing time, as long as BCM series can meet the diversified continuous processing.
5. The X axis is smaller 30%-40% than the same travel; the footprint is reduced by 30-40%.

translations.name: AI智能化五軸工具機
translations.description:
本機台市場定位在可製作大型工件且高複雜精密度工具機，主打「AI智慧化」與「實用性」2大創新價值：

AI智慧化：加裝智慧應用服務器，可整合相關數據並上傳至友嘉數據服務管理平台做分析，並將數據轉為可視化呈現，如零組件自動偵測、稼動率管理等，並經由電腦、平板、手機雲端平台做管理。經由實證得知，一般工廠主管原需透過月報表才可得知產量，現在可當天立即掌握；此外，透過零組件偵測，可減少人員巡檢，提升管理效率達22.3%；售服保養部分，AI取代人工書面作業，模型準確高達90%，一年可節省90萬元。

實用性：開發擺頭式高端五軸機，可減少市面上泛用五軸機堆疊式結構所造成累積誤差；此外，溫升與顫振一直是客戶在使用機台的2大痛點，友嘉自行開發溫度補償卡與建模分析軟體，大幅改善機台三軸熱變形問題，補償後加工精度控制在0.02mm內比原本未補償前改善80%；切削過程中若發生顫振現象，友嘉切削顫振技術，使用優化演算法與圖形化介面，可於2秒內抑制顫振現象；在高速主軸加工過程中，容易因產生熱量造成線性熱膨脹而發生主軸熱伸長變形，透過追加位移感應器測量位移信息與監測溫度信息，並傳輸到數控系統，可進行誤差補償定位。

(6)	萬用型的承載台設計(Universal Inspection Table)，可快速的產品切換程式自動化與伴隨的全域自動遮蔽設計。

translations.name: AX-1500超精密車床
translations.description:
AX-1500超精密車床，主軸迴轉精度達0.1um，重覆定位精度達±0.01um，模組各項精度指標接近國際大廠水準。實車工件表面粗糙度Ra 5nm，圓筒度0.1um，可實現超高加工精度需求，加工精度超越精密磨床，可以實現以車代磨的加工技術。適用於光學、半導體、光通訊、模具產業。
AX-1500床身採用整塊天然花崗岩作為床面，減少切削時的殘留應力，並提供良好的制震能力。液靜壓滑軌具有接觸面零摩擦、高阻尼特性並有效克服遲滯滑移的現象，可減少車削時的振動量，並具有極微小的進給能力，刀具壽命可以提高兩倍以上，滑軌也可保持長久的精度。軸向採用對稱式雙線馬驅動，除了移動平順及穩定，快速移動相較國外超精密車床機型更提升12.5%。搭載智能化CCD對刀系統及線上動平衡系統，直接在機內調整刀具位置與工件動平衡，提升客戶產品製程效率及超高精度的要求。
受新冠肺炎疫情影響，使得客戶要分流工作，開發的可視化生產管理系統TiMES，可將現有生產排程經由遠端將程式傳輸至加工機,在加工過程中運用Ti-Link i介面監控機器運行狀況、程式名稱、加工條件、稼動時間、警報履歷排行、停機時段皆能即時化監控及有效管理產線。

translations.name: AX-1500 ultra-precision lathe machine
translations.description: AX-1500 ultra precision lathe developed by our company, the spindle rotation accuracy reaches 0.1um, and repeated positioning accuracy reaches ±0.01um, each accuracy index of the module is close to the standard of international key manufacturers. Practically, the surface roughness of workpiece is Ra 5nm and the cylindricity is 0.1um, which can meet the requirements of ultra-high machining accuracy. The applications are suitable for optical, semiconductor, optical communication, and mold industry.AX-1500 adopts a whole piece of natural granite as the bed surface, which reduces the residual stress during cutting and provides good vibration damping ability. The hydrostatic guideway provides zero friction on the contact surface, high damping characteristics, and effectively overcomes the phenomenon of hysteresis slip which reduces the amount of vibration during turning, with a very small feed capacity.

translations.name: 龍門五軸數位智能自動化
translations.description:
龍門五軸數位智能自動化，搭配智能監控技術整合ERP及MES系統，從規劃到生產和服務的數位化製程，進階智能自動化技術，包括大數據處理能力、不同品牌設備自動化連接性，強化高速切削難切削材料、加工平穩、溫升變形小等特性，搭配高速自動交換盤系統，在加工過程中自動為下一個工件進行設置，並運用友善APP介面，取得所有生產相關訊息。

雙柱龍門一體式門開結構可實現高剛性、高精度和動態性能並可控制熱變形，通過一次性設置實現五軸同動加工特性，進行深切和複雜曲面加工同時保持最佳精度。荷重2.5噸，2200x1200mm工作台，配備table in table 直徑1200mm旋轉工作台，使加工更具彈性，利用自動交換盤系統，提高生產靈活性，達到單機自動化，解決自動化產線佔地空間問題。

本產品導入智慧型加工技術及智能監控技術，確保加工精度，可即時監控整機狀態，運用其IoT功能及AI演算，全面監控整機易磨損元件，提高機械可靠度，生產率和機台使用壽命，同時連接數據化管理，確保生產效率，即時供貨並做預測性服務，達到零意外停機，及24小時全天候智能自動化生產，提昇產能及利潤，提供用戶接軌智慧製造最佳解決方案。

AXILE’s bridge-type 5X digitalized intelligent automation consists of the innovative automatic pallet changing solutions and flexible manufacturing systems, supported by the proprietary SMT™ and ART™ technologies. 

The digitalized intelligent automation solutions enable machinists to embrace smart manufacturing to increase operational efficiency and productivity, optimize energy and staffing costs, and achieve 24/7 unmanned production, thereby significantly boosting ROI. 

Meanwhile, the proprietary technologies provide real-time and remote updates for manufacturers to embrace automation with no unexpected downtime. 

Using the OPC UA protocol and compatible with the umati (universal machine technology interface) platform, AXILE’s bridge-type 5X digitalized intelligent automation can be integrated into a whole ecosystem of third-party products, solutions, and systems.

translations.name: CNC球體複合車床
translations.description:
本SBL-100T除了具有標準CNC車床的所有優勢之外，同時間又能兼顧球型加工的真圓度，搭配特殊滾光刀具與技術，使得產品精度、品質都能獲得大幅的提升。

自動化導入方面，可以搭配門型機械手或是六軸機械手進行連線與自動上下料，也可使用送料機，進行各類棒材加工。加工便利性遠勝於傳統油壓專用機。

真圓度加工方面，由於傳統CNC車床都是採用X-Z軸座標搭配各類車刀進行加工，在座標編寫與實際加工成品，很容易產生誤差或是橢圓形的狀況。針對此現象，我們進行設備改良，設計出具有B軸功能的CNC車床，使球體加工不再是無法克服的難題。

．B軸採用伺服圓盤機構，徑軸向軸承可承受多方向切削力。分度盤本體結構架構規劃，肋補強均勻，結構設計紮實穩定，剛性高。
．渦輪由高張力鋁青銅材質組成，張力與合金鋼相當，渦桿採用合金鋼，銅與合金鋼的混合材質可以增加抗磨性，延長產品壽命。
．高品質的材質可確保高傳動扭力，馬達扭力亦可有效的傳輸。
．大尺寸的渦輪加大囓合面以減低表面承受的壓力，提升持久性。
．迴轉轉盤設計輕量化，減少蝸桿蝸輪磨耗，提高伺服轉盤壽命。

translations.name: 四面鉋木機
translations.description:
隨著製造技術的進步，人們日常使用的機械、設備也日趨複雜化；以往的四面鉋木機係將木板材於一個水平軸向的輸送，及至少一個軸向的切削，加工木板材的表面以形成其光滑的表面；然而僅可用於刨除木板材之表面，無法進一步用於其他種類之紋路加工；如此，對於項多量少的小型加工廠而言，並不符合經濟效益。所以，針對上述所存在之問題點，如何開發一種更具理想實用性之創新結構，實使用消費者所殷切企盼。
1.跳刀結構，可切削出複雜的表面紋路，作為傢俱之零組件或藝術飾品，且該跳刀結構藉由電腦數值控制（CNC，Computer Numerical Control）作動，可減少加工損壞率並增加工作效率。
2.操作介面使用人機介面，透過圖像式的操作介面容易理解與操作，-	產品、刀具、磨刀資料集於人機介面內，其工作產品、訂單號，描述性一一呈現眼前，不須靠老師父之記憶操作機械。其便利、速度、時效、多樣少量之快速生產性，與別人搶單之時效性。
上述結構與功能更加貼近消費者的使用需求，增加四面鉋木機的功能，簡化四面鉋木機的操作，更加符合人性所需。

translations.name: 四主軸五軸加工機
translations.description:
漢瑞泰實業股份有限公司以中文自有品牌「漢瑞泰-HANRETEC」及 Logo 為註冊商標行銷台灣及世界各國。公司的主要產品為「五軸數控銑床的設計、製造與售後服務」。本著『堅持品質第一，顧客至上』的品質政策，全體員工專心研製高品質加工機及周邊整合系統供應業界，已發展成為台灣精密五軸全系列產品的專業製造公司。
「MARK- II 四主軸五軸加工機」具高剛性構設計之機座、立柱及骨架，可保證穩定的鑽、銑等切削功能。採用台灣一級鑄件廠鑄件所生產高級鑄件及漢瑞泰公司既有機台平衡的設計經驗，適用於汽機車產業的閥體加工、渦輪葉片、離合器箱、化油器殼體、壓縮機汽缸、凸輪蓋等，應用在3C電子產品、醫療產品領域，也可從事多軸向鋁壓鑄件、鋁鍛件、碳纖機殼等輕型五軸加工用途。
為了創造對於使用者的「魅力品質」與「性價比」肯定，「MARK- II四主軸五軸加工機」擁有4倍速設備稼動率，可大幅節省設備、電力、人力、空間及製作治具成本，以電力需求來說可節省高達70％，更可節省約60％空間。目前有同一客戶在3年陸續採購12台投入零件生產之行列，是對漢瑞泰此類投入研發設計之中小企業的最大肯定。

translations.name: 手持式雷射除鏽清潔機
translations.description:
雷射除鏽清潔技術相較於市面上傳統除鏽方式，可在不須化學藥劑或研磨，對基材表面無損傷狀況下，透過雷射除去金屬上的鏽層、表面油汙、烤漆、鍍膜及焊道清潔等。

而雷射清潔之品質則取決於其設備之光學設計與雷射系統搭配，以及參數調整等相關技術。有別於市場上之手持式雷射除鏽清潔設備多數皆為進口整機代理販賣，或是搭配品牌雷射系統整合上市，惠特科技之手持式雷射除鏽清潔機，則由惠特科技前瞻雷射微細加工技術研發中心進行研發與製造。惠特擁有完整的光學設計、相關軟硬體專業研發人才與多年的系統整合經驗，與市場上其他類似之產品比較，惠特產品除擁有更彈性的雷射出光規格及出光品質控制外，實際清潔效果與速度亦優於其他廠牌。更因惠特科技專注於研發雷射之精密微細加工技術多年，擁有研發設計、相關專業技術與經驗，可協助客戶因應使用需求微客製設計，包含滿足客戶針對精密元件或是模具的高精度清潔之需求，創造機台性能與應用領域之多元化之優勢。

translations.name: 高效撕碎整合型回收造粒機
translations.description:
因應全球市場對於膜袋料及結構強韌塑料的回收需求日益增加，POLYSTAR開發出具備創新價值與效益的高效撕碎整合型回收造粒機。本回收造粒機將原本獨立之撕碎單元完美整合於一體，並搭載智慧型進料節能控制技術，以確保進料之穩定性與最適化。在過濾系統創新上，則開發出更高度自動化的逆洗過濾系統，以獨特的熔體流道機構設計搭配分段時脈控制技術，有效提升排渣自動化程度，進而降低換網操作成本。

切粒系統為回收造粒機的核心單元，POLYSTAR運用數位程式演算技術搭配節能變頻驅動模組，開發出全自動化切粒系統。藉由切粒刀速度隨著模頭壓力而自動調變控制，可生產出尺寸均一與品質優良的再生顆粒。此外，切粒系統輔以氣動缸恆壓控制技術，讓切粒刀可穩定貼附於模頭表面，大幅提升再生顆粒成型穩定性。

在工業4.0智慧製造構面上，POLYSTAR採用智能化PLC電控系統，整合高度視覺化與人性化人機介面，大幅縮短操作員的學習曲線。電控系統並結合遠端連線監控模組，可透過雲端IP進行線上即時故障排除、自動預熱、大數據收集分析與生產參數優化等功能。本機台的創新技術與功能已確實應用到歐洲、日本、美國等客戶國家，並獲得高度的價值肯定。

translations.name: High-Efficient Shredding Recycling Line
translations.description:
In response to the increasing demand for film bag scraps and solid structure material processing, POLYSTAR has developed a high-efficient shredding integrated recycling machine with innovative value and benefits. This recycling machine perfectly integrates the shredder all in one and is equipped with energy-saving feeding technology to ensure the optimization of the feeding. 

The pelletizing system is the core unit of the recycling machine. POLYSTAR utilizes the innovated digital programming technology with ECO inverter modules to develop a fully automated pelletizing system. By automatically adjusting the speed of the pelletizer along with the die pressure, the uniform size and excellent quality of recycled pellets can be produced. 

By the development of Industry 4.0 smart manufacturing and "Circular Economy", POLYSTAR adopts an intelligent PLC control system and integrates a highly user-friendly HMI, which greatly shortens the learning curve and enhances the level of automation.

translations.name: 多軸車銑複合機
translations.description: 「多軸車銑複合機 CST 42200」可因應各產業複雜多道次加工件，例如:滾筒、哥林柱、汽缸、石化製品、油管、閥類、輸送毂、輪軸、旋翼葉輪…等大型管類或長軸類工件之精密加工。可改善以往需安排多機台分段於不同機型上生產，造成客戶加工時程及加工道次的成本及精度上的負擔。因此，三鋒「多軸車銑複合機 CST 42200」採單一車銑複合機的架構，延展出具有兩台複合機的功能，來減少加工流程，以有效達到一機多用，大幅提高設備的生產效率、品質及人性化之目的。本產品的應用開發，以顧客需求為導向，產品從設計開發到應用服務，都以產品使用者的需求為優先考量。該機種具備高效率加工性能及紮實的基礎工藝，對於顧客來說這些是最為重要的要素，符合客戶質量要求的成本反應在價格上，讓顧客買到物超所值的優良產品。

translations.name: Multi-axis Turning and Milling CNC Lathe
translations.description: "Multi-axis turning and milling machine CST 42200" has high-efficiency processing performance and solid basic craftsmanship. It can respond to the complex and multi-pass processing parts of various industries, such as: roller, tie bar, cylinders, petrochemical products, oil pipes, valves, conveying hubs, wheel shaft, rotor i... and other large pipes precision machining of similar or long shaft workpieces. It can improve the previous need to arrange multiple machines for segmented production on different models, which cause the customer's processing time and processing pass cost and accuracy burden. Therefore, Sun Firm "Multi-axis turning-milling complex machine CST 42200" adopts the structure of a single turning-milling complex machine, and extended the function of two complex machines to reduce the processing flow, so as to effectively achieve multiple functions of one machine and greatly increase the production of equipment. The purpose of efficiency, quality and humanization.

translations.name: 自動化生產線(輪圈)
translations.description:
油機工業近年來投入自動化及智能化產品開發，在全球市場中達成多筆自動化生產線規劃實績，成為各產業的隱形冠軍推手，期許為客戶創造出更多價值與競爭力；本案規劃之鋼圈自動化生產線，是台灣現行規劃製造之鋼圈自動化生產線中，機台數最多、產能最大的自動化生產線，本產線包含9台雙刀塔立式車床，9台複合型車鑽立式車床及9台6軸式機械手組成，每小時最高可生產約400件，年產值可達300萬件以上。
油機自動化產線生產線特色:
1.油機產線佔地面積相較他廠小，能大幅度提高場地使用效能，且節省建廠費用。
2.油機高效率加工設備，可提供穩定的加工品質，並且滿足客戶所需之產能與品質需求。
3.上下料機械手臂採用FANUC關節式機械手，動作較具彈性，且品質及售後服務有完善的保證。
4.模組化雙層物流架，方便維修，快速換置，減少物流架維修停機時間。
5.快速換刀系統、刀具、刀片可單機更換，無需整線停機。
6.設備佈置有預留足夠維修空間，增加維修方便性。
7.完善安全防護裝置，增加安全的保護。
8.油機自主開發HMI人機介面。
9.遠端監控系統，達到0接觸，0距離管理。
10.智能化出料檔料系統，優化產線流程。

Taiwan's largest Automatic Automotive Wheel Rim Production Line which can produce about 400 pieces per hour, with an annual output value of up to 3 million More than one piece.

5. The tool can be changed quickly, and can be replaced by a single machine, without the need to stop the whole line.
6. The equipment layout has reserved enough space for maintenance to increase the convenience of maintenance.
7. Improve safety protection devices and increase safety protection.
8. The You Ji  HMI human-machine interface.
9. The remote monitoring system

translations.name: 立式車床
translations.description:
1.VTL系列因應高複合性車銑及高效率重載加工需求，立柱採對稱式門型結構，無論在哪個位置加工，都能維持相同精度，更可提升超過50%整體剛性結構，使之能更有效抵抗切削力作。
2.大跨距框型門架設計，使機台能完全包覆加工物，提升穩定性及壽命，更能確保加工精度。
3.橫樑硬軌端面與主軸中心距離縮短(VTL1600約為470mm)，以降低車削產生力矩，增加加工穩定性。
4.銑削主軸與C軸可於同一機台進行車、銑、鑽等複合化加工功能，大幅提升加工性能與彈性。
5.立式車床具備因工件工件自重，加工較臥式車床穩定之特性，並且更適合加工環狀、不規則狀、偏重型工件。
6.油機自主開發HMI人機介面，依客戶需求開發，可達到虛實整合，可視化管理。
7.搭配Marposs智能監控系統，可以達到刀具監控、加工製程監控、加工優化(震動及負載檢知)、機台保養預知、機台保護(碰撞保護)等符合工業4.0智慧機械元素。
8.適用於航太業、風電業、船舶業、能源業、油閥管筏業、電機馬達業...等產業，泛用性高，針對軸承、引擎、各式機械零組件、環件、馬達框、各式重型機具等加工產業，皆可採用。

translations.name: Vertical Turning Center
translations.description:
You Ji VTL series are designed for high efficiency heavy duty cutting, column adopts symmetrical design to increase 50% more rigidity.
Wide span X axis box guideway design brings high stability during long cutting time, suitable for aerospace industry, wind power industry,
shipbuilding industry, energy industry, pumps & valves, motor industry...etc.,VTL series can also be used for machining engine case, bearings, engines, mechanical parts, ring parts, motor housing, and various heavy equipment.
The YOU JI independently develops HMI (human-machine interface),which is developed according to customer needs, which can  achieve virtual and real integration and visualized management.
With Marposs intelligent monitoring system, it can achieve tool monitoring, processing process monitoring, processing optimization (vibration and load detection), machine maintenance prediction, machine protection (collision protection) and other intelligent machinery elements that comply with Industry 4.0.

translations.name: CNC五軸銑車複合加工機
translations.description:
產品面：採用閉式龍門架構設計，搭配Y軸三線軌穩固支撐鞍座及主軸，穩固的切削動剛性，達到高精度及高品質切削。銑車複合設計，工件可一次加工完成，避免多次裝夾的精度誤差。頭座採45度傾斜旋轉軸設計，可執行立式及臥式加工，大幅增加加工應用範圍。扭力馬達傳動的高速旋轉工作台可重負荷及進行車銷加工。全開式工作門設計，上下工件操作便利，易於搭配自動化設備，提高生產效率。智慧化介面配合五軸同動非常適合精密零件及汽車航太等模具加工。可搭配機聯網功能，達到工業4.0智慧生產的目的。

行銷面：新虎將產品核心價值是效率與精度。機台特性是高剛性架構及精度持久。Gentiger以自有品牌行銷全世界。因應工業4.0的到來，品牌Gentiger也將以Genius Tiger 的意象作數位化的呈現，導入智慧機械的元素。除了積極參與國際重要展會及專業雜誌的品牌行銷，更與廣告媒體廠商合作，拍攝機台介紹的工業頻道影片，讓使用者更清楚瞭解新虎將機器的優點與應用，並透過網路Google關鍵字搜尋及專業網站將Gentiger品牌投放在全世界各大線上展會。

translations.name: 污物切碎泵浦
translations.description:
專利的弧形鋸齒入口切斷盤，搭配葉片焊製鎢鋼刀的半開放式葉輪，可將吸入的水中固形物強力扯碎破壞，使固形物變小。切斷盤及葉輪皆經熱處理加工提高硬度，增加耐磨度，特性穩定，堅固耐用。

●  機械軸封潤滑油採用食品醫療級高純度白礦油，外觀清澈透明、無色無味、不溶於水，符合美國食品醫療管理局FDA和歐洲REACH…等多國規範，不含毒物，不會污染環境與危害生物及人體健康。

●  配備齊全：環氧樹脂(Epoxy)防水電纜基座、馬達過載保護器、雙組式SiC矽碳鋼(Silicon Carbide)機械軸封，皆符合ISO 9001品質保證系統並通過嚴謹的檢驗程序。

●  可使用在畜牧、食品、紙漿行業，生活污水處理及污水排放之排水。

translations.name: Submersible Cutter Pumps
translations.description:
The patented curve-shaped casing cover equipped with the open type of tungsten tip impeller, can forcefully tear, and destroy the inhaled solids in the water, making the solids into smaller pieces. The casing cover and the impeller are processed by heat treatment to increase the hardness, anti-abrasion, stability, stronger and durable.

Mechanical seal lubricating oil is made of food-grade high-purity white mineral oil. It is complies with national standards such as FDA and European REACH. This lubricant is eco and environment-friendly, with low environmental impact.

Standard accessories include: cable with an epoxy resin sealed water-resistant cable base, Auto-cut motor protector, double mechanical seals (Silicon Carbide), and lip seal design, all of which comply with the ISO 9001 quality assurance system and have passed strict inspection procedures.

Applications: livestock, food industry, pulp and paper industry, domestic sewage treatment/Wastewater treatment plant.

translations.description:
The effective grinding ability for household waste by the unique design of Radial Cutter & Cutter Ring.

Corrosion-resistant Radial Cutter and Cutter Ring material SUS440C, hardened to 55~60 Rockwell C.

The high starting torque motor design suitable for various applications of grinding, and that could avoid burnout caused by abnormal starting.

Mechanical seal lubricating oil is made of food-grade high-purity white mineral oil. It is complies with national standards such as FDA and European REACH. This lubricant is eco and environment-friendly, with low environmental impact.

Standard accessories include cable with an epoxy resin sealed water-resistant cable base, Auto-cut motor protector, double mechanical seals (Silicon Carbide), and lip seal design, all of which comply with the ISO 9001 quality assurance system and have passed strict inspection procedures.
Applications: Drainage of wastewater from individual residences, apartment buildings, recreational developments, motels, hotels

translations.name: 研磨液混料供應系統
translations.description:
亞泰研磨液混料供應系統，以三桶式呈現，全機自動化操作包含入料模組、混料、供應及控制單元。針對半導體化學機械平坦化中所使用研磨液進行混料均勻攪拌並傳輸至製程端使用。

其他品牌的三桶式，個別桶僅可支援單一功能，因此無法承擔任何停機作業的風險；然而，亞泰藉由獨家的管路控制與穩壓技術，達到3個桶子中每一個桶子皆可完成研磨液的攪拌、暫存及供應等多功能，使混料供應可彈性配置單桶或同時運作；即便任一桶需停機檢修，皆可符合半導體廠不停線要求。

研磨液經由流體管線及控制閥注入底部為錐形的桶槽，以桶底噴流攪拌方式達到攪拌均態、避免沉積並且減少殘液。系統搭載品質優化方案，包括濕氮氣裝置，可避免與空氣接觸的研磨液乾燥硬化；品質分析模組進行研磨液補正；熱交換模組，以個別控制桶內液體的溫度；穩壓脈波吸收模組，搭配輸送泵組，以穩定研磨液供應的流量及壓力。

本產品主要為有限的廠房配置下爭取到更佳的物料處理坪效，節省空間之餘更藉由機組零件運作頻率降低達到設備使用壽命的延長，使總體成本的節省。在符合人因維修、空間節省及極簡美學的設計下，提供更優化的安全冗餘、混料更精確、且即時確保研磨液品質的供應系統。
translations.meta_description: 亞泰研磨液混料供應系統，以三桶式呈現，全機自動化操作包含入料模組、混料、供應及控制單元。針對半導體化學機械平坦化中所使用研磨液進行混料均勻攪拌並傳輸至...

translations.name: Slurry Mixing and Supplying System
translations.description:
iTrident provides slurry to SEMI CMP processing. Triple tank configuration and each barrel have the same structure and functions include capabilities to mix, supply, and store. Each of tank module can work alone or together to keep the supply of the slurry ongoing without any interruption even one barrel is cleaned or malfunctioned. 

The slurry is fed to a conical-bottom-sharped tank which makes mixing slurry evenly with high efficiency and no residue deposit at the bottom. It equipped with quality optimization solutions includes Wet N2 preventing slurry drying, adjustment module answering analysis finding, heat exchange controlling the slurry temperature, pressure-control module regulating flow and pressure. 

The number of operations by the system as a whole is reduced and in turn prolongs the lifecycle of the system. it is capable of providing better functional redundancy, safe space, mixing more precisely, ensures quality in real-time, and the system operation cost reduced.

translations.name: 高速電梯
translations.description: 高樓林立是都市化必然的現象，而完善的電梯設備能提供高層建築內安全便利的垂直交通；以人口密集的商業辦公大樓為例，上千人群聚在同棟建築內，上下樓須完全倚賴電梯群組的疏運。如何在安全的前提下，提供快速、效率、舒適的電梯運行，尤其是快速疏解上下班尖峰時刻大量人潮的進出，就是崇友實業多年來致力開發「堅尼西斯」系列高速電梯的使命。以國產化高速電梯的機種，分速120米以上，整合日新月異的AI智慧派車、綠能回生電力、物聯網維保、新穎人機介面及科技防疫機能等，讓高層建築專用的高速電梯群組，發揮最有效率的運輸；換言之，電梯群組的輸送效率愈高，就可以減少電梯台數的設置，增加建築物內珍貴的可使用面積。國產化高速電梯的創新價值，除了釋放更多建築物的可使用面積，還包括掌握控制軟體機能所能提供業主端最佳的派車模式，達到最高的輸送率及最短等候時間，以因應不同建築用途的需求。

translations.name: High speed elevators
translations.description: Tall buildings are the phenomenon of urbanization, and a proper elevator system can provide safe and convenient vertical transportation in tall buildings. How to provide fast, efficient and comfortable elevator operation under the premise of safety, especially to smoothly deliver passengers during early and evening peak periods, is the mission of GFC for many years to develop the "GENESIS" series of high-speed elevators. Localized high-speed elevator models, with a speed of more than 120m/min, integrate AI smart destination dispatching system, regenerative drive, IoT maintenance, novel human-machine interface and epidemic prevention, etc. The innovative value of localized high-speed elevators, in addition to releasing more usable space of buildings, also includes owning the control software to provide the optimization dispatching mode, achieving maximum handling capacity and minimum waiting time, in order to meet demands from different tall buildings.

translations.name: 智慧型IP66軋鋼馬達
translations.description:
1. IP66 高防護等級,適用於高溫,高濕,高粉塵,高水蒸氣的鋼鐵環境.
1-1 軸封採用非接觸式迷宮甩圈,防止水與粉塵進入馬達內部.
1-2 防水蓋設計,軸端增加不鏽鋼防水蓋,防止水噴濺以及與軸封被直接衝擊 .

2. 最佳化設計
2-1 殼體採環形散熱片,避免鋼鐵粉塵堆積在馬達外殼上而造成散熱不良.
2-2 採用高密封性軸承以及高耐溫油脂,軸承壽命為一般馬達2倍以上.
2-3 H級絕緣,可耐高溫環境.
2-4 改良型後托架,接線安裝便利,且可防止水從出線端滲入.
2-5 採用不鏽鋼軸心,抗腐蝕能力佳.

3. 變頻驅動
3-1	可S1 連續運轉, 250% 60 sec.過載能力.
3-2  符合NEMA MG1 PART 31 變頻規範.

4. 雲端智能監控
搭配大同TiMS smart sensor,雲端智能監控馬達的溫度及三軸振動與頻譜分析,透過雲端大數據分析可做有效的預知保養及設備故障預防.

5. 環境友善設計
產品符合RoHS與REACH 環保指令.

translations.description:
IE3優級效率耐壓防爆馬達是一款以客戶需求為出發點之產品，針對提高安全性、提升性能及檢測更便利等需求，而延伸出的機種。

6.東元在美國、德國、中國、印度等地皆有服務據點，提供全球化的技術支援與服務。

translations.description:
東元電機由客戶需求出發，跳脫既有產品框架，將高品質、高性能之超高功率密度強制送風型低壓馬達搭載智能遠端監控系統，提供有別於其他產品的全新使用體驗。本產品以IEC規範為依歸，搭配發展之新技術，以提高馬達功率密度、減少材料耗用為方向，投入緊湊型馬達之開發。不僅增加材料利用率，同時提升結構剛性與減少材料耗用，適於變頻應用場景，節能又環保。

translations.name: 自主移動機器人
translations.description:
威剛動打造新一代智慧系統平台，其主要在AI智慧演算、智慧動力及電池系統、以及系統整合等三個核心關鍵技術上，完美架構出可以廣泛應用於工業4.0、智慧物流、智慧倉儲等多領域的智慧移動式平台，簡稱AMR系統平台。
目前首此技術應用於本項產品「自主移動機器人AMR-500」上，可以做到：
1.	智慧自主導航：透過感測器融合動力系統，達到精準自主導航誤差值在±3cm內、精準定位達±1cm內，且電量能自動回饋低壓自主充電。
2.	人車跟隨：可依需求執行人跟車、車跟人功能，且能做到站點呼叫，依站點需求一鍵呼叫，隨叫隨到。
3.	客製化情境應用：可依需求迅時搭載不同應用：如輸送設備、貨架、 籠車、噴霧殺菌、紫外線殺菌等。
未來欲將AMR平台用於健康防護應用，如輔助診療和遠距輔助診療，透過5G即時影像傳輸及MR技術，輔助復健科、心臟科心電圖診療和說明，也方便病患在家中即時連線，達成遠距醫療服務。另外，可依產業應用搭載頂升、輸送、撿貨籃、手臂等，具備彈性簡易特性，無縫接軌智慧整合協作，達到迅時整合智慧化應用系統，提升整體效益促進產業升級。

translations.name: Autonomous Navigation Robot
translations.description: The ADATA Autonomous Mobile Robot AMR-500 has the following features: 1. Intelligent autonomous navigation: through a sensor system, accurate autonomous navigation with an error value within ±3cm and accurate positioning within ±1cm is achieved. The power can automatically feedback low-voltage autonomous charging. 2. Person following: the function allows the robot to follow people to meet the needs of various applications where people need to work in conjunction with the robots. 3. Customized situational applications: different applications can be equipped quickly according to demand: such as conveying equipment, shelves, cage trucks, spray sterilization, ultraviolet sterilization, etc. The AMR-500 is part of ADATA’s aspiration to provide customers with a complete AMR platform. The platform will be based on three core areas, namely AI, smart power management and battery systems, and system integration. The AMR platform will be suitable for healthcare applications, and others.

translations.name: 永磁同步電機
translations.description: 威剛發現在目前市面上電動車使用的馬達，雖然應用範圍越來越廣泛，卻有其限制，除了低價競爭以外，在性能的運作上相對打了折扣。例如高爾夫球車即為一例。故威剛動力藉由系統整合設計，掌控馬達及驅動器相互結合的效能，研發出永磁同步馬達MI086A13K，其最大的特色就是省電、高效能兼具環保的經濟效益。MI086A13K針對磁路、結構與熱傳設計進行一系列模擬與最佳化設計驗證。同時，透過高剛性與最佳化空冷、水冷設計，提高馬達可靠度，能應付任何地形及環境需求。其精密的高功率密度設計，讓馬達體積及重量大幅減少，可適用於各類車輛，且容易安裝；寬廣的效率高原區讓馬達在各種行車條件下都能有最佳節能表現；低諧波共振與高密度結構，更可有效抑制馬達的震動及噪音。此外，也能提升車輛的續航能力，並減少安裝空間，達到多重功效。MI086A13K更可提供客製化服務，從整體車輛需求，到系統分析規劃和開發，經過嚴謹的分析驗證及完整測試，同時利用工廠製造執行系統(MES)及品質追溯系統在生產管理的重點環節做即時監控，全程掌握在製品和成品出貨後的產品管理，將未來動力翻轉成全新的商業模式。

translations.name: Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motor
translations.description: The MI086A13K permanent magnet synchronous motor is designed to be power-saving, highly efficient, and friendly to the environment. ADATA found that the motors used in electric vehicles currently on the market have more and more applications, but they have their limitations. In addition to low-cost competition, they are relatively discounted in terms of performance. For example, golf carts. Therefore, ADATA uses an integrated design to control the efficiency of the combination of the motor and the driver to develop the MI086A13K permanent magnet synchronous motor. The MI086A13K can be customized as needed, from overall vehicle requirements, to system analysis, planning and development, through rigorous analysis, verification and complete testing. At the same time, it uses the Factory Manufacturing Execution System (MES) and quality traceability system to perform key checks during production.

translations.name: 頂升動力模組
translations.description: PLM600頂升模組是台灣同功能頂升模組之中體積最小的一款，專為AGV(無人搬運車)頂升移動貨物之功能所設計的動力模組，是碩陽電機經營客戶多年後，以客戶的需求為出發點，為追求效率與體積極致而設計的新產品。PLM頂升模組，整合了四個用於頂升方案的最佳部件，將其體積壓縮到極致重新設計，在符合全年無休工作的條件下，整合部件包含了可靠的伺服馬達、高效耐用的行星減速機、高強度螺桿移動模組以及智能的伺服馬達驅動器，具有體積小、速度快、控制精準、耐用又高效的特性，支援AGV主流通訊方式CAN-BUS、RS-485與RS-232，並且通過CE，能提供多項安全保護機制，是一個能有效協助AGV品牌商產品升級，縮小整車體積、提高工作效率的利器。

translations.name: AGV Lift Module
translations.description: PLM600 lift module is the smallest lift solution in Taiwan. MTM bases on years of experience in the AGV field to design PLM600. PLM600 is a total solution for AGV(automatic guided vehicle) lift function which integrates the following four products: reliable servo motor, high-efficiency planetary reducer, strong screw, and smart motor drive. PLM600 lift module is a powerful solution for AGV makers all over the world which can provide users high efficiency, safety, and high endurance in the smallest size. What’s more, PLM600 supports the common communication methods of AGV, CAN-BUS, RS-485, and RS-232, providing multiple safety protection functions to make users apply it more easily.

translations.name: 智能多控主機盒
translations.description:
一、傳統融合智慧 智慧並存傳統
將牆上傳統開關替換成純智慧開關，智慧開關屬電子產品終有故障一天，開關若故障造成家中無傳統式開關可使用。
【雙路徑保障】
使用雙路徑-黑白切智能多控盒，讓牆壁一路徑、智慧一路徑供電。
1.	不須替換原牆壁開關輕鬆升級。
2.	牆上開關切仍然可以正常繼續使用
3.	不必重新配管配線。
二、無痕安裝 無痕設計 彈性單品
家中若有30只傳統開關切，只需要部份升級成智慧照明黑白切開關時，全屋牆面就保有整體性。
【隱藏式單品安裝】
1.	在原線路上加裝就輕鬆升級，並可隱藏於天花板上。
2.	一盞燈不管被 1處、 2處 、3處牆上開關控制，也僅需要一個黑白切開關CP值相當高。
三、一鍵全屋開燈關燈
牆壁開關切是居家生活中每天使用頻率最高的電器設備，隨著物聯網到來親觸牆上開關切不再是唯一開燈關燈方法，一鍵開關燈將具備更多元開關功能。
【一鍵精品外觀】
1.	傳統住宅大門出口旁設置的"出門一鍵全屋關燈"，只需要加裝雙路徑-黑白切智能開關盒在開關箱內，就能升級遠端出門一鍵全屋開燈關燈。
2.	智慧照明開關控制僅須在原開關切線路上加裝黑白切智能開關盒，立即擁有手機一鍵開關燈。

translations.name: 卷鐵心型模鑄式變壓器
translations.description:
變壓器鐵心分為卷鐵心及積鐵心二大類。卷鐵心因結構緊密，故體積小、重量輕、噪音低、鐵損低。因技術及設備限制，傳統卷鐵心僅能使用於小型油式變壓器。南亞專利技術突破設備及製造技術限制，全球首次將卷鐵心擴大應用於全規格變壓器，可減少矽鋼片用量、減低退火能源消耗、減少組裝工時。已逐漸獲得同業之肯定及模仿，可促進變壓器產業升級。
技術特點有:
(a)	矽鋼片用量減少8%，節省原料。
(b)	佔地面積減小約10%，可縮減電氣室面積，節省建廠經費。
(c)	噪音遠低於標準，可節省噪音防制工程費用，使產品更適用於都會住宅區。
(d)	鐵心不需退火，節省能源消耗。

translations.name: Wound Core Mold Transformer
translations.description: Transformer cores are divided into two categories: wound cores and stacking cores. Due to the compact structure of the wound core, it is small in size, light in weight, low in noise and iron loss. Due to technical and equipment limitations, conventional wound cores can only be used in small oil-type transformers. Nanya's patented technology breaks through the limitations of equipment and manufacturing technology, and for the first time in the world, the wound core is expanded to be used in full-spec transformers, which can reduce the consumption of silicon steel sheets, reduce annealing energy consumption, and reduce assembly man-hours. It has gradually gained recognition and imitation from the industry, which can promote the upgrading of the transformer industry.

translations.name: 電動車用高效率輕質電動馬達
translations.description:
隨各國陸續擬定未來禁售燃油車的政策，而台灣也預計將於2040年全面進入電動車時代。星博於2019年成立馬達暨馬達控制器開發課，發展電動車相關高端科技產品，朝二輪和特殊運用四輪電動車的電控和電機發展。

由星博所開發的MVWF7K6-102輕量、高效率電動馬達可輸出7.6KW的功率，並應用於工業領域或電動載具，其具備以下特點:
1.國際品質管理系統: 生產工廠具備ISO9001及ISO14001國際品質標準認證。
2.環保安全: 採用無毒材料，符合RoHS、REACH 等歐盟環保指令，且符合歐洲相關安全規範。
3.特殊組件設計: 採特殊線圈與接線設計，可簡化繞線時間、提高槽滿率、製程良率及空間利用率，並有效改善製程中線圈破皮、端部接線不易與後續整線等問題。
4.高耐用性: 選用內藏型永磁同步馬達(IPMSM)，有效提升馬達使用強度，且具備IPX6防水設計，可用於各種特殊環境。
5.溫度感測保護: 在電路上採用NTC熱敏電阻設計，馬達於溫度過高的情況下會進入保護模式。
6.定制選項及配件: 為因應客戶需求提供不同的選項及配件，如:對應不同的功率有內藏流道之水冷殼體、散熱鰭片之氣冷外殼等。

translations.name: Energy-Efficient Electric Motor for EV
translations.description:
MVWF7K6-102 is an electric motor that provides 7.6 KW power and can be used in industrial fields or applied to EV.

Features:
1.Quality standards: ISO9001 and ISO14001 certified.
2.Eco-friendly & safe to use: Made of non-toxic materials, meets RoHS & REACH regulations, and complies with the relevant European safety requirements.
3.Unique design components: The distinctive coil and circuit connection reduces the time for the winding process, improves the slot fill factor and space utilization, increases the yield rate, etc.
4.High durability: An IPMSM brushless DC motor in IPX6 protection that can be used in various special environments.
5.Over temperature protection: The NTC thermistor is being used in the circuit for motor protection against overheats.
6.Custom product options: Provides different types of motor cases to fit in a varied range of output power, including the water-cooled case with flow passage, air-cooled case with heat sink, etc.

translations.name: 電動車用高效率馬達控制器
translations.description:
隨各國陸續擬定未來禁售燃油車的政策，而台灣也預計將於2040年全面進入電動車時代。星博於2019年成立馬達暨馬達控制器開發課，發展電動車相關高端科技產品，朝二輪和特殊運用四輪電動車的電控和電機發展。

由星博所開發的DVWF7K6-102馬達控制器，可應用於工業領域或電動載具，其具備以下特點:
1.國際品質管理系統: 生產工廠具備ISO9001及ISO14001國際品質標準認證。
2.環保安全: 採用無毒材料，符合RoHS、REACH 等歐盟環保指令，且符合歐洲相關安全規範。
3.操作安全設計: 設置鑰匙開關。
4.高效節能: 內建智慧演算法可讓馬達具有低電流、高效率控制，且具煞車回充功能，使系統可回收能量，以達到節能減碳的功能。
5.高耐用性: 殼體底座考量強度與實用性做極簡化設計，並強化電源進出端子與殼體間結構，避免振動或碰撞造成端子斷裂，且具備IPX6防水設計，適用於各種特殊環境。
6.溫度感測保護: 採用NTC熱敏電阻設計，控制器於溫度過高的情況下會進入保護模式。
7.客製選項及配件: 因應客戶需求進行客製，並提供不同的選項及配件，如:不同的應用需求有不同的驅控程式與控制把手。

translations.name: Energy-Efficient Motor Controller for EV
translations.description:
DVWF7K6-102 is a motor controller that can be used in the industrial fields or applied to EV such as electric bicycles, electric scooters, golf carts, etc.

Features:
1.Quality standards: ISO9001 and ISO14001 certified.
2.Eco-friendly & safe to use: Made of non-toxic materials, meets RoHS & REACH regulations, and complies with the relevant European safety requirements.
3.Safety in design: Key switch.
4.Energy efficiency: The embedded AI algorithm allows the motor to operate in high efficiency; additionally, the system can reuse the power and recharge the battery when braking.
5.High durability: The enhanced structure between terminal & case, simplified design of the bottom case, and the IPX6 protection make it can be used in various special environments.
6. Over temperature protection: The NTC thermistor is being used in the circuit for controller protection against overheats.
7.Customization: Device drivers, control handles, etc.

translations.name: 在線式Smart App Online高功率密度不斷電系統
translations.description:
CyberPower在線式Smart App Online高功率密度不斷電系統為IT設備、伺服器、工作站、NAS儲存裝置、網絡設備，安全系統和監控系統提供電力備援保護。此產品為高功率密度不斷電系統，採用雙轉換架構，提供高品質電力輸出，其節能模式可有效節省電費。此產品可與發電機相容，延長電力使用，其電池採用熱插拔設計，更換電池時可確保系統運作不中斷。

此產品採用智慧電池管理(SBM)，可提升電池充電性能，並延長電池壽命，節省電池維護成本，也可搭配外接電池箱延長運作時間。其面板為彩色LCD可調式螢幕，使用者可輕鬆讀取重要資訊。此產品也可搭配PowerPanel®電源管理軟體，方便使用者進行即時電源監控和管理。

translations.name: Smart App Online (High-Density) UPS
translations.description:
CyberPower Smart App Online (High-Density) UPS guarantees power backup protection for IT equipment, servers, workstations, NAS/Storage devices, telecom devices, networking devices, security/emergency systems, and surveillance systems. The UPS adopts double-conversion topology to provide high-quality power output in a compact design. This generator-compatible UPS features hot-swappable battery packs for maintenance without power interruption, and comes with additional ECO Mode to conserve power and save on energy costs.

The UPS can employ Extended Battery Modules (EBM) to prolong runtimes, and adopts patented Battery Management Technology to balance battery string voltage for optimal battery lifespan. This model also features tiltable color LCD panel that allows users to monitor key power and battery information at a glance. The PowerPanel® Power Management Software allows user to perform real-time monitoring and remote management of the UPS.

translations.name: 電動阻擋缸
translations.description:
電動缸的高效率能源轉換，使「空壓轉電動」逐漸成為市場開發趨勢，金器領先台灣同業，優先開發出「MESBE電動阻擋缸」，將熱賣的空壓阻擋缸升級為電動控制，藉此提高能源利用效率，同時還能進行生產數據的收集及問題分析。
MESBE電動阻擋缸用途為阻擋輸送帶上快速移動的物體至定位，以利人員或設備執行下一段作業，主要應用市場為汽車工業、物流產業、製造業等。

電能驅動
將驅動源由壓縮空氣更換成電能，可提高能源利用效率，符合環保節能趨勢。

智慧控制
搭配步進馬達及專用驅動器，可透過程式控制作動速度及設定多段阻擋位置，增加使用彈性。

獨家專利槓桿解除功能
一鍵同時解除「槓桿鎖定」和「自由通過」的專利設計，無需人員手動解除，省時又安全。

產品適用範圍廣
可調型油壓緩衝器可對應不同重量的工件，10~400公斤的荷重範圍均可輕易勝任。

安裝調整方便
阻擋方向前後左右四個90度面向皆可調，不需將阻擋缸從機台上拆除，節省安裝時間。

堅固耐用
油壓緩衝器每100萬次作動需定期更換，主體使用壽命保證作動500萬次。

適用場合
「無空壓源的空間」或是「要求潔淨度的環境」。

translations.name: Electric Stopper Actuator
translations.description:
As the No.1 Taiwanese pneumatic components manufacturer, Mindman launch the first electric stopper cylinder - MESBE in Taiwan. MESBE is mainly used to stop moving workpiece on conveyor. Automotive industry, logistics, and manufacturing industry are the main markets for this application. More product features are shown below:

Powered by Electricity 
Convert driven power from compressed air to electricity. Achieve higher efficiency of energy usage.

Smart Control
With step motor and its driver, it can have more manipulating flexibility by programming the motion speed and blocking positions.
  
Patented lever unlock mechanism
One move to unlock “lever lock” and “free-pass” functions. No need to resume the function manually. Quick and safe.

Solid and Durable 
1 million life cycles guaranteed for the shock absorber and 5 million life cycles guaranteed for the main body.

Application
For environment without compressed air or room require cleanness.

translations.name: 快速換爪機構
translations.description:
「MCTC快速換爪機構」由R端模組和T端模組所組成，R端模組可安裝於各種形式的機械手臂上，T端模組則針對不同作業需求安裝工具，如夾爪，氣動工具、真空吸盤…等等。一組R端可對應多組T端，大幅增加使用者的生產彈性及節省換線架車時間與人力成本。

鎖定機構設計
本產品最大獨特性在於R端模組採用平面錐孔鎖定裝置及T端模組的拉栓，R端和T端模組結合方式為錐面配合，可使R/T端結合時自動導正。長期使用下來，亦能夠自動補償磨耗間隙。

高重複精度
以額定荷重25 kg為例，重複精度達±5µm，遠優於市售同級品的±15µm。

品質卓越
以額定荷重的1.5倍重量進行300萬次壽命測試，結果顯示重複精度仍小於±15µm。

安全自鎖保護機制
R端模組內運用高彈力彈簧機構設計，若突然失去空壓源的供應，至少需要2000牛頓的力量才可能強制脫開，因此可確保T端模組不脫落，保證工件機台與操作者的安全性。

容易維護
易磨耗的拉栓及定位銷採螺絲鎖付設計，更換容易，客戶自行維修即可。
translations.meta_description: 「MCTC快速換爪機構」由R端模組和T端模組所組成，R端模組可安裝於各種形式的機械手臂上，T端模組則針對不同作業需求安裝工具，如夾爪，氣動工具、真空吸盤…等等...

translations.name: Automatic Tool Changer
translations.description:
MCTC Quick Changer comprises R module and T module. R module can be installed onto various kinds of robot arms. T modules can be connected with different tools, such as gripper, vacuum pad, and so on.

Unique Lock mechanism
The cone-shape lock mechanism is self-aligned by the tapered surface. Also, it compensates the gap from wear automatically.

High repeatability
Under 25kg payload: repeatability is ±5µm, which is superior to ±15µm of similar products on the market. 

Outstanding quality
The repeatability remain within ±15 um even after 3 million operations with 1.5 times payload. 

Self-lock mechanism
R module needs at least 2000-newton force to unmount the T module when the air source is cut accidently.

Easy maintenance
Bolt and positioning pins are expendable and they are designed to be secured by screws. They can be changed easily by users.

translations.name: 水車內藏式展刀動力頭
translations.description:
參選產品FMDM155水車內藏式展刀動力頭，將馬達的配置優化成為能夠搭配內藏馬達的設計，因此不再需要馬達帶動皮帶輪。減少了馬達盒後，徹底解決干涉的問題，同時降低重量、體積。改良為直結式不只能提升精度，並縮短加工時程、降低生產成本。水車式的結構，可應用於水車式專用機，水車式主軸頭能夠立式的配置，顛覆了一般傳統主軸頭只能使用臥式配置所造成的空間浪費， 參選產品FMDM155 水車式內藏主軸頭的設計，不只能增加工作站配置的彈性、也能縮小主軸頭所佔據的設置空間。加工效能比傳統主軸頭更加優質，同時每顆主軸頭都可比舊款主軸頭減少最高35%的重量。搭配上展刀頭，除了搪孔加工之外可以進行孔徑內部的溝槽加工或多段加工以及斜度加工。讓生產更有效率。
 以往客戶選購主軸頭，往往考量的首要挑件就是是否會有干涉的問題、以及廠房或者機台空間的問題，FMDC155W內藏式鑽孔攻牙動力頭(自動換刀)便是切入客戶的需求，防止干涉、減少空間成本，提供給客戶更上一層樓的選擇。

translations.name: Built-in Motor Facing Head Unit
translations.description: FMDM155 Built-in Motor Facing Head Unit - Flange Type, the configuration design is optimized with a built-in motor. With this design, the pulley housing is removed, which solve the problem of space interference and weight is reducing as well. The improvement to the direct motor type increases the accuracy, also shortens the processing time and reduces the production cost. The flange type spindle design is perfect for installing on a trunnion rotary machines. This flange type spindle can be installed vertically, which overturns the space waste caused by the traditional way configuration in horizontally. Not only increases the flexibility of the workstation configuration, but also reduces the setup space occupied by the spindle unit. This spindle helps to increase processing efficiency, and the design reduces the weight by up to 35% compared with the old spindle heads.

translations.name: 氮氣平衡配重缸
translations.description:
油順精密推出「氮氣平衡配重缸」是油壓缸與活塞式蓄壓器的完美搭配，藉由油壓缸本身即可承載大噸數重量的功用，結合獨特活塞式蓄壓器之設計製造，解決物件夾取時可能出現的超重負載情形，協助機械手臂在旋轉運行過程中，使其作動更為穩定順暢，不至因設備容易撞機，而引起一連串的工作安全事故。
更多「氮氣平衡配重缸」的好處如下：	
一、節能：有效避免能源浪費及解決油壓較不穩定特性，促使機械手臂達到驚人的平衡穩定效果。
二、除噪：完全移除油壓動力系統設備，達到簡潔利落的機型外觀，以及無噪音干擾的工作環境。
三、降本增效：結合伺服馬達，不僅擁有精準到位的最高水準表現，更突破油壓配重使用上的侷限，有效降低購置伺服馬達的成本，所搭載的『智慧型活塞式蓄壓器』（獲2019年台灣精品獎），能將數據即時回傳給予終端用戶做為觀察與分析，幫助採取有效防護措施，促其達成 AI智能化及問題數據分析之設計改善需求。
translations.meta_description: 油順精密推出「氮氣平衡配重缸」是油壓缸與活塞式蓄壓器的完美搭配，藉由油壓缸本身即可承載大噸數重量的功用，結合獨特活塞式蓄壓器之設計製造，解決物件夾取時...

translations.name: Nitrogen Balance Cylinder Actuator
translations.description:
Ashun “Nitrogen Balance Cylinder Actuator” is the perfect match of hydraulic cylinder and piston accumulator, by heavy duty cylinders and the unique design of piston accumulators, this new products can solve the overweight issues during loading, and assist the robot arm more smoothly during rotating, then prevent the occupational accidents.

The more advantages are as following,
1. Saving energy: Effectively avoid the energy wasting and improve the hydraulic instability, this advantage will achieve an amazing balance and stability.
2. Noise-canceling: Removing hydraulic power system equipment completely, this advantage will achieve the perfect outlooks and noiseless work environment.
3. Reducing cost and increasing performance: Combining with servo motor, not only has the high performance but also breakthrough the cylinder limitation, the data of “Intelligent Piston Accumulators” (Taiwan Excellence 2019) can be sent back in time for analyzing and taking protective measure effectively.

translations.name: 超極限油壓制動器
translations.description:
油順精密研發出「超極限油壓制動器」採取特殊結構發明設計，化解各種會發生爆裂的可能性，其耐壓程度相較於傳統工法之最大耐壓程度，足足高出2倍以上，且與採用傳統工法有相同耐高壓的油壓缸重量相比，減少幅度達到50%，更能滿足過往油壓環境裡，對於耐壓能力及重量的限制，有效提升作業安全上的保障！
「超極限油壓制動器」除提供超耐高壓的設計之外更是兼顧成本考量，在設計上做出一大突破，去除以前傳統方式所使用的加厚型式，缸體不需要隨著耐壓係數提高而被迫採用加厚規格，省下的材料成本有兩倍以上；還優化加工技術層面，減少過往繁複的製程工序，也幫助省下傳統工法所必需的人工費用，對於在超耐高壓的產品提供上，做到既節省成本又有創新手法的大躍進。
此項特殊結構設計已獲得發明專利，證書號為I717885，油壓缸的緩衝裝置也獲得兩項發明專利，證書號分別為I666389及I697626。

translations.name: Ultra-Limited Cylinder Actuator
translations.description:
ASHUN “Ultra-Limited Cylinder Actuator” which adopt special structure design, it prevents any possible burst issues, the pressure resistance is more than twice than traditional process, the weight is lower 50% than old design, the reduction rate is up to 50%, it would be more satisfied with the high pressure resistance and limited weight than previous, this new design improves the security of work safety effectively.

“Ultra-Limited Cylinder Actuator” not only provides high pressure resistance, but also considers the cost, this new design removes the thicker type used in the traditional way, users don’t need to choose the thicker barrels according to the working pressure, so this will reduce cost. Not only improve the technical processing, but also save the labor cost for traditional methods. This design is saving cost and great innovation.

The special structure design has patent, certificate number #I717885.
The cylinder cushion has 2 patents, certification number #I666389 #I697626.

translations.name: 高功率密度聯網型直流伺服驅動器
translations.description:
1. JSDT2為業界最佳的直流無刷伺服驅動器，採用32bit高性能MCU加上FPGA雙核心處理，提高電流頻寬至6.1KHz、降低整定時間至1ms、編碼器解析度為23bit，滿足高精密與快速響應的市場。
2. 可驅動伺服馬達、線性馬達、直驅馬達；可搭配BISS、Tamagawa、脈波型等各式編碼器，複合式馬達驅動與回授可應用於各種場合。
3. 驅動器為緊湊型的模組化設計，透過彈性化調整，即可達到客製化需求。
4. 在極小型化的設計下，最大可驅動到1200W之功率，尺寸僅57 x 55 x 50.8mm，適用於高功率密度場合。
5. 具備多種高速通訊介面(如EtherCAT等)，符合IEC61800-7總線標準等，可應用於多軸市場。
6. 人性化的人機介面並內建自動增益調測技術(Auto-tuning)、高低頻抑制，使驅動器可操作在各種應用場合。

translations.name: High power density networked DC servo drive
translations.description:
1. JSDT2 is the best brushless DC servo drive, using 32-bit high performance MCU and FPGA to achieve dual core processing, the bandwidth increase to 6.1KHz, the settling time reduces to 1ms, and the encoder resolution is 23bit to meet the high precision and fast response market.
2. It can drive servo motors, linear motors, and direct-drive motors; It can be matched with various encoders such as BISS, Tamagawa, and pulse type, and the compound motor drive and feedback can be applied to various occasions.
3. The driver is a modular design, with flexible adjustment to meet the customization requirements easily.
4. With high power density design, only 57 x 55 x 50.8mm size, it can drive the motor to instantaneous 1200W power.
5. It has high-speed communication (such like EtherCAT), and conforms to the IEC61800-7 bus standard, which can be applied to the multi-axis market.
6. Built-in automatic gain tuning technology (Auto-tuning), high and low frequency suppression.

(3)在機構上使用了兩項東元專利，包含關節連接裝置、轉子煞車共軸技術，有效提升出力軸法蘭盤組裝精度、節省裝配時間，以及節省電磁煞車機構空間、提升關節模組靜止時之高固定性。
(4)具備多種高速通訊介面(如EtherCAT等)，符合IEC61800-7總線標準等，可應用於多軸市場。

translations.name: High-precision collaborative robot joint module
translations.description:
(1)With 32-bit high performance MCU and FPGA to achieve dual core processing, the bandwidth increases to 6.1KHz, the settling time reduces to 1ms, and the encoder resolution is 23bit to meet the high precision and fast response market.
(2)Adopts a modular design, change the motor wattage and speed reduction ratio according to customer requirements. Under the same power, the minimum joint module is the lightest in the industry, only 1.41kg.
(3)Two TECO patents are used in the mechanism, including joint connection device, rotor brake co-axial technology, effectively improves the assembly accuracy of the output shaft flange, saves assembly time and space, improve the high fixation at rest.
(4)Integrated much interface of high speed communication such as EtherCAT, it conforms to the IEC61800-7 bus standard, applied to the multi-axis market.
(5)Humanized Machine Interface and built-in auto-tuning technology, high and low frequency suppression, can be operated in various of applications.

translations.description:
[1]	本產品為多元化設計，透過視覺演算技術，可滿足智慧跟人跟隨/跟線跟隨/自動循線/自駕模式功能，將智慧避障技術整合於智能跟隨系統，提供使用者操作上使跟隨車行動更顯快速輕巧，並能在狹窄通道間能穿梭自如，活動範圍也更為彈性。

translations.name: 智慧收送餐服務型機器人
translations.description:
1.本產品為無軌式設計，相較於有軌的方案，無須鋪設磁軌，可大幅降低設置及維運成本。搭配昇級的運動控制技術和智慧避障技術，使行動更顯輕巧，並能在狹窄通道間能穿梭自如，活動範圍也比較彈性。
2.當機器人內建電源過低時，可以採用自動回充功能返回補充電量，若遇人流較多，無暇充足電力時，可採更換備用電池的方式，讓整體服務不中斷。
3.於此產品智慧收餐機器人，依其外型可定位於餐飲服務、迎賓導覽、室內巡檢及醫療養護等四大應用領域，修改外型塗裝、顯示幕之文字或圖案、語音命令模式、語音對話內容及置換商標，符合採用產品之企業識別形象。亦可於頭部、手部或餐盤上方增添裝置，進行更多樣化之互動應用服務。

With upgraded motion control technology and intelligent obstacle avoidance technology, and the range of movement is more flexible.
2. When the built-in power of the robot is too low, the automatic recharging function can be used to return the supplementary power. If there is a lot of people and there is no time for sufficient power, the backup battery can be replaced to keep the overall service uninterrupted.
3. The intelligent meal receiving robot of this product can be positioned in four application fields including catering service, welcome tour, indoor inspection and medical maintenance according to its appearance, and modify the appearance of the painting, it is also possible to add devices on the head, hands or above the plate for more diversified interactive application services.

translations.name: 智機化開板生產線
translations.description:
訂製傢俱系統櫃板(多樣式、規格重複低、出貨時間短)傳統製程耗時、失誤率高、準交率低、管理不易，常需資深師傅才能達成特殊訂單，無法大量接單。STRATOS PRO FL搭載恩德自主開發之AGMVP系統，提供系統櫃板業者各種高效率、低失誤、高準交率、友善管理之全工廠製程解決方案，協助客戶從傳統升級至數位化產業，將生產負荷交給設備，產能不因人力受限。
STRATOS PRO FL具備1. 自動刀長量測(減少人工量測誤差，競爭對手少見)。2. 邊加工邊換刀功能，加工效率提升10％～20％(尚未競爭對手有此功能)。3. 整板懸空上料，一次定位，上料速度快一倍，不刮傷工件(競爭對手為拖拉式，效率低易刮傷工件)。4. 下料台自動調整高度，提升自動下料穩定性。5. 圖形化直觀操作介面(恩德自主開發AGMVP)。

translations.name: 三爪式電動夾爪
translations.description: 自動化生產為工業4.0所具備的基本要求，其中大數據更是不可或缺，因此為了數值回饋、管理、生產資料的保存，EDQ三爪式電動夾爪即結合含編碼器步進式馬達控制的獨特設計，利用程式可控制性及電流精準的特性，可有效控制馬達帶動渦輪螺桿，搭配高精密滾柱滑軌，進而準確的將夾爪控制到所需位置(作動精度可達+/-0.01mm)，且夾爪平行式作動推力可達22~102N及速度50mm/s，提供更穩定的夾持力，獨家區塊模組換爪專利，讓客戶替換夾爪效率提升20%，使自動化設備應用更加多元及便利，規劃時能夠更靈活快速。本產品利用可程式的驅動器控制夾爪之夾持力，避免夾傷生產物件，提升生產良率，且可有效減少夾爪行走不必要的行程，提高生產效率，再配合含編碼器步進式馬達，可將其作動數據回饋訊號至伺服器，有利於生產管理、品質管控及錯誤分析。另因產品動力源為電流驅動，作動時不會產生氣流揚起粉塵，可應用於環境要求較嚴苛的操作場合(如無塵室及醫療場所等)。本公司氣動元件產品廣為各項產業所使用，考慮到耐油汙防鏽或防腐蝕的要求，在製程上採用高規格的表面處理方式，兼顧保護作用及質感。電動元件特性在無污染源，可為環境及節能減碳作出貢獻。

translations.name: 3-Finger Electric Gripper
translations.description:
EDQ 3-Finger Electric Gripper is with +/-0.01mm accuracy, 22~102N parallel push force and 50mm/s speed can provide more stable gripping force.  Moreover, the exclusive gripper changing module can improve 20% efficiency when customers change gripper.
Programmable driver can control gripping force from gripper to avoid damaging objects and improve production yield rate and reduce unnecessary stroke to improve production efficiency.  Step motor with encoder can send action data back to server to perform production management, quality control and error analysis.
Power source is electricity, griper won’t get any dust caused by air flow when actuating, and it’s suitable for clean room and medical care industry.

translations.name: 精密過濾緩啟模組
translations.description:
在自動化生產過程中，氣動設備作動時，容易機器突作動對人員造成危害，或人員操作不當對工具機及人員造成直接或間接之傷害。UFMLV 300精密過濾緩啟模組中之緩啟閥裝置是針對氣壓缸於逐漸增加流量與壓力的過程中，透過緩和啟動閥達到延緩啟動，進而保護操作人員及設備，且此系列均符合OHSA規格，附鎖孔及顯示窗，給氣及排氣狀態可視化，雙動作下壓開啟給氣，可在維修操作時避免錯誤動作。
本產品具有將氣體高精度過濾(過濾雜質密度最高0.01μm)，並搭配塑膠杯可視化，即時觀察濾心使用情況，且可依照使用者需求更換金屬杯，更佳牢固耐用，內置渦旋環可將空氣內水氣甩至透明杯底端，可搭配自動排水或手動排水排出，及設定調整輸出壓力、作動緩起動等功能，並且搭配殘壓排放閥，將設備內部氣源排出，並阻斷進氣端氣體，在此條件下依然能輸出大流量達7000L/min，流量耗損小。 本產品緩排元件搭配橋式整流器設計將AC電壓轉換為DC電壓，無雜音產生而具有降低噪音之效果，藉由緩啟與緩排之功能不僅實現安全之工作環境也能延緩機台使用壽命。其DC電壓在功率0.95W的低電力消耗設計，較同款機種3W更能節省70%之耗電量，提高能能源效率。

translations.name: Precision Filter Soft Start-Up Valve Module
translations.description:
UFMLV 300 Precision Regulator Soft Start-Up Valve Module, Precision filter can filtrate air (Nominal filtration rating: 0.01μm), users can realize filter element condition via visualized PC bowl, optional manual drain, auto drain and metal bowl can be selected per user’s using environment; Soft start-up valve will raise initial pressure and flow rate gradually in air cylinder to protect equipment and user’s safety; Shup-off valve is complied with OSHA standards, supply and exhaust can be visualized, and double action air supply design will prevent wrong action during operating.
UFMLV 300 Precision Regulator Soft Start-Up Valve Module can raise & release flow rate & air pressure slowly and adjust pressure, and bridge rectifier design will convert DC from AC to reduce noise, and DC voltage is 0.95 watt only, compared to other 3 watt components, low power consuming can save 70% energy.

translations.name: 極微型線性滑軌
translations.description:
極微型線性滑軌Super Miniature Guideway，為全球唯二，台灣首發，微米級的軌寬。
1.微米級1mm：將泛用型線軌尺寸縮小20倍，具微米級行走精度、低噪音、使用壽命長等優勢，提供3C電子產品、光學元件、半導體檢驗設備及微型醫檢設備等高精準度、可靠與穩定之精密零件，加速產業加值升級。
2.簡化迴流系統設計：較泛用型微小線性滑軌少約75%之配件數量，一體式的迴流系統設計以小至Ø0.4之滾珠匹配；藉簡化產品複雜度，提高顧客機器設備的空間利用率，提升顧客競爭力，為客戶創造更高附加價值。
3.微米級(μm, micron meter)工藝：藉微米級的尺寸與行走精度，輔助醫檢設備，俾能檢驗出0.1 μm的病毒。
4.輕盈行走體驗：細膩的滾道輪廓與小於鋼珠筆之筆尖圓珠的搭配，創造出前所未有的運行體驗，提供設備可高速運行(3m/s)與高度順暢(行走抖動感5gf以下)之傳動元件。強化客戶產品的精度與重現性。
5.值得信賴的高品質：材質選用可硬化熱處理之不銹鋼，肩負耐磨耗與抗腐蝕之功能需求，可強化半導體設備對於環境耐受度之高度依賴。

translations.name: 滾珠螺桿
translations.description:
國際間提倡工業4.0後，高精密科技產業及精密機械產業隨之快速發展，滾珠螺桿已成為主要核心元件。眾多產業現階段面臨市場逐漸飽和、競爭激烈，客戶需求不斷的求新求變。
而本次全球傳動推出「SFYA1632高導程螺桿組」，該產品設計理念有別於傳統滾珠螺桿，採用薄而有彈性的材質，強化刮刷效果，循環結構中增加高剛性及高速化功能，以達到高DN值、高速度、高剛性、強化防塵結構等特性。且在超高導程的最大限速度可達到24000RPM及壽命的整體提升5%，運轉速度相較於舊款兩倍導程高，更合適應用於高速化工具機、自動化機械等產業。
全球傳動更透過中國、美國子公司提供全球戰略指標客戶與經銷商完善的產品銷售及售後服務。以就近、即時服務客戶，並持續透過定期於世界各大展場上，將最新的產品推出，直接取得客戶反饋，進而動態調整市場策略、掌握市場動態。

Starting from Industry 4.0, the precision technology industry has developed rapidly, and ball screw has become the main core component. 
TBI MOTION launched the "SFYA1632 High Lead Ball Screw". The product design concept is different from traditional ball screws. It uses thin and flexible materials to strengthen the scraping function. The circulation structure adds high rigidity and high-speed functions to achieve high DN value, enhanced dust-proof structure. In addition, the maximum speed limit can reach 24000RPM and the overall service life is increased by 5%, suitable for the applications of high-speed machine tools, automated machinery.
TBI MOTION also provides comprehensive product and well after-sales services of global strategic indicators through its subsidiaries in China and the United States, Serving customers nearby and in time, continuously launching the newest products at the global exhibition, directly obtaining customer feedback, and adjusting the marketing strategy.

translations.name: 智能化綜合交換機構之擴充式刀庫交換系統
translations.description:
近幾年來因應工業4.0之潮流，綜合切削加工機高轉速、高精度、強力切削等機械特性早已是標準配備，而搭配可擴充式刀庫、可遠距離輸送、具同步打刀及聯動開/關門功能與高效率且定位精準的驅動及選刀系統等要求更是重要顯著，因此本競賽產品「智能化綜合交換機構之擴充式刀庫交換系統」閃亮問世，其符合市場需求之適切功能如下說明：
1.	擁有三項台灣新型專利。
2.	可擴充式鏈式刀庫系統，可容納5倍以上儲刀數量。
3.	雙軸雙臂與工具機雙主軸進行取換刀，產能效率倍數成長。
4.	雙導層上下移動驅動裝置，換刀效率提升1倍。
5.	傳動機構全伺服驅動設計，整機定位精度與移動效率零擔憂。
6.	驅動皮帶斷裂即停之安全裝置，換刀系統具智慧化安全功能。
7.	建立設備健康狀態即時監測與預診技術，設備故障預防確保加工品質及效率。

本競賽產品可廣泛運用在船舶製造、交通運輸、航太科技、3C產業、綠能環保、農業製造與學術
單位…等產業，若加以推廣行銷後，一年可為全球工具機產業增加約22億元銷售金額的附加價值。

LGW 系列產品有著高品質、高精度、高荷重、高於市場需求，絕對是線馬模組市場最不容忽視的商品。

translations.name: High-precision built-in linear guiderail linear motor module
translations.description:
The LGW series products adopt for high-accuracy Built-in linear guide rail design with the brand new self-developed linear motor. The mainframe shortens to 64~75mm. which is the lowest height among the same level product, reducing the installation space and providing customers more options for the application under flat and tough assembly situations.

Comparing with the previous generation design, the self-developed linear motor increases more than 20% of available payload under the same structure size, with a maximum 3G Acc/Dec speed and 2500mm/s speed which massively reduces the cycle time and increases production efficiency to satisfy the market request.

The main structure shrinks more than 40% comparing with other brands, and the compact mechanism presents a high rigid and high-quality design ability. With the modularized design, customers don’t need to purchase separately the stator, optical scale, and sensor to install, which can reduce import time and manpower cost.

translations.name: 直線步進線馬滑台
translations.description:
工業4.0時代的來臨加速產業導入自動化生產，高明鐵開發這款符合市場需求免外掛位置回授機制的直線步進線馬滑台，其獨特性是具備步進馬達的優勢，可直接分割定位，不僅改善因嚴苛荷重和推力條件導致的應用環境限制，更具備簡易位置控制的特點，大幅提升使用率，該產品搭配開迴步進驅動器和步進伺服驅動器可達到±5um/±1um的高精度表現，產品組合搭配不受限於伺服控制驅動器，可節省約50%的成本費用，該產品適用於半導體及自動移載等應用。

translations.description: Moving into Industry 4.0, the era of smart factory automation is to speed automated production. GMT has developed this Linear Stepper Stage that meets market needs and does not require an external position feedback mechanism. The uniqueness of it has stepper motor advantage, can partition positioning directly, and increase utilization rate. Not only it improves application’s environmental restrictions caused by severe load and thrust conditions, but also it has simple position control characteristic. The linear stepper stage is equipped with open loop driver (stepper servo driver), the accuracy can reach ±5um (±1um). When servo controlled driver is no longer only option, the cost can be saved about 50%. This product is suitable for applications such as semiconductors and automatic transfer.

translations.name: Rotary Gripper Module
translations.description: GMT has developed this Rotary Gripper Module meets market needs with both rotary and clamping functions. The uniqueness of its rotary and clamping functions can be operated independently and controlled by the drive controller alone. You can simply control independence movement without two-axis simultaneous correction, infinite rotation of the rotation angle solves wire winding problem. It increases diversity of single-axis module assembly, it is no longer limited to single product application. The product adopts closed-loop feedback control, which is convenient for users to make compensation actions according to the operating conditions, thereby improving accuracy and stability. The Rotary gripper module is equipped with GMT dedicated driver, which has the characteristics of simplified programming, simple control, and rapid application. This product is suitable for applications such as biomedical industry, pharmaceutical inspection automation industry, and assembly industry automation.

translations.name: ROMI 先進之環 直驅馬達
translations.description:
大銀微系統開發ROMI先進之環之超薄型直驅馬達，英文全名為Ring of Metrology and Inspection，適用半導體製程、LED製程、電路板檢測以及各式AOI應用等，並因應市場趨於高產出率、高廠房面積利用率、高設備使用周期、低維護時間，根據市場需求開發以下功能：
(1)	輕薄：2.2cm的薄度可謂全球市場唯一，透過輕薄特性使設備重心降低，以利設備運行穩定，增加生產速度。
(2)	大中空：中央大幅鏤空達Ø24cm，可使各項物件自由穿梭，實現簡易安裝，縮小設備體積。
(3)	耐用：直接透過馬達驅動方式，免去機械磨耗，大幅提昇設備使用壽命。
(4)	潔淨：無額外機械結構，可以免去磨耗發塵且易於保養維護，降低發塵與汙染情況發生。

translations.name: ROMI direct drive motor
translations.description:
ROMI, short for Ring of Metrology and Inspection, an ultra-thin direct drive motor developed by HIWIN MIKROSYSTEM, can be applicable to semiconductor/LED manufacturing process, PCB inspection and various AOI applications. In response to market trends, such as high output rate, high plant area utilization rate, high equipment life cycle and low maintenance time, the following functions have been developed:
1. Lightweight (width 2.2cm): This lowers the center of gravity of equipment to facilitate the stability of operation and to increase the production rate.
2. Large hollow (Ø24cm): This allows various objects to shuttle freely in the center to realize simplified installation and to reduce the size of equipment.
3. Durable: Directly driven by the motor can avoid mechanical abrasion and greatly increase the service life of equipment.
4. Clean: Without extra mechanical structure, it can avoid wear and dust, reduce dust and pollution, and make users easily perform care and maintenance.

translations.name: 智慧窗簾整合系統
translations.description:
本產品國內獨創且世界領先產品，已通過智慧建材標章認證，為國內唯一取得此認證之窗簾業者。將窗簾結合IoT物聯網技術，整合窗簾、軟體、燈光完美結合，可任意控制單窗、多窗或整棟窗簾群控。透過光照計、小型氣象站、太陽曆軌跡圖收集大數據至中央控制主機加以分析後，下指令至各窗簾全自動精準智慧控制，使窗簾達到指定位置遮陽，或陰天光照不足時，優先開啟窗簾補充光源，提供建築物節能減碳方案。
獨特性如下：
(1) 採精準的電子定位，可延伸與其他智慧環控系統應用。
(2) 運轉時精準、平穩、安靜。
(3) 整合網路、控制、構造及組裝，設計運用多樣化。
(4) 中控整合，雙向反饋，管理方便。
本產品從市場導向，2020年開發完成並進入商業化，政府將智慧綠建築做為重點發展的新興產業，大力推展智慧建築標章，通過智慧建材標章將提升產品在智慧建築領域的價值。應用面以大型建築物或商、廠辦為主，提供客戶打造整齊美觀、高科技的工作環境，減少空調運轉負荷，帶來節能省電的高效率。

translations.name: Smart Curtain Integration System
translations.description:
The only MIT curtain system that has obtained the Intelligent Building Materials certification! With the help of the illuminometer, micro weather station and solar calendar chart, it automatically generates orders to control the curtains based on the collected data. When it is too bright, the curtains will be pulled to an optimal position to block the sunlight; when it is dim, the curtains will then be opened to conserve energy and reduce carbon emission for the building.
(1) Accurate electronic positioning with connectivity with other intelligent environment control system.
(2) Precise, steady and quiet throughout the operations.
(3) Integrate the network, control, structure and assembly for design and utilization diversity.
(4) Central integration, two-way feedback, easy management.
Designed primarily for buildings, it enables people to build a tidy, good-looking and high-tech environment while reducing the usage of ACs, thereby saving energy efficiently.

translations.name: 智慧語音蜂巢窗簾
translations.description:
本產品為國內獨創，將窗簾與數位通訊、IoT物聯網、智能音箱互相結合，無須透過轉接器做中介連結，直接與語音原生系統整合，可快速切入APPLE iOS與Google Android兩大行動系統之智慧家庭市場，並符合目前國際窗簾無繩化的潮流，其獨特性如下：
(1) 獨特蜂巢型中空結構，可將空氣儲存中空層，保持室內恆溫、隔熱保暖兼具吸音，吸音效果達30%。
(2) 有效遮陽及防紫外線，降低空調使用量，可節省用電並提高節能效率，有效節能減碳。
(3) 精準電子式定位，運轉時平穩、安靜，精準到達定位。

本產品創新優勢、特色如下：

(2) 省電節能：DC直流高效率馬達，低電壓、低功耗設計，運轉精準、平穩、安靜。先進高科技設計零組件，待機超低功耗。
(3) 智能整合：與原生APP直接串接，無須透過轉接器中介連結。語音控制，雙向反饋，管理方便。

The first MIT smart curtain that integrates digital communication, IoT and smart voice controls without the need of adapter.

Modules with advanced high-tech design ensures super low standby power consumption. Effectively blocks sunlight and prevents UV ray penetration, reducing the AC usage while raising energy conservation and carbon reduction.

(4) Smart integration: Direct connection with original apps. Equipped with native voice system of iOS and Android which is easy to manage.

translations.name: 人因照明智慧路燈
translations.description: 人口逐漸都市化，世界各國政府面臨電力需求、交通壅塞、資訊流通以及環境汙染等等，因此，各國致力推動發展智慧城市，運用各種創新科技與技術，解決能源、交通、環境等各類問題。而各國也意識到「路燈」是促成智慧城市的重要基礎建設，不僅在城市中形成綿密的網路系統，搭配感測器研發技術，更能創造許多智慧應用；結合輝度影像與智慧光型控制技術的「人因照明智慧路燈」應運而生，「人因照明智慧路燈」利用影像辨識技術運算照明的輝度及路面的光照均勻度，讓路燈輸出的電壓值達到最佳化，根據智慧光型控制系統建立的預測模型，同時搭配無線智慧控制模組及特殊設計光學引擎，可依據環境偵測條件接收控制模組訊號後，即時進行光型變換，即便天氣變化大，還是可以讓照明因地制宜，保持均勻視覺特性，藉此增加用路人的安全。

translations.name: Human-Centric Smart Lighting System
translations.description: Governments all over the world are facing problems such as traffic congestion, information circulation, environmental pollution, etc. Therefore, all countries are committed to promote the development of smart cities and using various innovative technologies and technologies to solve various problems. And countries are also aware that street lighting are an important infrastructure to promote smart cities. "Human-oriented intelligent lighting system" uses image recognition technology to calculate lighting brightness and road surface luminosity uniformity. Switching distribution in time can be supported since the optical engines can detect the condition after receiving signals which is established by prediction system with wireless in the intelligent light control system. Even if the weather changes dramatically, it can still be adjusted to local conditions to maintain pedestrian safety.

translations.name: 濃霧對策雙色溫智慧路燈
translations.description:
路燈是道路上重要的基礎建設，肩負夜間照明的重責大任。全世界的城市都在推動LED照明替代傳統燈具，除了具有顯著的節電成效，LED路燈更可針對不同區域選用因地制宜的色溫、亮度及光型，近乎客製化，提供每個鄉鎮最適切的夜間照明。 
雙色溫智慧路燈可搭配感測器及管理平台，實現適時適地的創新路燈應用：
1.於濃霧及大雨時提供低色溫路燈照明，透過低色溫路燈較高的雨霧穿透力，提供較佳的道路照明。
2.於用路尖峰時端提供高色溫路燈照明，用路人較能集中精神且不易昏睡，較佳的發光效率也方便用路人分辨物件遠近。在用路離峰時段提供低色溫路燈照明，降低路燈照射區域的蟲害及減少人眼傷害。
3.透過漸進式調整路燈色溫，避免用路人視線中突如其來的色溫改變，導致眼睛不適。

translations.name: Dynamic Smart Lighting System
translations.description:
Street lighting is an important infrastructure and the illuminated lead at the night. Cities all over the world are promoting LED lighting to replace traditional lamps. In addition to energy saving and carbon dioxide reduction, LED street lighting can also support color temperature, brightness and light type tailored to local conditions in  different areas.
Dynamic Smart Lighting System:
1. Provide low color temperature street lighting in dense fog and heavy rain, and provide better road lighting through the higher rain and fog penetration of low color temperature street lamps.
2. Provide high color temperature street lighting at the rush hour. The better luminous efficiency also create the friendly condition for passers-by to distinguish the distance of objects. Provide low color temperature street lighting during the off-peak hours to reduce the damage from illumination in and human eye.

translations.name: 儲能系統解決方案
translations.description:
台達儲能系統解決方案是一套可調度並調節電力，強化供電與電網可靠度、穩定再生能源發展，並提升廠辦能源使用效率的電力系統。台達具備研發、生產、整合的全套能力，可提供一站式解決方案，包含模擬規劃工具、功率調節系統、電池儲能系統、控制系統、能源管理系統、整合測試、建置與維運服務。
解決方案採用模組化配置設計，可針對電廠與電網輔助、微電網、工商業用電大戶等不同儲能應用型態，彈性配置最適當的容量、種類、裝置型態的設備與電池，具體協助電業確保供電穩定性，並幫助工商用戶參與輔助服務或滿足用電大戶條款、RE100供應鏈等需求。
以2020年完成的台電金門夏興電廠儲能系統的發電機緊急備用電源應用為例，台達儲能系統解決方案透過精準控制電力輸出入，可於偵測到跳機後0.2秒內即時救援，幫助穩定電網。結合台達獨創的「多工排程運行」模式，除了備用電源，亦可同時設定頻率調節、再生能源平滑等多種能源管理應用，將儲能系統的性能餘裕運用極致。針對市場最重視的安全性，台達電池系統包含完善的電池管理系統、提前告警、防延燒等設計，可避免意外發生或將傷害與損失最小化，讓客戶可安心將儲能系統導入電力系統與工業廠區。

translations.name: Energy Storage Solution
translations.description:
Delta’s Energy System Solution (ESS) can dispatch and regulate power to strengthen the reliability of the power supply, stabilize development of renewables, and help industrial users participate in auxiliary services or meet RE100 requirements.

It includes a simulation tool, power conditioning system, battery system, control and energy management system, as well as construction and maintenance services. It adopts a modular design that can be flexibly configured for the most appropriate capacity, type, and form factor of equipment for different applications. Aiming at safety, it includes battery management system, anti-extended burn design, and more.

Take the generator backup as an example. Delta’s ESS can accurately controls power and maintain power supply within 0.2 seconds after detecting a trip. Combined with Delta’s original multitask operation mode, multiple applications, such as frequency regulation and PV smoothing, can also be set at the same time to maximize ESS performance.

translations.name: 美學光電建築解決方案
translations.description: 全球36%的能源消耗來自建築物，同時建築物也直接或間接影響全球40%的CO2排放，為了達到淨零碳排(Net Zero Emissions)，建築光電化是不可避免的趨勢。友達的美學光電建築解決方案著重於提供建築物再生能源利用之餘也能兼顧建築物外觀美感，使再生能源於建築物上的利用同時具備能源效益、減碳效益、隔熱效益與美學效益。設計考量重點為圖案化色彩鮮豔度提升並保有具市場競爭力的功率輸出，模組於垂直牆面的安裝便利性與安全性、大面積圖案經圖案化模組拼接後的完整性。期許透過美學光電建築完整解決方案，打造新一代智慧綠建築，不僅能滿足客戶對於美學的要求，更能以綠色能源轉換自發自用，為地球多盡一份心力，創造共生共榮。實現人類對美好生活的願景與想像。

translations.name: AUO Sun Bello total solution
translations.description:
According to statistics from the International Energy Agency (IEA) in 2020, buildings consume 40% of global energy. Since 2018, European countries have passed the Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD) amendment to strengthen the energy management and monitoring system to reach n-ZEB (Net-Zero Emission Building). AUO Sun Bello solutions emphasized not only to have extra energy generation but also keep architectural material functions include noise reduction, heat insulation, beauty appearance.
And with AUO specific racking system, can install Sun Bello modules easily and safely. Suitable for roof, façade, balcony, signage.

translations.name: 1,000總噸級研究船
translations.description:
「新海研1號」為台船公司首次建造之海洋研究船系列。我國四面環海，海洋資源研究及探索十分重要，本輪之建造不僅嘉惠國內研究機構及學界，有助於擴展海洋環境與生態研究等領域之視野，於國內水槽進行船模試驗，亦能儲備未來大型海研船之設計與驗證能力。
本輪主要尺寸小，探測儀器及研究設備甚多，須於有限空間內有效佈置與整合。聲納系統為本輪重點設備。為使聲納系統能正常運作，水下聲納位置須與線形結合設計，以防流場氣泡干擾聲納系統，並以防擾流造成錯誤影響。除要求機械噪音管制外，亦須於海試時須依DNV驗船協會規範進行水下噪音量測。

translations.name: 1000GT Class Research Vessel
translations.description:
" R/V NEW OCEAN RESEARCHER 1" is the research vessel which is designed, built and delivered by CSBC. Taiwan is an island country, therefore, ocean resource research and exploration are very important. This vessel will bring benefit to domestic research institutions to expand the horizon of marine environment and ecological research.
This vessel is well equipped with many detectors and equipment, which means, naval architectures shall pay more attentions, to integrate all of them in a limited space. For example, the sonar system is one of the key equipment of this vessel. In order to make sure the accuracy, the flow lines shall be optimized, to avoid the interference caused from air bubbles. In the other hand, to achieve better ship power performance, and prevent the negative effect generated from cross flow. The background noise of the vessel itself is also minimized, in accordance with the regulations of DNV Ship Surveying Association regulates underwater noise measurement.

translations.name: 天眼5G轉播無人機
translations.description:
[雷虎天眼5G轉播無人機]的特點:
1.新科技應用: 雷虎科技全新開發之[雷虎天眼5G轉播無人機]整合高畫質相機雲台及5G高壓縮4K影像圖傳技術，具有長時間飛行及高酬載能力。目前大型新聞事件的現場轉播，電視台直播都是利用衞星轉播車（SNG車），僅能提供有限的地面視角，且費用昂貴。雷虎中大型電動無人直升機具有高酬載且安全、安靜、容易操控特性，並且結合國內外技術，讓無人機可自動避障及視距外飛行，加上5G的通訊時代及影像壓縮技術的突破，可進行即時新聞畫面拍攝及串流服務。
2.高效率直升機構型設計：可變螺距的直升機構型是專為搭載高清影像設備長時間飛行所設計。產品本身的結構設計是依據真實的直升機做為藍本可大幅增加操控之安全性及穩定性，精密的傳動機構及高升力旋翼設計讓本產品成為高效率的空中直播利器。
3.完善的安全系統：直升機頂部設計有光達避障感應器，可即時偵測周遭障礙物。另外航電系統均搭配雙GPS/雙IMU元件，能夠讓無人機更安全的執行任務。最新的AI影像辨識降落系統讓直升機精準智能的自動降落，無人機可大幅增加電視台在災難新聞事件現場轉播能力，提升報導作業效率與拍攝安全性。

translations.name: SkyEye 5G UAV
translations.description: The newly developed T-200 SkyEye 5G Live Streaming UAV by Thunder Tiger integrates high-quality camera gimbal and 5G high-compression image transmission technology, with long-term flight and high payload capability. At present, the live broadcast of large-scale news events and the live broadcast of TV Company use satellite news gathering vehicles (SNG vehicles), which can only provide a limited ground view and are expensive. The Thunder Tiger's SkyEye 5G Live Streaming UAV, as a large electric unmanned helicopter, It can stay in the air for nearly 60 minutes. The UAV can automatically avoid obstacles and conduct out of sight flight, coupled with breakthroughs in 5G communication equipment and image compression technology, provides real-time 5G transmitted news screen shooting and streaming services, making it possible to broadcast real-time news 4K images in the air, and become the world's leading 5G-4K image live broadcast equipment in the air.
